quotes.quote: “‎Someone's opinion of you does not have to become your reality.”
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.quote: “A great tree develops over time and can tell stories not only those of happiness, but also those that contain pain from what it has seen over the years, and as a result is the wise ancient tree that it is today. As the seasons change, the tree naturally goes through changes as well: where the leaves turn yellow and orange in the fall, falling by the Winter, returning in the Spring, and with full set of new leafs by the Summer. Love is no different in that there will be times when we are fully naked in the Winter, and left to wonder about Spring when it seemed so easy to love, yet the wise tree knows that no winter will last forever no matter how cold it may be.”
quotes.author: Forrest Curran

quotes.quote: “We become so absorbed in our flaws and faults that we forget that it is better to be a diamond with a flaw than a pebble without. To have flaws is beauty in itself, a fact so frightening that we hurry to hide them from sight and tarnish the whole in the process of comparing ourselves to others.”
quotes.author: Forrest Curran

quotes.quote: “As I naturally go through a full range of emotions in my life, I mustn’t feel ashamed for feeling lost, for it is honest and human to feel such.”
quotes.author: Forrest Curran

quotes.quote: “Make the choice to embrace this day. Do not let your TODAY be stolen by the ghost of yesterday or the "To-Do" list of tomorrow! It’s inspiring to see all the wonderfully amazing things that can happen in a day in which you participate.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “People in general would rather die than forgive. It'shard. If God said in plain language. "I'm giving you a choice, forgive or die," a lot of people would go ahead and order their coffin.”
quotes.author: Sue Monk Kidd

quotes.quote: “Just because Fate doesn't deal you the right cards, it doesn't mean you should give up. It just means you have to play the cards you get to their maximum potential.”
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.quote: “Firm was my resolve
quotes.author: Alok Mishra

quotes.quote: “One day in my shoes and a day for me in your shoes, the beauty of travel lies in the ease and willingness to be more open.”
quotes.author: Forrest Curran

quotes.quote: “Perfection does not exist -- you can always do better and you can always grow.”
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.quote: “You don't have to get it perfect, you just have to get it going. Babies don't walk the first time they try, but eventually they get it right”
quotes.author: Jack Canfield

quotes.quote: “Some we proudly display on our arms, while others we shyly conceal. Tattoo the moments of sorrow as well as the moments of splendor and beauty. Tattoo in an acknowledgment and tribute to home, and tattooing your beliefs that define who you are. Whether we intended to or not, every moment of our lives are tattooed to our heart.”
quotes.author: Forrest Curran

quotes.quote: “Whether you know or not, you are the infinite potential of love, peace and joy”
quotes.author: Amit Ray

quotes.quote: “You need mountains, long staircases don't make good hikers.”
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: “You can lose your MONEY. You can lose your FRIENDS. You can lose your JOB and you can lose your MARRIAGE...and still recover...as long as there is HOPE. Never lose HOPE.”
quotes.author: John Paul Warren

quotes.quote: “Orang yang tidak pernah dibakar panas mentari, mustahil menghargai rimbun berteduh - peribahasa Turki.”
quotes.author: Hasrizal Abdul Jamil

quotes.quote: “You cannot continue on the same path and arrive at a different destination. Make the choice to have your actions reflect your goals.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “When you are lonely for a while don't get restless, if you had born alone, you are going to die alone then for sometime you can certainly live alone.”
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: “لا يمكنك أن تُنجز شيئا إذا أعطيته نصف وقتك ولا يمكنك أن تحب شخصا إذا أعطيته نصف قلبك”
quotes.author: ياسر حارب

quotes.quote: “Fear can only grow in darkness. Once you face fear with light, you win.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “We can't undo a single thing we have ever done, but we can make decisions today that propel us to the life we want and towards the healing we need.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “You can't just wish change; you have to live the change in order for it to become a reality.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “Reading the Bible will help you get to know the word, but it’s when you put it down and live your life that you get to know the author.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “Be wise today so you don't cry tomorrow.”
quotes.author: E.A. Bucchianeri

quotes.quote: “A very small percentage of the people in this world will actually experience and live today. So many people will be stuck on another day, another time that traumatized them and caused them to spiritually stutter so they miss out on this day.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “I hope you find true meaning, contentment, and passion in your life. I hope you navigate the difficult times and come out with greater strength and resolve. I hope you find whatever balance you seek with your eyes wide open. And I hope that you - yes, you - have the ambition to lean in to your career and run the world. Because the world needs you to change it.”
quotes.author: Sheryl Sandberg

quotes.quote: “You are what you believe in. You become that which you believe you can become”
quotes.author: Bhagavad Gita

quotes.quote: “To assess the quality of thoughts of people, don't listen to their words, but watch their actions.”
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: “If you want to find happiness, find gratitude.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “Do it first and feel about it afterwards.' - Dagny Taggart”
quotes.author: Ayn Rand

quotes.quote: “Everyone's time is limited. What matters most is to focus on what matters most.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “Never allow your mind to wander untamed like a wild animal that exists on the basis of survival of the fittest. Tame your mind with consistent focus on your goals and desires.”
quotes.author: Stephen Richards

quotes.quote: “Grateful souls focus on the happiness and abundance present in their lives and this in turn attracts more abundance and joy towards them.”
quotes.author: Stephen Richards

quotes.quote: “It is not as much about who you used to be, as it is about who you choose to be.”
quotes.author: Sanhita Baruah

quotes.quote: “Intelligence is more important than strength, that is why earth is ruled by men and not by animals.”
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: “Life is a balanced system of learning and evolution. Whether pleasure or pain; every situation in your life serves a purpose. It is up to us to recognize what that purpose could be.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “Manifesting is a lot like making a cake. The things needed are supplied by you, the mixing is done by your mind and the baking is done in the oven of the universe.”
quotes.author: Stephen Richards

quotes.quote: “[Greens] don't come through the back door the same as other groceries. They don't cower at the bottom of paper bags marked 'Liberty.' They wave over the top. They don't stop to be checked off the receipt. They spill out onto the counter. No going onto shelves with cans in orderly lines like school children waiting for recess. No waiting, sometimes for years beyond the blue sell by date, to be picked up and taken from the shelf. Greens don't stack or stand at attention. They aren't peas to be pushed around. Cans can't contain them. Boxed in they would burst free. Greens are wild. Plunging them into a pot took some doing. Only lobsters fight more. Either way, you have to use your hands. Then, retrieving them requires the longest of my mother's wooden spoons, the one with the burnt end. Swept onto a plate like the seaweed after a storm, greens sit tall, dark, and proud.”
quotes.author: Georgia Scott

quotes.quote: “A smile is the best way to get oneself out of a tight spot, even if it is a fake one. Surprisingly enough, everyone takes it at face value. I read that in a book."
quotes.author: Naruto Shippuden

quotes.quote: “I’ll detach myself from the crowd if it hinders my growth,
quotes.author: Hareem Ch

quotes.quote: “Before this generation lose the wisdom, one advice - read books.”
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: “When admiring other people's gardens, don't forget to tend to your own flowers.”
quotes.author: Sanober Khan

quotes.quote: “No one rises to low expectations”
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.quote: “Do you love yourself enough to BE what you love yourself enough to WANT?”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “One of the most healing things you can do is recognize where in your life you are your own poison.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “‎By reacting from fear instead of responding from love, you inject poison directly into the veins of your relationship.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “You are the perfect creation of God. Don't allow you to be down. God is experiencing through you.”
quotes.author: Amit Ray

quotes.quote: “It is better to aim high and miss than to aim low and hit.”
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.quote: “Let today be the day that you become committed in being, in doing, in getting, achieving, in experiencing. Let today be the day that you are committed to being the change you wish to see and living the life you wish to live.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “Be happy with who you are and what you do, and you can do anything you want.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “It's up to you today to start making healthy choices. Not choices that are just healthy for your body, but healthy for your mind.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “Do not let another day go by where your dedication to other people's opinions is greater than your dedication to your own emotions!”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “Although time seems to fly, it never travels faster than one day at a time. Each day is a new opportunity to live your life to the fullest. In each waking day, you will find scores of blessings and opportunities for positive change. Do not let your TODAY be stolen by the unchangeable past or the indefinite future! Today is a new day!”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “Confidence is like a dragon where, for every head cut off, two more heads grow back.”
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: “People are successful because they think and act like successful people.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “Always Remember to take your Vitamins: Take your Vitamin A for ACTION, Vitamin B for Belief, Vitamin C for Confidence ,Vitamin D for Discipline, Vitamin E for Enthusiasm!!”
quotes.author: Pablo

quotes.quote: “Not all dreamers are winners, but all winners are dreamers. Your dream is the key to your future. The Bible says that, "without a vision (dream), a people perish." You need a dream, if you're going to succeed in anything you do.”
quotes.author: Mark Gorman

quotes.quote: “The size of your dreams must always exceed your current capacity to achieve them. If your dreams do not scare you, they are not big enough.”
quotes.author: Ellen Johnson Sirleaf

quotes.quote: “A birth-date is a reminder to celebrate the life as well as to update the life.”
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: “Despite everything, it's still you.”
quotes.author: Toby Fox

quotes.quote: “Do more listening than talking; talk more about them than about you.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “At school, new ideas are thrust at you every day. Out in the world, you'll have to find your inner motivation to seek for new ideas on your own.”
quotes.author: Bill Watterson

quotes.quote: “You can't hang around waiting for somebody else to pull your strings. Destiny's what you make of it. You have to face whatever life throws at you. And if it throws more than you'd like, more than you think you can handle? Well then you just have to find the heroism within yourself and play out the hand you've been dealt. The universe never sets a challenge that can't be met. You just need to believe in yourself in order to find the strength to face it.”
quotes.author: Darren Shan

quotes.quote: “When you start giving, instead of getting, you make a difference. You can always give a warm smile, a sincere hello, a positive vibe… your attention, your time, your love, and kindness to those around you.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “One word of encouragement can be enough to spark someone’s motivation to continue with a difficult challenge.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “I conclude therefore that, fortune being changeful and mankind steadfast in their ways, so long as the two are in agreement men are successful, but unsuccessful when they fall out. For my part I consider that it is better to be adventurous than cautious, because fortune is a woman, and if you wish to keep her under it is necessary to beat and ill-use her; and it is seen that she allows herself to be mastered by the adventurous rather than by those who go to work more coldly. She is, therefore, always, woman-like, a lover of young men, because they are less cautious, more violent, and with more audacity command her.”
quotes.author: Niccolò Machiavelli

quotes.quote: “With a hint of good judgment, to fear nothing, not failure or suffering or even death, indicates that you value life the most. You live to the extreme; you push limits; you spend your time building legacies. Those do not die.”
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: “Forgive yourself for your faults and your mistakes and move on.”
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.quote: “The difference between greed and ambition is a greedy person desires things he isn't prepared to work for.”
quotes.author: Habeeb Akande

quotes.quote: “The power to change your life lies in the simplest of steps.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “Today, many will choose to live free of conditions and rules governing their own happiness. Why not you? Do not let another day go by where your dedication to other people's opinions is greater than your dedication to your own emotions! Today's a new day!”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “Success is a poor teacher”
quotes.author: Robert Kiyosaki

quotes.quote: “We can’t help the way we’re born. We can’t help what we are, only what life we choose to make for ourselves.”
quotes.author: Leigh Bardugo

quotes.quote: “What we perceive about ourselves is greatly a reflection of how we will end up living our lives.”
quotes.author: Stephen Richards

quotes.quote: “Soar with wit. Conquer with dignity. Handle with care.”
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: “The lust for comfort kills the passions of the soul.”
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.quote: “Yawns are not the only infectious things out there besides germs.
quotes.author: Vera Nazarian

quotes.quote: “I will heighten my life by helping others heighten theirs”
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.quote: “Do the things you used to talk about doing but never did. Know when to let go and when to hold on tight. Stop rushing. Don't be intimidated to say it like it is. Stop apologizing all the time. Learn to say no, so your yes has some oomph. Spend time with the friends who lift you up, and cut loose the ones who bring you down. Stop giving your power away. Be more concerned with being interested than being interesting. Be old enough to appreciate your freedom, and young enough to enjoy it. Finally know who you are.”
quotes.author: Kristin Armstrong

quotes.quote: “It’s time to care; it’s time to take responsibility; it’s time to lead; it’s time for a change; it’s time to be true to our greatest self; it’s time to stop blaming others.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “When I face the desolate impossibility of writing five hundred pages, a sick sense of failure falls on me, and I know I can never do it. Then gradually, I write one page and then another. One day's work is all I can permit myself to contemplate.”
quotes.author: John Steinbeck

quotes.quote: “Are you going to allow the world around you to change while you remain stagnant? Make this the time you throw away old habits that have hindered your happiness and success and finally allow your greatest self to flourish.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “How would your life be different if…You pretended those around you were deaf to your words? Let today be the day…You let your actions speak and communicate your feelings and intentions.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “Life itself is simple...it's just not easy.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “You've been given the innate power to shape your life...but you cannot just speak change, you have to LIVE change. Intent paired with action builds the bridge to success. You can't just want it; you have to do it, live it...BE it! Success isn't something you have, it's something you DO!”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “You are where you are right now because of the actions you've taken, or maybe, the inaction you've taken.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “Think of the patience God has had for you and let it resonate to others. If you want a more patient world, let patience be your motto”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “It is better to find your courage to make changes when you can choose to rather than being forced to. If you do not make change, change will make you.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “Therefore it is unnecessary for a prince to have all the good qualities I have enumerated, but it is very necessary to appear to have them. And I shall dare to say this also, that to have them and always to observe them is injurious, and that to appear to have them is useful; to appear merciful, faithful, humane, religious, upright, and to be so, but with a mind so framed that should you require not to be so, you may be able and know how to change to the opposite.”
quotes.author: Niccolò Machiavelli

quotes.quote: “The whole value of solitude depends upon oneself; it may be a sanctuary or a prison, a haven of repose or a place of punishment, a heaven or a hell, as we ourselves make it.”
quotes.author: John Lubbock

quotes.quote: “Shoot for the moon. Even if you miss, you'll land among the stars.”
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.quote: “Politeness is the first thing people lose once they get the power.”
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: “The value of surrounding yourself with positive people is not what you get from them, but how good a person you have become because of them.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “How would your life be different if…You stopped focusing on what you didn’t want and started focusing on what you do want? Let today be the day…You establish a clear intent, make a plan, and take actions towards your intent.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “Scholars, theologians, and even poets have yet to be able to truly describe and touch upon the beauty, romance, and magic of a relationship built on 100% authenticity”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “If you don’t know exactly where you’re going, how will you know when you get there?”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “The here and now is all we have, and if we play it right it's all we'll need.”
quotes.author: Ann Richards

quotes.quote: “Kindness is universal. Sometimes being kind allows others to see the goodness in humanity through you. Always be kinder than necessary.”
quotes.author: Germany Kent

quotes.quote: “Resources are hired to give results, not reasons.”
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: “What would have become of Hercules do you think if there had been no lion, hydra, stag or boar - and no savage criminals to rid the world of? What would he have done in the absence of such challenges?
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.quote: “When you are angry try your best to go to sleep, it keeps you away from speaking, writing and thinking while you are angry.”
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: “All worries are less with wine.”
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: “A friend who is far away is sometimes much nearer than one who is at hand.”
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.quote: “You don't have to be great to get started but you have to get started to be great.”
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.quote: “Until one is committed there is hesitancy, the chance to draw back, always ineffectiveness. Concerning all acts of initative or creation, there is one elementary truth...that the moment one definitely commits oneself, then Providence moves. too. All sorts of things occur to help one that would otherwise never have occurred. A whole stream of events issues from the decision, raising in ones's favor all manner of incidents and meetings and material assistance which no man would have believed would have come his way.
quotes.author: W.H. Murray The Scottish Himalayan Expedition

quotes.quote: “Your feelings wouldn't get hurt if you were honest with yourself”
quotes.author: Tye Lewis

quotes.quote: “The way you live your day is a sentence in the story of your life. Each day you make the choice whether the sentence ends with a period, question mark, or exclamation point.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “At any given point you can release your greatest self. Don’t let anyone hold you back. Don’t let anyone dilute you. Don’t be peer pressured into being less than you are. People willing to dilute themselves for the sake of others is one of the great tragedies of our time. Stop letting others define and set the pace for your life. Get out there and be your best. Do your best. Live your best. Make every day count and you’ll see how exponentially more exciting, thrilling, successful, happy and full your life will be.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “Most people think the biggest sacrifice, the greates act of love you can give is to die for someone. And probably it is. But Sometimes it is the opposite. The biggest thing you can do for someone is to live.”
quotes.author: Sarah Wylie

quotes.quote: “Once you start recognizing the truth of your story, finish the story. It happened but you're still here, you're still capable, powerful, you're not your circumstance. It happened and you made it through. You're still fully equipped with every single tool you need to fulfill your purpose.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “When you find yourself in need of spiritual nourishment, it is in the opportunities to serve others that you will find the abundance you seek.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “The purpose of fear is to raise your awareness not to stop your progress.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “Although I deeply love oceans, deserts and other wild landscapes, it is only mountains that beckon me with that sort of painful magnetic pull to walk deeper and deeper into their beauty. They keep me continuously wanting to know more, feel more, see more.”
quotes.author: Victoria Erickson

quotes.quote: “When you do what you love, the seemingly impossible becomes simply challenging, the laborious becomes purposeful resistance, the difficult loses its edge and is trampled by your progress.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “I may not be where I want to be but I'm thankful for not being where I used to be.”
quotes.author: Habeeb Akande

quotes.quote: “You know you're doing what you love when Sunday nights feel the same as Friday nights....”
quotes.author: Donny Deutsch

quotes.quote: “NEVER be surprised by your own success!”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “We only live once. We all have an expiration date after that we will never come again. I am not saying that to make you sad. I am saying that so you can cherish each moment in your life and be grateful that you are here and you are Special”
quotes.author: Pablo

quotes.quote: “I can’t think of anything more disheartening than living a life without a clear purpose.”
quotes.author: Daniel Willey

quotes.quote: “The moment you become friends with your inner Self, you realize that the failures or hindrances that you met earlier were caused more by your disconnected status with your inner Being.”
quotes.author: Stephen Richards

quotes.quote: “Your agreement with reality defines your life.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “People who don't see you every day have a hard time understanding how on some days--good days--you can run three miles, but can barely walk across the parking lot on other days,' [my mom] said quietly.”
quotes.author: Jennifer Starzec

quotes.quote: “But when your sword breaks, you draw your dagger.”
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: “Success is something you experience when you act accordingly. Success is not something you have, it's something you do.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “If you do whatever it takes to accomplish your goals to live the life you desire, It will be worth it. I promise! But if you find some excuse to justify quitting your journey, you will regret it. This is also a promise!" -gbb”
quotes.author: Glenn Brandon Burke

quotes.quote: “A different vantage point gives us new information, and with that information we can begin to change our approach.”
quotes.author: Steve Pemberton

quotes.quote: “I do not care about happiness simply because I believe that joy is something worth fighting for.”
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: “The best way to succeed is to have a specific Intent, a clear Vision, a plan of Action, and the ability to maintain Clarity. Those are the Four Pillars of Success. It never fails!”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “People change for two main reasons:
quotes.author: Steven Aitchison

quotes.quote: “If you don't sacrifice for what you want, what you want becomes the sacrifice”
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: “If you get clear on the what, the how will be taken care of.”
quotes.author: Jack Canfield

quotes.quote: “If you have the courage to be honest with everyone, including yourself, you may hurt a few people's feelings, but they will forever value your opinion more than your half truths.”
quotes.author: Steven Aitchison

quotes.quote: “Having uncompromising belief also means safeguarding your own spirit, defining who and what you want in your life.”
quotes.author: Steve Pemberton

quotes.quote: “The difference between those who adapted and those who didn't, Gorton said, was a willingness to totally commit.”
quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quotes.quote: “Purposeful planning is most effective when you are actively seeking and getting feedback from those whose judgement you trust and respect.”
quotes.author: Steve Pemberton

quotes.quote: “When a man is pushed, tormented, defeated, he has a chance to learn something.”
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: “The universe doesn’t give you what you ask for with your thoughts; it gives you what you demand with your actions. In essence, you don't get what you WANT, you get what you ARE.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “Your environment will eat your goals and plans for breakfast.”
quotes.author: Steve Pavlina

quotes.quote: “If only we had the certainty in our strength that we do in our weaknesses and capacity for failure - oh how wonderful life would be”
quotes.author: Daniel Mangena

quotes.quote: “Make the most of the best and the least of the worst.”
quotes.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quotes.quote: “Stop giving meaningless praise and start giving meaningful action.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “When we replace a sense of service and gratitude with a sense of entitlement and expectation, we quickly see the demise of our relationships, society, and economy.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “Stop allowing your day-to-day life to be clouded by busy nothingness.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “A person doesn't have to change who he is to become better.”
quotes.author: Sidney Poitier

quotes.quote: “I often wished that more people understood the invisible side of things. Even the people who seemed to understand, didn't really.”
quotes.author: Jennifer Starzec

quotes.quote: “The value of a moment is immeasurable. The power of just ONE moment can propel you to success and happiness or chain you to failure and misery.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “Always have a 'Plan C”
quotes.author: Zoltan Andrejkovics

quotes.quote: “Change is in the air. This change reminds us that we are made and beautifully sculpted by the same power that orchestrates the change of season. Let this be the season you embrace and align yourself with this change.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “Free yourself from the complexities of your life! A life of simplicity and happiness awaits you.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “Search for contentment in each person you meet.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “If you intend to change, decide what you want and live your life accordingly.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “Change is the parent of progress.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “What do you think will be more effective when it comes to succeeding, believing you can or KNOWING you will? Let today be the last day you took timid steps of belief and start taking confident steps of purpose-driven knowing!”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “Your hopes, dreams and aspirations are legitimate. They are trying to take you airborne, above the clouds, above the storms, if you only let them.”
quotes.author: William James

quotes.quote: “Just because I'm doing what I love, doesn't mean It's always going to be fun.”
quotes.author: Tsubasa Yamaguchi

quotes.quote: “Today stretches ahead of you waiting to be shaped. You are the sculptor who gets to do the shaping. What today will be like is up to you.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “When you establish a destination by defining what you want, then take physical action by making choices that move you towards that destination, the possibility for success is limitless and arrival at the destination is inevitable.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “I hear you say 'Why?' Always 'Why?' You see things; and you say 'Why?' But I dream things that never were; and I say 'Why not?”
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: “Just because you're in a situation, doesn't mean you have to be that situation. You're not the situation you're in!”
quotes.author: K.M. Johnson

quotes.quote: “You’d think the earth
quotes.author: Don Hynes

quotes.quote: “Wanting something is not enough. You must hunger for it. Your motivation must be absolutely compelling in order to overcome the obstacles that will invariably come your way.”
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.quote: “Stop trying. Take long walks. Look at scenery. Doze off at noon. Don't even think about flying. And then, pretty soon, you'll be flying again.”
quotes.author: Hayao Miyazaki

quotes.quote: “Each day offers you an opportunity to overcome obstacles and fears in your life. Those victories, however small they appear, are significant and don’t need to be measured against or compared with those of someone else. They stand on their own as important measures of your own personal capabilities.”
quotes.author: Steve Pemberton

quotes.quote: “• I believe in my ability to create change.
quotes.author: Margarita Sekulova, Affirmations: A Guide to Manifest Better Life

quotes.quote: “you don't have to be great to get started but you have to to get started to be great”
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.quote: “Father has a strengthening character like the sun and mother has a soothing temper like the moon.”
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: “Yea though I walk through the Valley of the shadow of Death, I shall fear no evil...because I am the meanest motherfucker in the Valley.”
quotes.author: Bruce H. Norton

quotes.quote: “Too many of us are not living our dreams because we are living out fears.”
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.quote: “It’s hard to beat a person who never gives up.”
quotes.author: Babe Ruth

quotes.quote: “Create. Not for the money. Not for the fame. Not for the recognition. But for the pure joy of creating something and sharing it.”
quotes.author: Ernest Barbaric

quotes.quote: “Free yourself from the burden of feeling the need to hold on to anything. Let go… you are a part of everything.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “Learn from your history, but don’t live in it.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “The price tag you put on yourself decides your worth. Underestimating yourself will cost you dearly.”
quotes.author: Apoorve Dubey

quotes.quote: “All my problems bow before my stubbornness.”
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: “When you truly embrace your human impermanence you connect with the power you have, and influence you have, over the time you have.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “Too much action with too little intent makes for wasteful exertion of energy and the confusion between movement and progress.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “Let today be the day you stop having conflict between your actions and your goals and finally align your greatest intent with your purposeful actions, creating a universal symphony serenading your success!”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “As with all other aspects of the narrative art, you will improve with practice, but practice will never make you perfect. Why should it? What fun would that be?”
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.quote: “There's only one thing that will make them stop hating you. And that's being so good at what you do that they can't ignore you.”
quotes.author: Orson Scott Card

quotes.quote: “Don't be one of those who don't want others to be empowered. Share information. Try to make the next person, smarter.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “If you are going to be successful, you need to give up the phrase, "I can't" & all of its cousins, such as "I wish I were able to.”
quotes.author: Jack Canfield

quotes.quote: “The Key to Success is Action”
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: “What's money? A man is a success if he gets up in the morning and goes to bed at night and in between does what he wants to do.”
quotes.author: Bob Dylan

quotes.quote: “Things are changing, but this time I'm not afraid. This time I know who I am. This time I've made the right choice and fighting for the right team. I feel safe. Confident”
quotes.author: Tahereh Mafi

quotes.quote: “If you're early, you're on time. If you're on time, you're late.”
quotes.author: Lik Hock Yap Ivan

quotes.quote: “Success is not just about what you achieve, but also about how you impact others. Be a leader, inspire those around you, and leave a lasting legacy.”
quotes.author: Shubham Shukla

quotes.quote: “If people just took it a day at a time, they'd be a lot happier.”
quotes.author: Richard Bachman

quotes.quote: “In the modern workplace, you gotta be a jack-of-all-trades. Mastering your career is all about being adaptable, versatile, and always learning.”
quotes.author: Shubham Shukla

quotes.quote: “Want to make waves in the business world? Then you gotta be bold, take risks, and always be ready to pivot.”
quotes.author: Shubham Shukla

quotes.quote: “They say that the first step to success is setting clear goals. Well, I've got plenty of goals - like finally getting that corner office with a view, and firing my most annoying colleague.”
quotes.author: Shubham Shukla

quotes.quote: “They say that success is a journey, not a destination. But let's be real, the destination is pretty sweet - especially if it comes with a six-figure salary and a company car.”
quotes.author: Shubham Shukla

quotes.quote: “Professional development is important, but let's not forget about the most important kind of development - personal brand development. Because in the modern workplace, it's not what you know, it's who knows you.”
quotes.author: Shubham Shukla

quotes.quote: “Don't just climb the corporate ladder, master it! And if anyone tries to push you off, show them who's boss and climb even higher.”
quotes.author: Shubham Shukla

quotes.quote: “Success is not just about hard work, it's about working smart. So, take a break from the grind and strategize like a pro.”
quotes.author: Shubham Shukla

quotes.quote: “To achieve career mastery, you must first master yourself. Take the time to assess your strengths, weaknesses, and goals, and then chart a course for success.”
quotes.author: Shubham Shukla

quotes.quote: “If you want to achieve career mastery, then you need to be willing to put in the work. But don't worry, the view from the top is totally worth it.”
quotes.author: Shubham Shukla

quotes.quote: “If you're not driving business growth and profitability, then you might as well be a houseplant. So get out there and make some money, honey!”
quotes.author: Shubham Shukla

quotes.quote: “The modern job market is like a game of musical chairs. You need to be the one with a chair when the music stops, or you're out of luck.”
quotes.author: Shubham Shukla

quotes.quote: “The workplace is like a battlefield, and you need to be a warrior to survive. So arm yourself with knowledge and fight for your place in the corporate world.”
quotes.author: Shubham Shukla

quotes.quote: “You're never ready for what you have to do. You just do it. That makes you ready.”
quotes.author: Flora Rheta Schreiber

quotes.quote: “Do not sabotage your new relationship with your last relationship’s poison.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “Maturity is when you stop complaining and making excuses in your life; you realize everything that happens in life is a result of the previous choice you’ve made and start making new choices to change your life.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “You can't learn in school what the world is going to do next year.”
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: “The comfort zone is a psychological state in which one feels familiar, safe, at ease, and secure.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “The only easy day was yesterday.”
quotes.author: US Navy SEALs

quotes.quote: “Discipline your mind to see the good in every situation and look on the best side of every event.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “The beginning is always NOW.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “Today is yours to shape. Create a masterpiece!”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “Live your vision and demand your success.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “Whatever choice you make makes you. Choose wisely.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “Your dream is a reality that is waiting for you to materialize. Today is a new day! Don’t let your history interfere with your destiny! Learn from your past so that it can empower your present and propel you to greatness”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “Live Today! Do not allow your spirit to be softened of your happiness to be limited by a day you cannot have back or a day that does not yet exist.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “Success in life is not for those who run fast, but for those who keep running and always on the move.”
quotes.author: Bangambiki Habyarimana

quotes.quote: “Interrupt your thoughts of "I should", with your action of doing.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “Dream big. Wake up. Take the first step into the unknown.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “Sometimes you're drowning yourself in your own words.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “A lack of clarity could put the brakes on any journey to success.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “The first place where self-esteem begins its journey is within us.”
quotes.author: Stephen Richards

quotes.quote: “Make a pact with yourself today to not be defined by your past. Instead, shake things up today! Live through today. Don’t just exist through it - LIVE through it!”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “You have seen me fall; now see me rise.”
quotes.author: Abhaidev

quotes.quote: “Live life with a purpose and live it full out.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “Never confuse someone else's inability to do something with its inability to be done.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “To be is to do.”
quotes.author: Immanuel Kant

quotes.quote: “It is not enough if you just live life as it comes to you like a floating leaf in a pond. Make use of the powers bestowed in you and soar like an eagle.”
quotes.author: Stephen Richards

quotes.quote: “There is no tomorrow and there was no yesterday; if you truly want to accomplish your goals you must engulf yourself in today.”
quotes.author: Noel DeJesus

quotes.quote: “Superhuman effort isn't worth a damn unless it achieves results.”
quotes.author: Ernest Shackleton

quotes.quote: “أن تحاول مرارا لا يعني أنك غير قادر على النجاح بل يعني أنك غير قابل بالفشل”
quotes.author: ياسر حارب

quotes.quote: “In business 'professionalism' is not a tactic but a moral value.”
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: “Just like your body and lifestyle can be healthy or unhealthy, the same is true with your beliefs. Your beliefs can be your medicine or your poison.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “Accepting personal responsibility for your life frees you from outside influences – increases your self-esteem – boosts confidence in your ability to decisions – and ultimately leads to achieve success in life.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “Persistence is to the character of man as carbon is to steel.”
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.quote: “التسامُحُ أجملُ أنواع النسيان”
quotes.author: ياسر حارب

quotes.quote: “CONCERNED BUT NOT CONSUMED!”
quotes.author: Ron Sanders

quotes.quote: “Although goals are important, having a plan of action is vital to the success of those goals. Having a goal with no plan of action is like wanting to travel to a new destination without having a map.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “If it is bread that you seek, you will have bread.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: “Start shaping your own day. Start walking your own walk. This journey is yours, take charge of it. Stop giving other people the power to shape your life.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “The road to success is always under construction.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “Do not compromise yourself and put your goodness in the same impermanent category as whatever circumstance happening. Be the best you in every circumstance.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “Free yourself from the inauthenticity and disempowerment of your story.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “Step out of your comfort zone. Comfort zones, where your unrealized dreams are buried, are the enemies of achievement. Leadership begins when you step outside your comfort zone.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “It's not what you've got, it's what you use that makes a difference.”
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: “We are mathematical equations where your life is the sum of all choices you've made until now. The good news is you can change the equation so that you start making a difference in your life.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “Never run from the truth. It is always there; it never changes – save your energy.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “Success can be defined in many ways but failure in only one ... quitting!”
quotes.author: Gerard de Marigny

quotes.quote: “No matter what the cause, God is only as willing as you are.”

quotes.quote: “Leave your excuses and live your dreams!”
quotes.author: Paul F. Davis

quotes.quote: “Pride and power fall when the person falls, but discoveries of truth form legacies that can be built upon for generations.”

quotes.quote: “Action is the universal language of success.”

quotes.quote: “God didn’t give fear a body. God gave love a body.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “A person today who seems to have a great sense of self-esteem has his or her childhood days to thank for it.”

quotes.quote: “I’ve learned that no matter how inspired, fired up and motivated you might be, the dark clouds will always set in”
quotes.author: Bernard Kelvin Clive

quotes.quote: “When you start something, make sure that you're willing to take the time to finish it right because, honey, the work you put into it will be more than worth it in the end. The best things always are.”
quotes.author: C.M. Stunich

quotes.quote: “If you can remember why you started, then you will know why you must continue.”

quotes.quote: “The only way you're going to reach places you've never gone is if you trust God's direction to do things you've never done.”

quotes.quote: “Despite what you may believe, you can disappoint people and still be good enough. You can make mistakes and still be capable and talented. You can let people down and still be worthwhile and deserving of love. Everyone has disappointed someone they care about. Everyone messes up, lets people down, and makes mistakes. Not because we’re inadequate or fundamentally inept, but because we’re imperfect and fundamentally human. Expecting anything different is setting yourself up for failure.”
quotes.author: Daniell Koepke

quotes.quote: “The only thing wrong with trying to please everyone is that there's always at least one person who will remain unhappy. You.”
quotes.author: Elizabeth Parker

quotes.quote: “In the face of adversity, we have a choice.
quotes.author: Caryn Sullivan

quotes.quote: “You must take responsibility for removing I can't from your vocabulary.”
quotes.author: Jack Canfield

quotes.quote: “Being in home is like magic moments, in a magic world, among maicians”
quotes.author: Durgesh Satpathy

quotes.quote: “The power behind taking responsibility for your actions lies in putting an end to negative thought patterns. You no longer dwell on what went wrong or focus on whom you are going to blame. You don't waste time building roadblocks to your success. Instead, you are set free and can now focus on succeeding.”
quotes.author: Lorii Myers

quotes.quote: “A mind of moderate capacity which closely pursues one study must infallibly arrive at great proficiency in that study.”

quotes.quote: “Positive belief in yourself will give you the energy needed to conquer the world and this belief is the power behind all creation.”

quotes.quote: “Believe with all your heart that you will do what you were made to do.”

quotes.quote: “Perseverance is the act of true role models and heroes.”
quotes.author: Liza Wiemer

quotes.quote: “If you don't make the time to work on creating the life you want, you're eventually going to be forced to spend a LOT of time dealing with a life you don't want.”

quotes.quote: “Though money cannot acquire you happiness, it does not mean that both money and happiness cannot exist together.”
quotes.author: Stephen Richards

quotes.quote: “When I think how sometimes people can be brave enough to overcome any fear, any hardship, it gives me a feeling I can hardly describe. To charge right at the things that are painful and difficult, break through to the other side, and take pleasure in that - don't you think that's truly fantastic? The greater the suffering, the greater the joy in overcoming it.”
quotes.author: Genzaburo Yoshino

quotes.quote: “How many of us stop short of success on purpose? How many of us sabotage our own happiness because failure, while miserable, is a fear we're familiar with? Success, however, dreams come true, are a whole new kind of terrifying, an entire new species of responsibilities and disillusions, requiring a new way to think, act and become. Why do we REALLY quit? Because it's hopeless? Or because it's possible...”
quotes.author: Jennifer DeLucy

quotes.quote: “Winning is great, but if it's not enough then then you'll never have enough!”
quotes.author: Stephen Richards

quotes.quote: “Whatever belief we have actually stems from the thankfulness that we feel and this feeling further attracts more happy feelings towards us.”
quotes.author: Stephen Richards

quotes.quote: “Once you figure out what you want in life—expect nothing less.”
quotes.author: Lorii Myers

quotes.quote: “When something poses as obstacle to you,surmount it and use it as a miracle to move on to greater height.”
quotes.author: Ifeanyi Enoch Onuoha

quotes.quote: “Music shouldn't be just a tune, it should be a touch.”

quotes.quote: “Once you understand how powerful you are within, you exponentially increase the power and potentiality of everything outside of you.”

quotes.quote: “When in doubt, throw doubt out and have a little faith....”
quotes.author: E.A. Bucchianeri

quotes.quote: “Your self-confidence is simply the part of your brain that tells you whether or not you should try something different or new or believe in yourself, and just as a Jedi truly believes that it is within their power to control their thoughts and stay in the Light, so can you.”

quotes.quote: “Do the best you can, with what you can, while you can, and success in inevitable.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “You can perhaps, in a number of circumstances, tell yourself that you can't have more than you have until you do better than you're doing, but by all means steer clear of its reverse, the creed of defeat, in saying that you can't do better than you're doing until you can have more than you have.”
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: “The more clouds you have in your sky, the more colorful sunset it will be.”
quotes.author: Sajal Sazzad

quotes.quote: “One often has to do what they have to do in order to do what they want to do; however if you only do what you want to do then you will never do what you have to do!”
quotes.author: Dr. C. Moorer

quotes.quote: “How would your life be different if...You could control the outcome of your day, your week, your year? Let today be the day...You embrace the truth that you DO have such control to label every event in your life, and create an agreement with reality that empowers you and propels you to greatness.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “أعْجَزُ الناس المتشائمون وأقلّهم حظاً أقلّهم أملا”
quotes.author: ياسر حارب

quotes.quote: “One should measure their life by the faith they embrace and the relationships they cherish”
quotes.author: John Paul Warren

quotes.quote: “You’ve got one life, one shot, and all the power to make it happen. Get ready to dream big and live big. It’s all up to you. And it starts now.”
quotes.author: Jolene Stockman

quotes.quote: “المبدعون لا يُبهروننا فقط ولكنهم يمنحوننا الأمل ويُجددون الطاقات المكبوتة بداخلنا فَهُم الشموع التي تُبدد الظلام ولا تلعنه”
quotes.author: ياسر حارب

quotes.quote: “In what world
quotes.author: Jazalyn

quotes.quote: “hold company with yourself so sacred
quotes.author: AVA.

quotes.quote: “We do not observe reality, we observe our REACTIONS to it.
quotes.author: Gordana Biernat

quotes.quote: “Like love, like talent, like any other virtue, like anything else in this life, happiness needs to be nurtured - this is the truth of the whole matter.”
quotes.author: Ogwo David Emenike

quotes.quote: “The greatest love stories are not those in which love is only spoken, but those in which it is acted upon.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “Do not dilute the truth of your potential. We often convince ourselves that we cannot change, that we cannot overcome the circumstances of our lives. That is simply not true. You have been blessed with immeasurable power to make positive changes in your life. But you can't just wish it, you can't just hope it, you can't just want it... you have to LIVE it, BE it, DO it.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “Without desires and dreams, your thoughts do not matter and you can think whatever you want to.”
quotes.author: Stephen Richards

quotes.quote: “Too often we underestimate the power of a touch, a smile, a kind word, a listening ear, an honest accomplishment, or the smallest act of caring, all of which have the potential to turn a life around.”
quotes.author: Leo Buscaglia

quotes.quote: “It is a profound and necessary truth that the deep things in science are not found because they are useful; they are found because it was possible to find them.”
quotes.author: J. Robert Oppenheimer

quotes.quote: “Write this down: My life is full of unlimited possibilities.”
quotes.author: Pablo

quotes.quote: “Stop waiting for the right person to come into your life. Be the right person to come to someone’s life”
quotes.author: Leo Babauta

quotes.quote: “If everyone is moving forward together, then success takes care of itself.”
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: “The problem isn’t that I think so highly of myself. It is just that you think so little of yourself. Live life BIG, BOLD and OUT LOUD!”
quotes.author: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.quote: “You don't have to be a hero to accomplish great things---to compete. You can just be an ordinary chap, sufficiently motivated to reach challenging goals.”
quotes.author: Edmund Hillary

quotes.quote: “Have you had a failure or rejection? You could get bitter. That's one way to deal with it. Or...you could just get BETTER. What do you think?”
quotes.author: Destiny Booze

quotes.quote: “Great losses are great lessons.”
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: “The people we consider successful in our society are all people that seize every moment and make the best of each situation.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “A good self-esteem level is mostly dependant on how we value ourselves without any bias.”
quotes.author: Stephen Richards

quotes.quote: “You are where you are and what you are because of yourself, nothing else. Nature is neutral. Nature doesn't care. If you do what other successful people do, you will enjoy the same results and rewards that they do. And if you don't, you won't.”
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: “Your limits are somewhere up there, waiting for you to reach beyond infinity.”
quotes.author: Arnold Henry

quotes.quote: “Be a worthy worker and work will come.”
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: “People have boldness to criticize but not to sensitize.”
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: “Once we open our eyes to the infinite magic that the universe has in abundance, we are sure to be enthralled by what we see and this miraculous creation gets us closer to our dreams and to the world as a whole.”
quotes.author: Stephen Richards

quotes.quote: “Success is not only dependent on understanding your own skill-set. It’s also important to recognize the talents of others and know how to profit from them.”
quotes.author: Raoul Davis Jr.

quotes.quote: “We have come here together so that you might know, through virtue of your own pain, your own hopelessness, your own fear, your own darkness and the lie of powerlessness, the very actual power of your own will, of the will of your soul.”
quotes.author: Jennifer DeLucy

quotes.quote: “Prepare yourself for success. You have to see it coming to get there.”
quotes.author: Destiny Booze

quotes.quote: “Decide to be fine until the end of the week. Make yourself smile, because you're alive and that's your job. Then do it again the next week. I call it being professional. Do it right, with a smile, or don't do it.”
quotes.author: Frank Devereaux

quotes.quote: “It will be better to spent our energy on reality; the tangible facts, not thoughts of the past.”
quotes.author: Durgesh Satpathy

quotes.quote: “If you can't be brave, be determined. And you'll end up in the same place.”
quotes.author: Lisa Scottoline

quotes.quote: “Common man's patience will bring him more happiness than common man's power.”
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: “Things do not happen TO you. They happen THROUGH you.
quotes.author: Gordana Biernat

quotes.quote: “While spirituality provides an efficient and endless fuel for your mind and body, you must burn that fuel with human action towards your goals, dreams, and desires.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “The victory over our inner self is a daily struggle. Be strong and do not give up.”
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: “Success necessitates sacrifice.”
quotes.author: Habeeb Akande

quotes.quote: “You don't have to be good at something to be liked.”
quotes.author: Stephen Richards

quotes.quote: “The more you can have control over your ego rather than let it run amuck, the more successful you’ll be in all areas of life.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “Life’s a marathon, not a sprint.”
quotes.author: Phillip C. McGraw

quotes.quote: “How would your life be different if...you began each day by thanking someone who has helped you? Let today be the day...You make it a point to show your gratitude to others. Send a letter or card, make a call, send a text or email, tell them in person...do whatever you have to do to let them know you appreciate them.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “The most dangerous irony is, people are angry with others because of their own incompetence.”
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: “What good has impatience ever brought? It has only served as the mother of mistakes and the father of irritation.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “Every challenge you encounter in life is a fork in the road. You have the choice to choose which way to go - backward, forward, breakdown or breakthrough.”
quotes.author: Ifeanyi Enoch Onuoha

quotes.quote: “There has never been a meaningful life built on easy street.”
quotes.author: John Paul warren

quotes.quote: “If at first you don’t succeed, you’re doing it wrong. Learn from the experience. Try again, but with a different approach.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “When you are just EXISTING, life happens to you… and you manage; when you are truly LIVING, you happen to life… and you lead.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “The job of feets is walking, but their hobby is dancing.”
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: “If you always do what you've always done, you'll always get what you always got.”
quotes.author: James P. Lewis

quotes.quote: “Take care of your costume and your confidence will take care of itself.”
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: “This moment is yours and yours alone! Take charge, seize this moment and allow it to propel you to the high levels of an empowered life. Allow upon this fertile moment to be planted the seeds of your happiness and success.”

quotes.quote: “When the going gets tough, the tough get going”

quotes.quote: “It is important that when we make a resolution, or establish a goal, that we take the ACTION necessary to accomplish that goal.”

quotes.quote: “I prefer to be on the side of losers, the misunderstood or lonely people rather than writing about the strong and powerful.”

quotes.quote: “But if we are talking in terms of making progress in life, we must understand that "good enough" is very different from "best.”

quotes.quote: “The purpose of empowerment is to urge you towards freedom, to help each of you to break free of all limitations. It is that freedom that will give you eternal happiness and finally connect you with the unconditional realization of TRUTH.”

quotes.quote: “Something hit me very hard once, thinking about what one little man could do. Think of the Queen Mary — the whole ship goes by and then comes the rudder. And there's a tiny thing at the edge of the rudder called a trimtab.

quotes.quote: “The mind can't delete what the heart won't let go of.”

quotes.quote: “You can only work on yourself. Start there.”

quotes.quote: “Whatever your calling, it's already rooted within you, and those roots can be trampled or tugged at but never removed. They grow stronger only when tended, nurtured, and most important, shared with others.”

quotes.quote: “Networking isn't how many people you know, it's how many people know you.”
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: “I can’t help you, I can only guide you, and you are the one who can help yourself.”

quotes.quote: “You can't keep dancing with the devil and ask why you're still in hell.”

quotes.quote: “Health is hearty, health is harmony, health is happiness.”

quotes.quote: “The people who really make you angry, control you!”

quotes.quote: “You are a beautiful soul wrapped up in a human body. It’s your job to unwrap, and find your soul again.”

quotes.quote: “Every sunrise is priceless and you can experience the richness that life holds only when you live life to the full instead of just being an onlooker.”

quotes.quote: “The realisation that limitations are imaginary will make you strong and overpowering.”
quotes.author: Stephen Richards

quotes.quote: “How would your life be different if...You decided to give freely, love fully, and play feverously? Let today be the day...You free yourself from the conditioned rules that limit your happiness and dilute the beautiful life experience. Have fun. Give - Love - Play!”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “Self-confidence is contagious.”
quotes.author: Stephen Richards

quotes.quote: “I have realized that whatever good comes to me, comes from God, whatever bad comes to me, God has allowed it, and I choose to be thankful for both.”
quotes.author: Jeff Goins

quotes.quote: “Prepared for the worst,but still praying for the best”
quotes.author: Lil Wayne

quotes.quote: “Luck is a word the bitter teach to the ignorant.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “لن يفشل أبدا كل انسان يحاول”
quotes.author: أنيس منصور

quotes.quote: “لا تَقُل لي ما اسْمُك وقُل لي ما إنجازك فالإنجازات تصنع الأسماء”
quotes.author: ياسر حارب

quotes.quote: “Don't use yesterday's state of mind, to make today's decision.”
quotes.author: C. Nzingha Smith

quotes.quote: “Notice the difference between being in control and needing control.”
quotes.author: Marilyn Suttle

quotes.quote: “Courage is not only about finding bravery for ourselves. It is also about helping others find theirs.”
quotes.author: Steve Pemberton

quotes.quote: “Pivoting does not mean changing your goal but rather changing your strategy to realize that goal.”
quotes.author: Steve Pemberton

quotes.quote: “Everything is easier said than done. Wanting something is easy. Saying something is easy. The challenge and the reward are in the doing.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “Whenever we take a stand, we invite others who are siting on the sidelines to join us.”
quotes.author: Steve Pemberton

quotes.quote: “The future is greatly different than your life now, the actions that you take must also be greatly different. You cannot do the same thing and get something different.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “Each day gives the opportunity for you to be treated right, to feel worthy, and to be successful. It’s a choice you have to make, a faith you have to embrace, and a standard you have to set.”

quotes.quote: “Once you feel nice about yourself, you have planted the first seed to develop self-confidence.”

quotes.quote: “The face is the mirror of the mind, and eyes without speaking confess the secrets of the heart.”

quotes.quote: “Time waits for no one.”

quotes.quote: “You are the point of origin for everything in your world: you set the standard for yourself.”

quotes.quote: “When someone who is suffering looks to you for compassion, it's indeed a blessing; you are chosen to be their Light in a moment of sorrow.”

quotes.quote: “I would rather live short and right then long and wrong.”

quotes.quote: “We need more than just the Law of Attraction. We need to connect with its more successful twin, the Law of Generosity. And further entwine ourselves with their parent; the Law of Love.”

quotes.quote: “Fear has the role we give it. We are able to empower or poison ourselves to whatever degree we want. This is the beauty of our design.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “You‘ve been given the innate power to shape your life.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “You would not be here TODAY if YESTERDAY was your defining moment. LIVE THIS DAY and move towards your dreams.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “There are two things essential if you want to enhance your Jedi self-confidence:
quotes.author: Stephen Richards

quotes.quote: “Every great leader can take you back to a defining moment when they decided to lead”
quotes.author: John Paul Warren

quotes.quote: “Never engage in gossip, it kills your soul, and wounds another’s heart”

quotes.quote: “Yet how hard most people work for mere dust and ashes and care, taking no thought of growing in knowledge and grace, never having time to get in sight of their own ignorance.”

quotes.quote: “Sometimes we have to soak ourselves in the tears and fears of the past to water our future gardens.”
quotes.author: Suzy Kassem

quotes.quote: “You be as angry as you need to be," she said. "Don't let anyone tell you otherwise. Not your grandma, not your dad, no one. And if you need to break things, then by God, you break them good and hard."
quotes.author: Patrick Ness

quotes.quote: “A real decision is measured by the fact that you've taken a new action. If there's no action, you haven't truly decided.”

quotes.quote: “The difference between being mediocre and achieving excellence is you.”
quotes.author: Stephen Richards

quotes.quote: “A failure is always in the passenger seat in his or her life.”
quotes.author: Stephen Richards

quotes.quote: “Pursue your goal. Opinions be damned.”

quotes.quote: “I must admit, that I have learned more from my negative experiences than I have ever learned from my positive one.”

quotes.quote: “Your circumstances do NOT define you. Expect a GRAND finale.”

quotes.quote: “Remember diamonds are created under pressure so hold on, it will be your time to shine soon.”

quotes.quote: “Faith UP! Your purpose is GREATER than all your PROBLEMS.”

quotes.quote: “If you have to ask if you’ve done enough, you haven’t. Each day brings with it the opportunity to do more than you did yesterday.”

quotes.quote: “With one kind gesture you can change a life. One person at a time you can change the world. One day at a time we can change everything.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “A Master Jedi feels emotions, but they do not allow them to influence their reasoning. Yoda told Luke that he would know the good from the bad when he was 'calm, at peace.”

quotes.quote: “Intent without dedicated action is simply not enough. Action without a clear intent is a waste. It is when these two powerful forces are aligned that the energy of the universe conspires in your favor.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “You will never get everything in life but you will get enough.”
quotes.author: Sanhita Baruah

quotes.quote: “Certain situations need a Jedi-like approach. One of these is when you are in a strange environment, usually where you feel unsure of yourself. You would be surprised how, if you walk with confidence and meaning, people will see this as a mark of confidence, yet you are perhaps shaking inside but outwardly you have the gait of a confident Jedi Knight.”

quotes.quote: “The time has come to harness the blessed power within us and to use it to transcend from our current existence into a more empowered reality.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “It's not always what we don't know that gets in our way; sometimes it's what we think we know that keeps us from learning.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “If the painter wishes to see beauties that charm him, it lies in his power to create them, and if he wishes to see monstrosities that are frightful, ridiculous, or truly pitiable, he is lord and God thereof.”

quotes.quote: “Love is perhaps the only emotions that is boundless”
quotes.author: Santosh Avvannavar

quotes.quote: “ننامُ كثيرا أفلا نحلمُ قليلا”
quotes.author: ياسر حارب

quotes.quote: “To be happy, you have to risk being unhappy.”
quotes.author: Ogwo David Emenike

quotes.quote: “Never stop acquiring the commonsense, it is as good as the knowledge.”

quotes.quote: “Uncertainty will always be part of the taking charge process.”
quotes.author: Harold Geneen

quotes.quote: “After a while, San Lang said softly, “Something like saving the world, it really doesn’t matter how you do it. But, although brave, it’s foolish.” “Yeah,” Xie Lian agreed. Hua Cheng continued, “Although foolish, it’s brave.”
quotes.author: Mò Xiāng Tóng Xiù

quotes.quote: “Feelings are real. They often become one’s reality. But they are not always based on truth.”
quotes.author: Jesikah Sundin

quotes.quote: “Whatever you do, do something positive.”

quotes.quote: “A belief is simply a thought that seems true to YOU.”
quotes.author: Gordana Biernat

quotes.quote: “Jedi act with confidence, move with confidence, and breathe with confidence. Jedi possess a confident calmness in their looks, attitude and
quotes.author: Stephen Richards

quotes.quote: “Changes are inevitable and not always controllable. What can be controlled is how you manage, react to and work through the change process.”
quotes.author: Kelly A. Morgan

quotes.quote: “The world is my church. My actions are my prayer. My behavior is my creed.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “A true dreamer is one who knows how to navigate in the dark”.”

quotes.quote: “A barrier is a limitation only when you perceive it as one.”

quotes.quote: “When a human lighthouse sees you in the midst of your storm, it points you toward safety and protection. In doing so, it also sends you and uncompromising message of belief: Yes, the situation is difficult, but you are not alone. I’m standing right here with you, and I know the way home.”
quotes.author: Steve Pemberton

quotes.quote: “You have had a dream for so many years. Let today be the day you make a plan for it. Just think about how much more likely you are to hit your target when you finally aim at it.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “When someone we know is afraid of judgment, we can provide a safe haven for their hopes by telling them first and foremost that we are proud of their efforts.”

quotes.quote: “Have faith in the universe and its capability to lead you to the path of abundance.”
quotes.author: Stephen Richards

quotes.quote: “The madder it makes you, the harder you need to laugh at it.”
quotes.author: Destiny Booze

quotes.quote: “Dear Fellow Human Being,
quotes.author: Jasz Gill

quotes.quote: “Recovery is full of ups and downs.
quotes.author: Brittany Burgunder

quotes.quote: “I want every girl in the world to pick up a guitar and start screaming.”
quotes.author: Courtney Love

quotes.quote: “For self-educated scientists and thinkers such as Charles Darwin, Srinivasa Ramanujan, Leonardo-da-Vinci, Michael Faraday, myself and many others, education is a relentless voyage of discovery. To us education is an everlasting quest for knowledge and wisdom.”
quotes.author: Abhijit Naskar

quotes.quote: “A story meant to motivate all and sundry irrespective of their circumstances”
quotes.author: Santosh Avvannavar

quotes.quote: “We can’t continuously be a society of well-wishers. We must take action to bring those wishes to fruition.”

quotes.quote: “Choice forms the divider which is responsible for the formation of all futures that can be possible.”

quotes.quote: “On the other hand, if the future is not the one you chose then you may have to use your willpower to obtain the future of your liking.”
quotes.author: Stephen Richards

quotes.quote: “Most people know the physical senses, but a lot of people don’t know the soul’s senses: empathy, trust, intuition, love and harmony”

quotes.quote: “Forgive to forget, do not forget to forgive”
quotes.author: Santosh Avvannavar

quotes.quote: “It is in the balancing of your spirituality with your humanity that you will find immeasurable happiness, success, good health, and love.”

It is the work itself that calls them onward, especially if they believe they are the only ones who can do it.”
quotes.author: Rae Carson

quotes.quote: “Success is something you experience when you act accordingly. Success is not something you have, it’s something you do.”

quotes.quote: “When life's got you down, keep your head up... you can't see the ground anyway”

quotes.quote: “It's better to do something with quality, no matter how long it takes you rather than do something mediocre, with constant quantity.”

quotes.quote: “The smell of the sweat is not sweet, but the fruit of the sweat is very sweet.”

quotes.quote: “You can take anything if you want it enough.”

quotes.quote: “Today is a special day that will go by very fast, so let’s take every second to make the most out of every moment.”

quotes.quote: “If I quit now, I will soon be back to where I started. And when I started I was desperately wishing to be where I am now.”

quotes.quote: “Food for thought: Every dead body on Mount Everest was once a highly motivated person. Stay lazy my friends. It may save your life one day.”

quotes.quote: “Strength wasn‘t about being able to do everything alone. Strength was knowing when to ask for help and not being too proud to do it.”

quotes.quote: “Stop comparing yourself with others. If they are good at something, you too are good at something else. Self-confidence is not measured by your own capabilities versus that of others, but by your own needs.”

quotes.quote: “What if I told you 10 years from now your life would be exactly the same?
quotes.author: Karen Salmansohn

quotes.quote: “Concentrate more on your achievements than your failures. Learn to take the failures as opportunities to rectify your errors.”
quotes.author: Stephen Richards

quotes.quote: “Each person has got a voice inside them. Communicate with it and take hold of it. Do not let it push and shove you around – you are its master!”

quotes.quote: “You’re only responsible for yourself, Jess. And that’s the only person you can control. Other people will either get it or they won’t but you can’t define yourself by their opinions.”

quotes.quote: “Always make your future bigger than your past.”
quotes.author: Dan Sullivan

quotes.quote: “How we relate with other people is dependent on how we rate ourselves and what we think about ourselves.”

quotes.quote: “Failures can be called ‘strengtheners’ as they make you determined to reach your goal with the lessons they teach.”

quotes.quote: “Taking the decision-making process away from people disempowers them. It also makes them much less likely to buy into the decision, however right it may be. One’s own conscience remains the ultimate arbiter.”
quotes.author: Lama Surya Das

quotes.quote: “Some of the most powerful speeches I have given have been delivered in the dedicated silence of my actions.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “But confining myself more to the particular, I say that a prince may be seen happy to-day and ruined to-morrow without having shown any change of disposition or character. This, I believe, arises firstly from causes that have already been discussed at length, namely, that the prince who relies entirely upon fortune is lost when it changes. I believe also that he will be successful who directs his actions according to the spirit of the times, and that he whose actions do not accord with the times will not be successful. Because men are seen, in affairs that lead to the end which every man has before him, namely, glory and riches, to get there by various methods; one with caution, another with haste; one by force, another by skill; one by patience, another by its opposite; and each one succeeds in reaching the goal by a different method. One can also see of two cautious men the one attain his end, the other fail; and similarly, two men by different observances are equally successful, the one being cautious, the other impetuous; all this arises from nothing else than whether or not they conform in their methods to the spirit of the times. This follows from what I have said, that two men working differently bring about the same effect, and of two working similarly, one attains his object and the other does not.”
quotes.author: Niccolò Machiavelli

quotes.quote: “Five years from today, you will be the same person that you are today, except for the books you read and the people you meet.”
quotes.author: Charlie "Tremendous" Jones

quotes.quote: “According to the Law of Attraction, the physical reality that you experience at present is drawn towards the future probability you desired when it attains more power.”
quotes.author: Stephen Richards

quotes.quote: “For that reason, let a prince have the credit of conquering and holding his state, the means will always be considered honest, and he will be praised by everybody because the vulgar are always taken by what a thing seems to be and by what comes of it; and in the world there are only the vulgar, for the few find a place there only when the many have no ground to rest on.”
quotes.author: Niccolò Machiavelli

quotes.quote: “The greatest Emotion is Love.
quotes.author: pablo

quotes.quote: “Our own self-esteem is something we can actually twist in whatever way we want.”
quotes.author: Stephen Richards

quotes.quote: “I don't give up. That makes me incredibly resilient or maybe stupid or just plain stubborn. Whichever...”
quotes.author: Destiny Booze

quotes.quote: “Self-belief, also called self-efficacy, is the kind of feeling you have when you have, like a Jedi, mastered a particular kind of skill and with its help have been able to achieve your set goals.”
quotes.author: Stephen Richards

quotes.quote: “أحط نفسك تدريجيا بفريق من الطراز الأول من الأشخاص الذين سيجعلون حياتك بهيجة و سعيدة و غنية إلى أبعد حد. ابدأ على الفور ،،”
quotes.author: Jack Canfield

quotes.quote: “Without adversity, there would be no growth, and without growth, there would be no lesson to be learned.”
quotes.author: Michelle D. Rosado

quotes.quote: “One of the Secrets in Life is to Make Stepping Stones out of Stumbling Blocks.”
