quotes.quote: “ليس بالضرورة أن تكون عظيما لكي تحلم ولكن عليك أن تحلم لكي تكون عظيما”
quotes.author: ياسر حارب

quotes.quote: “إن من يُحب يُهدي ومن يُهدي يحب وخير هدية هو الحب ذاته، فهو البقاء بعد الرحيل وهو الحياة بعد الموت وهو الكلمة التي لا تحتاج إلى قاموس”
quotes.author: ياسر حارب

quotes.quote: “In the spiritual world many forms of the physical universe that are potentially effective can be perceived but with regard to time, we can observe only one form.”
quotes.author: Stephen Richards

quotes.quote: “There is no real world, just the one you create.”
quotes.author: Jolene Stockman

quotes.quote: “Leaders in OVER their heads is the mere result of getting ahead of their intended SEASON.”
quotes.author: John Paul Warren

quotes.quote: “The word "seek" is a verb. Are you treating it as such in your life? If you seek change, success, or love, DO it - BE it!”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “How would your life be different if...you had a plan of action towards your goals? Let today be the day...You stop allowing your days to be stolen by busy nothingness and take calculated steps towards your goals.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “Your only limitations are the ties you allow to bind you.”
quotes.author: Saundra Dalton-Smith

quotes.quote: “If you want your prayers answered, get up off your knees and do something about them.”
quotes.author: Wally Lamb

quotes.quote: “To become a master at any skill, it takes the total effort of your: heart, mind, and soul working together in tandem.”
quotes.author: Maurice Young

quotes.quote: “I have learned that the harder you fall…the higher you bounce!”
quotes.author: John Paul Warren

quotes.quote: “If life throws you a few bad notes or vibrations, don't let them interrupt or alter your song.”
quotes.author: Suzy Kassem

quotes.quote: “Today, you have the opportunity to transcend from a disempowered mindset of existence to an empowered reality of purpose-driven living. Today is a new day that has been handed to you for shaping. You have the tools, now get out there and create a masterpiece.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “Some years ago, I was lucky enough invited to a gathering of great and good people: artists and scientists, writers and discoverers of things. And I felt that at any moment they would realise that I didn’t qualify to be there, among these people who had really done things.
quotes.author: Neil Gaiman

quotes.quote: “الانشغال بالألم هو توقّفٌ مؤقَتٌ عن الحياة وهو إقحامٌ ساذج للعجز في عقولنا والعظماء فقط من يرون في الألم أكبر دافع للمقاومة”
quotes.author: ياسر حارب

quotes.quote: “Nothing that happens to you was meant to be. The only thing about you that was meant to be is you. Blaze your own trail.”
quotes.author: George Alexiou

quotes.quote: “I may not be where I want to be, but if I stop now, I'll NEVER get where I'm going!”
quotes.author: Laura Lynch

quotes.quote: “Have nuts and be nuts.”
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: “Don't get too deep, it leads to over thinking, and over thinking leads to problems that don't even exist in the first place.”
quotes.author: Jayson Engay

quotes.quote: “Coming to the END of MYSELF and all SELF effort...seems to be the very point that God steps in and shows HIMSELF to be more than ENOUGH.”
quotes.author: John Paul Warren

quotes.quote: “Pain? Yes, of course. Racing without pain is not racing. But the pleasure of being ahead outweighed the pain a million times over. To hell with the pain. What's six minutes of pain compared to the pain they're going to feel for the next six months or six decades. You never forget your wins and losses in this sport. YOU NEVER FORGET.”
quotes.author: Brad Alan Lewis

quotes.quote: “We've also evolved the ability to simply 'pay it forward': I help you, somebody else will help me. I remember hearing a parable when I was younger, about a father who lifts his young son onto his back to carry him across a flooding river. 'When I am older,' said the boy to his father, 'I will carry you across this river as you now do for me.' 'No, you won't,' said the father stoically. 'When you are older you will have your own concerns. All I expect is that one day you will carry your own son across this river as I no do for you.' Cultivating this attitude is an important part of Humanism--to realize that life without God can be much more than a series of strict tit-for-tat transactions where you pay me and I pay you back. Learning to pay it forward can add a tremendous sense of meaning and dignity to our lives. Simply put, it feels good to give to others, whether we get back or not.”
quotes.author: Greg Epstein

quotes.quote: “God can take the ordinary and create the extraordinary. Our incredible God has the power to transform your simple life and give you the life of your dreams. Remarkable things happen in your life when you believe.”
quotes.author: Amaka Imani Nkosazana

quotes.quote: “A farmer is a magician who produces money from the mud.”
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: “An empowered life begins with serious personal questions about oneself. Those answers bare the seeds of success.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “قد لا يفارقك الألم ولكنك تستطيع أن تفارقه”
quotes.author: ياسر حارب

quotes.quote: “War is not just the shower of bullets and bombs from both sides, it is also the shower of blood and bones on both sides.”
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: “Going down in history is a dead end pursuit”
quotes.author: Benny Bellamacina

quotes.quote: “If the world is a book, are you the hero, or just a walk-on part?”
quotes.author: K.J. Parker

quotes.quote: “During a conversation, listening is as powerful as loving.”
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: “If you won’t trust yourself, nobody else will.”
quotes.author: Anamika Mishra

quotes.quote: “If your failure is not a lesson, it's indeed a failure.”

quotes.quote: “In the history of a soul’s evolution there is a critical point of the human incarnation that decides for us whether we stay there, go down or progress upwards. There is a knot of worldly desires impeding us; cut the knot by mastering desires and go forward. This done, progress is assured.”
quotes.author: Virchand Raghavji Gandhi

quotes.quote: “All my life I've been fascinated by the precipice in all of us. When you come to it, you either choose to fall or you don’t --Alvin Ailey”
quotes.author: Kathy Petrakis

quotes.quote: “What if not just women, but both men and women, worked smart, more flexible schedules? What if the workplace itself was more fluid than the rigid and narrow ladder to success of the ideal worker? And what if both men and women became responsible for raising children and managing the home, sharing work, love, and play? Could everyone then live whole lives?”

quotes.quote: “Let them be what they want to be. Make yourselves what you want to be.”

quotes.quote: “This time, like all times, is a very good time - if we but know what to do with it”

quotes.quote: “Those who believe in it are the ones who find it”

quotes.quote: “Success is a decision, not a gift.”

quotes.quote: “The Jedi is a practitioner of mind mastery. But with the whole scope of his love, or maturity in Christ, we begin relying on him for guidance where we would prefer him to walk beside us rather than behind us.”

quotes.quote: “...Or we can blaze! Become legends in our own time, strike fear in the heart of mediocre talent everywhere! We can scald dogs, put records out of reach! Make the stands gasp as we blow into an unearthly kick from three hundred yards out! We can become God's own messengers delivering the dreaded scrolls! We can race dark Satan himself till he wheezes fiery cinders down the back straightaway....They'll speak our names in hushed tones, 'those guys are animals' they'll say! We can lay it on the line, bust a gut, show them a clean pair of heels. We can sprint the turn on a spring breeze and feel the winter leave our feet! We can, by God, let our demons loose and just wail on!”

Don’t put sand (negativity) on your mind. Think positive, encouraging, uplifting thoughts, & the negative will soon evaporate.”

quotes.quote: “Ideas and philosophies have a shelf-life. They must be kept fresh and renewed or they will spoil. If left unattended, the same ideas and philosophies that once nourished you and helped you grow can poison you and make you sick. Become aware of new ideas that can refresh your way of life and be open to the fact that your old ideas and philosophies can work for you for some time, but when the shelf-life has passed, those ideas and philosophies could also harm you.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “This inner Being is all powerful, intelligent, indestructible and a storehouse of knowledge and wisdom. This inner core is truly who and what you are and is perpetually trying to connect with your outward self.”

quotes.quote: “For this reason a prince ought to take care that he never lets anything slip from his lips that is not replete with the above-named five qualities, that he may appear to him who sees and hears him altogether merciful, faithful, humane, upright, and religious. There is nothing more necessary to appear to have than this last quality, inasmuch as men judge generally more by the eye than by the hand, because it belongs to everybody to see you, to few to come in touch with you. Every one sees what you appear to be, few really know what you are, and those few dare not oppose themselves to the opinion of the many, who have the majesty of the state to defend them; and in the actions of all men, and especially of princes, which it is not prudent to challenge, one judges by the result.”

quotes.quote: “There’s an interesting story about Abraham Lincoln. During the American Civil War he signed an order transferring certain regiments, but Secretary of War Edwin Stanton refused to execute it, calling the president a fool. When Lincoln heard he replied, ‘If Stanton said I’m a fool then I must be, for he’s nearly always right, and he says what he thinks. I’ll step over and see for myself.’ He did, and when Stanton convinced him the order was in error, Lincoln quietly withdrew it. Part of Lincoln’s greatness lay in his ability to rise above pettiness, ego, and sensitivity to other people’s opinions. He wasn’t easily offended. He welcomed criticism, and in doing so demonstrated one of the strengths of a truly great person: humility. So, have you been criticised? Make it a time to learn, not lose.”
quotes.author: Patience Johnson

quotes.quote: “That failure serves a purpose!”

quotes.quote: “જે છૂટી ગયું હોય કે છોડી દીધું હોય એને ક્લેઈમ કરવા ક્યારેય પાછા ન ફરવું. ભૂતકાળ બનેલી ક્ષણો પર દાવો કરવાથી ક્યારેક આપણે ફરી એ જ બેડીઓમાં પ્રવેશી જઈએ છીએ, જેમાંથી માંડ છુટકારો મેળવેલો. એ ક્ષણો ગમ્મે તેટલી સુખદ હોય, ભૂતકાળને ફરીથી જીવવાનો પ્રયત્ન કરવો મૂર્ખામી છે. કારણકે લાખ પ્રયત્નો પછી પણ એની એ જ ક્ષણોને આપણે ફરીથી જીવી નથી શકવાના. ભૂતકાળ ગમ્મે તેટલો પોકારે, એને પાછળ વળીને જોવાની ભૂલ ન કરવી. એ સુખદ યાદોને મનોમન ચૂમી લેવી અને આગળ વધવું.”

quotes.quote: “In life, pain is not necessarily a punishment; rather it is also a privilege to prove that you are stronger.”

quotes.quote: “Setbacks No Shackle (Sonnet)
quotes.author: Abhijit Naskar

quotes.quote: “જ્યારે તમે ખરેખર જાતને પ્રાથમિકતા આપવા માંડો છો ત્યારે અમૂકને ગુમાવવા લાગો છો. તમારા ઉપેક્ષિત સ્વ-હિતથી જેટલા લોકોને લાભ મળતો, એ બધા હવે દૂર ચાલ્યા જશે. ધેટ્સ ઓકે. આત્મ-પોષણ માટે કેટલાક પરોપજીવીઓનું દૂર જવું આવશ્યક હોય છે.”
quotes.author: Dr. Nimit Oza

quotes.quote: “A dream without action is like a map without footsteps, only those who walk make it to the destination.”
quotes.author: Alex Shaikh

quotes.quote: “Any sacrifice that I make will be worth it if we can become our ancestors’ wildest dreams.”
quotes.author: Analeigh Sbrana

quotes.quote: “There is only one way you can fail and that’s if you believe you don’t deserve to win.”
quotes.author: Wendy K Richards

quotes.quote: “You can't disown caterpillars if you love butterflies.”
quotes.author: Udai Yadla

quotes.quote: “The safest choices aren't always the quickest ones.”
quotes.author: Alex

quotes.quote: “Dear self, it's okay to check out for a while, just remember to check back in.”
quotes.author: Alessandra Olanow

quotes.quote: “How to stay positive when all you want to do is be negative: start with one small positive thought.”
quotes.author: Alessandra Olanow

quotes.quote: “Dear self, I'm not where I want to be, but at least I'm not where I used to be.”
quotes.author: Alessandra Olanow

quotes.quote: “Embrace the doubt of tomorrow, for there is no opportunity in the certainty of yesterday.”
quotes.author: Brandon Smith

quotes.quote: “Just pause, reset, and restart... but do not shutdown the spirit of determination, for it gives you the power to begin anew and drives you to rise above and overcome.”
quotes.author: CaristoSays

quotes.quote: “Speak life, always.”
quotes.author: Affinity Soul

quotes.quote: “An overly timid engagement with the debates of our time will rob one of the ferocity of feeling that is necessary to move the world. "If you do not feel it, you will not get it by hunting for it”
quotes.author: Alexander C. Karp

quotes.quote: “The secret to making accurate predictions is within. One can memorise all the techniques in the world and still err. The fact is that the final "Message" is sent through the Source itself. Intuition works hand-in-hand with human analysis.”
quotes.author: Mitta Xinindlu

quotes.quote: “Whenever this land faces the destruction of humanity,
quotes.author: Sandip Shelke

quotes.quote: “The only limits in life are the ones we place on our thoughts. Break the barriers, and unlock your true potential.”
quotes.author: Pintu Saw

quotes.quote: “There is something far worse than poverty and fear. It is slavery ! I would trade all the wealth in the world to live a single moment of freedom.
quotes.author: Sandip Shelke

quotes.quote: “નિરક્ષર પાસે રહેવાથી જ્ઞાનકોશનું મહત્વ ઘટતું નથી. કેટલાક લોકોને દરેકની કિંમત ખબર હોય છે, પણ મૂલ્ય ખબર નથી હોતું. જો કોઈ તમને વાંચી કે સમજી નથી શકતું, તો એ એમની નિરક્ષરતા છે. એમના ‘કલર બ્લાઇન્ડ’ હોવાથી આપણા રંગો ઓછા નથી થવાના. જો કોઈ આપણી પ્રતિભા, સારપ, કે સફળતાની કદર નથી કરતું, તો એની ફરિયાદ શું કરવાની ? કોઈની પ્રશંસા, કદર, કે સમર્થનનું મહોતાજ હોય, એવું તેજ શું કામનું ? જેઓ ઈર્ષા, અજ્ઞાન, કે પૂર્વગ્રહોથી બળતા હોય, તેમને દીવાનો પ્રકાશ પણ દઝાડશે જ. એમની ચિંતા કર્યા વગર, ચમક્યા કરો.”
quotes.author: Dr. Nimit Oza

quotes.quote: “There’s no other way to look move forward, except to look forward.”
quotes.author: Nkwachukwu Ogbuagu

quotes.quote: “Opinions are like drums; if you do not beat them, they wouldn’t sound. Let the world know your opinion on issues.”
quotes.author: Nkwachukwu Ogbuagu

quotes.quote: “There’s no other way to move forward, except to look forward.”
quotes.author: Nkwachukwu Ogbuagu

quotes.quote: “how to speak with live person on United airlines"
quotes.author: David

quotes.quote: “Even if you lose all you have, don’t ever lose hope.”
quotes.author: Nkwachukwu Ogbuagu

quotes.quote: “Now, I choose peace. I choose wholeness. I choose love because I can. I am the author of my own life; I am both the pen and the paper. I am the source and the light. I am the one who declares, "This is how it is now," and so it is.”
quotes.author: Robin S. Baker

quotes.quote: “If you can’t predict what leads to success, you are less likely to invest in improving”
quotes.author: Hiran Shanake Perera

quotes.quote: “Channel your emotions and thoughts into pursuing your dreams—they're your greatest energy source. Don't let them dissipate through fleeting posts on social media”
quotes.author: Ankith Reddy

quotes.quote: “The sixth verse is never sung twice. Your suffering begins and ends with you.”
quotes.author: Hari krishnan Nair

quotes.quote: “Question your rulers
quotes.author: Claudys Kantara

quotes.quote: “Your best might not look the same every day, and that’s okay. Some days you’ll feel like you’re on top of the world, and other days it will feel like a victory just to make it through. But as long as you’re doing what you can with what you have, that is enough. You are enough.”
quotes.author: J. Edwards Holt

quotes.quote: “Culture isn't fluff. It's infrastructure.”
quotes.author: Janna Cachola

quotes.quote: “Obstacles aren't walls, they're mirrors—showing you the strength you forgot you had. Face them, and watch yourself rise.”
quotes.author: Srinivas Mishra

quotes.quote: “If I could show you how my heart is flowing with gratitude and love, I'd send you pictures, I swear.”
quotes.author: Mitta Xinindlu

quotes.quote: “You don't need a formal position to lead; influence is powerful.”
quotes.author: Hemant Nepal

quotes.quote: “What you water with effort, will bloom. Even in the shadow of doubt.”
quotes.author: Martin Walters

quotes.quote: “Do you know the difference between healthy self-doubt and imposter syndrome? Compare this: a GPS recalculating your route—calm, collected, and ready to guide you back on track. Now, contrast that with your Inner Chaotic Passenger who’s simultaneously giving you wrong directions, insisting that you got your license from a garage sale, and yelling that you’re trying to scam them. Whatever happens—they’re definitely giving you one star and writing a detailed complaint about it.”
quotes.author: Tempest Jemison

quotes.quote: “(...) here’s the thing about pretending to have all the answers: it’s exhausting, it’s lonely, and—surprise, surprise—it’s holding you back from your greatest potential. Your worth isn't determined by a flawless facade but by your resilience, adaptability, and willingness to be genuinely human.”
quotes.author: Tempest Jemison

quotes.quote: “Being diligent to a course, makes you an agent and source, through which; others can outsource and attain same course.”
quotes.author: Roland Nkrah

quotes.quote: “Understanding that this voice is a misguided attempt to shield you from failure by bombarding you with self-criticism is the first step to putting it in its place.”
quotes.author: Tempest Jemison

quotes.quote: “The whole point of our reincarnation is to help others; whether it's our children, families, friends, or strangers.
quotes.author: Mitta Xinindlu

quotes.quote: “I am the cause and effect of my problems.”
quotes.author: A.S Rana

quotes.quote: “I am the cause and effect of my problems.”
quotes.author: Anoop S. Rana

quotes.quote: “Where trees won't grow, bushes thrive. Nothing and no one is insignificant in this world.”
quotes.author: Bhuwan Thapaliya

quotes.quote: “Heroes are not born but made through their choices. One could be given the greatest gifts of the world and choose to do nothing with them. Or someone with nothing could forge their way to the pinnacle of power. Whether mortal or immortal, our destiny is in our hands.”
quotes.author: Sue Lynn Tan

quotes.quote: “Don't try too hard to fit in nor to stand out; you will get lost in between. Embrace who you are.”
quotes.author: Sujata(SLK)

quotes.quote: “I also want to be happy. To invest in something meaningful and fulfilling, even if it is difficult, and maybe not the most practical option in the world. To spend more time with Baba and Mama and Xiaoyi, and finally hang out with Chanel, and go out on a proper date with Henry. I want to laugh until my stomach hurts, and write until I’ve crafted something that delights me, and learn to bask in my small, private victories. Learn to accept that these things, too, are worth wanting.”
quotes.author: Ann Liang

quotes.quote: “No one has a perfect life Some of us just hide the imperfections well.”
quotes.author: Adil Alzarooni

quotes.quote: “Education must empower a man to have an economic freedom.”
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: “It is never too late.

quotes.quote: “Your chart, profile or lifestyle could indicate a second marriage or relationship. It's not a sign of failure; but a sign of a second chance to love again. Don't be ashamed, just align yourself accordingly.”

quotes.quote: “An end of a marriage or a relationship is not a failure. It's an opportunity to love again. Align yourself accordingly.”
quotes.author: Mitta Xinindlu

quotes.quote: “Venus is exalted in Pisces to show us that either direction of the fish can give maximum fulfilment. Being single or being in a couple can be both equally satisfying. Don't be pressured to follow the social norms. Follow your chart.”

quotes.quote: “Aude Aliquid Dignum”

quotes.quote: “Growth is not only the act of adding more to our lives, but also of letting go of what no longer serves us.”
quotes.author: Aloo Denish Obiero

quotes.quote: “You have endured, not to be shackled by your history but to reclaim your present, to live fortunately, freely, and fearlessly.”
quotes.author: Rise Visuals

quotes.quote: “Your body speaks before your words ever reach the room”
quotes.author: S.RAI

quotes.quote: “If you start low, don't worry, all the greats started low.”
quotes.author: Ronald Bunch

quotes.quote: “If you can accept your flaws, you're flawless.”
quotes.author: Ronald Bunch

quotes.quote: “A problem loved is a problem solved.”
quotes.author: Sola Kosoko

quotes.quote: “Anything worth doing is worth striving to perfect. If you are able to do it well, why should you do it halfway?”
quotes.author: Lois Duncan

quotes.quote: “It was a boat, a small boat, an older boat, not much more than the length of a couple of blue whales, and there was one intention, the story immemorial: to survive the harpoon, skip the vortex, complete the job, and get back to where we came from.”
quotes.author: Colum McCann

quotes.quote: “You can't because you haven't”
quotes.author: Otegbade Temitayo

quotes.quote: “જીવનમાં કેટલાક ફેરફારો બાહ્ય રીતે અનિચ્છનીય અને નેગેટીવ લાગે છે, પણ હકીકતમાં તેઓ અંદરની બાજુએ મોકળાશ કરતાં હોય છે. એવી જગ્યા બનાવતા હોય છે જ્યાંથી કશુંક નવું ઉગી શકે.”
quotes.author: Dr. Nimit Oza

quotes.quote: “In life, we don't HAVE to do anything”
quotes.author: Ta Kos

quotes.quote: “The weight of regret is heavier than the burden of discipline—choose wisely.”
quotes.author: Aloo Denish Obiero

quotes.quote: “લાયકાત વગરના પુરુષ સામે પોતાની જાત સમર્પિત કરી દીધા પછી, જો દીકરીને એ વાતનો અફસોસ રહ્યા કરે, તો એ નિષ્ફળતા દીકરીની નહીં, એના પિતાની છે. એક દીકરીની સેલ્ફ-વર્થ કેટલી છે, એ યોગ્ય ઉંમરે જો તેને જણાવવામાં ન આવે, તો ‘વલ્નરેબીલીટી’ અને ‘લવ-સિકનેસ’નો બોજો ઉપાડીને તે પોતાની આખી જિંદગી એક પુરુષની સહાનુભૂતિ અને સમર્થન મેળવવામાં વિતાવી દે છે. પછી તેની પાસે પોતાની સેલ્ફ-વર્થ પ્રસ્થાપિત કરવા માટે પોતાની સેક્સ્યુઆલીટી સિવાય બીજું કશું જ નથી હોતું. કેટલા પુરુષો એનામાં ઈન્ટરેસ્ટેડ છે ? એવી વાતમાં જો દીકરી પોતાનું સ્વમાન શોધતી થઈ જાય તો સમજવું કે એક પિતા તરીકે આપણે નિષ્ફળ રહ્યા છીએ.”
quotes.author: Dr. Nimit Oza

quotes.quote: “We are responsible for what we are
quotes.author: Swami Vivekananda

quotes.quote: “We reap what we sow

quotes.quote: “This is the first lesson to learn be determined not to curse anything outside not to lay the blame upon anyone outside but stand up lay the blame on yourself
quotes.author: Swami Vivekananda

quotes.quote: “It is our own mental attitude which makes the world what it is for us
quotes.author: Swami Vivekananda

quotes.quote: “Truth can be stated in a thousand different ways
quotes.author: Swami Vivekananda

quotes.quote: “Whenever we attain a higher vision, the lower vision disappears of itself”
quotes.author: Swami Vivekananda

quotes.quote: “Everything can be sacrificed for truth but truth cannot be sacrificed for anything”

quotes.quote: “ಬದುಕು'

quotes.quote: “We cannot live in a way that is inconsistent with our expectations for ourselves.”

quotes.quote: “Communism is when iPhone.”
quotes.author: Karl Marx

quotes.quote: “True hierarchy can be found in the animal kingdom. Man must recognise sigma from alpha, the latter from beta, and the former from gamma. Order is in the intellect and strength of the spirit of man.”

quotes.quote: “You deserve to be happy, Rob. Do what makes you happy. Do what feeds your soul.”

quotes.quote: “the afternoon. You can't take it with you.”
quotes.author: Annie Dillard

quotes.quote: “Well, I got what I went after, and then some – and I can’t help feeling a little puffed up about it… This is a man size job, but I seem to be getting away with it, and I’m going to see it through.' (Genevieve Hitt)”
quotes.author: Liza Mundy

quotes.quote: “We were not born just to increase the GDP of our nation. We were born to live a purposeful, meaningful, and fulfilling life.”
quotes.author: Dr. Sanjay Runwal

quotes.quote: “Exercise moderation. Learn to keep your life simple and away from comparisons.”
quotes.author: Dr. Sanjay Runwal

quotes.quote: “Be present only where it really matters to you. Don't waste your time and energy if it does not please you. What really matters now, is your personal joy and satisfaction.”
quotes.author: Dr. Sanjay Runwal

quotes.quote: “The real essence of SBOP Concept is in balancing your existence for yourself, for your future and your family, and for the good of the community.”
quotes.author: Dr. Sanjay Runwal

quotes.quote: “Be a student all your life. Let learning be a never-ending process for you.”
quotes.author: Dr. Sanjay Runwal

quotes.quote: “Stay in the present and engage in a way that would be of interest to the younger generation. They are the ones who will be helping and caring for you as your get older. Learn to get along with them smoothly rather than complain about their generational differences.”
quotes.author: Dr Sanjay Runwal

quotes.quote: “Stay in the present and engage in a way that would be of interest to the younger generation. They are the ones who will be helping and caring for you as your get older. Learn to get along with them smoothly rather than complain about their generational differences.”
quotes.author: Dr. Sanjay Runwal

quotes.quote: “Acts of kindness do not cost money nor does sincere gratefulness cost anything. However, the joy it can spread is what money cannot buy.”
quotes.author: Dr. Sanjay Runwal

quotes.quote: “At the end of your life, your bank passbook will only matter to your children but the DGL (Do Good in Life) passbook will create a lifetime of legacy.”
quotes.author: Dr. Sanjay Runwal

quotes.quote: “Leave a clean and tidy legacy behind so that the next generation admires you and your way of working rather than curses you for the mess that you have left behind.”
quotes.author: Dr. Sanjay Runwal

quotes.quote: “Be selfish to create a large space for yourself in the hearts of as many as you can. This is one selfishness no one will rue.”
quotes.author: Dr. Sanjay Runwal

quotes.quote: “A man must first empower himself. To be of service to himself and his fellow men.”
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: “Respect reflects on behavior, not on words.
quotes.author: G.K. Dutta

quotes.quote: “Life is like a book—each day a page, each year a chapter, and before you can figure out the ending, it's over. Live life to the fullest. Don’t wait for opportunity to knock; be a carpenter, build your own door, and walk boldly through it.”
quotes.author: Matt Heart

quotes.quote: “Only The Fallen Can Rise Again”
quotes.author: Steven Erikson

quotes.quote: “You have a burning passion in your heart. So let’s do our best. Let's work hard in life, even if we’re lonely.” — Kyojuro Rengoku”
quotes.author: Koyoharu Gotouge

quotes.quote: “The greatest luxury we can have is not where we are, but who we’re becoming.”
quotes.author: Hockson Floin

quotes.quote: “Why would I act like an Angel if you treat me like a Demon?”
quotes.author: Vincent Jay M. Cabrera

quotes.quote: “We must carry out our duties, dedicating the spirit to God and with detachment from all interest in the things of the world and free from enmity towards any living being.”
quotes.author: Sarvepalli Radhakrishnan

quotes.quote: “Recognize that rejection is a part of the human experience and does not define your worth or capabilities.”
quotes.author: Janani Srikanth

quotes.quote: “Remember, every great achievement was once an idea in someone’s mind. Don’t let fear hold you back from working on that idea.”
quotes.author: Janani Srikanth

quotes.quote: “A true leader fights not with a sword, but with the strength in his heart.”
quotes.author: Israh Azizi

quotes.quote: “Small ideas grow mighty achievements”
quotes.author: unknown author

quotes.quote: “It’s hard to beat a person who never gives up”
quotes.author: Babe Ruth

quotes.quote: “The real promise is not that anyone belongs to us, but that in this boundless, ever-changing world, we belong to the moments we create together.”
quotes.author: DarkNightBeacon

quotes.quote: “Don't regret what you said; emotions always say the truth”
quotes.author: M M Khane

quotes.quote: “If you want something different, you are going to have to do something different.”
quotes.author: Jack Canfield

quotes.quote: “Just because you have limitations doesn’t mean you have to limit yourself.”
quotes.author: Casey Yun

quotes.quote: “Do not get tired of searching. If there’s anything to get tired of, it should be the act of counting the number of times you have searched without finding.”
quotes.author: Nkwachukwu Ogbuagu

quotes.quote: “We can choose the courage to put ourselves in the vicinity of the things we fear over and over again until we grow more comfortable and then confident.”
quotes.author: Brendon Burchard

quotes.quote: “Do not limit yourself to the past.”
quotes.author: Neville Goddard

quotes.quote: “Time is the only currency that can be spent but never saved; invest it wisely, for its return is your legacy.”
quotes.author: Aloo Denish Obiero

quotes.quote: “In a world full of confusion, to really heal, you need a bit of practicality and reality.”
quotes.author: Mitta Xinindlu

quotes.quote: “To learn is to light a flame; to teach is to spread its glow.”
quotes.author: Aloo Denish Obiero

quotes.quote: “You will sweat; it's uncomfortable. You won't feel it's enough, but it'll be something. Lean your body and let your head rest against the wall. Listen to the screech of the violin electrifying your skin. And let the ball start rolling.”
quotes.author: Hansel Hersch

quotes.quote: “Seeing love turn into a long-term commitment makes my heart jump.”
quotes.author: Mitta Xinindlu

quotes.quote: “And then, I realized what you do with an idea...
quotes.author: Kobi Yamada

quotes.quote: “You nice, keep going.”
quotes.author: Park Jimin

quotes.quote: “Every victory, every struggle, every happiness, and every sadness, have brought you to this moment in your life and made you the wonderful, wiser person that you are right now- always love who you are...”
quotes.author: Teresa M. Wilkins

quotes.quote: “You are responsible for understanding your limitations. Only then can you make the decisions with regard to approach, rather staying within its confines if the task supersedes your capabilities or expertise or seeking assistance & know-how to tackle the task at hand.”
quotes.author: Darwies Soeker

quotes.quote: “Only The Fallen Can Rise Again”
quotes.author: Hamza-L

quotes.quote: “Don't give up on your daring dreams.”
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: “The Sun Persists in Rising so I Make Myself Stand”
quotes.author: Suzanne Collins

quotes.quote: “In a world where everything has a price, truth often takes the backseat to sales. When you're judged by what you can pay, remember: those who can't buy their worth aren't seen. Smile, move forward, and define your own value.”
quotes.author: Ann Merin Varghese

quotes.quote: “As long as you're not doing what you're meant to do, you'll feel like you're walking around with a tiny rock inside your shoe.”

quotes.author: Chris Wei Chen

quotes.quote: “You are encouraged to put your passion & efforts into protecting and establishing your stable financial future, instead of looking for others to partner with to share your property or inherit property from others in this life. Come out to cultivate your own crops and wait for their harvests like a peasant or a gardener. With your north node Aries in 2nd house, you are coming to realize that all your possessions have to be owned and earned by yourself. As an entrepreneur's spirit, you can effectively manage your material possessions to build self-worth in society in this lifetime. Gone is the mediocre middleman in an intimate partnership or close family. This time, life seriously challenges you to venture for your own money. Plan and do big for all things that you never dared to think about doing independently, especially when you were in your childhood, where you automatically follow intensive cooperation to sharing your belongings. North Node Aries in 2nd house put your Aries soul energy on the front line of your financial life. It is important to display Aries's potential in this aspect to practice and foster your positive energies in the process of your spiritual growth. Speak less and act impulsively and do more, being daring when addressing the public will bring you fulfillment joyfully...
quotes.author: Chris Wei Chen

quotes.quote: “There must be willingness first, before the strength, in every spiritual assignment”

quotes.quote: “All you need to do is decide that you have something you’ve been wanting. It doesn’t matter what your senses are telling you. What does your mind tell you? If you can see it in your head, you have it. Just decide that it’s already yours. It’ll have no choice but to reveal itself.”

quotes.quote: “And while I might not survive if I stay, I'm not sure I can live with myself if I leave.”

quotes.quote: “When the shit hit the fan, if everyone said "there, there" and made out it wasn't your fault, you just blamed yourself more. You needed to be an adult and step up, accept the responsibility and move on, or else you learned nothing and you got stuck in a spiral of self-doubt.”

quotes.quote: “Possession - yes, possess the whole earth if you wanted, but keep it for yourself. What should it matter to you how your things were scattered to the winds - after you were dead? There was only one life that mattered in this world and that was your own.”

quotes.quote: “I have seen so much of the deep dark. How can I now crave to stand in the light?”

quotes.quote: “I have seen so much of the deep dark. How can I now crave to stand in the light?”

quotes.quote: “If you can go to a movie and see a picture of war and suffering, and afterward say, “What a wonderful picture!” so may you take this life as a cosmic picture-show. Be prepared for every kind of experience that may come to you, realizing that all are but dreams. Each human life constitutes a drama; and the events of each day represent a drama. You are living a fresh one each of the year’s 365 days. The thought that you are merely a player in these dramas is very comforting. Realize that the acting out of whatever part you are called upon to play does not affect your real being. At the end of every earthly incarnation you are the same—the immortal soul—untouched by sickness, sorrow, or death. “He who cannot be ruffled by these (contacts of the senses with their objects), who is calm and evenminded during pain and pleasure, he alone is fit to attain everlastingness!” (Bhagavad Gita II:15.)”
quotes.author: Paramahansa Yogananda

quotes.quote: “Sometimes the world will hit you hard, but as long as you remember to hit it back 10 times harder, you'll always be good!”

quotes.quote: “The happiest people make the maddest decisions, the saddest people make the sanest. When you're trying to decide what path to take, especially when it comes to career choices and love, always keep that in mind!”

quotes.quote: “In this moment rests the seed of everything you could become—

quotes.author: Enric Mestre Arenas

quotes.quote: “I was wondering if it would be possible- when I suddenly realized that—the greatest people have made the impossible—I’m possible”

quotes.quote: “The BEST things happens in your life

quotes.quote: “Your pain is not a tomb—

quotes.quote: “What if we dream together?" —Dread”

quotes.quote: “You are more than your fears have allowed you to be.

quotes.quote: “To live is to be infinite,

quotes.quote: “You'll Never Walk Alone' is cheesy but not wrong. The song doesn't claim that the world is just a happy place. It just asks us to walk on with hopes in our hearts. And like Louis in the Carousel, even if you don't really believe in the golden sky or the sweet silver song of the lark when you start singing, you believe it a little more when you finish.”

quotes.quote: “When you're doubting the Universe's master plan, take a peek at your surroundings. See those dreams turned into reality? That's the Universe's way of saying, "I got you." It's like a cosmic wink, a nod from the stars that says, "I heard you, and I delivered." It’s like a sneak peek into your own past prayers. So, next time you’re doubting the Universe’s plan, just look at your life – it’s the proof that magic is real, dreams do come true, and the universe has always been secretly rooting for you.”
quotes.author: Life is Positive

quotes.quote: “Your next steps will determine whether you make it or break it. You now know how you can shape the trajectory of your life and who you become.”

quotes.quote: “You can’t settle for good when you’re called to be great.”

quotes.quote: “Stop making excuses for your lack of action or results by focusing on what other people have done to you, how life is not fair, or how the world has wronged you.”

quotes.quote: “The future you depends on the current you to chase the goals and ambitions you have set for yourself. The future version of you is relying on this very moment—and every day after—for you to keep the focus, the dedication, and the promises that you have made to yourself.”

quotes.quote: “Those hungry for success are willing to take on the daily challenge of pushing themselves to their greatest potential despite hardships.”

quotes.quote: “You don’t have to get it right, you just have to get it started.”

quotes.quote: “To change is to evolve; to resist is to wither.”

quotes.quote: “Could-do only matters if it's also want-to-do.”

quotes.quote: “Me? ...I'm a woman of great faith who takes the time to encourage others, while pursuing my own vision.”

quotes.quote: “I wish everyone knew that success is not defined by degrees or qualifications.
quotes.author: Mitta Xinindlu

quotes.quote: “Sometimes, it seems no matter what moves you make to better your life, some of the ugliness of your past tries to follow you, but thankfully, so does God’s grace.”

quotes.quote: “Hope is the light you hold fast to when passing through darkness. With it, you will surely find your way. With it, you will surely find what you’re searching for.”

quotes.quote: “You don't have to figure out anything. Everything is already figured out. All you need to do is to listen to that tiny little voice of your heart.”

quotes.quote: “Once you know where you are going, you can never get tired on the way to it.”
quotes.author: Nkwachukwu Ogbuagu

quotes.quote: “So, instead of the story being this messed-up thing I erroneously produced, because I don’t know how to do it right—instead of it existing as a sort of Proof of Failure, with me as Chief Failer—I see myself as a loyal, helpful friend to that guy over there, who is my talent, and I have faith in him, although he sometimes gets a little confused. And I’m trying to help him to do his best. He empties his pockets on to the table and some of what he puts there is good, and some of it is… “not quite there yet.” I step up to the table, put my hand on his back, and the feeling I’m trying to convey is, “What’ve we got here? Let’s see what we can do. It’s going to be all right.”
quotes.author: George Saunders

quotes.quote: “The joy of knowing Jesus.”
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: “In order to get something done, you gotta do something. In order to do something, you gotta get to work. So, let's get to work.”

quotes.quote: “Do not get discouraged because of the difficulties.”
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: “Though there are difficulties, do not give up.”
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: “On the edge conversations with my son. My son (the one who can't easily decide) asked me in a positive note, "Mommy how can you be fearless and decide easily." To which I carefully replied: "It's not that I am without fear. In fact, after having you - I have a lot. Nothing is easy when you don't really know what you want. But if you truly do want things to happen, your fears will be overshadowed by making your dreams come true. Just make one step at a time and with each step the shadows of doubt and fear will fall behind you."
quotes.author: Mystqx Skye

quotes.quote: “Level Up
quotes.author: Mystqx Skye

quotes.quote: “Don't scatter yourself; you're not wind. Learn to say no.”
quotes.author: Mitta Xinindlu

quotes.quote: “Embrace the mountain for its view and the valley for its vision, knowing each serves a purpose in your journey.”
quotes.author: Sope Agbelusi

quotes.quote: “The mountain gives us a place to shout our triumphs, the valley a space to whisper our plans for the next ascent.”
quotes.author: Sope Agbelusi

quotes.quote: “If you believe you can, then you will.”
quotes.author: José Ferreira

quotes.quote: “If You Feel Happiness, Sorrow and Pain While Writing Your Characters, It Means You are a True Author.”
quotes.author: unknown author

quotes.quote: “Life is too short for bad vibes and lukewarm coffee. Surround yourself with people who lift you higher and invest in a good coffee maker. After all, why settle for mediocrity when you can have an espresso shot of excellence in every cup? Embrace the bold flavors of life, kick negativity to the curb, and savor the rich aroma of success. Remember, you’re the barista of your own destiny, so brew it strong and make it count!”
quotes.author: Life is Positive

quotes.quote: “Don’t light a fire that has no reason to be alive because at the end of the day you are the one that is going to be burned”
quotes.author: K.America

quotes.quote: “No one goes around throwing caution to the wind, unless the wind is blowing their way.”
quotes.author: Taylor Jenkins Reid

quotes.quote: “Whenever you’re about to find fault with someone, hit pause and ask yourself: What flaw of mine is the evil twin of the one I’m about to criticize? It’s like holding up a mirror before pointing a finger. We can turn those fingers into peace signs & high-fives, fostering empathy. This little trick can turn your inner critic into a sage, swapping judgment for a bit of humility & understanding. So, next time, think twice and see if you’re about to roast your own twin flaw.”
quotes.author: Life is Positive

quotes.quote: “Whether you're climbing mountains or just trying to survive Monday, keep your eyes on the prize. Life's a marathon, not a sprint, and the finish line is reserved for those who refuse to quit. So, lace up your shoes, take a deep breath, & keep pushing forward. Every step, no matter how small, gets you closer to your dreams. Quitting is easy, but where's the fun in that? Stick with it because that's where the magic happens. Stay focused, stay determined, & let success chase you down!”
quotes.author: Life is Positive

quotes.quote: “Never assume but ask questions.”
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: “When the student is ready, the teacher will appear.”
quotes.author: Ancient Proverb

quotes.quote: “Do hard work. Either you will succeed, or you will prove the statement 'Hard work is the key to success' wrong. But remember, it can never be proved wrong, so there is only one option left.”

quotes.quote: “Strength lies within the individual who sees every difficulty as an opportunity to create some this new.”

quotes.quote: “You wake up every morning to fight the same demons that left you so tired the night before, and that, my love, is bravery.”

quotes.quote: “You are doing something real! It just takes effort. Anything takes effort. The better it is, the more effort it takes. You have to follow through with it. Now get your butt back up there and keep moving. There aren’t any breaks unless the commander orders them. Keep going, George, you have to do it. Don’t be a pessimist.”

quotes.quote: “Allow love to heal your scars by opening your heart.”

quotes.quote: “We came to earth to fulfill certain roles or characters, so that future actors and actresses can gain knowledge and insight from the experiences of those who came before them.”

quotes.quote: “Saints like Jesus and others — depending on your religion — died as single men; never dated and never married.
