quotes.quote: “Discipline Your Mind to Think Positively: Discipline your mind to see the good in every situation and look on the best side of every event.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

Scientists can't invent new minutes. And you can't save time to spend it on another day. Even so, time is amazingly fair and forgiving. No matter how much time you've wasted in the past, you still have an entire tomorrow.”

quotes.quote: “The one who falls and gets up is stronger than the one who never tried. Do not fear failure but rather fear not trying.”

Nurture your mind with positive thoughts: kindness, empathy, compassion, peace, love, joy, humility, generosity, etc. The more you feed your mind with positive thoughts, the more you can attract great things into your life.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “What you stay focused on will grow.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “Don’t wait for things to happen. Make them happen.”

quotes.quote: “Challenge and adversity are meant to help you know who you are. Storms hit your weakness, but unlock your true strength.”

I want to live my life in such a way that when I get out of bed in the morning, the devil says, 'aw shit, he's up!”

quotes.quote: “Gratitude builds a bridge to abundance.”

quotes.quote: “You were put on this earth to achieve your greatest self, to live out your purpose, and to do it courageously.”

quotes.quote: “The universe doesn’t give you what you ask for with your thoughts - it gives you what you demand with your actions.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “Beliefs are choices. First you choose your beliefs. Then your beliefs affect your choices.”

quotes.quote: “Stop doing what is easy. Start doing what is right.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “Do not let arrogance go to your head and despair to your heart; do not let compliments go to your head and criticisms to your heart; do not let success go to your head and failure to your heart.”

quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “Each day brings new opportunities, allowing you to constantly live with love—be there for others—bring a little light into someone's day. Be grateful and live each day to the fullest.”

quotes.quote: “Do not stop thinking of life as an adventure. You have no security unless you can live bravely, excitingly, imaginatively; unless you can choose a challenge instead of competence.”

quotes.quote: “To have what you have never had, you have to do what you have never done.”

quotes.quote: “Live the Life of Your Dreams

quotes.quote: “You are the average of the five people you spend the most time with.”

quotes.quote: “People are always blaming their circumstances for what they are. I don't believe in circumstances. The people who get on in this world are the people who get up and look for the circumstances they want, and if they can't find them, make them.”

quotes.quote: “You Are the Master of Your Attitude

quotes.quote: “Renew, release, let go. Yesterday’s gone. There’s nothing you can do to bring it back. You can’t “should’ve” done something. You can only DO something. Renew yourself. Release that attachment. Today is a new day!”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “How would your life be different if…You walked away from gossip and verbal defamation? Let today be the day…You speak only the good you know of other people and encourage others to do the same.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “LAW 4
quotes.author: Robert Greene

quotes.quote: “Forget yesterday - it has already forgotten you. Don't sweat tomorrow - you haven't even met. Instead, open your eyes and your heart to a truly precious gift - today.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “Don’t let others tell you what you can’t do. Don't let the limitations of others limit your vision. If you can remove your self-doubt and believe in yourself, you can achieve what you never thought possible.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “You have to accept whatever comes, and the only important thing is that you meet it with the best you have to give.”
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: “Don't wish it were easier. Wish you were better.”
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: “I want to live my life in such a way that when I get out of bed in the morning, the devil says, "aw shit, he's up!”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “Great leaders create more leaders, not followers.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “In the end, you have to choose whether or not to trust someone.”
quotes.author: Sophie Kinsella

quotes.quote: “If you don’t give up on something you truly believe in, you will find a way.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “Don't fear failure. — Not failure, but low aim, is the crime. In great attempts it is glorious even to fail.”
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.quote: “Turn your obstacles into opportunities and your problems into possibilities.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “One of the most spiritual things you can do is embrace your humanity. Connect with those around you today. Say, "I love you", "I'm sorry", "I appreciate you", "I'm proud of you"...whatever you're feeling. Send random texts, write a cute note, embrace your truth and share it...cause a smile today for someone else...and give plenty of hugs.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “Rejection is an opportunity for your selection.”
quotes.author: Bernard Branson

quotes.quote: “Remember to look up at the stars and not down at your feet. Try to make sense of what you see and wonder about what makes the universe exist. Be curious. And however difficult life may seem, there is always something you can do and succeed at.
quotes.author: Stephen Hawking

quotes.quote: “Don't confuse poor decision-making with destiny. Own your mistakes. It’s ok; we all make them. Learn from them so they can empower you!”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “You are not a victim. No matter what you have been through, you're still here. You may have been challenged, hurt, betrayed, beaten, and discouraged, but nothing has defeated you. You are still here! You have been delayed but not denied. You are not a victim, you are a victor. You have a history of victory.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “I cannot compromise my respect for your love. You can keep your love, I will keep my respect.”
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: “Everything is hard before it is easy”
quotes.author: Goethe J.W.

quotes.quote: “Consistency is the true foundation of trust. Either keep your promises or do not make them.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “It's funny how, in this journey of life, even though we may begin at different times and places, our paths cross with others so that we may share our love, compassion, observations, and hope. This is a design of God that I appreciate and cherish.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “Shine your light and make a positive impact on the world; there is nothing so honorable as helping improve the lives of others.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “Dream your own dreams, achieve your own goals. Your journey is your own and unique.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “The discontent and frustration that you feel is entirely your own creation.”
quotes.author: Stephen Richards

quotes.quote: “Fear robs you of your freedom to make the right choice in life that can bridge the gap between where you are and where you want to be. On the other side of fear, lies freedom. If you want to grow, you need to be brave and take risks. If you're not uncomfortable, you're not growing.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “Great Leaders Create More Leaders
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “How would your life be different if…You stopped worrying about things you can’t control and started focusing on the things you can? Let today be the day…You free yourself from fruitless worry, seize the day and take effective action on things you can change.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “Be with someone who inspires you and makes you be the best version of yourself.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “The greatest step towards a life of simplicity is to learn to let go.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “Life teaches us the right path is rarely the easy one.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “The harder you fall, the heavier your heart; the heavier your heart, the stronger you climb; the stronger you climb, the higher your pedestal.”
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: “Find a purpose to serve, not a lifestyle to live.”
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: “Every choice comes with a consequence. Once you make a choice, you must accept responsibility. You cannot escape the consequences of your choices, whether you like them or not.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “Keep in mind that the true measure of an individual is how he treats a person who can do him absolutely no good.”
quotes.author: Ann Landers

quotes.quote: “Failures are the stairs we climb to reach success.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “No one has ever achieved greatness without dreams.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “Live boldly. Push yourself. Don't settle.”
quotes.author: Jojo Moyes

quotes.quote: “Free yourself from the complexities and drama of your life. Simplify. Look within. Within ourselves we all have the gifts and talents we need to fulfill the purpose we've been blessed with.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “You can have everything you want if you can put your heart and soul into everything you do.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “After sleeping through a hundred million centuries we have finally opened our eyes on a sumptuous planet, sparkling with color, bountiful with life. Within decades we must close our eyes again. Isn’t it a noble, an enlightened way of spending our brief time in the sun, to work at understanding the universe and how we have come to wake up in it? This is how I answer when I am asked—as I am surprisingly often—why I bother to get up in the mornings.”
quotes.author: Richard Dawkins

quotes.quote: “Difficulties and adversities viciously force all their might on us and cause us to fall apart, but they are necessary elements of individual growth and reveal our true potential. We have got to endure and overcome them, and move forward. Never lose hope. Storms make people stronger and never last forever.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “Stay strong, stay positive, and never give up.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “How much you can learn when you fail determines how far you will go into achieving your goals.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “Today is a new day. Don't let your history interfere with your destiny! Let today be the day you stop being a victim of your circumstances and start taking action towards the life you want. You have the power and the time to shape your life. Break free from the poisonous victim mentality and embrace the truth of your greatness. You were not meant for a mundane or mediocre life!”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “Create a vision for the life you really want and then work relentlessly towards making it a reality.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “Change course, but don’t give up.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “Those with a grateful mindset tend to see the message in the mess. And even though life may knock them down, the grateful find reasons, if even small ones, to get up.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “War is an ugly thing, but not the ugliest of things: the decayed and degraded state of moral and patriotic feeling which thinks that nothing is worth a war, is much worse. When a people are used as mere human instruments for firing cannon or thrusting bayonets, in the service and for the selfish purposes of a master, such war degrades a people. A war to protect other human beings against tyrannical injustice; a war to give victory to their own ideas of right and good, and which is their own war, carried on for an honest purpose by their free choice, — is often the means of their regeneration. A man who has nothing which he is willing to fight for, nothing which he cares more about than he does about his personal safety, is a miserable creature who has no chance of being free, unless made and kept so by the exertions of better men than himself. As long as justice and injustice have not terminated their ever-renewing fight for ascendancy in the affairs of mankind, human beings must be willing, when need is, to do battle for the one against the other.”
quotes.author: John Stuart Mill

quotes.quote: “No matter how much experience you have, there’s always something new you can learn and room for improvement.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “LAW 38
quotes.author: Robert Greene

quotes.quote: “Do not let your negative thoughts have power over you because those thoughts will end up controlling your life. No one can live a positive life with a negative mind.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “Be where you are, stop over-thinking, and focus on what you are doing.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “If you have a goal, write it down. If you do not write it down, you do not have a goal - you have a wish.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “You are never alone. You are eternally connected with everyone.”
quotes.author: Amit Ray

quotes.quote: “There is great change to be experienced once you learn the power of letting go. Stop allowing anyone or anything to control, limit, repress, or discourage you from being your true self! Today is YOURS to shape - own it - break free from people and things that poison or dilute your spirit.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “If you care about something enough, you'll find a way to make it happen.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “Believe in your infinite potential. Your only limitations are those you set upon yourself.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “One must always be prepared for riotous and endless waves of transformation.”
quotes.author: Elizabeth Gilbert

quotes.quote: “To overcome fear is the quickest way to gain your self-confidence.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “There is no more profitable investment than investing in yourself. It is the best investment you can make; you can never go wrong with it. It is the true way to improve yourself to be the best version of you and lets you be able to best serve those around you.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “Your complaints, your drama, your victim mentality, your whining, your blaming, and all of your excuses have NEVER gotten you even a single step closer to your goals or dreams. Let go of your nonsense. Let go of the delusion that you DESERVE better and go EARN it! Today is a new day!”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “Plants are more courageous than almost all human beings: an orange tree would rather die than produce lemons, whereas instead of dying the average person would rather be someone they are not.”
quotes.author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quotes.quote: “What helps you persevere is your resilience and commitment.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “A gentleman is someone who does not what he wants to do, but what he should do.”
quotes.author: Haruki Murakami

quotes.quote: “If you believe you can, you might. If you know you can, you will.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “Instead of worrying about what could go wrong, change your thoughts to what could go right. When you change the negative thought into a positive one, it eliminates the negative one.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “You make the world a better place by making daily improvements to become the best version of yourself.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “It's not what we do once in a while that shapes our lives. It's what we do consistently.”
quotes.author: Anthony Robbins

quotes.quote: “Be careful the stories you're telling yourself about your current circumstances; a head full of negative thoughts has no space for positive ones.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “The level of success you achieve will be in direct proportion to the depth of your commitment.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “Maybe I made a mistake yesterday, but yesterday’s me is still me. I am who I am today, with all my faults. Tomorrow I might be a tiny bit wiser, and that’s me, too. These faults and mistakes are what I am, making up the brightest stars in the constellation of my life. I have come to love myself for who I was, who I am, and who I hope to become.”
quotes.author: Kim Namjoong

quotes.quote: “When you concentrate your energy purposely on the future possibility that you aspire to realize, your energy is passed on to it and makes it attracted to you with a force stronger than the one you directed towards it.”
quotes.author: Stephen Richards

quotes.quote: “Act the way you'd like to be and soon you'll be the way you'd like to act.”
quotes.author: Bob Dylan

quotes.quote: “...yelling doesn't make a thing any more possible.”
quotes.author: Angie Sage

quotes.quote: “You have two choices, to conquer your fear or to let your fear conquer you.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “You attract who you are being. When you work at being the type of person that you want to attract, you attract those kinds of people into your life.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “If you are not the hero of your own story, then you're missing the whole point of your humanity.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “A young outcast will often feel that there is something wrong with himself, but as he gets older, grows more confident in who he is, he will adapt, he will begin to feel that there is something wrong with everyone else.”
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: “What the mind can conceive and believe, and the heart desire, you can achieve.”
quotes.author: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.quote: “Sometimes it's worth lingering on the journey for a while before getting to the destination.”
quotes.author: Richelle Mead

quotes.quote: “If you think you are beaten, you are
quotes.author: Walter D. Wintle

quotes.quote: “We have been called to heal wounds, to unite what has fallen apart, and to bring home those who have lost their way.”
quotes.author: St. Francis of Assisi

quotes.quote: “The most intriguing people you will encounter in this life are the people who had insights about you, that you didn't know about yourself.”
quotes.author: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.quote: “Love is as simple as the absence of self given to another. God, when invited, fills the void of any unrequited love; hence loving is how one is drawn closer to God no matter its most horrific repercussions.”
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: “Set the standard! Stop expecting others to show you love, acceptance, commitment, & respect when you don't even show that to yourself.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “Faith moves mountains, love transforms hearts.”
quotes.author: John Paul Warren

quotes.quote: “Sometimes letting go is simply changing the labels you place on an event. Looking at the same event with fresh eyes.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “No matter what your history has been, your destiny is what you create today. What are you going to create?”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “You have the ability to choose your reactions.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “Times will change for the better when you change.”
quotes.author: Maxwell Maltz

quotes.quote: “Push yourself to do more and to experience more. Harness your energy to start expanding your dreams. Yes, expand your dreams. Don't accept a life of mediocrity when you hold such infinite potential within the fortress of your mind. Dare to tap into your greatness.”
quotes.author: Robin S. Sharma

quotes.quote: “Do what you think is right. Don't let people make the decision of right or wrong for you.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “People will always have opinions about your decision because they're not courageous enough to take action on their opinion.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “12--Lose Battles, But Win The War: Grand Strategy
quotes.author: Robert Greene

quotes.quote: “If you're offered a seat on a rocket ship, don't ask what seat! Just get on.”
quotes.author: Sheryl Sandberg

quotes.quote: “Either you run the day or the day runs you..”
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: “Your opinion is not my reality.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “Once your mindset changes, everything on the outside will change along with it.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “When you are living the best version of yourself, you inspire others to live the best versions of themselves.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “A photograph shouldn't be just a picture, it should be a philosophy.”
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: “Because when we give too many fucks, when we choose to give a fuck about everything, then we feel as though we are perpetually entitled to feel comfortable and happy at all times, that’s when life fucks us.”
quotes.author: Mark Manson

quotes.quote: “remember that trying is eighty percent of doing something. So try and don't give up, because not giving up is the other twenty percent.”
quotes.author: Zain Hashmi

quotes.quote: “God helps those who strut their stuff.”
quotes.author: Dan Sofer

quotes.quote: “Look around you. Everything changes. Everything on this earth is in a continuous state of evolving, refining, improving, adapting, enhancing…changing. You were not put on this earth to remain stagnant.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “Leaders are limited by their vision rather than by their abilities.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “Happiness is a state of mind, a choice, a way of living; it is not something to be achieved, it is something to be experienced.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “If you've got nothing to dance about, find a reason to sing.”
quotes.author: Melody Carstairs

quotes.quote: “She remembered who she was
quotes.author: Lalah Delia

quotes.quote: “Make today worth remembering.”
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: “Now is the time to get serious about living your ideals. How long can you afford to put off who you really want to be? Your nobler self cannot wait any longer. Put your principles into practice – now. Stop the excuses and the procrastination. This is your life! You aren’t a child anymore. The sooner you set yourself to your spiritual program, the happier you will be. The longer you wait, the more you’ll be vulnerable to mediocrity and feel filled with shame and regret, because you know you are capable of better. From this instant on, vow to stop disappointing yourself. Separate yourself from the mob. Decide to be extraordinary and do what you need to do – now.”
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.quote: “It is impossible to discourage the real writers - they don't give a damn what you say, they're going to write.”
quotes.author: Sinclair Lewis

quotes.quote: “There are some values that you should never compromise on to stay true to yourself; you should be brave to stand up for what you truly believe in even if you stand alone.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “Every challenge you face today makes you stronger tomorrow. The challenge of life is intended to make you better, not bitter.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “Make your work to be in keeping with your purpose”
quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.quote: “People who lack the clarity, courage, or determination to follow their own dreams will often find ways to discourage yours. Live your truth and don't EVER stop!”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “One of the best ways to influence people is to make them feel important. Most people enjoy those rare moments when others make them feel important. It is one of the deepest human desires.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “Great goals make great people. People cannot hit what they do not aim for.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “You have come a long way and have won many battles. Whenever you’re faced with a difficult or challenging situation, you’ll overcome it. Yes, you can.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “Make the most of what you have and keep your standards high. Never settle for anything less than you deserve or are capable of achieving.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “Don't chase people. Be yourself, do your own thing and work hard. The right people - the ones who really belong in your life - will come to your. And stay.”
quotes.author: Will Smith

quotes.quote: “Live life as though nobody is watching, and express yourself as though everyone is listening.”
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: “Life keeps throwing me lemons because I make the best lemonade...”
quotes.author: King James Gadsden

quotes.quote: “Too many of us are not living our dreams because we are living our fears.”
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.quote: “Your greatest self has been waiting your whole life; don't make it wait any longer.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “Ever Tried. Ever Failed. No matter. Try again. Fail again. Fail better.”
quotes.author: Samuel Beckett

quotes.quote: “Judging is preventing us from understanding a new truth. Free yourself from the rules of old judgments and create the space for new understanding.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “If you fuel your journey on the opinions of others, you are going to run out of gas.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “Protect your enthusiasm from the negativity and fear of others. Never decide to do nothing just because you can only do little. Do what you can. You would be surprised at what "little" acts have done for our world.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “Real change is difficult at the beginning. Without the familiar to rely upon, you may not in as much command as you had once been. When things are not going your way, you will start doubting yourself. Stay positive, keep the faith, and keep moving forward – your breakthrough may be just around the corner.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “We all have negative thoughts now and then, but we can choose not to dwell there and not to let them control us.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “Keep your promises and be consistent. Be the kind of person others can trust.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “Learn everything you can, anytime you can, from anyone you can, there will always come a time when you will be grateful you did.”
quotes.author: Sarah Caldwell

quotes.quote: “Instead of complaining about the problem and blaming others, start finding the solution.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “Our deepest fear is not that we are inadequate. Our deepest fear is that we are powerful beyond measure. It is our light, not our darkness that most frightens us. We ask ourselves, Who am I to be brilliant, gorgeous, talented, fabulous? Actually, who are you not to be?”
quotes.author: Marianne Williamson

quotes.quote: “Create your own miracles; do what you think you cannot do.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “Don’t tell me about your god with your words. Show me about your god with your actions.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “To be heroic is to be courageous enough to die for something; to be inspirational is to be crazy enough to live a little.”
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: “You have a unique gift to offer this world. Be true to yourself, be kind to yourself, read and learn about everything that interests you and keep away from people who bring you down. When you treat yourself kindly and respect the uniqueness of those around you, you will be giving this world an amazing gift... YOU!”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “Integrity is doing what is right and truthful, and doing as you say you would do.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “Act as if! Act as if you're a wealthy man, rich already, and then you'll surely become rich. Act as if you have unmatched confidence and then people will surely have confidence in you. Act as if you have unmatched experience and then people will follow your advice. And act as if you are already a tremendous success, and as sure as I stand here today - you will become successful.”
quotes.author: Jordan Belfort

quotes.quote: “If you're waiting until you feel talented enough to make it, you'll never make it.”
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: “If an apology is followed by an excuse or a reason, it means they are going to commit same mistake again they just apologized for.”
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: “I will be generous with my love today. I will sprinkle compliments and uplifting words everywhere I go. I will do this knowing that my words are like seeds and when they fall on fertile soil, a reflection of those seeds will grow into something greater.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “‎Today is a new day. It's a day you have never seen before and will never see again. Stop telling yourself the 'same crap, different day' lie! How many days has that lie stolen from you? Seize the wonder and uniqueness of today! Recognize that throughout this beautiful day, you have an incredible amount of opportunities to move your life into the direction you want it to go.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “My atheism, like that of, is true piety towards the universe and denies only gods fashioned by men in their own image, to be servants of their human interests.”
quotes.author: George Santayana

quotes.quote: “Life has no limitations, except the ones you make.”
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.quote: “God is whispering in your heart, in the whole existence, just tune your ears.”
quotes.author: Amit Ray

quotes.quote: “Become the leader of your life. Lead yourself to where you want to be. Breathe life back into your ambitions, your desires, your goals, your relationships.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “I am not a victim. No matter what I have been through, I'm still here. I have a history of victory.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “The more you believed in yourself, the more you could trust yourself. The more you trust yourself, the less you compare yourself to others.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “Just for the record: happiness is not bullshit.”
quotes.author: Andrew Sean Greer

quotes.quote: “If a man has his eyes bound, you can encourage him as much as you like to stare through the bandage, but he'll never see anything.”
quotes.author: Franz Kafka

quotes.quote: “Everything is within your power,
quotes.author: Janice Trachtman

quotes.quote: “Sometimes, when people have a low opinion of their own worth—or, perhaps, when they refuse responsibility for their lives—they choose a new acquaintance, of precisely the type who proved troublesome in the past. Such people don’t believe that they deserve any better—so they don’t go looking for it. Or, perhaps, they don’t want the trouble of better. Freud called this a “repetition compulsion.” He thought of it as an unconscious drive to repeat the horrors of the past—sometimes, perhaps, to formulate those horrors more precisely, sometimes to attempt more active mastery and sometimes, perhaps, because no alternatives beckon. People create their worlds with the tools they have directly at hand. Faulty tools produce faulty results. Repeated use of the same faulty tools produces the same faulty results. It is in this manner that those who fail to learn from the past doom themselves to repeat it. It’s partly fate. It’s partly inability. It’s partly … unwillingness to learn? Refusal to learn? Motivated refusal to learn?”
quotes.author: Jordan B. Peterson

quotes.quote: “Holding a grudge & harboring anger/resentment is poison to the soul. Get even with people...but not those who have hurt us, forget them, instead get even with those who have helped us.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “Most people fail in life not because they aim too high and miss, but because they aim too low and hit.”
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.quote: “Never underestimate the power you have to take your life in a new direction.”
quotes.author: Germany Kent

quotes.quote: “If you take responsibility for yourself you will develop a hunger to accomplish your dreams.”
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.quote: “Don't be distracted by criticism. Remember ~ the only taste of success some people have is when they take a bite out of you.”
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: “If you can’t believe in miracles, then believe in yourself. When you want something bad enough, let that drive push you to make it happen. Sometimes you’ll run into brick walls that are put there to test you. Find a way around them and stay focused on your dream. Where there’s a will, there’s a way.”
quotes.author: Isabel Lopez

quotes.quote: “What is the point of being on this Earth if you are going to be like everyone else?”
quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quotes.quote: “The more you talk about them, the more important they will feel. The more you listen to them, the more important you will make them feel.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “Real change is difficult at the beginning, but gorgeous at the end. Change begins the moment you get the courage and step outside your comfort zone; change begins at the end of your comfort zone.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “Keep your head in the clouds and your hands on the keyboard.”
quotes.author: Marissa Meyer

quotes.quote: “How would your life be different if...You were conscious about the food you ate, the people you surround yourself with, and the media you watch, listen to, or read? Let today be the day...You pay attention to what you feed your mind, your body, and your life. Create a nourishing environment conducive to your growth and well-being today.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “In traveling, a companion, in life, compassion,'" she repeats, making sure of it. If she had paper and pencil, it wouldn't surprise me if she wrote it down. "So what does that really mean? In simple terms."
quotes.author: Haruki Murakami

quotes.quote: “Until you change how you get things done, you'll never know what works best.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “Your beliefs affect your choices. Your choices shape your actions. Your actions determine your results. The future you create depends upon the choices you make and the actions you take today.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “The spirit of the individual is determined by his dominating thought habits.”
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.quote: “Don't give up! It's not over. The universe is balanced. Every set-back bears with it the seeds of a come-back.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “Dedicate yourself to what gives your life true meaning and purpose; make a positive difference in someone's life.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “Finding the lesson behind every adversity will be the one important thing that helps get you through it.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “How would your life be different if…You didn’t allow yourself to be defined by your past? Let today be the day…You stop letting your history interfere with your destiny and awaken to the opportunity to release your greatest self.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “Remember that things are not always as they appear to be… Curiosity creates possibilities and opportunities.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “Stop blaming outside circumstances for your inside chaos.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “When we mentally give a person, place, or point in time more credit than ourselves, we create a fictitious ceiling. A restriction over the expectations that we have over our own performance in that moment. We get tense. We focus on the outcome instead of the activity and we miss the doing of the deed. We either think the world depends on the result or it's too good to be true. But it doesn't and it isn't. And it's not our right to believe it does or is.
quotes.author: Matthew McConaughey

quotes.quote: “Being defeated is often a temporary condition. Giving up is what makes it permanent.”
quotes.author: Marilyn vos Savant

quotes.quote: “You make mistakes, mistakes don't make you”
quotes.author: Maxwell Maltz

quotes.quote: “When was the last time you woke up and realized that today could be the best day of your life?”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “You have to lift a person up before you can really put them in their place.”
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: “The greatest revenge is massive success.”
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.quote: “Sometimes we forget about our own advantages because we focus on what we don't have. Just because you have to work a little harder at something that seems easier to others doesn't mean you're without your own talents.”
quotes.author: Chris Colfer

quotes.quote: “Make your lives a masterpiece, you only get one canvas.”
quotes.author: E.A. Bucchianeri

quotes.quote: “Live out of your imagination instead of out of your memory.”
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.quote: “Never say anything about yourself you don't want to come true”
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: “الأحلام التي لا تدفعك للتحدث عنها بشغف هي أحلام ناقصة”
quotes.author: ياسر حارب

quotes.quote: “What others think about you is none of your business.”
quotes.author: Jack Canfield

quotes.quote: “Align yourself with people that you can learn from, people who want more out of life, people who are stretching and searching and seeking some higher ground in life.”
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.quote: “Shoot for the moon, because even if you miss you miss, you'll land in the stars.”
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.quote: “The most powerful magic of all is choice.”
quotes.author: Sara Raasch

quotes.quote: “Sex is a powerful intent to create: the creation of pleasure, creation of love, and ultimately the creation of life. It connects and syncs two beings emotionally, physically, and mentally and is one of the strongest expressions of love that exists in this World.”
quotes.author: Forrest Curran

quotes.quote: “Your life begins to change the day you take responsibility for it.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “It is difficult to make the right choice if you fear choosing wrongly.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “We are exactly what our history made us to be.”
quotes.author: Stephen Richards

quotes.quote: “Your own setbacks aren’t what they first appear to be; rather than viewing them as failures, view them as learning opportunities that are the building blocks for future preparation.”
quotes.author: Steve Pemberton

quotes.quote: “الأمنيات التي لا تتحقق بسرعة تمنحنا وقتا للدعاء والتأمل”
quotes.author: ياسر حارب

quotes.quote: “Never let fear hold you captive.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “Accept yourself, your strengths, your weaknesses, your truths, and know what tools you have to fulfill your purpose.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “Goals are the road maps that guide you to your destination.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “. I am not speaking, of course, of the beauty which strikes the senses, of the beauty of qualities and appearances. I am far from despising this, but it has nothing to do with science. What I mean is that more intimate beauty which comes from the harmonious order of its parts, and which a pure intelligence can grasp.”
quotes.author: Henri Poincaré

quotes.quote: “Seize the wind," I whispered. "Don't become the kite that never flies.”
quotes.author: Elizabeth Lim

quotes.quote: “It’s a lack of clarity that creates chaos and frustration. Those emotions are poison to any living goal.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “Stop comparing yourself to others. Always strive to improve yourself to become better today than you were yesterday to serve those around you and the world.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “Focus on making choices to lead your life that aligns with your core values in the most purposeful way possible.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “Don't let the tall weeds cast a shadow on the beautiful flowers in your garden.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “For your past, for your flaws, and ultimately for your stress; I judge no one whom I’ve met along the way because in a sense we were all wounded in our own ways.”
quotes.author: Forrest Curran

quotes.quote: “Simplify your life. You don't grow spiritual, you shrink spiritual.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “‎Someone's opinion of you does not have to become your reality.”
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.quote: “A great tree develops over time and can tell stories not only those of happiness, but also those that contain pain from what it has seen over the years, and as a result is the wise ancient tree that it is today. As the seasons change, the tree naturally goes through changes as well: where the leaves turn yellow and orange in the fall, falling by the Winter, returning in the Spring, and with full set of new leafs by the Summer. Love is no different in that there will be times when we are fully naked in the Winter, and left to wonder about Spring when it seemed so easy to love, yet the wise tree knows that no winter will last forever no matter how cold it may be.”
quotes.author: Forrest Curran

quotes.quote: “We become so absorbed in our flaws and faults that we forget that it is better to be a diamond with a flaw than a pebble without. To have flaws is beauty in itself, a fact so frightening that we hurry to hide them from sight and tarnish the whole in the process of comparing ourselves to others.”
quotes.author: Forrest Curran

quotes.quote: “As I naturally go through a full range of emotions in my life, I mustn’t feel ashamed for feeling lost, for it is honest and human to feel such.”
quotes.author: Forrest Curran

quotes.quote: “Make the choice to embrace this day. Do not let your TODAY be stolen by the ghost of yesterday or the "To-Do" list of tomorrow! It’s inspiring to see all the wonderfully amazing things that can happen in a day in which you participate.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “People in general would rather die than forgive. It'shard. If God said in plain language. "I'm giving you a choice, forgive or die," a lot of people would go ahead and order their coffin.”
quotes.author: Sue Monk Kidd

quotes.quote: “Just because Fate doesn't deal you the right cards, it doesn't mean you should give up. It just means you have to play the cards you get to their maximum potential.”
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.quote: “Firm was my resolve
quotes.author: Alok Mishra

quotes.quote: “One day in my shoes and a day for me in your shoes, the beauty of travel lies in the ease and willingness to be more open.”
quotes.author: Forrest Curran

quotes.quote: “Perfection does not exist -- you can always do better and you can always grow.”
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.quote: “You don't have to get it perfect, you just have to get it going. Babies don't walk the first time they try, but eventually they get it right”
quotes.author: Jack Canfield

quotes.quote: “Some we proudly display on our arms, while others we shyly conceal. Tattoo the moments of sorrow as well as the moments of splendor and beauty. Tattoo in an acknowledgment and tribute to home, and tattooing your beliefs that define who you are. Whether we intended to or not, every moment of our lives are tattooed to our heart.”
quotes.author: Forrest Curran

quotes.quote: “Whether you know or not, you are the infinite potential of love, peace and joy”
quotes.author: Amit Ray

quotes.quote: “You need mountains, long staircases don't make good hikers.”
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: “You can lose your MONEY. You can lose your FRIENDS. You can lose your JOB and you can lose your MARRIAGE...and still recover...as long as there is HOPE. Never lose HOPE.”
quotes.author: John Paul Warren

quotes.quote: “Orang yang tidak pernah dibakar panas mentari, mustahil menghargai rimbun berteduh - peribahasa Turki.”
quotes.author: Hasrizal Abdul Jamil

quotes.quote: “You cannot continue on the same path and arrive at a different destination. Make the choice to have your actions reflect your goals.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “When you are lonely for a while don't get restless, if you had born alone, you are going to die alone then for sometime you can certainly live alone.”
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: “لا يمكنك أن تُنجز شيئا إذا أعطيته نصف وقتك ولا يمكنك أن تحب شخصا إذا أعطيته نصف قلبك”
quotes.author: ياسر حارب

quotes.quote: “Fear can only grow in darkness. Once you face fear with light, you win.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “We can't undo a single thing we have ever done, but we can make decisions today that propel us to the life we want and towards the healing we need.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “You can't just wish change; you have to live the change in order for it to become a reality.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “Reading the Bible will help you get to know the word, but it’s when you put it down and live your life that you get to know the author.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “Be wise today so you don't cry tomorrow.”
quotes.author: E.A. Bucchianeri

quotes.quote: “A very small percentage of the people in this world will actually experience and live today. So many people will be stuck on another day, another time that traumatized them and caused them to spiritually stutter so they miss out on this day.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “I hope you find true meaning, contentment, and passion in your life. I hope you navigate the difficult times and come out with greater strength and resolve. I hope you find whatever balance you seek with your eyes wide open. And I hope that you - yes, you - have the ambition to lean in to your career and run the world. Because the world needs you to change it.”
quotes.author: Sheryl Sandberg

quotes.quote: “You are what you believe in. You become that which you believe you can become”
quotes.author: Bhagavad Gita

quotes.quote: “To assess the quality of thoughts of people, don't listen to their words, but watch their actions.”
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: “If you want to find happiness, find gratitude.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “Do it first and feel about it afterwards.' - Dagny Taggart”
quotes.author: Ayn Rand

quotes.quote: “Everyone's time is limited. What matters most is to focus on what matters most.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “Never allow your mind to wander untamed like a wild animal that exists on the basis of survival of the fittest. Tame your mind with consistent focus on your goals and desires.”
quotes.author: Stephen Richards

quotes.quote: “Grateful souls focus on the happiness and abundance present in their lives and this in turn attracts more abundance and joy towards them.”
quotes.author: Stephen Richards

quotes.quote: “It is not as much about who you used to be, as it is about who you choose to be.”
quotes.author: Sanhita Baruah

quotes.quote: “Intelligence is more important than strength, that is why earth is ruled by men and not by animals.”
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: “Life is a balanced system of learning and evolution. Whether pleasure or pain; every situation in your life serves a purpose. It is up to us to recognize what that purpose could be.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “Manifesting is a lot like making a cake. The things needed are supplied by you, the mixing is done by your mind and the baking is done in the oven of the universe.”
quotes.author: Stephen Richards

quotes.quote: “[Greens] don't come through the back door the same as other groceries. They don't cower at the bottom of paper bags marked 'Liberty.' They wave over the top. They don't stop to be checked off the receipt. They spill out onto the counter. No going onto shelves with cans in orderly lines like school children waiting for recess. No waiting, sometimes for years beyond the blue sell by date, to be picked up and taken from the shelf. Greens don't stack or stand at attention. They aren't peas to be pushed around. Cans can't contain them. Boxed in they would burst free. Greens are wild. Plunging them into a pot took some doing. Only lobsters fight more. Either way, you have to use your hands. Then, retrieving them requires the longest of my mother's wooden spoons, the one with the burnt end. Swept onto a plate like the seaweed after a storm, greens sit tall, dark, and proud.”
quotes.author: Georgia Scott

quotes.quote: “A smile is the best way to get oneself out of a tight spot, even if it is a fake one. Surprisingly enough, everyone takes it at face value. I read that in a book."
quotes.author: Naruto Shippuden

quotes.quote: “I’ll detach myself from the crowd if it hinders my growth,
quotes.author: Hareem Ch

quotes.quote: “Before this generation lose the wisdom, one advice - read books.”
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: “When admiring other people's gardens, don't forget to tend to your own flowers.”
quotes.author: Sanober Khan

quotes.quote: “No one rises to low expectations”
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.quote: “Do you love yourself enough to BE what you love yourself enough to WANT?”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “One of the most healing things you can do is recognize where in your life you are your own poison.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “‎By reacting from fear instead of responding from love, you inject poison directly into the veins of your relationship.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “You are the perfect creation of God. Don't allow you to be down. God is experiencing through you.”
quotes.author: Amit Ray

quotes.quote: “It is better to aim high and miss than to aim low and hit.”
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.quote: “Let today be the day that you become committed in being, in doing, in getting, achieving, in experiencing. Let today be the day that you are committed to being the change you wish to see and living the life you wish to live.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “Be happy with who you are and what you do, and you can do anything you want.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “It's up to you today to start making healthy choices. Not choices that are just healthy for your body, but healthy for your mind.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “Do not let another day go by where your dedication to other people's opinions is greater than your dedication to your own emotions!”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “Although time seems to fly, it never travels faster than one day at a time. Each day is a new opportunity to live your life to the fullest. In each waking day, you will find scores of blessings and opportunities for positive change. Do not let your TODAY be stolen by the unchangeable past or the indefinite future! Today is a new day!”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “Confidence is like a dragon where, for every head cut off, two more heads grow back.”
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: “People are successful because they think and act like successful people.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “Always Remember to take your Vitamins: Take your Vitamin A for ACTION, Vitamin B for Belief, Vitamin C for Confidence ,Vitamin D for Discipline, Vitamin E for Enthusiasm!!”
quotes.author: Pablo

quotes.quote: “Not all dreamers are winners, but all winners are dreamers. Your dream is the key to your future. The Bible says that, "without a vision (dream), a people perish." You need a dream, if you're going to succeed in anything you do.”
quotes.author: Mark Gorman

quotes.quote: “The size of your dreams must always exceed your current capacity to achieve them. If your dreams do not scare you, they are not big enough.”
quotes.author: Ellen Johnson Sirleaf

quotes.quote: “A birth-date is a reminder to celebrate the life as well as to update the life.”
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: “Despite everything, it's still you.”
quotes.author: Toby Fox

quotes.quote: “Do more listening than talking; talk more about them than about you.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “At school, new ideas are thrust at you every day. Out in the world, you'll have to find your inner motivation to seek for new ideas on your own.”
quotes.author: Bill Watterson

quotes.quote: “You can't hang around waiting for somebody else to pull your strings. Destiny's what you make of it. You have to face whatever life throws at you. And if it throws more than you'd like, more than you think you can handle? Well then you just have to find the heroism within yourself and play out the hand you've been dealt. The universe never sets a challenge that can't be met. You just need to believe in yourself in order to find the strength to face it.”
quotes.author: Darren Shan

quotes.quote: “When you start giving, instead of getting, you make a difference. You can always give a warm smile, a sincere hello, a positive vibe… your attention, your time, your love, and kindness to those around you.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “One word of encouragement can be enough to spark someone’s motivation to continue with a difficult challenge.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “I conclude therefore that, fortune being changeful and mankind steadfast in their ways, so long as the two are in agreement men are successful, but unsuccessful when they fall out. For my part I consider that it is better to be adventurous than cautious, because fortune is a woman, and if you wish to keep her under it is necessary to beat and ill-use her; and it is seen that she allows herself to be mastered by the adventurous rather than by those who go to work more coldly. She is, therefore, always, woman-like, a lover of young men, because they are less cautious, more violent, and with more audacity command her.”
quotes.author: Niccolò Machiavelli

quotes.quote: “With a hint of good judgment, to fear nothing, not failure or suffering or even death, indicates that you value life the most. You live to the extreme; you push limits; you spend your time building legacies. Those do not die.”
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: “Forgive yourself for your faults and your mistakes and move on.”
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.quote: “The difference between greed and ambition is a greedy person desires things he isn't prepared to work for.”
quotes.author: Habeeb Akande

quotes.quote: “The power to change your life lies in the simplest of steps.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “Today, many will choose to live free of conditions and rules governing their own happiness. Why not you? Do not let another day go by where your dedication to other people's opinions is greater than your dedication to your own emotions! Today's a new day!”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “Success is a poor teacher”
quotes.author: Robert Kiyosaki

quotes.quote: “We can’t help the way we’re born. We can’t help what we are, only what life we choose to make for ourselves.”
quotes.author: Leigh Bardugo

quotes.quote: “What we perceive about ourselves is greatly a reflection of how we will end up living our lives.”
quotes.author: Stephen Richards

quotes.quote: “Soar with wit. Conquer with dignity. Handle with care.”
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: “The lust for comfort kills the passions of the soul.”
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.quote: “Yawns are not the only infectious things out there besides germs.
quotes.author: Vera Nazarian

quotes.quote: “I will heighten my life by helping others heighten theirs”
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.quote: “Do the things you used to talk about doing but never did. Know when to let go and when to hold on tight. Stop rushing. Don't be intimidated to say it like it is. Stop apologizing all the time. Learn to say no, so your yes has some oomph. Spend time with the friends who lift you up, and cut loose the ones who bring you down. Stop giving your power away. Be more concerned with being interested than being interesting. Be old enough to appreciate your freedom, and young enough to enjoy it. Finally know who you are.”
quotes.author: Kristin Armstrong

quotes.quote: “It’s time to care; it’s time to take responsibility; it’s time to lead; it’s time for a change; it’s time to be true to our greatest self; it’s time to stop blaming others.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “When I face the desolate impossibility of writing five hundred pages, a sick sense of failure falls on me, and I know I can never do it. Then gradually, I write one page and then another. One day's work is all I can permit myself to contemplate.”
quotes.author: John Steinbeck

quotes.quote: “Are you going to allow the world around you to change while you remain stagnant? Make this the time you throw away old habits that have hindered your happiness and success and finally allow your greatest self to flourish.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “How would your life be different if…You pretended those around you were deaf to your words? Let today be the day…You let your actions speak and communicate your feelings and intentions.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “Life itself is simple...it's just not easy.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “You've been given the innate power to shape your life...but you cannot just speak change, you have to LIVE change. Intent paired with action builds the bridge to success. You can't just want it; you have to do it, live it...BE it! Success isn't something you have, it's something you DO!”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “You are where you are right now because of the actions you've taken, or maybe, the inaction you've taken.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “Think of the patience God has had for you and let it resonate to others. If you want a more patient world, let patience be your motto”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “It is better to find your courage to make changes when you can choose to rather than being forced to. If you do not make change, change will make you.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “Therefore it is unnecessary for a prince to have all the good qualities I have enumerated, but it is very necessary to appear to have them. And I shall dare to say this also, that to have them and always to observe them is injurious, and that to appear to have them is useful; to appear merciful, faithful, humane, religious, upright, and to be so, but with a mind so framed that should you require not to be so, you may be able and know how to change to the opposite.”
quotes.author: Niccolò Machiavelli

quotes.quote: “The whole value of solitude depends upon oneself; it may be a sanctuary or a prison, a haven of repose or a place of punishment, a heaven or a hell, as we ourselves make it.”
quotes.author: John Lubbock

quotes.quote: “Shoot for the moon. Even if you miss, you'll land among the stars.”
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.quote: “Politeness is the first thing people lose once they get the power.”
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: “The value of surrounding yourself with positive people is not what you get from them, but how good a person you have become because of them.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “How would your life be different if…You stopped focusing on what you didn’t want and started focusing on what you do want? Let today be the day…You establish a clear intent, make a plan, and take actions towards your intent.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “Scholars, theologians, and even poets have yet to be able to truly describe and touch upon the beauty, romance, and magic of a relationship built on 100% authenticity”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “If you don’t know exactly where you’re going, how will you know when you get there?”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “The here and now is all we have, and if we play it right it's all we'll need.”
quotes.author: Ann Richards

quotes.quote: “Kindness is universal. Sometimes being kind allows others to see the goodness in humanity through you. Always be kinder than necessary.”
quotes.author: Germany Kent

quotes.quote: “Resources are hired to give results, not reasons.”
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: “What would have become of Hercules do you think if there had been no lion, hydra, stag or boar - and no savage criminals to rid the world of? What would he have done in the absence of such challenges?
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.quote: “When you are angry try your best to go to sleep, it keeps you away from speaking, writing and thinking while you are angry.”
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: “All worries are less with wine.”
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: “A friend who is far away is sometimes much nearer than one who is at hand.”
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.quote: “You don't have to be great to get started but you have to get started to be great.”
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.quote: “Until one is committed there is hesitancy, the chance to draw back, always ineffectiveness. Concerning all acts of initative or creation, there is one elementary truth...that the moment one definitely commits oneself, then Providence moves. too. All sorts of things occur to help one that would otherwise never have occurred. A whole stream of events issues from the decision, raising in ones's favor all manner of incidents and meetings and material assistance which no man would have believed would have come his way.
quotes.author: W.H. Murray The Scottish Himalayan Expedition

quotes.quote: “Your feelings wouldn't get hurt if you were honest with yourself”
quotes.author: Tye Lewis

quotes.quote: “The way you live your day is a sentence in the story of your life. Each day you make the choice whether the sentence ends with a period, question mark, or exclamation point.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “At any given point you can release your greatest self. Don’t let anyone hold you back. Don’t let anyone dilute you. Don’t be peer pressured into being less than you are. People willing to dilute themselves for the sake of others is one of the great tragedies of our time. Stop letting others define and set the pace for your life. Get out there and be your best. Do your best. Live your best. Make every day count and you’ll see how exponentially more exciting, thrilling, successful, happy and full your life will be.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “Most people think the biggest sacrifice, the greates act of love you can give is to die for someone. And probably it is. But Sometimes it is the opposite. The biggest thing you can do for someone is to live.”
quotes.author: Sarah Wylie

quotes.quote: “Once you start recognizing the truth of your story, finish the story. It happened but you're still here, you're still capable, powerful, you're not your circumstance. It happened and you made it through. You're still fully equipped with every single tool you need to fulfill your purpose.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “When you find yourself in need of spiritual nourishment, it is in the opportunities to serve others that you will find the abundance you seek.”

Not because we’re inadequate or fundamentally inept, but because we’re imperfect and fundamentally human. Expecting anything different is setting yourself up for failure.”

quotes.quote: “You must take responsibility for removing I can't from your vocabulary.”

You no longer dwell on what went wrong or focus on whom you are going to blame. You don't waste time building roadblocks to your success. Instead, you are set free and can now focus on succeeding.”

The greater the suffering, the greater the joy in overcoming it.”

Why do we REALLY quit? Because it's hopeless? Or because it's possible...”

quotes.quote: “The more clouds you have in your sky, the more colorful sunset it will be.”

quotes.quote: “One often has to do what they have to do in order to do what they want to do; however if you only do what you want to do then you will never do what you have to do!”

Let today be the day...You embrace the truth that you DO have such control to label every event in your life, and create an agreement with reality that empowers you and propels you to greatness.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “hold company with yourself so sacred
