quotes.quote: “Like love, like talent, like any other virtue, like anything else in this life, happiness needs to be nurtured - this is the truth of the whole matter.”
quotes.author: Ogwo David Emenike

quotes.quote: “The greatest love stories are not those in which love is only spoken, but those in which it is acted upon.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “Do not dilute the truth of your potential. We often convince ourselves that we cannot change, that we cannot overcome the circumstances of our lives. That is simply not true. You have been blessed with immeasurable power to make positive changes in your life. But you can't just wish it, you can't just hope it, you can't just want it... you have to LIVE it, BE it, DO it.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “Without desires and dreams, your thoughts do not matter and you can think whatever you want to.”
quotes.author: Stephen Richards

quotes.quote: “Too often we underestimate the power of a touch, a smile, a kind word, a listening ear, an honest accomplishment, or the smallest act of caring, all of which have the potential to turn a life around.”
quotes.author: Leo Buscaglia

quotes.quote: “It is a profound and necessary truth that the deep things in science are not found because they are useful; they are found because it was possible to find them.”
quotes.author: J. Robert Oppenheimer

quotes.quote: “Write this down: My life is full of unlimited possibilities.”
quotes.author: Pablo

quotes.quote: “Stop waiting for the right person to come into your life. Be the right person to come to someone’s life”
quotes.author: Leo Babauta

quotes.quote: “If everyone is moving forward together, then success takes care of itself.”
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: “The problem isn’t that I think so highly of myself. It is just that you think so little of yourself. Live life BIG, BOLD and OUT LOUD!”
quotes.author: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.quote: “You don't have to be a hero to accomplish great things---to compete. You can just be an ordinary chap, sufficiently motivated to reach challenging goals.”
quotes.author: Edmund Hillary

quotes.quote: “Have you had a failure or rejection? You could get bitter. That's one way to deal with it. Or...you could just get BETTER. What do you think?”
quotes.author: Destiny Booze

quotes.quote: “Great losses are great lessons.”
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: “The people we consider successful in our society are all people that seize every moment and make the best of each situation.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “A good self-esteem level is mostly dependant on how we value ourselves without any bias.”
quotes.author: Stephen Richards

quotes.quote: “You are where you are and what you are because of yourself, nothing else. Nature is neutral. Nature doesn't care. If you do what other successful people do, you will enjoy the same results and rewards that they do. And if you don't, you won't.”
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: “Your limits are somewhere up there, waiting for you to reach beyond infinity.”
quotes.author: Arnold Henry

quotes.quote: “Be a worthy worker and work will come.”
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: “People have boldness to criticize but not to sensitize.”
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: “Once we open our eyes to the infinite magic that the universe has in abundance, we are sure to be enthralled by what we see and this miraculous creation gets us closer to our dreams and to the world as a whole.”
quotes.author: Stephen Richards

quotes.quote: “Success is not only dependent on understanding your own skill-set. It’s also important to recognize the talents of others and know how to profit from them.”
quotes.author: Raoul Davis Jr.

quotes.quote: “We have come here together so that you might know, through virtue of your own pain, your own hopelessness, your own fear, your own darkness and the lie of powerlessness, the very actual power of your own will, of the will of your soul.”
quotes.author: Jennifer DeLucy

quotes.quote: “Prepare yourself for success. You have to see it coming to get there.”
quotes.author: Destiny Booze

quotes.quote: “Decide to be fine until the end of the week. Make yourself smile, because you're alive and that's your job. Then do it again the next week. I call it being professional. Do it right, with a smile, or don't do it.”
quotes.author: Frank Devereaux

quotes.quote: “It will be better to spent our energy on reality; the tangible facts, not thoughts of the past.”
quotes.author: Durgesh Satpathy

quotes.quote: “If you can't be brave, be determined. And you'll end up in the same place.”
quotes.author: Lisa Scottoline

quotes.quote: “Common man's patience will bring him more happiness than common man's power.”
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: “Things do not happen TO you. They happen THROUGH you.
quotes.author: Gordana Biernat

quotes.quote: “While spirituality provides an efficient and endless fuel for your mind and body, you must burn that fuel with human action towards your goals, dreams, and desires.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “The victory over our inner self is a daily struggle. Be strong and do not give up.”
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: “Success necessitates sacrifice.”
quotes.author: Habeeb Akande

quotes.quote: “You don't have to be good at something to be liked.”
quotes.author: Stephen Richards

quotes.quote: “The more you can have control over your ego rather than let it run amuck, the more successful you’ll be in all areas of life.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “Life’s a marathon, not a sprint.”
quotes.author: Phillip C. McGraw

quotes.quote: “How would your life be different if...you began each day by thanking someone who has helped you? Let today be the day...You make it a point to show your gratitude to others. Send a letter or card, make a call, send a text or email, tell them in person...do whatever you have to do to let them know you appreciate them.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “The most dangerous irony is, people are angry with others because of their own incompetence.”
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: “What good has impatience ever brought? It has only served as the mother of mistakes and the father of irritation.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “Every challenge you encounter in life is a fork in the road. You have the choice to choose which way to go - backward, forward, breakdown or breakthrough.”
quotes.author: Ifeanyi Enoch Onuoha

quotes.quote: “There has never been a meaningful life built on easy street.”
quotes.author: John Paul warren

quotes.quote: “If at first you don’t succeed, you’re doing it wrong. Learn from the experience. Try again, but with a different approach.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “When you are just EXISTING, life happens to you… and you manage; when you are truly LIVING, you happen to life… and you lead.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “The job of feets is walking, but their hobby is dancing.”
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: “If you always do what you've always done, you'll always get what you always got.”
quotes.author: James P. Lewis

quotes.quote: “Take care of your costume and your confidence will take care of itself.”
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: “This moment is yours and yours alone! Take charge, seize this moment and allow it to propel you to the high levels of an empowered life. Allow upon this fertile moment to be planted the seeds of your happiness and success.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “When the going gets tough, the tough get going”
quotes.author: Billy Joel

quotes.quote: “It is important that when we make a resolution, or establish a goal, that we take the ACTION necessary to accomplish that goal.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “I prefer to be on the side of losers, the misunderstood or lonely people rather than writing about the strong and powerful.”
quotes.author: Núria Añó

quotes.quote: “But if we are talking in terms of making progress in life, we must understand that "good enough" is very different from "best.”
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: “The purpose of empowerment is to urge you towards freedom, to help each of you to break free of all limitations. It is that freedom that will give you eternal happiness and finally connect you with the unconditional realization of TRUTH.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “الفاشلون يتحدثون عن آلامهم والناجحون يتحدثون عن آمالهم”
quotes.author: ياسر حارب

quotes.quote: “Something hit me very hard once, thinking about what one little man could do. Think of the Queen Mary — the whole ship goes by and then comes the rudder. And there's a tiny thing at the edge of the rudder called a trimtab.
quotes.author: R. Buckminster Fuller

quotes.quote: “The mind can't delete what the heart won't let go of.”
quotes.author: Peggy Toney Horton

quotes.quote: “You can only work on yourself. Start there.”
quotes.author: Alice O. Howell

quotes.quote: “Whatever your calling, it's already rooted within you, and those roots can be trampled or tugged at but never removed. They grow stronger only when tended, nurtured, and most important, shared with others.”
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: “Networking isn't how many people you know, it's how many people know you.”
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: “I can’t help you, I can only guide you, and you are the one who can help yourself.”
quotes.author: Durgesh Satpathy

quotes.quote: “You can't keep dancing with the devil and ask why you're still in hell.”
quotes.author: Kynna Claire

quotes.quote: “Health is hearty, health is harmony, health is happiness.”
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: “The people who really make you angry, control you!”
quotes.author: Steven Aitchison

quotes.quote: “You are a beautiful soul wrapped up in a human body. It’s your job to unwrap, and find your soul again.”
quotes.author: Steven Aitchison

quotes.quote: “Every sunrise is priceless and you can experience the richness that life holds only when you live life to the full instead of just being an onlooker.”
quotes.author: Stephen Richards

quotes.quote: “The realisation that limitations are imaginary will make you strong and overpowering.”
quotes.author: Stephen Richards

quotes.quote: “How would your life be different if...You decided to give freely, love fully, and play feverously? Let today be the day...You free yourself from the conditioned rules that limit your happiness and dilute the beautiful life experience. Have fun. Give - Love - Play!”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “Self-confidence is contagious.”
quotes.author: Stephen Richards

quotes.quote: “I have realized that whatever good comes to me, comes from God, whatever bad comes to me, God has allowed it, and I choose to be thankful for both.”
quotes.author: Jeff Goins

quotes.quote: “Prepared for the worst,but still praying for the best”
quotes.author: Lil Wayne

quotes.quote: “Luck is a word the bitter teach to the ignorant.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “لن يفشل أبدا كل انسان يحاول”
quotes.author: أنيس منصور

quotes.quote: “لا تَقُل لي ما اسْمُك وقُل لي ما إنجازك فالإنجازات تصنع الأسماء”
quotes.author: ياسر حارب

quotes.quote: “Don't use yesterday's state of mind, to make today's decision.”
quotes.author: C. Nzingha Smith

quotes.quote: “Notice the difference between being in control and needing control.”
quotes.author: Marilyn Suttle

quotes.quote: “Courage is not only about finding bravery for ourselves. It is also about helping others find theirs.”
quotes.author: Steve Pemberton

quotes.quote: “Pivoting does not mean changing your goal but rather changing your strategy to realize that goal.”
quotes.author: Steve Pemberton

quotes.quote: “Everything is easier said than done. Wanting something is easy. Saying something is easy. The challenge and the reward are in the doing.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “Whenever we take a stand, we invite others who are siting on the sidelines to join us.”
quotes.author: Steve Pemberton

quotes.quote: “The future is greatly different than your life now, the actions that you take must also be greatly different. You cannot do the same thing and get something different.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “Each day gives the opportunity for you to be treated right, to feel worthy, and to be successful. It’s a choice you have to make, a faith you have to embrace, and a standard you have to set.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “Once you feel nice about yourself, you have planted the first seed to develop self-confidence.”
quotes.author: Stephen Richards

quotes.quote: “The face is the mirror of the mind, and eyes without speaking confess the secrets of the heart.”
quotes.author: Saint Jerome

quotes.quote: “Time waits for no one.”
quotes.author: The Girl Who Leapt Through Time

quotes.quote: “You are the point of origin for everything in your world: you set the standard for yourself.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “When someone who is suffering looks to you for compassion, it's indeed a blessing; you are chosen to be their Light in a moment of sorrow.”
quotes.author: Michelle D. Rosado

quotes.quote: “I would rather live short and right then long and wrong.”
quotes.author: John Paul Warren

quotes.quote: “We need more than just the Law of Attraction. We need to connect with its more successful twin, the Law of Generosity. And further entwine ourselves with their parent; the Law of Love.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “Fear has the role we give it. We are able to empower or poison ourselves to whatever degree we want. This is the beauty of our design.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “You‘ve been given the innate power to shape your life.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “You would not be here TODAY if YESTERDAY was your defining moment. LIVE THIS DAY and move towards your dreams.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “There are two things essential if you want to enhance your Jedi self-confidence:
quotes.author: Stephen Richards

quotes.quote: “Every great leader can take you back to a defining moment when they decided to lead”
quotes.author: John Paul Warren

quotes.quote: “Never engage in gossip, it kills your soul, and wounds another’s heart”
quotes.author: Steven Aitchison

quotes.quote: “Yet how hard most people work for mere dust and ashes and care, taking no thought of growing in knowledge and grace, never having time to get in sight of their own ignorance.”
quotes.author: John Muir

quotes.quote: “Sometimes we have to soak ourselves in the tears and fears of the past to water our future gardens.”
quotes.author: Suzy Kassem

quotes.quote: “You be as angry as you need to be," she said. "Don't let anyone tell you otherwise. Not your grandma, not your dad, no one. And if you need to break things, then by God, you break them good and hard."
quotes.author: Patrick Ness

quotes.quote: “A real decision is measured by the fact that you've taken a new action. If there's no action, you haven't truly decided.”
quotes.author: Anthony Robbins

quotes.quote: “The difference between being mediocre and achieving excellence is you.”
quotes.author: Stephen Richards

quotes.quote: “A failure is always in the passenger seat in his or her life.”
quotes.author: Stephen Richards

quotes.quote: “Pursue your goal. Opinions be damned.”
quotes.author: Stacy Verdick Case

quotes.quote: “I must admit, that I have learned more from my negative experiences than I have ever learned from my positive one.”
quotes.author: John Paul Warren

quotes.quote: “Your circumstances do NOT define you. Expect a GRAND finale.”
quotes.author: John Paul Warren

quotes.quote: “Remember diamonds are created under pressure so hold on, it will be your time to shine soon.”

quotes.quote: “Faith UP! Your purpose is GREATER than all your PROBLEMS.”
quotes.author: John Paul Warren

quotes.quote: “If you have to ask if you’ve done enough, you haven’t. Each day brings with it the opportunity to do more than you did yesterday.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “With one kind gesture you can change a life. One person at a time you can change the world. One day at a time we can change everything.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “A Master Jedi feels emotions, but they do not allow them to influence their reasoning. Yoda told Luke that he would know the good from the bad when he was 'calm, at peace.”
quotes.author: Stephen Richards

quotes.quote: “Intent without dedicated action is simply not enough. Action without a clear intent is a waste. It is when these two powerful forces are aligned that the energy of the universe conspires in your favor.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “You will never get everything in life but you will get enough.”
quotes.author: Sanhita Baruah

quotes.quote: “Certain situations need a Jedi-like approach. One of these is when you are in a strange environment, usually where you feel unsure of yourself. You would be surprised how, if you walk with confidence and meaning, people will see this as a mark of confidence, yet you are perhaps shaking inside but outwardly you have the gait of a confident Jedi Knight.”
quotes.author: Stephen Richards

quotes.quote: “The time has come to harness the blessed power within us and to use it to transcend from our current existence into a more empowered reality.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “It's not always what we don't know that gets in our way; sometimes it's what we think we know that keeps us from learning.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “If the painter wishes to see beauties that charm him, it lies in his power to create them, and if he wishes to see monstrosities that are frightful, ridiculous, or truly pitiable, he is lord and God thereof.”
quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.quote: “Love is perhaps the only emotions that is boundless”
quotes.author: Santosh Avvannavar

quotes.quote: “ننامُ كثيرا أفلا نحلمُ قليلا”
quotes.author: ياسر حارب

quotes.quote: “To be happy, you have to risk being unhappy.”
quotes.author: Ogwo David Emenike

quotes.quote: “Never stop acquiring the commonsense, it is as good as the knowledge.”
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: “Uncertainty will always be part of the taking charge process.”
quotes.author: Harold Geneen

quotes.quote: “After a while, San Lang said softly, “Something like saving the world, it really doesn’t matter how you do it. But, although brave, it’s foolish.” “Yeah,” Xie Lian agreed. Hua Cheng continued, “Although foolish, it’s brave.”
quotes.author: Mò Xiāng Tóng Xiù

quotes.quote: “Feelings are real. They often become one’s reality. But they are not always based on truth.”
quotes.author: Jesikah Sundin

quotes.quote: “Whatever you do, do something positive.”
quotes.author: Dave Pelzer

quotes.quote: “A belief is simply a thought that seems true to YOU.”
quotes.author: Gordana Biernat

quotes.quote: “Jedi act with confidence, move with confidence, and breathe with confidence. Jedi possess a confident calmness in their looks, attitude and
quotes.author: Stephen Richards

quotes.quote: “Changes are inevitable and not always controllable. What can be controlled is how you manage, react to and work through the change process.”
quotes.author: Kelly A. Morgan

quotes.quote: “The world is my church. My actions are my prayer. My behavior is my creed.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “A true dreamer is one who knows how to navigate in the dark”.”
quotes.author: John Paul Warren

quotes.quote: “A barrier is a limitation only when you perceive it as one.”
quotes.author: Stephen Richards

quotes.quote: “When a human lighthouse sees you in the midst of your storm, it points you toward safety and protection. In doing so, it also sends you and uncompromising message of belief: Yes, the situation is difficult, but you are not alone. I’m standing right here with you, and I know the way home.”
quotes.author: Steve Pemberton

quotes.quote: “You have had a dream for so many years. Let today be the day you make a plan for it. Just think about how much more likely you are to hit your target when you finally aim at it.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “When someone we know is afraid of judgment, we can provide a safe haven for their hopes by telling them first and foremost that we are proud of their efforts.”
quotes.author: Steve Pemberton

quotes.quote: “Have faith in the universe and its capability to lead you to the path of abundance.”
quotes.author: Stephen Richards

quotes.quote: “The madder it makes you, the harder you need to laugh at it.”
quotes.author: Destiny Booze

quotes.quote: “Dear Fellow Human Being,
quotes.author: Jasz Gill

quotes.quote: “Recovery is full of ups and downs.
quotes.author: Brittany Burgunder

quotes.quote: “I want every girl in the world to pick up a guitar and start screaming.”
quotes.author: Courtney Love

quotes.quote: “For self-educated scientists and thinkers such as Charles Darwin, Srinivasa Ramanujan, Leonardo-da-Vinci, Michael Faraday, myself and many others, education is a relentless voyage of discovery. To us education is an everlasting quest for knowledge and wisdom.”
quotes.author: Abhijit Naskar

quotes.quote: “A story meant to motivate all and sundry irrespective of their circumstances”
quotes.author: Santosh Avvannavar

quotes.quote: “We can’t continuously be a society of well-wishers. We must take action to bring those wishes to fruition.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “Choice forms the divider which is responsible for the formation of all futures that can be possible.”
quotes.author: Stephen Richards

quotes.quote: “On the other hand, if the future is not the one you chose then you may have to use your willpower to obtain the future of your liking.”
quotes.author: Stephen Richards

quotes.quote: “Most people know the physical senses, but a lot of people don’t know the soul’s senses: empathy, trust, intuition, love and harmony”
quotes.author: Steven Aitchison

quotes.quote: “Forgive to forget, do not forget to forgive”
quotes.author: Santosh Avvannavar

quotes.quote: “It is in the balancing of your spirituality with your humanity that you will find immeasurable happiness, success, good health, and love.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “One thing I have learned from many years of watching my father is that some people, the best ones, are motivated more by the chance to prove themselves than by a command to serve. It is the work itself that calls them onward, especially if they believe they are the only ones who can do it.”
quotes.author: Rae Carson

quotes.quote: “Success is something you experience when you act accordingly. Success is not something you have, it’s something you do.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “When life's got you down, keep your head up... you can't see the ground anyway”
quotes.author: Nicole Rae

quotes.quote: “A cord that remains, always. in many ways...”
quotes.author: Santosh Avvannavar

quotes.quote: “It's better to do something with quality, no matter how long it takes you rather than do something mediocre, with constant quantity.”
quotes.author: Oscar Auliq-Ice

quotes.quote: “The smell of the sweat is not sweet, but the fruit of the sweat is very sweet.”
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: “You can take anything if you want it enough.”
quotes.author: Effy Stonem

quotes.quote: “Today is a special day that will go by very fast, so let’s take every second to make the most out of every moment.”
quotes.author: Oscar Auliq-Ice

quotes.quote: “If I quit now, I will soon be back to where I started. And when I started I was desperately wishing to be where I am now.”
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: “Food for thought: Every dead body on Mount Everest was once a highly motivated person. Stay lazy my friends. It may save your life one day.”
quotes.author: Oliver Markus Malloy

quotes.quote: “Strength wasn‘t about being able to do everything alone. Strength was knowing when to ask for help and not being too proud to do it.”
quotes.author: Karen Marie Moning

quotes.quote: “Stop comparing yourself with others. If they are good at something, you too are good at something else. Self-confidence is not measured by your own capabilities versus that of others, but by your own needs.”
quotes.author: Stephen Richards

quotes.quote: “What if I told you 10 years from now your life would be exactly the same?
quotes.author: Karen Salmansohn

quotes.quote: “Concentrate more on your achievements than your failures. Learn to take the failures as opportunities to rectify your errors.”
quotes.author: Stephen Richards

quotes.quote: “Each person has got a voice inside them. Communicate with it and take hold of it. Do not let it push and shove you around – you are its master!”
quotes.author: Stephen Richards

quotes.quote: “You’re only responsible for yourself, Jess. And that’s the only person you can control. Other people will either get it or they won’t but you can’t define yourself by their opinions.”
quotes.author: Susan Mallery

quotes.quote: “Always make your future bigger than your past.”
quotes.author: Dan Sullivan

quotes.quote: “How we relate with other people is dependent on how we rate ourselves and what we think about ourselves.”
quotes.author: Stephen Richards

quotes.quote: “Failures can be called ‘strengtheners’ as they make you determined to reach your goal with the lessons they teach.”
quotes.author: Stephen Richards

quotes.quote: “Taking the decision-making process away from people disempowers them. It also makes them much less likely to buy into the decision, however right it may be. One’s own conscience remains the ultimate arbiter.”
quotes.author: Lama Surya Das

quotes.quote: “Some of the most powerful speeches I have given have been delivered in the dedicated silence of my actions.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “But confining myself more to the particular, I say that a prince may be seen happy to-day and ruined to-morrow without having shown any change of disposition or character. This, I believe, arises firstly from causes that have already been discussed at length, namely, that the prince who relies entirely upon fortune is lost when it changes. I believe also that he will be successful who directs his actions according to the spirit of the times, and that he whose actions do not accord with the times will not be successful. Because men are seen, in affairs that lead to the end which every man has before him, namely, glory and riches, to get there by various methods; one with caution, another with haste; one by force, another by skill; one by patience, another by its opposite; and each one succeeds in reaching the goal by a different method. One can also see of two cautious men the one attain his end, the other fail; and similarly, two men by different observances are equally successful, the one being cautious, the other impetuous; all this arises from nothing else than whether or not they conform in their methods to the spirit of the times. This follows from what I have said, that two men working differently bring about the same effect, and of two working similarly, one attains his object and the other does not.”
quotes.author: Niccolò Machiavelli

quotes.quote: “Five years from today, you will be the same person that you are today, except for the books you read and the people you meet.”
quotes.author: Charlie "Tremendous" Jones

quotes.quote: “According to the Law of Attraction, the physical reality that you experience at present is drawn towards the future probability you desired when it attains more power.”
quotes.author: Stephen Richards

quotes.quote: “For that reason, let a prince have the credit of conquering and holding his state, the means will always be considered honest, and he will be praised by everybody because the vulgar are always taken by what a thing seems to be and by what comes of it; and in the world there are only the vulgar, for the few find a place there only when the many have no ground to rest on.”
quotes.author: Niccolò Machiavelli

quotes.quote: “The greatest Emotion is Love.
quotes.author: pablo

quotes.quote: “Our own self-esteem is something we can actually twist in whatever way we want.”
quotes.author: Stephen Richards

quotes.quote: “I don't give up. That makes me incredibly resilient or maybe stupid or just plain stubborn. Whichever...”
quotes.author: Destiny Booze

quotes.quote: “Self-belief, also called self-efficacy, is the kind of feeling you have when you have, like a Jedi, mastered a particular kind of skill and with its help have been able to achieve your set goals.”
quotes.author: Stephen Richards

quotes.quote: “أحط نفسك تدريجيا بفريق من الطراز الأول من الأشخاص الذين سيجعلون حياتك بهيجة و سعيدة و غنية إلى أبعد حد. ابدأ على الفور ،،”
quotes.author: Jack Canfield

quotes.quote: “Without adversity, there would be no growth, and without growth, there would be no lesson to be learned.”
quotes.author: Michelle D. Rosado

quotes.quote: “One of the Secrets in Life is to Make Stepping Stones out of Stumbling Blocks.”
quotes.author: Jack Penn

quotes.quote: “Leaders in OVER their heads is the mere result of getting ahead of their intended SEASON.”

quotes.quote: “The word "seek" is a verb. Are you treating it as such in your life? If you seek change, success, or love, DO it - BE it!”

quotes.quote: “How would your life be different if...you had a plan of action towards your goals? Let today be the day...You stop allowing your days to be stolen by busy nothingness and take calculated steps towards your goals.”

quotes.quote: “Some years ago, I was lucky enough invited to a gathering of great and good people: artists and scientists, writers and discoverers of things. And I felt that at any moment they would realise that I didn’t qualify to be there, among these people who had really done things.

quotes.quote: “الانشغال بالألم هو توقّفٌ مؤقَتٌ عن الحياة وهو إقحامٌ ساذج للعجز في عقولنا والعظماء فقط من يرون في الألم أكبر دافع للمقاومة”

quotes.quote: “Nothing that happens to you was meant to be. The only thing about you that was meant to be is you. Blaze your own trail.”

quotes.quote: “I may not be where I want to be, but if I stop now, I'll NEVER get where I'm going!”

quotes.quote: “Have nuts and be nuts.”

quotes.quote: “Don't get too deep, it leads to over thinking, and over thinking leads to problems that don't even exist in the first place.”

quotes.quote: “Coming to the END of MYSELF and all SELF effort...seems to be the very point that God steps in and shows HIMSELF to be more than ENOUGH.”

quotes.quote: “Pain? Yes, of course. Racing without pain is not racing. But the pleasure of being ahead outweighed the pain a million times over. To hell with the pain. What's six minutes of pain compared to the pain they're going to feel for the next six months or six decades. You never forget your wins and losses in this sport. YOU NEVER FORGET.”
quotes.author: Brad Alan Lewis

quotes.quote: “We've also evolved the ability to simply 'pay it forward': I help you, somebody else will help me. I remember hearing a parable when I was younger, about a father who lifts his young son onto his back to carry him across a flooding river. 'When I am older,' said the boy to his father, 'I will carry you across this river as you now do for me.' 'No, you won't,' said the father stoically. 'When you are older you will have your own concerns. All I expect is that one day you will carry your own son across this river as I no do for you.' Cultivating this attitude is an important part of Humanism--to realize that life without God can be much more than a series of strict tit-for-tat transactions where you pay me and I pay you back. Learning to pay it forward can add a tremendous sense of meaning and dignity to our lives. Simply put, it feels good to give to others, whether we get back or not.”
quotes.author: Greg Epstein

quotes.quote: “God can take the ordinary and create the extraordinary. Our incredible God has the power to transform your simple life and give you the life of your dreams. Remarkable things happen in your life when you believe.”

quotes.quote: “A farmer is a magician who produces money from the mud.”

quotes.quote: “Compromise brings harmony to both, happiness to none.”
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: “To fall in love for any reason does cause fires of emotion. When we are in love, we ride on a positive energy as compared to not being in love. When we are love, we transcend conditional love to that of unconditional and we are now flowering in consciousness. Love is a very important element of consciousness as it becomes purer with Source union even as our consciousness is expanded further. Consciousness is love that is light.”
quotes.author: Nandhi Tapasyogi

quotes.quote: “Holding on to the past will hold you down in life. Learn from it but move on.”
quotes.author: Jonathan Anthony Burkett

quotes.quote: “Greatness comes from the inside and once you believe you have it, it's yours to share with the world.”
quotes.author: Chris Burkmenn

quotes.quote: “In our worldly perceptions of Jesus, we tend to embrace the kindness of his love ('be encouraged') but not the discipline of his love ('and sin no more'). But with the whole scope of his love, or maturity in Christ, we begin relying on him for guidance where we would prefer him to walk beside us rather than behind us.”
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: “The greatest happiness is a quiet kind. It’s the tender understanding that we’re living in a very strange place full of strange creatures. And there’s quite a bit of wonder in that.”
quotes.author: F.K. Preston

quotes.quote: “You don’t get what you wish for; you get what you work for.”
quotes.author: Daniel Milstein

quotes.quote: “Usually people don't see beyond the surface of things and cannot understand more other than the obvious; they are used to judging a book by its cover, and that is why they don't hesitate to bully.”
quotes.author: Maria Karvouni

quotes.quote: “If you dare take the challenge, you will possess the courage to conquer.”
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: “Only hardship softens the hardness of the human heart.”
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: “The only time a man can do the right thing is right now.”
quotes.author: John Verdon

quotes.quote: “One sure way to kill a dream, is to suffocate it with worry.”
quotes.author: TemitOpe Ibrahim

quotes.quote: “To be successful, love yourself and be originally you. Discover what you were born to do and do it well.”
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: “You cannot ‘fit yourself in’ to greatness.
quotes.author: Gordana Biernat

quotes.quote: “Life is about peeking through the veil of forgetfulness.
quotes.author: Gordana Biernat

quotes.quote: “On the road to liberation, learn to press Next.
quotes.author: Talismanist Giebra

quotes.quote: “أعرف أنك في هذه الآونة تقعين أحيانا فريسة لخوفك من الحياة أكثر من خوفك من الموت. وأعلم أنك في سبيل الخلاص من هذه المعاناة تلجئين في الغالب أكثر فأكثر لخيالك. لكن مايغيب عنك أن خيالك الآن هو بصدد تدميرك.
quotes.author: غيوم ميسو - عائد لأبحث عنك

quotes.quote: “It's not about perfect. It's about effort. And when you bring that effort every single day, that's where transformation happens. That's how change occurs.”
quotes.author: Jillian Michaels

quotes.quote: “...Or we can blaze! Become legends in our own time, strike fear in the heart of mediocre talent everywhere! We can scald dogs, put records out of reach! Make the stands gasp as we blow into an unearthly kick from three hundred yards out! We can become God's own messengers delivering the dreaded scrolls! We can race dark Satan himself till he wheezes fiery cinders down the back straightaway....They'll speak our names in hushed tones, 'those guys are animals' they'll say! We can lay it on the line, bust a gut, show them a clean pair of heels. We can sprint the turn on a spring breeze and feel the winter leave our feet! We can, by God, let our demons loose and just wail on!”
quotes.author: John L. Parker Jr.

quotes.quote: “Procrastination is the bad habit of putting of until the day after tomorrow what should have been done the day before yesterday.”
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.quote: “True leaders bring out your personal best. They ignite your human potential”.”
quotes.author: John Paul Warren

quotes.quote: “Acceptance makes an incredible fertile soil for the seeds of change.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “الصداقة الحقيقية تُعيدُ تعريف المطر لأنها تأتي دون مقابل”
quotes.author: ياسر حارب

quotes.quote: “Success is within reach of all people, but you can grasp it only when you realise the power within you.”
quotes.author: Stephen Richards

quotes.quote: “Who should we be trying to make the most proud? Our family? Our friends? Our teachers or bosses? What about the one who molded us out of the earth itself, who formed us like clay, and instilled within us the very breath of life that shaped the universe?”
quotes.author: James D. Maxon

quotes.quote: “There’s a Chinese proverb that says “Wisdom is avoiding all thoughts that weaken you & embracing those that strengthen you” Your mind is like a Ferrari (Or your favorite car) it is Awesome!...but if you put sand on the gas tank it won’t run. Don’t put sand (negativity) on your mind. Think positive, encouraging, uplifting thoughts, & the negative will soon evaporate.”
quotes.author: Pablo

quotes.quote: “Death is more uni­ver­sal than life; everyone dies but not every­one lives.”
quotes.author: Alan Sachs

quotes.quote: “The secret to strong leaders is that strong leaders are strong because they have been tempered by the negative. They have discovered the secret of combining the negative and the positive to PRODUCED their very own POWER plant!”
quotes.author: John Paul Warren

quotes.quote: “المتصالح مع ذاته يشبه النهر الذي يستمر في صبّ مياهه العذبة في البحر المالح على الرغم من علمه بأنه لن يحيله حلواً، فهو يعلم بأن مهمّته تكمن في ري الأراضي التي يمر عليها وليس في تحلية مياه البحر”
quotes.author: ياسر حارب

quotes.quote: “السعادةُ لا تأتي بشروط”
quotes.author: ياسر حارب

quotes.quote: “معرفتك لأسباب فشلك ستوصلك إلى القمة ومعرفتك لأسباب نجاحك ستبقيك عليها”
quotes.author: ياسر حارب

quotes.quote: “Circumstances, knowledge or birth do not determine the realisation of your desires. It is only you who are blocking the achievement of your dreams and goals.”
quotes.author: Stephen Richards

quotes.quote: “الأملُ ثورة فرديةٌ على الألم”
quotes.author: ياسر حارب

quotes.quote: “be who you set out to be...”
quotes.author: Gino Norris

quotes.quote: “السعادة طريقة وليست طريقا”
quotes.author: ياسر حارب

quotes.quote: “Ideas and philosophies have a shelf-life. They must be kept fresh and renewed or they will spoil. If left unattended, the same ideas and philosophies that once nourished you and helped you grow can poison you and make you sick. Become aware of new ideas that can refresh your way of life and be open to the fact that your old ideas and philosophies can work for you for some time, but when the shelf-life has passed, those ideas and philosophies could also harm you.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “This inner Being is all powerful, intelligent, indestructible and a storehouse of knowledge and wisdom. This inner core is truly who and what you are and is perpetually trying to connect with your outward self.”
quotes.author: Stephen Richards

quotes.quote: “You have pissed your last in this house . . . and I don't make velvet roses anymore.”
quotes.author: Toni Morrison

quotes.quote: “Everyone has too much of something, whether it’s time, talent or treasure. Everyone does have their own half, you just have to find it.”
quotes.author: Hannah Salwen

quotes.quote: “Be disciple of depth in shallow world.”
quotes.author: Cal Newport

quotes.quote: “Each man follows his own path - his own destiny, if you will. And only he is responsible for the choice.”
quotes.author: Heather Graham

quotes.quote: “It so happens that at times your desires tend to disagree with the reality and this is due to the fact that you have not let the two elements complement each other.”
quotes.author: Stephen Richards

quotes.quote: “What would life be if we didn't shake and wake ourselves up once and a while”
quotes.author: Heather Richards

quotes.quote: “We, as human beings, enjoy freedom of choice.
quotes.author: Lorii Myers

quotes.quote: “Strange things are always abounding. Watch and discern. There is always a lesson to be learned.
quotes.author: Vanessa Richardson

quotes.quote: “If you want to tell the world who you are, then the world must first show what you do.”
quotes.author: Aabas Sadkani

quotes.quote: “যে বিজ্ঞান স্রষ্টার তৈরি প্রকৃতির সব রহস্য ভেদ করতে অক্ষম, তাকে বাটখারা বানিয়ে সেই প্রকৃতির স্রষ্টাকে জাস্টিফাই করাটা কি নিছক ছেলে মানুষি নয়?”
quotes.author: Arif Azad

quotes.quote: “Well, if it can be thought, it can be done, a problem can be overcome,”
quotes.author: E.A. Bucchianeri

quotes.quote: “Easily mistaken, it is not about a love for adversity, it is about knowing a strength and a faith so great that adversity, in all its adverse manifestations, hardly even exists.”
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: “To achieve anything, you must be prepared to dabble on the boundary of disaster.”
quotes.author: Stirling Moss

quotes.quote: “Like everything in life, it is not what happens to you but how you respond to it that counts.”
quotes.author: Steve Backley

quotes.quote: “Don’t hide what you have just because people tell you it’s not normal. I have known normal people…and guess what? They are as boring as hell...”
quotes.author: Sidney Knight

quotes.quote: “It is never about who is right or wrong, it is about what is best.”
quotes.author: Steve Backley

quotes.quote: “Reach for the sky but keep your feet on the ground”
quotes.author: Phil Limbert

quotes.quote: “Shame and blame should have no place in our body, mind, or spirit.”
quotes.author: Asa Don Brown

quotes.quote: “Don't be indifferent about any random idea that occurs to you, because each and every idea is for a particular purpose. it may not be beneficial to you, but can be what others are craving for”
quotes.author: Michael Bassey Johnson

quotes.quote: “Our perceptions are influenced by our surroundings.”
quotes.author: Asa Don Brown

quotes.quote: “Fear is the Fatal killer of Desire.”
quotes.author: zig ziggler

quotes.quote: “Did you have a rough month? I did :( but, you know what? There’s no time to dwell on a missed opportunity or worry about what I should’ve done or said, beating myself up & making myself miserable about my mistakes. That doesn’t work. So will take notes from that, put it behind me, move on & finish the year STRONG”
quotes.author: Pablo

quotes.quote: “You can start to change your luck today. Begin believing that you can have what you desire and superior things will arrive.”
quotes.author: Steve Backley

quotes.quote: “Get a grip on yourself. there's only one god here on earth, and that's you. If you don't like the world, make one you like better.”
quotes.author: Yasmina Khadra

quotes.quote: “Shrug off the no’s – they are temporary. This is your world. In your world there is only yes.”
quotes.author: Jolene Stockman

quotes.quote: “The thrust of continuous action is the firewood which fuels motivation.”
quotes.author: Steve Backley

quotes.quote: “Through my choices and actions, I have learned the most effective way of speaking to God is without saying a word.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “On your quest to spirituality it is often required to suspend your rationality; but true spirituality asks that you enhance your rationality.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “Don't violate the law, but don't reject an idea because it's illegal. You might be able to get the law changed.”
quotes.author: ROBERTH H. SCHULLER

quotes.quote: “Not matter what your sacred or religious book is, it's not how well you know the book, it's how well you're in alignment with the author.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “Along our chosen paths, we all meet up with demons. We must meet them, and battle them, even when they are nothing but mist in the night.”
quotes.author: Heather Graham

quotes.quote: “Faith is the poetry of our dreams; action is the builder of our reality.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “I ask myself: Are Defeats necessary ?
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: “Holding on, holding out and holding fast when the going is tough constitutes a winning mindset.”
quotes.author: Ogwo David Emenike

quotes.quote: “If you are not able to see your goals, they will take longer to achieve, and sometimes “longer” is "never.”
quotes.author: Honoree Corder

quotes.quote: “Don’t forget to collect the memories on your journey. Remember, if you only focus on your destination, you will miss out on the benefits of the journey.”
quotes.author: Tanya R. Liverman

quotes.quote: “Make peace with your past so you don't mess up the present!”
quotes.author: Marcia Casar Friedman

quotes.quote: “We learn best when we care about what we are doing, when we have choices. We learn best when the work has meaning to us, when it matters. We learn best when we are using our hands and our minds.We learn best when the work we are doing is real and relevant.”
quotes.author: Dennis Littky

quotes.quote: “Between natural ability and education choose natural ability, as it will keep you happy and will fetch you the glory sooner.”
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: “It takes understanding to be outstanding”
quotes.author: Pastor Simeon Nwani

quotes.quote: “Without inspiration the best powers of the mind remain dormant. There is a fuel in us which needs to be ignited with sparks.”
quotes.author: Johann Gottfried Von Herder

quotes.quote: “For this reason a prince ought to take care that he never lets anything slip from his lips that is not replete with the above-named five qualities, that he may appear to him who sees and hears him altogether merciful, faithful, humane, upright, and religious. There is nothing more necessary to appear to have than this last quality, inasmuch as men judge generally more by the eye than by the hand, because it belongs to everybody to see you, to few to come in touch with you. Every one sees what you appear to be, few really know what you are, and those few dare not oppose themselves to the opinion of the many, who have the majesty of the state to defend them; and in the actions of all men, and especially of princes, which it is not prudent to challenge, one judges by the result.”
quotes.author: Niccolò Machiavelli

quotes.quote: “I'm not happy when I'm writing, but I'm more unhappy when I'm not.”
quotes.author: Fannie Hurst

quotes.quote: “...[I]ron discipline does not preclude but presupposes criticism and contest of opinion within the Party. Least of all does it mean that discipline must be 'blind'. On the contrary, iron discipline does not preclude but presupposes conscious and voluntary submission, for only conscious discipline can be truly iron discipline.”
quotes.author: Joseph Stalin

quotes.quote: “The “Warrior Ethos” emphasizes placing the mission first, not accepting defeat, and being disciplined physically and mentally. Why? Because an American Soldier is a “guardian of freedom and the American way of life.”
quotes.author: Dan Smee

quotes.quote: “كلما زادت وُعورة الطريق كانت نهايته أجمل”
quotes.author: ياسر حارب

quotes.quote: “العُظماء هم الذين انتصروا على أنفسهم قبل أن ينتصروا على الآخرين”
quotes.author: ياسر حارب

quotes.quote: “اليأس هو آخر محاولة قبل النجاح”
quotes.author: ياسر حارب

quotes.quote: “الموهبة تصنع لك بداية جميلة والإصرار يصنع لك نهاية أجمل”
quotes.author: ياسر حارب

quotes.quote: “عندما أفشلُ أُوقِنُ بأنني أسير في الطريق الصحيح لأن الفشل يدفعني إلى العمل أكثر”
quotes.author: ياسر حارب

quotes.quote: “النّصرُ لا يتأخر نحن الذين نسْتَعجِله”
quotes.author: ياسر حارب

quotes.quote: “Submission to what people call their 'lot' is simply ignoble. If your lot makes you cry and be wretched, get rid of it and take another.”
quotes.author: Elizabeth von Arnim

quotes.quote: “النصرُ لا يتأتّى لِمَن يُمعِنُ النظر خلفه”
quotes.author: ياسر حارب

quotes.quote: “أحب مفترقات الطرق لأنها تدفعنا إلى الاختيار”
quotes.author: ياسر حارب

quotes.quote: “التفاؤل قَدَرٌ لم يتحقق بعد”
quotes.author: ياسر حارب

quotes.quote: “النجاح يدلّنا على الطريق والفشل يدلّنا على الطريقة”
quotes.author: ياسر حارب

quotes.quote: “Never ever forget that you enlisted in the ranks – you weren’t press ganged or drafted. Nobody owes you anything – least of all respect for your work – until you’ve earned it with what you put on the page.”
quotes.author: T.F. Rigelhof

quotes.quote: “Living life ONCE is enough...if you live life RIGHT.”
quotes.author: John Paul warren

quotes.quote: “النهضة ليست خُرافة إذا آمنا بها وحتى الخرافات تكون مُلهمة أحيانا”
quotes.author: ياسر حارب

quotes.quote: “الأفكار العظيمة هي التي تجعلنا نتحمّس من أجلها لا التي تجعلنا نغضب من أجلها”
quotes.author: ياسر حارب

quotes.quote: “عندما نتأمّل فإننا نعرف دون أن نفكّر ونصل دون أن نقطع الطريق”
quotes.author: ياسر حارب

quotes.quote: “Life of any real value or substance is not formed during good times merely enjoyed.”
quotes.author: John Paul Warren

quotes.quote: “She sincerely wishes success, for her new life, and intends that no failure of effort, temper, or spirits on her part will jeopardise it.”
quotes.author: Jude Morgan

quotes.quote: “... Gunpei Yokoi, asked his boss, 'What should I make?' Nintendo chief executive Hiroshi Yamauchi replied, 'Something great.'
quotes.author: David Sheff

quotes.quote: “Great treasures bring out great greed in the hearts of men and great greed has been the downfall of many nations. - from "Opoponax Dreams”
quotes.author: Genieve Dawkins

quotes.quote: “Confidence can be learned - but not from a book. Confidence comes from from living.”
quotes.author: Saskia Shakin

quotes.quote: “Don't go downhill just because it's easy. The view is only visible from the top.”
quotes.author: Destiny Booze

quotes.quote: “Beloved, the passage of time is but a fleeting metric, for it is the accumulation of life's experiences that truly constitutes wisdom. The years may chronicle our journey, but it is the depth of our encounters, the richness of our struggles, and the breadth of our understanding that ultimately define the substance of our being.”
quotes.author: Bishop W.F. Houston Jr.

quotes.quote: “True victory, beloved, lies not just in the immediate conquest but in the wisdom to discern the long shadow it may cast.”
quotes.author: Bishop W.F. Houston Jr.

quotes.quote: “Beloved, as we navigate the complexities of triumph, let us remember to scrutinize the subtle repercussions of our actions lest we declare victory prematurely. For it is in the unexamined consequences that the true nature of our success is revealed, and the wisdom of our decisions is ultimately tested.”
quotes.author: Bishop W.F. Houston Jr.

quotes.quote: “Firestarters are flexible. They recognize situational needs and are able to flow into the accessible role identity most relevant to overcome emergent challenges.”
quotes.author: Raoul Davis Jr.

quotes.quote: “The moon stared at me through sprinkled nighttime stardust and I alone smile.”
quotes.author: Jay Long

quotes.quote: “In your name, the family name is at last because it's the family name that lasts.”
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: “Your rebel soul shines like a diamond pulled from dust: bright, clear and flawless.”
quotes.author: Jay Long

quotes.quote: “Your greatness is measured by your horizons.”
quotes.author: Michelangelo

quotes.quote: “Hopes, wants and wishes, all cast across the night sky with my heart in tow.”
quotes.author: Jay Long

quotes.quote: “Not all things that fall down break. Some develop wings.”
quotes.author: Neelam Saxena Chandra

quotes.quote: “Changing a Habit is Never Difficult.
quotes.author: Vineet Raj Kapoor

quotes.quote: “Start small and keep going.”
quotes.author: Abhijit Naskar

quotes.quote: “If one million of you give assent to the one thousand who participate in the murder of a child, then one million of you are a million times guilty.”
quotes.author: Compton Gage

quotes.quote: “Confident Assured Posture: Foundation of Powerful Style”
quotes.author: Cindy Ann Peterson

quotes.quote: “What you wish to be, be.”
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: “Strive through your adversities with a tenacious mindset and a sincere heart and there shall surely be a great end when you get to the end unrelentingly. You shall surely leave a noble mark when you endure to the end and you shall surely smile in the end and ponder over how the journey to the end was. Note; there is no sweet fruit that is not the product of the dirty soil. No matter what, keep moving on!”
quotes.author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah

quotes.quote: “No crime is a means to an end. No crime can be rationalized.”
quotes.author: Compton Gage

quotes.quote: “There is only one thing that is more natural than thinking: breathing. And it is in breathing that we find the door to happiness.”
quotes.author: Mario Maruffi

quotes.quote: “To be a poet in a destitute time means: to attend, singing, to the trace of the fugitive god. This is why the poet in the time of the world's night utters the holy.”
quotes.author: Martin Heidegger

quotes.quote: “If one thousand of you participate in the murder of one child, then one thousand of you are a thousand times guilty.”
quotes.author: Compton Gage

quotes.quote: “We put great expectations on our tomorrows when we truly need to rely on ourselves. Far too many overlook personal action, as a means to get things done. Blame is easily passed if one does not hold themselves accountable.”
quotes.author: Jay Long

quotes.quote: “Man is not merely born to make money. But to fulfill is mission.”
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: “A well-written article does not make what was written factual or something to subscribe to.
quotes.author: Loren Weisman

quotes.quote: “أؤمن بالقدرة، ولا أؤمن بالقدر.”
quotes.author: غيوم ميسو - عائد لأبحث عنك

quotes.quote: “If you are paying someone to motivate you (seriously), you should rather pay to a psychiatrist.”
quotes.author: Anupam S Shlok

quotes.quote: “Life isn't a struggled to know what's right. It's a struggle to do it.”
quotes.author: Paul Pinelle

quotes.quote: “When yeu win, your success story can be whatever the fuck yeu want.”
quotes.author: Sandesh Hukpachongbang

quotes.quote: “My father said unmarked hands were a sign of a man who had not worked for his achievements. He was most likely referring to a future husband, but I decided that it was a standard I wished to hold myself to as well. ”
quotes.author: I.V. Ophelia

quotes.quote: “يجب أن نمتلك القدرة على تغير أنفسنا، الجرأة على أن نكون أسياد حياتنا الخاصة، الجرأة على الانغمار في اكتشاف ذواتنا.”
quotes.author: غيوم ميسو - عائد لأبحث عنك

quotes.quote: “I've had many dreams useless dreams while sleeping. Priceless are those that guide me while awake.”
quotes.author: Paul Pinelle

quotes.quote: “Meditate on holy scriptures if you desire to grow strong in spirit.”
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: “The effort you put into something is never wasted, even if it leads you to disappointing results. Your efforts make you wiser, more skilled , and more experienced and that's a positive outcome for any effort. Show yourself approved!”
quotes.author: Mlungisi Simelane

quotes.quote: “It is as much about input – the conversation of imaginative men (women and children not excluded) has a rhythm, a phrase that follows a thought and precedes the development of further thought … try not to be a cunt.”
quotes.author: Gordon Roddick

quotes.quote: “Tomorrow will never call to ask your opinion; you don't control it. Stop allowing today's possibilities to be robbed by tomorrow's insecurities.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “Time is too short in this one life, to be able to do everything,
quotes.author: Sujit Lalwani

quotes.quote: “In meetings philosophy might work,
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: “You are conditioned to believe that if you let go, if you surrender, you will either be a victim of circumstances and not assertive in your own being, or you will be viewed as being lazy, lacking in willpower, and un-motivated.
quotes.author: Kelly Martin

quotes.quote: “Comfort zone: simply means the routine of one’s daily life – it is a psychological state in which one feels familiar, safe, at ease, and secure.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “When you practice leadership,The evidence of quality of your leadership, Is known from the type of leaders that emerge out of your leadership”
quotes.author: Sujit Lalwani

quotes.quote: “When you start to accept responsibility for the results you get in life, you also take back the power to change your future outcome.”
quotes.author: Kevin Ngo

quotes.quote: “Those who win never give up.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “At the end of the day, it’s your life. If you turn out good, the world celebrates you and with you (not minding how you achieved it). If bad, they abandon you (even if they gave you the advice that led you to doom). Just be you and follow your heart.”
quotes.author: Omoakhuana Anthonia

quotes.quote: “Patience, more than the ability to bear pains or endure waiting, is to be calm no matter what happens – constantly take action to turn it to positive growth opportunities – and have faith to believe that it will all work out in the end while you are waiting.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “Let's always try to paint the truth ... our art must be made to mean something.”
quotes.author: E.A. Bucchianeri

quotes.quote: “Be creative enough to dream, brave enough to try, persistent enough to succeed, and humble enough to thank those who helped you along the way.”
quotes.author: Elizabeth Parker

quotes.quote: “The results of knowledge without application results in nothing at all. Do what you know better to do.”

quotes.quote: “There’s an interesting story about Abraham Lincoln. During the American Civil War he signed an order transferring certain regiments, but Secretary of War Edwin Stanton refused to execute it, calling the president a fool. When Lincoln heard he replied, ‘If Stanton said I’m a fool then I must be, for he’s nearly always right, and he says what he thinks. I’ll step over and see for myself.’ He did, and when Stanton convinced him the order was in error, Lincoln quietly withdrew it. Part of Lincoln’s greatness lay in his ability to rise above pettiness, ego, and sensitivity to other people’s opinions. He wasn’t easily offended. He welcomed criticism, and in doing so demonstrated one of the strengths of a truly great person: humility. So, have you been criticised? Make it a time to learn, not lose.”

quotes.author: Mitta Xinindlu

quotes.quote: “When you are a disciple of God, he/she will always be with you and will find you regardless of where you are.”

quotes.quote: “If you are working on something exciting that you really care about, you don’t have to be pushed. The vision pulls you.”

quotes.quote: “Coach Kaspar hugged me like a dad, "My job isn't to make you a winner; my job is to help you see you are already a winner.”

quotes.quote: “Don't give up on yourself when life gets a little harder. Instead, love harder those who do value your life”

quotes.quote: “Good news makes its way to you slower because it’s full of joy.”

quotes.quote: “There will always be a solution. It's in your chart.”

quotes.quote: “There’s always something left to lose”
quotes.author: Holly Black

quotes.quote: “જે છૂટી ગયું હોય કે છોડી દીધું હોય એને ક્લેઈમ કરવા ક્યારેય પાછા ન ફરવું. ભૂતકાળ બનેલી ક્ષણો પર દાવો કરવાથી ક્યારેક આપણે ફરી એ જ બેડીઓમાં પ્રવેશી જઈએ છીએ, જેમાંથી માંડ છુટકારો મેળવેલો. એ ક્ષણો ગમ્મે તેટલી સુખદ હોય, ભૂતકાળને ફરીથી જીવવાનો પ્રયત્ન કરવો મૂર્ખામી છે. કારણકે લાખ પ્રયત્નો પછી પણ એની એ જ ક્ષણોને આપણે ફરીથી જીવી નથી શકવાના. ભૂતકાળ ગમ્મે તેટલો પોકારે, એને પાછળ વળીને જોવાની ભૂલ ન કરવી. એ સુખદ યાદોને મનોમન ચૂમી લેવી અને આગળ વધવું.”
quotes.author: Dr. Nimit Oza

quotes.quote: “આપણામાં કોઈક ખોટ છે એવી માન્યતા જ ક્યારેક આપણી સૌથી મોટી ખોટ હોય છે.”
quotes.author: Dr. Nimit Oza

quotes.quote: “Fall like a waterfall & become a new version of yourself when you fall”
quotes.author: Palak Tewary

quotes.quote: “The key is faith + fate + feat”
quotes.author: Palak Tewary

quotes.quote: “Something I understood from the Bible that I found is also the truth: We were created in God's image to love, serve, cherish, and protect each other until the return of God or his son.”
quotes.author: Werley Nortreus

quotes.quote: “No matter what we are going through, our hearts feel some kind of pure happiness when we worship God and share love with others.”
quotes.author: Werley Nortreus

quotes.quote: “Healthcare professionals deserve better recognition and respect than other professionals because we will always depend on them when our health is in trouble.”
quotes.author: Werley Nortreus

quotes.quote: “If God forgives us, we should also forgive one another because God is a God of love and forgiveness.”
quotes.author: Werley Nortreus

quotes.quote: “Darkness was not my enemy, but rather the landscape where I learned to shine.”
quotes.author: DarkNightBeacon

quotes.quote: “Success comes when you do what your heart desires.”
quotes.author: Werley Nortreus

quotes.quote: “દરેકની નજરમાં હીરો બનવાનું છોડી દઈએ, તો જીવન બહુ સરળ થઈ જાય છે. કેટલાકની નજરમાં આપણે નિષ્ફળ, નકામા કે નવરા જ રહેવાના. બસ, એટલું સ્વીકારી લઈએ તો ઘણી માનસિક શાંતિ મળશે.”
quotes.author: Dr. Nimit Oza

quotes.quote: “In life, pain is not necessarily a punishment; rather it is also a privilege to prove that you are stronger.”
quotes.author: Suman Subhralin

quotes.quote: “Setbacks No Shackle (Sonnet)
quotes.author: Abhijit Naskar

quotes.quote: “જ્યારે તમે ખરેખર જાતને પ્રાથમિકતા આપવા માંડો છો ત્યારે અમૂકને ગુમાવવા લાગો છો. તમારા ઉપેક્ષિત સ્વ-હિતથી જેટલા લોકોને લાભ મળતો, એ બધા હવે દૂર ચાલ્યા જશે. ધેટ્સ ઓકે. આત્મ-પોષણ માટે કેટલાક પરોપજીવીઓનું દૂર જવું આવશ્યક હોય છે.”
quotes.author: Dr. Nimit Oza

quotes.quote: “A dream without action is like a map without footsteps, only those who walk make it to the destination.”
quotes.author: Alex Shaikh

quotes.quote: “Any sacrifice that I make will be worth it if we can become our ancestors’ wildest dreams.”
quotes.author: Analeigh Sbrana

quotes.quote: “There is only one way you can fail and that’s if you believe you don’t deserve to win.”
quotes.author: Wendy K Richards

quotes.quote: “You can't disown caterpillars if you love butterflies.”
quotes.author: Udai Yadla

quotes.quote: “The safest choices aren't always the quickest ones.”
quotes.author: Alex

quotes.quote: “Dear self, it's okay to check out for a while, just remember to check back in.”
quotes.author: Alessandra Olanow

quotes.quote: “How to stay positive when all you want to do is be negative: start with one small positive thought.”
quotes.author: Alessandra Olanow

quotes.quote: “Dear self, I'm not where I want to be, but at least I'm not where I used to be.”
quotes.author: Alessandra Olanow

quotes.quote: “Embrace the doubt of tomorrow, for there is no opportunity in the certainty of yesterday.”

quotes.quote: “Just pause, reset, and restart... but do not shutdown the spirit of determination, for it gives you the power to begin anew and drives you to rise above and overcome.”

quotes.quote: “Speak life, always.”

quotes.quote: “An overly timid engagement with the debates of our time will rob one of the ferocity of feeling that is necessary to move the world. "If you do not feel it, you will not get it by hunting for it”

quotes.quote: “The secret to making accurate predictions is within. One can memorise all the techniques in the world and still err. The fact is that the final "Message" is sent through the Source itself. Intuition works hand-in-hand with human analysis.”

quotes.quote: “Whenever this land faces the destruction of humanity,
quotes.author: Sandip Shelke

quotes.quote: “The only limits in life are the ones we place on our thoughts. Break the barriers, and unlock your true potential.”
quotes.author: Pintu Saw

quotes.quote: “There is something far worse than poverty and fear. It is slavery ! I would trade all the wealth in the world to live a single moment of freedom.
quotes.author: Sandip Shelke

quotes.quote: “નિરક્ષર પાસે રહેવાથી જ્ઞાનકોશનું મહત્વ ઘટતું નથી. કેટલાક લોકોને દરેકની કિંમત ખબર હોય છે, પણ મૂલ્ય ખબર નથી હોતું. જો કોઈ તમને વાંચી કે સમજી નથી શકતું, તો એ એમની નિરક્ષરતા છે. એમના ‘કલર બ્લાઇન્ડ’ હોવાથી આપણા રંગો ઓછા નથી થવાના. જો કોઈ આપણી પ્રતિભા, સારપ, કે સફળતાની કદર નથી કરતું, તો એની ફરિયાદ શું કરવાની ? કોઈની પ્રશંસા, કદર, કે સમર્થનનું મહોતાજ હોય, એવું તેજ શું કામનું ? જેઓ ઈર્ષા, અજ્ઞાન, કે પૂર્વગ્રહોથી બળતા હોય, તેમને દીવાનો પ્રકાશ પણ દઝાડશે જ. એમની ચિંતા કર્યા વગર, ચમક્યા કરો.”
quotes.author: Dr. Nimit Oza

quotes.quote: “There’s no other way to look move forward, except to look forward.”
quotes.author: Nkwachukwu Ogbuagu

quotes.quote: “Opinions are like drums; if you do not beat them, they wouldn’t sound. Let the world know your opinion on issues.”

quotes.quote: “There’s no other way to move forward, except to look forward.”
quotes.author: Nkwachukwu Ogbuagu

quotes.quote: “how to speak with live person on United airlines"

quotes.author: Nkwachukwu Ogbuagu

quotes.quote: “Now, I choose peace. I choose wholeness. I choose love because I can. I am the author of my own life; I am both the pen and the paper. I am the source and the light. I am the one who declares, "This is how it is now," and so it is.”
quotes.author: Robin S. Baker

quotes.quote: “If you can’t predict what leads to success, you are less likely to invest in improving”

quotes.quote: “Channel your emotions and thoughts into pursuing your dreams—they're your greatest energy source. Don't let them dissipate through fleeting posts on social media”
quotes.author: Ankith Reddy

quotes.author: Hari krishnan Nair

quotes.quote: “Question your rulers
quotes.author: Claudys Kantara

quotes.quote: “Your best might not look the same every day, and that’s okay. Some days you’ll feel like you’re on top of the world, and other days it will feel like a victory just to make it through. But as long as you’re doing what you can with what you have, that is enough. You are enough.”

quotes.quote: “Culture isn't fluff. It's infrastructure.”

quotes.quote: “If I could show you how my heart is flowing with gratitude and love, I'd send you pictures, I swear.”

quotes.author: Hemant Nepal

quotes.quote: “What you water with effort, will bloom. Even in the shadow of doubt.”
quotes.author: Martin Walters

quotes.quote: “Do you know the difference between healthy self-doubt and imposter syndrome? Compare this: a GPS recalculating your route—calm, collected, and ready to guide you back on track. Now, contrast that with your Inner Chaotic Passenger who’s simultaneously giving you wrong directions, insisting that you got your license from a garage sale, and yelling that you’re trying to scam them. Whatever happens—they’re definitely giving you one star and writing a detailed complaint about it.”
quotes.author: Tempest Jemison

quotes.quote: “(...) here’s the thing about pretending to have all the answers: it’s exhausting, it’s lonely, and—surprise, surprise—it’s holding you back from your greatest potential. Your worth isn't determined by a flawless facade but by your resilience, adaptability, and willingness to be genuinely human.”
quotes.author: Tempest Jemison

quotes.quote: “Being diligent to a course, makes you an agent and source, through which; others can outsource and attain same course.”
quotes.author: Roland Nkrah

quotes.quote: “Understanding that this voice is a misguided attempt to shield you from failure by bombarding you with self-criticism is the first step to putting it in its place.”
quotes.author: Tempest Jemison

quotes.quote: “The whole point of our reincarnation is to help others; whether it's our children, families, friends, or strangers.
quotes.author: Mitta Xinindlu

quotes.quote: “I am the cause and effect of my problems.”
quotes.author: A.S Rana

quotes.quote: “I am the cause and effect of my problems.”
quotes.author: Anoop S. Rana

quotes.quote: “Where trees won't grow, bushes thrive. Nothing and no one is insignificant in this world.”
quotes.author: Bhuwan Thapaliya

quotes.quote: “Heroes are not born but made through their choices. One could be given the greatest gifts of the world and choose to do nothing with them. Or someone with nothing could forge their way to the pinnacle of power. Whether mortal or immortal, our destiny is in our hands.”
quotes.author: Sue Lynn Tan

quotes.quote: “Don't try too hard to fit in nor to stand out; you will get lost in between. Embrace who you are.”
quotes.author: Sujata(SLK)

quotes.quote: “I also want to be happy. To invest in something meaningful and fulfilling, even if it is difficult, and maybe not the most practical option in the world. To spend more time with Baba and Mama and Xiaoyi, and finally hang out with Chanel, and go out on a proper date with Henry. I want to laugh until my stomach hurts, and write until I’ve crafted something that delights me, and learn to bask in my small, private victories. Learn to accept that these things, too, are worth wanting.”
quotes.author: Ann Liang

quotes.quote: “No one has a perfect life Some of us just hide the imperfections well.”
quotes.author: Adil Alzarooni

quotes.quote: “Education must empower a man to have an economic freedom.”
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: “Your chart, profile or lifestyle could indicate a second marriage or relationship. It's not a sign of failure; but a sign of a second chance to love again. Don't be ashamed, just align yourself accordingly.”

quotes.quote: “An end of a marriage or a relationship is not a failure. It's an opportunity to love again. Align yourself accordingly.”
quotes.author: Mitta Xinindlu

quotes.quote: “Venus is exalted in Pisces to show us that either direction of the fish can give maximum fulfilment. Being single or being in a couple can be both equally satisfying. Don't be pressured to follow the social norms. Follow your chart.”

quotes.quote: “Aude Aliquid Dignum”
quotes.author: Peter Thompson

quotes.quote: “Growth is not only the act of adding more to our lives, but also of letting go of what no longer serves us.”
quotes.author: Aloo Denish Obiero

quotes.quote: “You have endured, not to be shackled by your history but to reclaim your present, to live fortunately, freely, and fearlessly.”
quotes.author: Rise Visuals

quotes.quote: “Your body speaks before your words ever reach the room”
quotes.author: S.RAI

quotes.quote: “If you start low, don't worry, all the greats started low.”
quotes.author: Ronald Bunch

quotes.quote: “If you can accept your flaws, you're flawless.”
quotes.author: Ronald Bunch

quotes.quote: “A problem loved is a problem solved.”
quotes.author: Sola Kosoko

quotes.quote: “Anything worth doing is worth striving to perfect. If you are able to do it well, why should you do it halfway?”
quotes.author: Lois Duncan

quotes.quote: “It was a boat, a small boat, an older boat, not much more than the length of a couple of blue whales, and there was one intention, the story immemorial: to survive the harpoon, skip the vortex, complete the job, and get back to where we came from.”
quotes.author: Colum McCann

quotes.quote: “You can't because you haven't”
quotes.author: Otegbade Temitayo

quotes.quote: “જીવનમાં કેટલાક ફેરફારો બાહ્ય રીતે અનિચ્છનીય અને નેગેટીવ લાગે છે, પણ હકીકતમાં તેઓ અંદરની બાજુએ મોકળાશ કરતાં હોય છે. એવી જગ્યા બનાવતા હોય છે જ્યાંથી કશુંક નવું ઉગી શકે.”
quotes.author: Dr. Nimit Oza

quotes.quote: “In life, we don't HAVE to do anything”
quotes.author: Ta Kos

quotes.quote: “The weight of regret is heavier than the burden of discipline—choose wisely.”
quotes.author: Aloo Denish Obiero

quotes.quote: “લાયકાત વગરના પુરુષ સામે પોતાની જાત સમર્પિત કરી દીધા પછી, જો દીકરીને એ વાતનો અફસોસ રહ્યા કરે, તો એ નિષ્ફળતા દીકરીની નહીં, એના પિતાની છે. એક દીકરીની સેલ્ફ-વર્થ કેટલી છે, એ યોગ્ય ઉંમરે જો તેને જણાવવામાં ન આવે, તો ‘વલ્નરેબીલીટી’ અને ‘લવ-સિકનેસ’નો બોજો ઉપાડીને તે પોતાની આખી જિંદગી એક પુરુષની સહાનુભૂતિ અને સમર્થન મેળવવામાં વિતાવી દે છે. પછી તેની પાસે પોતાની સેલ્ફ-વર્થ પ્રસ્થાપિત કરવા માટે પોતાની સેક્સ્યુઆલીટી સિવાય બીજું કશું જ નથી હોતું. કેટલા પુરુષો એનામાં ઈન્ટરેસ્ટેડ છે ? એવી વાતમાં જો દીકરી પોતાનું સ્વમાન શોધતી થઈ જાય તો સમજવું કે એક પિતા તરીકે આપણે નિષ્ફળ રહ્યા છીએ.”
quotes.author: Dr. Nimit Oza

quotes.quote: “We are responsible for what we are
quotes.author: Swami Vivekananda

quotes.quote: “We reap what we sow
quotes.author: Swami Vivekananda

quotes.quote: “This is the first lesson to learn be determined not to curse anything outside not to lay the blame upon anyone outside but stand up lay the blame on yourself
quotes.author: Swami Vivekananda

quotes.quote: “It is our own mental attitude which makes the world what it is for us
quotes.author: Swami Vivekananda

quotes.quote: “Truth can be stated in a thousand different ways
quotes.author: Swami Vivekananda

quotes.quote: “Whenever we attain a higher vision, the lower vision disappears of itself”
quotes.author: Swami Vivekananda

quotes.quote: “Everything can be sacrificed for truth but truth cannot be sacrificed for anything”
quotes.author: Swami Vivekananda

quotes.quote: “ಬದುಕು'

quotes.quote: “Coffee stains my skirts. Men stain my pride. Both leave hideous marks on what belongs to me.”
quotes.author: Sylvia Plath

quotes.quote: “We cannot live in a way that inconsistent with out expectations for ourselves.”
quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

quotes.quote: “We cannot live in a way that is inconsistent with our expectations for ourselves.”
quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

quotes.quote: “Communism is when iPhone.”
quotes.author: Karl Marx

quotes.quote: “True hierarchy can be found in the animal kingdom. Man must recognise sigma from alpha, the latter from beta, and the former from gamma. Order is in the intellect and strength of the spirit of man.”
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: “A plebiscite to a man is like a hawk to a meek mouse ; without it, one would not function.”

quotes.author: Ralph Marston

quotes.quote: “Turn your can’t into a can, and your dream into plan!”

quotes.quote: “The two most powerful warriors are patience and time. …so remember: great achievements take time; there is no overnight success.”
quotes.author: Leo Tolstoy

quotes.author: Robert Green Ingersoll

quotes.quote: “Strength isn't about never falling; it's about always finding a way to rise again.”
quotes.author: Georgia Clare

quotes.quote: “The greatest atrocity to affect humankind is that we believe what our thoughts say about us and the world around us!”
quotes.author: Scott W Possley

quotes.quote: “You deserve to be happy, Rob. Do what makes you happy. Do what feeds your soul.”
quotes.author: N.R. Walker

quotes.quote: “the afternoon. You can't take it with you.”
quotes.author: Annie Dillard

quotes.quote: “Well, I got what I went after, and then some – and I can’t help feeling a little puffed up about it… This is a man size job, but I seem to be getting away with it, and I’m going to see it through.' (Genevieve Hitt)”
quotes.author: Liza Mundy

quotes.quote: “We were not born just to increase the GDP of our nation. We were born to live a purposeful, meaningful, and fulfilling life.”

quotes.quote: “Exercise moderation. Learn to keep your life simple and away from comparisons.”

quotes.quote: “You are encouraged to put your passion & efforts into protecting and establishing your stable financial future, instead of looking for others to partner with to share your property or inherit property from others in this life. With your north node Aries in 2nd house, you are coming to realize that all your possessions have to be owned and earned by yourself. As an entrepreneur's spirit, you can effectively manage your material possessions to build self-worth in society in this lifetime. Gone is the mediocre middleman in an intimate partnership or close family. This time, life seriously challenges you to venture for your own money. Plan and do big for all things that you never dared to think about doing independently, especially when you were in your childhood, where you automatically follow intensive cooperation to sharing your belongings. North Node Aries in 2nd house put your Aries soul energy on the front line of your financial life. It is important to display Aries's potential in this aspect to practice and foster your positive energies in the process of your spiritual growth. Speak less and act impulsively and do more, being daring when addressing the public will bring you fulfillment joyfully...

quotes.quote: “If you can go to a movie and see a picture of war and suffering, and afterward say, “What a wonderful picture!” so may you take this life as a cosmic picture-show. Be prepared for every kind of experience that may come to you, realizing that all are but dreams. Each human life constitutes a drama; and the events of each day represent a drama. You are living a fresh one each of the year’s 365 days. The thought that you are merely a player in these dramas is very comforting. Realize that the acting out of whatever part you are called upon to play does not affect your real being. At the end of every earthly incarnation you are the same—the immortal soul—untouched by sickness, sorrow, or death. “He who cannot be ruffled by these (contacts of the senses with their objects), who is calm and evenminded during pain and pleasure, he alone is fit to attain everlastingness!” (Bhagavad Gita II:15.)”

So, next time you’re doubting the Universe’s plan, just look at your life – it’s the proof that magic is real, dreams do come true, and the universe has always been secretly rooting for you.”
