quotes.quote: “Me? ...I'm a woman of great faith who takes the time to encourage others, while pursuing my own vision.”
quotes.author: Mitta Xinindlu

quotes.quote: “I wish everyone knew that success is not defined by degrees or qualifications.
quotes.author: Mitta Xinindlu

quotes.quote: “Sometimes, it seems no matter what moves you make to better your life, some of the ugliness of your past tries to follow you, but thankfully, so does God’s grace.”
quotes.author: Ron Acosta

quotes.quote: “Hope is the light you hold fast to when passing through darkness. With it, you will surely find your way. With it, you will surely find what you’re searching for.”
quotes.author: Nkwachukwu Ogbuagu

quotes.quote: “You don't have to figure out anything. Everything is already figured out. All you need to do is to listen to that tiny little voice of your heart.”
quotes.author: Hiral Nagda

quotes.quote: “Once you know where you are going, you can never get tired on the way to it.”
quotes.author: Nkwachukwu Ogbuagu

quotes.quote: “So, instead of the story being this messed-up thing I erroneously produced, because I don’t know how to do it right—instead of it existing as a sort of Proof of Failure, with me as Chief Failer—I see myself as a loyal, helpful friend to that guy over there, who is my talent, and I have faith in him, although he sometimes gets a little confused. And I’m trying to help him to do his best. He empties his pockets on to the table and some of what he puts there is good, and some of it is… “not quite there yet.” I step up to the table, put my hand on his back, and the feeling I’m trying to convey is, “What’ve we got here? Let’s see what we can do. It’s going to be all right.”
quotes.author: George Saunders

quotes.quote: “The joy of knowing Jesus.”
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: “In order to get something done, you gotta do something. In order to do something, you gotta get to work. So, let's get to work.”
quotes.author: John Moschitta

quotes.quote: “Do not get discouraged because of the difficulties.”
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: “Though there are difficulties, do not give up.”
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: “On the edge conversations with my son. My son (the one who can't easily decide) asked me in a positive note, "Mommy how can you be fearless and decide easily." To which I carefully replied: "It's not that I am without fear. In fact, after having you - I have a lot. Nothing is easy when you don't really know what you want. But if you truly do want things to happen, your fears will be overshadowed by making your dreams come true. Just make one step at a time and with each step the shadows of doubt and fear will fall behind you."
quotes.author: Mystqx Skye

quotes.quote: “Level Up
quotes.author: Mystqx Skye

quotes.quote: “Don't scatter yourself; you're not wind. Learn to say no.”
quotes.author: Mitta Xinindlu

quotes.quote: “Embrace the mountain for its view and the valley for its vision, knowing each serves a purpose in your journey.”
quotes.author: Sope Agbelusi

quotes.quote: “The mountain gives us a place to shout our triumphs, the valley a space to whisper our plans for the next ascent.”
quotes.author: Sope Agbelusi

quotes.quote: “If you believe you can, then you will.”
quotes.author: José Ferreira

quotes.quote: “If You Feel Happiness, Sorrow and Pain While Writing Your Characters, It Means You are a True Author.”
quotes.author: unknown author

quotes.quote: “Life is too short for bad vibes and lukewarm coffee. Surround yourself with people who lift you higher and invest in a good coffee maker. After all, why settle for mediocrity when you can have an espresso shot of excellence in every cup? Embrace the bold flavors of life, kick negativity to the curb, and savor the rich aroma of success. Remember, you’re the barista of your own destiny, so brew it strong and make it count!”
quotes.author: Life is Positive

quotes.quote: “Don’t light a fire that has no reason to be alive because at the end of the day you are the one that is going to be burned”
quotes.author: K.America

quotes.quote: “No one goes around throwing caution to the wind, unless the wind is blowing their way.”
quotes.author: Taylor Jenkins Reid

quotes.quote: “Whenever you’re about to find fault with someone, hit pause and ask yourself: What flaw of mine is the evil twin of the one I’m about to criticize? It’s like holding up a mirror before pointing a finger. We can turn those fingers into peace signs & high-fives, fostering empathy. This little trick can turn your inner critic into a sage, swapping judgment for a bit of humility & understanding. So, next time, think twice and see if you’re about to roast your own twin flaw.”
quotes.author: Life is Positive

quotes.quote: “Whether you're climbing mountains or just trying to survive Monday, keep your eyes on the prize. Life's a marathon, not a sprint, and the finish line is reserved for those who refuse to quit. So, lace up your shoes, take a deep breath, & keep pushing forward. Every step, no matter how small, gets you closer to your dreams. Quitting is easy, but where's the fun in that? Stick with it because that's where the magic happens. Stay focused, stay determined, & let success chase you down!”
quotes.author: Life is Positive

quotes.quote: “Never assume but ask questions.”
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: “When the student is ready, the teacher will appear.”
quotes.author: Ancient Proverb

quotes.quote: “Do hard work. Either you will succeed, or you will prove the statement 'Hard work is the key to success' wrong. But remember, it can never be proved wrong, so there is only one option left.”
quotes.author: Akshita Tripathi

quotes.quote: “Strength lies within the individual who sees every difficulty as an opportunity to create some this new.”
quotes.author: Dr. Khalid Huusain Mir

quotes.quote: “You wake up every morning to fight the same demons that left you so tired the night before, and that, my love, is bravery.”
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: “You are doing something real! It just takes effort. Anything takes effort. The better it is, the more effort it takes. You have to follow through with it. Now get your butt back up there and keep moving. There aren’t any breaks unless the commander orders them. Keep going, George, you have to do it. Don’t be a pessimist.”
quotes.author: William DeForest Halsted

quotes.quote: “Allow love to heal your scars by opening your heart.”
quotes.author: Shaa Zainol

quotes.quote: “We came to earth to fulfill certain roles or characters, so that future actors and actresses can gain knowledge and insight from the experiences of those who came before them.”
quotes.author: Ogunlana Akinola Okikiola

quotes.quote: “Saints like Jesus and others — depending on your religion — died as single men; never dated and never married.
quotes.author: Mitta Xinindlu

quotes.quote: “Patience is a greate Blessing, Don't Leave this Blessing Because Of people's nonsense”
quotes.author: shdaas

quotes.quote: “আমি আমার পিতৃদেব ভগবানচন্দ্র বসুর কথা বলিতেছিলাম। তাঁহার জীবন দেখিয়া শিখিয়াছিলাম যে, সার্থকতাই ক্ষুদ্র এবং বিফলতাই বৃহৎ। এইরূপে যখন ফল ও নিষ্ফলতার মধ্যে প্রভেদ ভুলিতে শিখিলাম, তখন হইতেই আমার প্রকৃত শিক্ষা আরম্ভ হইল। যদি আমার জীবনে কোনো সফলতা হইয়া থাকে তাহা নিষ্ফলতার স্থির ভিত্তির উপর প্রতিষ্ঠিত।”
quotes.author: Jagadish Chandra Bose

quotes.quote: “The future belongs to those who harness the power of their youth, daring to dream and determined to achieve.”
quotes.author: Aloo Denish Obiero

quotes.quote: “Youth brings fresh perspectives, challenging the status quo and paving the way for innovation and advancement.”
quotes.author: Aloo Denish Obiero

quotes.quote: “You are the master of your destiny. You can influence, direct, and control your own environment. You can make your life what you want it to be.”
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.quote: “Your mind will discern in the moments of ambiguity. In the chaos and the quagmire that you will encounter. In the darkness and the labyrinth that you will come up against. There lies a direction which if you take will lead you to light and glory. You cannot give up the fight. You were born to win. You are the feared one. You are the bravest one. You are the mightiest one. March on Commander!
quotes.author: Avijeet Das

quotes.quote: “His hope and his confidence had never gone. But now they were freshening as when the breeze rises.”
quotes.author: Earnest Hemingway

quotes.quote: “Now is no time to think of baseball, he thought. Now is the time to think of only one thing. That which I was born for.”
quotes.author: Earnest Hemingway

quotes.quote: “He did not like to look at the fish anymore since he had been mutilated. When the fish had been hit it was as though he himself were hit.
quotes.author: Earnest Hemingway

quotes.quote: “Happiness for a young flower is both on a sunny and a rainy day.”
quotes.author: Giovannie de Sadeleer

quotes.quote: “The happiness of a young flower is both on a sunny and a rainy day.”
quotes.author: Giovannie de Sadeleer

quotes.quote: “I am not after a status. I am the status.”
quotes.author: Mitta Xinindlu

quotes.quote: “Life is not a bed of roses so get comfortable on the thorns.”
quotes.author: Enoch Olalere

quotes.quote: “When delay comes,it is to ignite the relay power in us,so as not to be slain by delay, but to slay(our goals and challenges)”
quotes.author: Daniel I. OWOEYE

quotes.quote: “What will happen tomorrow is already scripted in yesterday's action.”
quotes.author: Somnath Bhattacharjee

quotes.quote: “Tough times call for tough minds”
quotes.author: Kevin Anytime

quotes.quote: “Any road followed to its end leads precisely nowhere. Climb the mountain just a little bit to test it's a mountain. From the top of the mountain, you cannot see the mountain.”
quotes.author: Brian Herbert

quotes.quote: “A silent breeze swept away a moment, one that never can be recaptured, never can it be relived. So it is for us to cherish the moments, cherish them with all of our might. For just as an eagle in flight, they are transient, soon vanishing like the moon as day return the light.”
quotes.author: Sherman Kennon

quotes.quote: “We'll be alright”
quotes.author: Gracie Abrams

quotes.quote: “I love school, always have, always will, because any classroom feels to me like a sacred place. What do I love, exactly, about a schoolroom? How, right from the first moment, everybody knows we’re all about learning; not terribly different from sitting down to a tasty banquet, only the knowledge-food is being cooked right there in the classroom, where amazing ingredients can be summoned out of thin air.”
quotes.author: Rose Rosetree

quotes.quote: “Listening to my inner child may not have been the most logical decision, but it was my happiest choice!”
quotes.author: Anna Rajmon

quotes.quote: “Sometimes we lose only to gain more.”
quotes.author: Mitta Xinindlu

quotes.quote: “You are the products of your thoughts. So, be Positive.”
quotes.author: D. Dhyani (Author of "The Unstuck" series)")

quotes.quote: “You are unique. You are beautiful. You are you”
quotes.author: D. Dhyani (Author of "The Unstuck" series)")

quotes.quote: “Your feed is what you make it.”
quotes.author: D. Dhyani (Author of "The Unstuck" series)")

quotes.quote: “Decluttering your space helps declutter your mind.”
quotes.author: D. Dhyani (Author of "The Unstuck" series)")

quotes.quote: “Pause, reflect, respond.”
quotes.author: D. Dhyani (Author of "The Unstuck" series)")

quotes.quote: “Choose your media, very carefully.”
quotes.author: D. Dhyani (Author of "The Unstuck" series)")

quotes.quote: “Sometimes, we need to step away from technology to reconnect with yourself.”
quotes.author: D. Dhyani (Author of "The Unstuck" series)")

quotes.quote: “You don’t have to do it alone. Find your tribe.”
quotes.author: D. Dhyani (Author of "The Unstuck" series)")

quotes.quote: “You are what your thoughts are.”
quotes.author: D. Dhyani (Author of "The Unstuck" series)")

quotes.quote: “Inhale the future, exhale the past.”
quotes.author: D. Dhyani (Author of "The Unstuck" series)")

quotes.quote: “Surround yourself with people who push you to do better.”
quotes.author: D. Dhyani (Author of "The Unstuck" series)")

quotes.quote: “Once more, I was left alone. My way of dealing with emotional distress was to immediately engage my heart and intellect in a search for new opportunities to develop. I knew that if I wanted to continue to live my life successfully, I would have to rise to unbelievable heights.”
quotes.author: Jacqueline Tusi

quotes.quote: “Just as I was about to end my life, I received the blessings of deep silence. A gentle but firm voice spoke to me, saying: “Jacqueline, hold on a little longer. Your negative life experiences are nothing compared to the positive adventures you will have in the future. The world has so much more to offer than you can imagine. Keep on trusting. I’m here with you.” Hearing this message and feeling the power of something greater than my own will to survive was another turning point in my life. In that moment, I became a believer in God.”
quotes.author: Jacqueline Tusi

quotes.quote: “In a moment of enlightenment, I no longer perceived myself as being unconditionally delivered over to my fate, but rather called to acknowledge my own authorship. In other words, the tragic events that had taken place in the past were not things that had simply happened to me. Rather, they were actions that
quotes.author: Jacqueline Tusi

quotes.quote: “Si quieres hacer una diferencia, tienes que aprender a hablar.”
quotes.author: Juan Carlos Arteaga

quotes.quote: “It's them or it's us.”
quotes.author: SJ Tilly

quotes.quote: “Nunca quise ser famoso, pero siempre supe que sería grande”
quotes.author: John Lee Hooker

quotes.quote: “If you can't make choices in your life, be it personal or professional, you are in a hostage situation.”
quotes.author: Hemant Batra

quotes.quote: “Try to be happy at every step rather than waiting for your goal, because that will be ever lasting and not dependent on the output.”
quotes.author: James Clear

quotes.quote: “Rather than making a position your identity, Make your habit your identity.”
quotes.author: James Clear

quotes.quote: “I will share any part of me that can serve as a lighthouse for another amidst the storm that is called healing.”
quotes.author: DarkNightBeacon

quotes.quote: “You discovered something in the darkness. Something more terrifying than fear itself. A light that symbolized your soul.”
quotes.author: DarkNightBeacon

quotes.quote: “You were a beauty born of darkness. You wore it wrapped around as a cape. Designed to draw others to you, only to never allow them in. Behind your innocent mask, lies your dark beauty that none can see.”
quotes.author: DarkNightBeacon

quotes.quote: “Life is like the wind, calm and gentle. Then sudden gusts and great storms that blow.”
quotes.author: DarkNightBeacon

quotes.quote: “Focus not on what you want to achieve but on what you want to become.”
quotes.author: James Clear

quotes.quote: “Reflect on your habits and keep them updated.”
quotes.author: James Clear

quotes.quote: “Blijf lezen, blijf leren, blijf proberen. Als je altijd hetzelfde blijft doen, dan blijf je ook dezelfde resultaten krijgen.”
quotes.author: Francien Regelink

quotes.quote: “Tidak boleh dibunuh, sekalipun itu orang jahat. Tidak boleh diperkosa, sekalipun itu kuda.”
quotes.author: Felix K. Nesi

quotes.quote: “If someone keeps disappointing you again and again, that's on you. Once someone shows they’re all about themselves, it’s time to stop hoping they’ll suddenly morph into a saint. People don’t change just because you want them to. So, stop hitting replay on the disappointment soundtrack and start looking out for yourself. Fool me once, shame on you. Fool me twice—well, you know the rest. Set those boundaries and let them live their self-centered lives while you protect your peace.”
quotes.author: Life is Positive

quotes.quote: “Breaking a habit does not matter but reclaiming it does. Start the same again even if you break it.”
quotes.author: James Clear

quotes.quote: “Life will not go the way we want and that's the best thing because life knows the way, we dont.”
quotes.author: Hiral Nagda

quotes.quote: “Letting go is moving on.”
quotes.author: Nkwachukwu Ogbuagu

quotes.quote: “Seingat Loki Tua, sejak kecil, makanan menjadi hal utama yang ia pikirkan. Ayah Loki Tua pernah bilang bahwa manusia masih bisa hidup tanpa ukir-ukiran, pertunjukkan tari, dan lomba dayung tahunan, tapi tidak tanpa makanan.”
quotes.author: Yusi Avianto Pareanom

quotes.quote: “Ha ha ha. Kau ini ternyata lebih lucu ketimbang temanmu. Apa pentingnya dikenang sebagai orang murah hati? Apa pentingnya dikenang sebagai apa pun? Yang penting hari ini aku masih bisa makan enak.”
quotes.author: Yusi Avianto Pareanom

quotes.quote: “Aku ingin kau jadi mataku dari belahan Barat sana. Pulanglah membawa cerita seru dan menjadi manusia baru. Percayalah, kau akan mendapatkan pengalaman yang tak akan kaubayangkan sebelumnya.”
quotes.author: Yusi Avianto Pareanom

quotes.quote: “Sesuatu yang sempurna tak punya hasrat lagi mencari. Sebuah perahu yang sempurna tak akan butuh lagi mencari ikan, muatan, teman, pelanggan, bahkan tanah baru.”
quotes.author: Yusi Avianto Pareanom

quotes.quote: “Tapi, pengalaman telah mengajarkannya bahwa ia tak boleh merasa terlalu nyaman akan segala sesuatu karena ia tahu bahwa petaka, tanpa pemberitahuan atau persetujuan, bisa menyergap kapan saja.”
quotes.author: Yusi Avianto Pareanom

quotes.quote: “Ketika orang memanahmu atau menggunakan senjata tajam untuk melawanmu, kau tahu mereka takut berhadapan satu lawan satu. Tapi, ketika kau digebuki seperti anjing, kau tahu lawanmu merasa diri mereka raksasa dan ini sungguh bikin hati nyeri.”
quotes.author: Yusi Avianto Pareanom

quotes.quote: “Biarkan ia tidur, Raden. Berdosa kita jika kita melakukan sesuatu yang jahat kepada orang tidur.”
quotes.author: Yusi Avianto Pareanom

quotes.quote: “Ia kadang tak perlu senjata dalam pengertian sesungguhnya. Musuhnya sangat dekat, ada dalam dirinya, hawa nafsunya sendiri”
quotes.author: Yusi Avianto Pareanom

quotes.quote: “Kemenangan terhebat dalam pertempuran justru ketika kita tak perlu mengangkat senjata.”
quotes.author: Yusi Avianto Pareanom

quotes.quote: “Ia tahu bahwa bangsa-bangsa asing suka datang ke tanahnya, mengklaim itu sebagai kepunyaan mereka, dan membunuh siapa pun yang melawan.”
quotes.author: Felix K. Nesi

quotes.quote: “Dunia yang fana ini, uang bisa membeli kebahagiaan, kalau kau tahu cara menggunakannya.”
quotes.author: Felix K. Nesi

quotes.quote: “Make your own paradise, live on it with your pride and comfort.”
quotes.author: Selva Subashree S

quotes.quote: “Make your own paradise, live on it with pride and comfort”
quotes.author: Selva Subashree S

quotes.quote: “You’ve been strong for so long, holding it all together like a superhero. But even superheroes need a nap! Let your soul take a breather and heal up before jumping back into the fray. Remember, you’re built tough, but you’re also allowed to kick back and recharge. You’ve got this—you’ll get through it. Just don’t forget to give yourself a break along the way. Rest up, regroup, and then get back to kicking life’s challenges to the curb.”
quotes.author: Life is Positive

quotes.quote: “For the underemployed, be comforted by the fact that the kind of work you are forced by bleak circumstances to do does not reflect your personality; it rather reflects the society.”
quotes.author: Nkwachukwu Ogbuagu

quotes.quote: “If you crave genuine followers, then leave the well-paved, smooth road you have been walking on and walk on steep, rocky and jagged frontiers. Whoever follows you there, count on them.”
quotes.author: Nkwachukwu Ogbuagu

quotes.quote: “Behind the mask of calm lies a sea of unspoken pain.”
quotes.author: DarkNightBeacon

quotes.quote: “Hope is the beacon in the dark night. Its light shines through the storm of your soul, and when you allow God to anchor your hope, you will realize He’s greater than any situation you will ever encounter.”
quotes.author: DarkNightBeacon

quotes.quote: “Al anxiety is separation anxiety.
quotes.author: Mark L Lockwood

quotes.quote: “All anxiety is separation anxiety.
quotes.author: Mark L Lockwood

quotes.quote: “Fear - It is not out there, but inside our minds.
quotes.author: Mark L Lockwood

quotes.quote: “The person more information with no action will never be greater than the person with less information and more action.”
quotes.author: Kevin Anytime

quotes.quote: “Start writing, no matter what. The water does not flow until the faucet is turned on.”
quotes.author: Deepak Kumar

quotes.quote: “Your future success will be determined by your ability to be honest with yourself and take ownership of your current reality and each subsequent move throughout your life.”
quotes.author: Nate Green

quotes.quote: “You are not in competition with anyone on social media. You must face the reality that your success requires you to focus on yourself.”
quotes.author: Nate Green

quotes.quote: “Your future is a canvas that can be developed as you go, but you have to focus on the vision of what you want that canvas to look like in the end and then always move toward that vision.”
quotes.author: Nate Green

quotes.quote: “If you don’t take the time to set your lighthouse and focus on who you want to be and what you want to accomplish, the lack of results will leave you unsatisfied. You have to be willing to come up with goals beyond anything you feel comfortable with and start driving forward to a future that might seem impossible right now.”
quotes.author: Nate Green

quotes.quote: “There have been many times when I’ve put energy and effort in the wrong direction. I had to adjust my focus and realize it was nothing but a distraction derailing me from progressing toward my lighthouse.”
quotes.author: Nate Green

quotes.quote: “Take a look at your past roadmap. What does it look like? Where have you been, and what areas do you have to change to create a better future for yourself?”
quotes.author: Nate Green

quotes.quote: “A man must be big enough to admit his mistakes, smart enough to profit from them, and strong enough to correct them”
quotes.author: Nate Green

quotes.quote: “The same is true for you. You need to take inventory of who you are, what you’re built for, and what you’re chasing after. You have to look at your life and connect with your failures and shortcomings and the fact that you are built to reach greatness. Stop running in the wrong direction and take the time to be honest with yourself about where you are in life and whether your current path will lead you to your lighthouse.”
quotes.author: Nate Green

quotes.quote: “Reviewing your past and doing a reality check is not just about who you have been and how you have shown up but also about looking at the vehicle you chose to chase your success.”
quotes.author: Nate Green

quotes.quote: “You have to be completely honest and accept your failures, weaknesses, and areas of needed improvement in your life.”
quotes.author: Nate Green

quotes.quote: “Being honest with yourself about your holdbacks and demons from the past is crucial, as they may be preventing you from becoming the person you aspire to be”
quotes.author: Nate Green

quotes.quote: “So I ask, who you are meant to be versus who you’ve allowed yourself to become? You are built for more. You have underutilized your capabilities and accepted less of yourself throughout your journey thus far.”
quotes.author: Nate Green

quotes.quote: “The ability to suck less and do better each day requires you to be connected to your present situation and the hard truths of a tough reality.”
quotes.author: Nate Green

quotes.quote: “Comparing others’ journeys to mine is impossible. They have different purposes, visions, desired outcomes, planning, and long-term outputs. It was evident that it was not even possible to compete with any of these guys—we were all running different races.”
quotes.author: Nate Green

quotes.quote: “The competition mentality can become a destructive slippery slope that will eat you alive and create an unhealthy pattern in your life. There is enough success to go around.”
quotes.author: Nate Green

quotes.quote: “Cutting out that distraction, focusing on my lighthouse and goals, and defining the success I was and still am chasing was freeing.”
quotes.author: Nate Green

quotes.quote: “The competition in your life must be between the prior version of you and the current version of you. You have to focus on your lighthouse, your goals, and the greatest version of you that you’re driving toward.”
quotes.author: Nate Green

quotes.quote: “Your life should be developed based on the principles of who you are and what you are built for, not the expectations from others or comparisons to others.”
quotes.author: Nate Green

quotes.quote: “Your success—or anyone else’s—does not come at someone else’s expense. Other people don’t have to fail for you to succeed. Your winning doesn’t have to mean there are losers.”
quotes.author: Nate Green

quotes.quote: “The only true competition is who you are versus who you need to be to achieve your desired outcome and greatest success.”
quotes.author: Nate Green

quotes.quote: “This competition in your life should be focused only on how you show up each day versus the version of you that you are striving to be.”
quotes.author: Nate Green

quotes.quote: “There are no shortcuts. There is no way to achieve the type of success you are working to achieve without doing the required work.”
quotes.author: Nate Green

quotes.quote: “When you have clearly identified your goals, what you’re going after, and the greatness you’re striving to become, all daily processes and actions should move you in that direction.”
quotes.author: Nate Green

quotes.quote: “Your suck is anything keeping you from getting to your lighthouse and becoming the greatest version of yourself”
quotes.author: Nate Green

quotes.quote: “Taking action toward your future will require seasons of extreme growth, hard decisions, and fears that need to be conquered.”
quotes.author: Nate Green

quotes.quote: “Fear will always be a part of every growth process you put yourself through. It should never cripple you or keep you from taking the right leap.”
quotes.author: Nate Green

quotes.quote: “Every insecurity is a holdback and resistance to the momentum you’re building.”
quotes.author: Nate Green

quotes.quote: “You have to take the inventory and connect with the insecurities and fears that are a part of your holdbacks.”
quotes.author: Nate Green

quotes.quote: “How you take action and handle this next phase of your life will determine whether you achieve your lighthouse or fall back toward your suck.”
quotes.author: Nate Green

quotes.quote: “The story of your life and your future is waiting on you.”
quotes.author: Nate Green

quotes.quote: “You are the author of your story. Nobody else is writing it now but you.”
quotes.author: Nate Green

quotes.quote: “You are your best asset and the number one tool to get you to your greatest success.”
quotes.author: Nate Green

quotes.quote: “If you want to fly, you have to strengthen your wings.”
quotes.author: Nate Green

quotes.quote: “The deeper that you have to dig to conquer the hardships in front of you, the more capable you will be to unlock your best future.”
quotes.author: Nate Green

quotes.quote: “The narrative will look completely different when you start wanting to design your own life, become dedicated to bettering your future, and strive to achieve the fullest version of what it can be”
quotes.author: Nate Green

quotes.quote: “You have to regain control of the authorship of your life and realize that no one else is going to write the story for you.”
quotes.author: Nate Green

quotes.quote: “Your story isn’t over as long as you have breath in your lungs. What will your story say?”
quotes.author: Nate Green

quotes.quote: “Acknowledge your position as the author, and determine what the next pages of your story are going to say.”
quotes.author: Nate Green

quotes.quote: “There is no sweet fellowship as having a true friend who will be there for you at all times: in times of victory, and in times of defeat, in times of success, and in times of sorrow, in times of plenty, and in times of scarcity, in times of sunshine and in times of darkness, in times of good health, and in times of sickness.”
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: “The fuel you need should come from the core of who you are and the driving forces that cannot be turned off. Surface-level reasons will fade, goals for monetary gain are short-lived, and you need to determine what factors ignite your hunger, fuel your passion, and turn you into an unstoppable force.”
quotes.author: Nate Green

quotes.quote: “Having a driving force to achieve your goals is not enough. You must connect with the why behind each goal to determine whether they will get you to the level of success your inner self will be satisfied with.”
quotes.author: Nate Green

quotes.quote: “Fear of failure as a tool used at the correct times to drive you in the right direction can be an incredible asset, but leaving it undefined can be extremely crippling and even a major holdback in your life”
quotes.author: Nate Green

quotes.quote: “The danger comes when you’re not willing to identify and accept the insecurities and fears in your life. How can you leverage what you’re not willing to acknowledge and face?”
quotes.author: Nate Green

quotes.quote: “Money itself does not bring the success you want and will not give you fulfillment. Right now, your lenses might be limited, and you might believe that money is the solution to all your problems and will satisfy your hunger and drive, but you will quickly find that there are deeper-rooted factors at hand.”
quotes.author: Nate Green

quotes.quote: “The most highly successful people I have met and worked with all have a major driving force based upon specific people or God in their lives”
quotes.author: Nate Green

quotes.quote: “In your life, some people need you to show up as the best version of yourself so you can provide security or a better future. Some people come to America to provide a better future for their families. Others dedicate themselves to earning multi-generational wealth to stop the cycle of poverty for their loved ones.”
quotes.author: Nate Green

quotes.quote: “It’s the inner voice telling you that you are built for more, the one that will never let you settle and is always driving you to push harder. You know you’re capable of so much more than you’re showing up as right now, and that voice drives you to always discover a greater version of who you are.”
quotes.author: Nate Green

quotes.quote: “You never want to limit your potential satisfaction, growth, and long-term happiness by always having to focus on the negativity from others from your past.”
quotes.author: Nate Green

quotes.quote: “The core fuel for your life should not come from your darkest places or past tormentors. It should not come from the foundation of pain from your past.”
quotes.author: Nate Green

quotes.quote: “Your future should be more than just proving others wrong. Your why and your lighthouse must be specific to you and developed from your life, your situation, your deep-rooted hunger, your past, your pain, your fears, and who you are built to be.”
quotes.author: Nate Green

quotes.quote: “The suck you are charging away from needs to stay behind you, and fully grasping your driving forces will make sure you are charging forward, dedicated to your lighthouse.”
quotes.author: Nate Green

quotes.quote: “Humility is the key to growth, and you must be ready to learn at every corner and from every issue, every relationship, every conversation, and every moment.”
quotes.author: Nate Green

quotes.quote: “A rock cannot absorb. It becomes complacent, unmoving, and stuck in its place. A sponge can take on and absorb, grow and expand, and adapt based on the climate around it.”
quotes.author: Nate Green

quotes.quote: “Your future, your goals, and everything you set in motion should always be based on what you are built to be and focused on the greatest version of what you can become.”
quotes.author: Nate Green

quotes.quote: “The people around you don’t feel the same calling, hunger, drive, and ambition that is inside you. They don’t have to live your life, walk your road, and be accountable for your actions.”
quotes.author: Nate Green

quotes.quote: “Don’t limit your sources of insight to those who harbor preconceived ideas or expectations of you”
quotes.author: Nate Green

quotes.quote: “You are your greatest asset and your best tool, and you must fully understand how to utilize, maximize, and develop yourself.”
quotes.author: Nate Green

quotes.quote: “The better you understand who you are and what you are built for, the more focused you can be in taking actions that are actually going to give you momentum toward your success rather than leaving you feeling burned out in a rat race.”
quotes.author: Nate Green

quotes.quote: “Your life is now a train moving swiftly down the tracks you are laying, but most of the time, you are moving too fast and barely putting down tracks in front of you. The reality that must be faced is that you will never arrive at your desired destination if you don’t set your long-term goals, plan your required outcomes, and define the station for your train to reach. I call this setting your lighthouse, the guiding light you need in your life to connect all the elements I’ve discussed and set long-term goals you can spend every day chasing after and moving the needle toward”
quotes.author: Nate Green

quotes.quote: “Your lighthouse should not be achievable in your current moment or based on your current knowledge or capabilities. It must be based upon the potential that is reachable only through developing your best skills and abilities. Think about how much more you will be able to accomplish as you compound your growth and work through the process of bettering yourself.”
quotes.author: Nate Green

quotes.quote: “For a relationship to thrive, there must be an equal exchange of giving and receiving.”
quotes.author: Prerna Yadav

quotes.quote: “Rihanna is a celebrity who really stands to represent Cocoa and Black Women...and all other races and people too. A role model who lives what she says, wears what she sells, and raw about who she is. She's the definition of the word, "authentic"!”
quotes.author: Mitta Xinindlu

quotes.quote: “Rihanna is a celebrity who really stands to represent Cocoa and Black Women...and all other races and people too. A role model who lives what she says, wears what she sells, and is raw about who she is. She's the definition of the word, "authentic"!”
quotes.author: Mitta Xinindlu

quotes.quote: “The light of a positive attitude can pierce the darkest night.”
quotes.author: Aloo Denish Obiero

quotes.quote: “Justice is a path that is not driven by the greed of today, but which can foresee the losses of tomorrow.”
quotes.author: Bhuwan Ribhu

quotes.quote: “Justice needs to be internalized into the consciousness of the society, in its conscience and its practice.”
quotes.author: Bhuwan Ribhu

quotes.quote: “Justivism needs to be the new pursuit and path for humanity to love and care, to nurture and grow, walk together not by force but by choice, and to Be Just.”
quotes.author: Bhuwan Ribhu

quotes.quote: “Follow the path of being just, the path of justice, and laws and policies will eventually find a way to be formed, or reformed”
quotes.author: Bhuwan Ribhu

quotes.quote: “Justice, like love, is a thing to be practiced and society’s end goal must be to achieve justness. The path itself should be of justness.”
quotes.author: Bhuwan Ribhu

quotes.quote: “The true mettle of a society is in how it responds to its own failures, and accepts that a wrong to one is a wrong to all, and how there is a zero tolerance to crime.”
quotes.author: Bhuwan Ribhu

quotes.quote: “It is time to call this ineffectiveness, this delay in the delivery of justice what it really is – a crime, and this continuous wrong should be declared a criminal act as such by law.”
quotes.author: Bhuwan Ribhu

quotes.quote: “Constitution needs to transcend from a piece of paper into the justice that is in the conscience of the society.”
quotes.author: Bhuwan Ribhu

quotes.quote: “History is written from the perspective of the victor, but told in legends from the perspective of the just.”
quotes.author: Bhuwan Ribhu

quotes.quote: “Justice is a sense of security found in each one of us.”
quotes.author: Bhuwan Ribhu

quotes.quote: “We, as a society, need to go back to our origins – to the seeds of justice that exist within us all.”
quotes.author: Bhuwan Ribhu

quotes.quote: “Justice, like love, is a feeling that can’t be limited to a definition.”
quotes.author: Bhuwan Ribhu

quotes.quote: “Society needs to seek accountability of the people it has appointed to guard itself.”
quotes.author: Bhuwan Ribhu

quotes.quote: “Delays in the completion of legal process need to be made accountable as a crime itself.”
quotes.author: Bhuwan Ribhu

quotes.quote: “Law alone is sometimes insufficient to ensure justice.”
quotes.author: Bhuwan Ribhu

quotes.quote: “The Universe is bigger than our worldly politics.”
quotes.author: Mitta Xinindlu

quotes.quote: “The pinnacle of beauty is kindness.”
quotes.author: Aloo Denish Obiero

quotes.quote: “In simplicity lies the elegance of true beauty.”
quotes.author: Aloo Denish Obiero

quotes.quote: “Adaptability is the secret weapon of a resilient business.”
quotes.author: Aloo Denish Obiero

quotes.quote: “You can dig a treasure not only below the ground, but it is also within your body, in your heart, and in your mind.”
quotes.author: Lorenzo "Larry" Y. Rubinos Sr.

quotes.quote: “Those who wait for perfect certainty miss the magic of chance.”
quotes.author: Aloo Denish Obiero

quotes.quote: “You are sitting at your crossroads right now, and two different versions of you can emerge in this next phase of your life. You can choose either the complacent, settled, comfort-seeking, easy-road-chasing, and excuse-making version or the relentless, hungry, dedicated, challenge-facing, risk-taking, reality-checking, and constantly adapting version.”
quotes.author: Nate Green

quotes.quote: “I came to think of poverty of speech as a reflection of the richness of the mind, giving it time to explore and develop each thought.”
quotes.author: J. Lam

quotes.quote: “Either you can let your suck define who you are, or you can break free and write the story of your future and success.”
quotes.author: Nate Green

quotes.quote: “The seasons of our lives are full of hardships and unknowns, but we can control our response to these challenges.”
quotes.author: Nate Green

quotes.quote: “The fire in me was ignited when I was young and has never been extinguished”
quotes.author: Nate Green

quotes.quote: “Success and money are defined early in our lives before we even understand it.”
quotes.author: Nate Green

quotes.quote: “Money is a tool, not an outcome. It brings experience, stability, and specific lifestyles. But when you use it toward your suck, it will all be useless.”
quotes.author: Nate Green

quotes.quote: “Embrace risk-taking: Challenge yourself to take calculated risks, whether it’s trying a new approach at work or taking on a new hobby that stretches your abilities.”
quotes.author: J. Edwards Holt

quotes.quote: “Your suck is personal. It’s the complacency and comfort and the fears, insecurities, and excuses that keep you from becoming the best version of yourself. You must do the work and determine precisely what your suck looks like. This will require you to work through the deep-rooted aspects of your life and push yourself to be open to the process”
quotes.author: Nate Green

quotes.quote: “The more open and honest you are about your suck, the greater the long-term outcome you’ll be able to achieve.”
quotes.author: Nate Green

quotes.quote: “There is no shortcut to defining your suck and your lighthouse, and there are going to be moments when you want to shut down and crawl back into the comfort zone that will become your suck.”
quotes.author: Nate Green

quotes.quote: “People are more focused on trying to look successful than doing the work required and grinding through the process to actually become successful.”
quotes.author: Nate Green

quotes.quote: “To achieve greatness and success and become the person you are called to be, you have to remain in a state of learning and adaptation.”
quotes.author: Nate Green

quotes.quote: “You are built for so much more than you’re currently allowing yourself to be.”
quotes.author: Nate Green

quotes.quote: “The challenges and difficulties in life will derail your progress and development unless you relentlessly charge forward and never let the easy roads, simple paths, complacency, and security pull you back toward the suck that you know you need to run from.”
quotes.author: Nate Green

quotes.quote: “Realizing you are called to be so much more than you are now is something that every highly driven, motivated, and dedicated individual wrestles with.”
quotes.author: Nate Green

quotes.quote: “You have to acknowledge and show up as the person you’re intended to be—despite the hurt, the insecurities, the failures, the fears, and the challenges you’ve had to face.”
quotes.author: Nate Green

quotes.quote: “You are at a catalyst point in your life, you can choose to settle for the easy roads, or you can chase the future that you know you’re capable of having.”
quotes.author: Nate Green

quotes.quote: “The roadmap is right in front of you, and your suck can finally be behind you if you execute the plans developed throughout this book.”
quotes.author: Nate Green

quotes.quote: “The reality is that your lens is filled with cracks and fractures. For some, it may even be completely broken. You may not see yourself as you really are. You may not see your strengths, capabilities, abilities, and skill sets”
quotes.author: Nate Green

quotes.quote: “Your past is chock-full of lens-shaping and lens-cracking experiences. They start at a young age, and you must connect to some of the core issues from your family, your childhood, and your life in general”
quotes.author: Nate Green

quotes.quote: “You have to be willing to take on your own challenges, make your own decisions, and follow your dreams.”
quotes.author: Nate Green

quotes.quote: “Your future is built on who you are and not their feelings or holdbacks.”
quotes.author: Nate Green

quotes.quote: “The fractures or cracks in your lenses make it difficult to see your potential.”
quotes.author: Nate Green

quotes.quote: “The grind is nothing but positive when you know why you’re grinding and the outcome you’re chasing”
quotes.author: Nate Green

quotes.quote: “The same is true for your life—the grind is just a part of your progress toward success and a better future. The grind is not the suck. Instead, it is your escape from your suck.”
quotes.author: Nate Green

quotes.quote: “The decision to run from your suck is the easy part—staying focused on your lighthouse and putting in the daily grind to suck less and do better is where those who will succeed and those who accept failure will part ways.”
quotes.author: Nate Green

quotes.quote: “From the moment that you opened your eyes and took your first breath your story began.”
quotes.author: Nate Green

quotes.quote: “The transition of ownership for the authorship of your life is handed off to you whether you are ready or not and no one is left to blame for what occurs in the rest of your story but you.”
quotes.author: Nate Green

quotes.quote: “The amazing part about being the author of your own life is that you can adjust the way circumstances are viewed, handled, and expressed.”
quotes.author: Nate Green

quotes.quote: “Your story does not end in those moments, hardships, or challenges—they are just chapters, small parts of the entire adventure of your life.”
quotes.author: Nate Green

quotes.quote: “It’s up to you to navigate the obstacles and the difficulties and constantly drive toward success despite all odds against you.
quotes.author: Nate Green

quotes.quote: “There is both a calming and scary realization that comes with knowing you only have one story to write in your life.”
quotes.author: Nate Green

quotes.quote: “Take on your life head-on and create a story that you are excited to be living. Be relentless during the hard times, humble during triumphs, and always hungry for the best version of yourself to show up each and every day.”
quotes.author: Nate Green

quotes.quote: “The stories of others who have pushed past their hardships and difficulties to become great should be terrific encouragement for whatever situation you are facing and whatever part of your story you have to write yourself through.”
quotes.author: Nate Green

quotes.quote: “If they remain with you during a storm, remain with them after the storm.”
quotes.author: Nkwachukwu Ogbuagu

quotes.quote: “Beloved, let each individual stand resolute in their divine calling. Whatever path one is summoned to walk, let it be honored as a sacred undertaking, for it is not the nature of the work itself that determines its holiness but rather the intention and purpose behind it.”
quotes.author: Bishop W.F. Houston Jr.

quotes.quote: “Beloved, it is within the crucible of adversity that a man's true strength is forged, for it is through the fiery trials of life's struggles that one uncovers the depths of one's resilience.”
quotes.author: Bishop W.F. Houston Jr.

quotes.quote: “Beloved, it is when one transitions from the realm of passive observation to the active pursuit of divine connection that the forces of opposition are stirred, for in the very act of praising and worshiping the Almighty, the gates of chaos are flung open, unleashing the tempestuous winds of resistance.”
quotes.author: Bishop W.F. Houston Jr.

quotes.quote: “From the ashes of failure, sorrow, hardship, and loss, the most exquisite souls arise, their journey marked by empathy and humility. Those who have plumbed the depths of despair and emerged, transformed, possess an ineffable beauty of spirit that cannot be denied. They, tempered by adversity, radiate empathy, humility, and a profound reverence for life, serving as beacons of inspiration to all who behold them. Remember, dear ones, the most exquisite spirits are not born of idyllic circumstances but are forged in the crucible of life's trials.”
quotes.author: Bishop W.F. Houston Jr.

quotes.quote: “Beloved, it is in the triumph over adversity that life reveals its profound fascination, and in the transcendence of its obstacles that we discover its true worth. For it is through the crucible of challenge that we are tempered, and in the overcoming of hardship that we find the essence of our existence.”
quotes.author: Bishop W.F. Houston Jr.

quotes.quote: “Beloved, the faithful do not toil to attain celestial bliss; rather, they embark on a transformative journey to cultivate the very essence of heaven within themselves. Through this odyssey, the burdens of pride, conceit, selfishness, insecurity, hate, and worry are relinquished, as the virtues of humility, gratitude, love, and joy are embraced, thereby transfiguring the human experience into a reflection of the divine.”
quotes.author: Bishop W.F. Houston Jr.

quotes.quote: “A new week has commenced, and we face new days filled with experiences yet to be discovered, and moments yet to be adventured, some good and some inevitably challenging. As we look forward to the week, let’s take heed from one of the many big lessons the smaller things in nature provide, and strive in stride like the resilient wildflowers that begin each day by turning to face the rolling sunrise.”
quotes.author: Marie Helen Abramyan

quotes.quote: “Time is and it isn’t… It can be your greatest enemy or your greatest friend. But it all depends on you.”
quotes.author: iLana Markarov

quotes.quote: “An age is just an indication that there's more to be done.”
quotes.author: Mitta Xinindlu

quotes.quote: “When you choose to keep silent infront of toxic people because you knew them already. You just don’t wanna humiliate them with the group. It’s called decent, class, sexy, expensive, valuable NOT CHEAP”
quotes.author: Fatima Nacana

quotes.quote: “The hardest step is the steepest. The most painful feeling is the deepest. Quitting is always the easiest option, and most of us fall for it. So when you can hardly bear it, don't quit. The next step forward is the most important.”
quotes.author: Nelson M. Lubao

quotes.quote: “Often, it's the small things in life that bring the greatest joy.”
quotes.author: Bishop W.F. Houston Jr.

quotes.quote: “Beloved, giving a license to the cravings of this world will destroy your driven enthusiasm to live.
quotes.author: Bishop W.F. Houston Jr.

quotes.quote: “Beloved, it is in the crucible of life's challenges that the true splendor of existence is unveiled, for it is through the act of conquering seemingly insurmountable obstacles that one imbues their journey with meaning, transforming mere existence into a profound and worthwhile odyssey.”
quotes.author: Bishop W.F. Houston Jr.

quotes.quote: “Beloved, it is in the sanctity of our spiritual and religious communities that we find the ultimate refuge from the forces of darkness that pervade our world. As long as we persist in a state of egocentrism, materialism, and spiritual cynicism, our capacity to effect positive change shall remain woefully compromised, for it is only through a transcendent and magnanimous relationship with the divine that we may access the wellspring of virtue necessary to transform the world around us.”
quotes.author: Bishop W.F. Houston Jr.

quotes.quote: “Beloved, our tolerance, prohibitions, and enforcements are the silent instructors through which we impart the profound lessons of respect. They are the unseen pedagogues that shape the boundaries of reverence, molding the sacred space in which honor resides. In the permissive expanse of what we allow, we etch the contours of esteem's terrain. Each indulgence scripts the depths to which regard may traverse. Conversely, in the fertile void of our prohibitions, we plant the seeds of deference. What we forbid inscribes the hallowed ground where veneration takes root and flourishes. Yet we chisel the definitive form of respect through the decisive hand of enforcement. Each exercised injunction is a chisel's strike, gradually giving rise to respect's exquisite visage. Thus, the triadic praxis of tolerance, prohibition, and enforcement weaves the intricate tapestry upon which the symphony of regard eternally echoes. Through this debate, we endlessly sculpt the sacred ethos of honor to which we all inescapably bow.”
quotes.author: Bishop W.F. Houston Jr.

quotes.quote: “Beloved, it is at the threshold of our most astounding triumphs that we invariably find ourselves confronted by the most formidable of adversaries, for the cosmos invariably demands that we demonstrate our worthiness for the glories that await us by surmounting the most daunting of challenges.”
quotes.author: Bishop W.F. Houston Jr.

quotes.quote: “Nature has taken a deep autumnal breath, and with gusting sighs of relief has shed away the year’s heft that’s now in the rear view. Tumbling away with strewn leaves are the remnants of days gone by. Storms have been weathered, dry spells overcome, and harsh winds survived, nature is now moving forward stronger. With newly sown seeds hope is laying dormant ready to forge ahead in the ethereal sunlight, come spring. Not loosing a beat, but rising back up rejoining the rhythm and restarting the journey. A beautiful lesson in resilience at play.”
quotes.author: Marie Helen Abramyan

quotes.quote: “After all the lies and the deception have been successfully challenged in your favour, I hope that you will, at least, find comfort in the truth.”
quotes.author: Mitta Xinindlu

quotes.quote: “So much about peace is learned in battle”
quotes.author: Dean Cocozza

quotes.quote: “Life never gives you more than you are presently equipped to handle. The moment it does, you're already dead.”
quotes.author: Austin Steel

quotes.quote: “Your worth is not measured in productivity.”
quotes.author: Dani Donovan

quotes.quote: “The Anti-Planner is designed to help you develop self-awareness skills to identify which negative emotions are behind why you're procrastinating, and provides strategies that address the actual root cause of the problem--so you can stop putting stuff off (and start kicking some butt).”
quotes.author: Dani Donovan

quotes.quote: “There's no magical, one-size-fits-all solution for getting unstuck (trust me, I've tried pretty much everything). But building self-awareness skills to recognize when and why you're getting stuck makes a huge difference. Once you've got that down, you'll be able to better identify what feeling is holding you back from taking care of The Thing (and how to start moving forward).”
quotes.author: Dani Donovan

quotes.quote: “In a world where gratitude thrives, parents' love forever survives. "FOREVER GRATEFUL", a book that strives to honour the role parents play in our lives.”
quotes.author: Shujath Hussain

quotes.quote: “Our life begins with parents and our life ends with parents, we wouldn't have existed without them.”
quotes.author: Shujath Hussain

quotes.quote: “Parents are the roots that give us wings to fly, Forever Grateful, Forever in Our Hearts.”
quotes.author: Shujath Hussain

quotes.quote: “God restores every stolen moment. Always!”
quotes.author: Mitta Xinindlu

quotes.quote: “For every moment stolen from you,
quotes.author: Mitta Xinindlu

quotes.quote: “They say curiosity killed the cat but I have rather always found it interesting”
quotes.author: Dipak Patel

quotes.quote: “Some people would give anything to be where you are and have what you have.”
quotes.author: Berlyn Hayes

quotes.quote: “Because forgiveness isn't about deserving. Everyone qualifies for it, despite the terrible things they do.”
quotes.author: Berlyn Hayes

quotes.quote: “Nie chodzi o to, że chcesz wypisać się z życia. [...] Chodzi o to, że chcesz do niego wrócić.”
quotes.author: Bonnie Garmus

quotes.quote: “A horse in a stall is safe, but that is not what horses are made for.”
quotes.author: Tobey Pearl

quotes.quote: “With the right attitude, the impossible becomes merely challenging.”
quotes.author: Aloo Denish Obiero

quotes.quote: “They were betting on my downfall, but they fell down while betting. And I'm still standing.”
quotes.author: Mitta Xinindlu

quotes.quote: “What makes the moon gain more followers at night and the sun goes viral during the day is by maintaining their standards.”
quotes.author: Luckson T Mabade

quotes.quote: “I have nothing to give; just life lessons from a tough life lived.”
quotes.author: Mitta Xinindlu

quotes.quote: “Becoming the person you are meant to be is a step-by-step process of learning to trust yourself every day with renewed energy.”
quotes.author: Geoffrey A. Cole

quotes.quote: “They were betting on my downfall, but they fell down while betting on it. And I'm still standing.”
quotes.author: Mitta Xinindlu

quotes.quote: “Respect isn't measured by the speed you reached, but by the miles you've covered.”
quotes.author: Sreeraj R

quotes.quote: “The moon does not look lonely because its light keeps it company. When lonely, let your thoughts keep you company.”
quotes.author: Nkwachukwu Ogbuagu

quotes.quote: “It's an honour to know that my pen is a healing device.”
quotes.author: Mitta Xinindlu

quotes.quote: “Patience is virtue for those who truly conquer. But it must be coupled with a dedicated effort. In fact, animals use this strategy in hunting, because they know that patience and dedication pay off.”
quotes.author: Mitta Xinindlu

quotes.quote: “Patience is a virtue for those who truly conquer. But it must be coupled with a dedicated effort. In fact, animals use this strategy in hunting, because they know that patience and dedication pay off.”
quotes.author: Mitta Xinindlu

quotes.quote: “Weakness is recognizing the strengths you have yet to develop.”
quotes.author: Berlyn Hayes

quotes.quote: “However, it does no good for me to talk or even write about it if I'm not going to live it every day.”
quotes.author: Larry Nielsen

quotes.quote: “Your future self deserves the wisdom of your present reflections.”
quotes.author: Erden Tuzunkan

quotes.quote: “Even on your worst days,
quotes.author: Kiera Davis

quotes.quote: “The more you create ... the more you want to create because creativity comes from a place of abundance.”
quotes.author: Ellen Palestrant

quotes.quote: “If fighting for justice makes you lose followers, you should celebrate. Such a loss becomes one of your biggest wins in this lifetime.”
quotes.author: Mitta Xinindlu

quotes.quote: “If you lose five followers because you're fighting for the rights of one person, that's a win. However, if you gain five followers because you're suppressing the rights of one person, that's a loss.”
quotes.author: Mitta Xinindlu

quotes.quote: “Through love, we're going to heal one relationship at a time.”
quotes.author: Mitta Xinindlu

quotes.quote: “At times the people who've hurt us cannot give us the bandages to heal ourselves. But through own healing, they can reflect on their actions and self correct; and without us lifting even a finger. It's a strange way how the human dynamics work at times.”
quotes.author: Mitta Xinindlu

quotes.quote: “Excellence is in our beliefs and focused actions.”
quotes.author: Abhishek Budhraja

quotes.quote: “The difference between falling short or fulfilling your true potential is how well you’ve designed your life”
quotes.author: Abhishek Budhraja

quotes.quote: “Once you accept that people don't belong to you, happiness finds you in full.”
quotes.author: Mitta Xinindlu

quotes.quote: “Have the right intentions, and the best solutions will come to you.”
quotes.author: Mitta Xinindlu

quotes.quote: “Positive attitude is the lens through which we transform challenges into opportunities.”
quotes.author: Aloo Denish Obiero

quotes.quote: “Some people commit, not for love, but for stability.”
quotes.author: Mitta Xinindlu

quotes.quote: “Being alone" is a state while "Loneliness"... is just a state of mind.”
quotes.author: Mahin Kapur

quotes.quote: “The secret to having a lot of money is solving a lot of problems, or having solutions to the problems of a lot of people.”
quotes.author: Oluronke M. Bello

quotes.quote: “My pen is my strength.”

quotes.quote: “To the Stoics, a good life meant living in accordance with nature, both universal nature – accepting the world for what it is, not resisting it because we think it should be different – and our own nature as human beings.”
quotes.author: Alexander Zenon

quotes.quote: “We human beings are not hive animals. We aren’t like bees or ants who just work constantly for the good of the community.”
quotes.author: Alexander Zenon

quotes.quote: “Tomorrow will arrive, come what may. The sun will rise, as it has always done, and will set in the evening when nature commands it.”
quotes.author: Alexander Zenon

quotes.quote: “The events that may befall you tomorrow are not new or novel, and the emotions that you will experience have been felt by countless others throughout the crashing torrent of time.
quotes.author: Alexander Zenon

quotes.quote: “Try to be happy at every step rather than waiting for your goals becuase that will be everlasting and not dependent on the output.”
quotes.author: James Clear

quotes.quote: “Make your habit your identity.”
quotes.author: James Clear

quotes.quote: “We often think that habits restricts us whereas habits free us from unnecessary thinking.”
quotes.author: James Clear

quotes.quote: “I'm a writer, not an editor. So if I make a typo or a mistake, take it as part of the job.”
quotes.author: Mitta Xinindlu

quotes.quote: “I'm heading back home.
quotes.author: Rabson Kashamba

quotes.quote: “Self-care is so much more than our actions. It can be both caring for self and caring about self.
quotes.author: E. Ballay

quotes.quote: “Sometimes we have to stop at certain stations before reaching the destination. But don't settle in, keep going.”
quotes.author: Mitta Xinindlu

quotes.quote: “Life is asking us to be flexible. I had to reinvent myself a hundred times just to find some peace of mind. Without flexibility, I would have been stuck in horrible situations.”
quotes.author: Mitta Xinindlu

quotes.quote: “Life is asking us to be flexible. Without flexibility, I would have been stuck in horrible situations.”
quotes.author: Mitta Xinindlu

quotes.quote: “I had to reinvent myself a hundred times just to find some peace of mind.”
quotes.author: Mitta Xinindlu

quotes.quote: “The road that I've walked has required extreme patience and a bit of tough skin. I feel challenged yet solidified.”
quotes.author: Mitta Xinindlu

quotes.quote: “Children are often our ancestors coming back through us.”
quotes.author: Mitta Xinindlu

quotes.quote: “As the still dawn breaks and first light graces the horizon, we humans are presented with tremendous opportunity. We are gifted with a fresh start, a blank canvas upon which we can paint however we choose.”
quotes.author: Alexander Zenon

quotes.quote: “When we first wake up our minds are clear, which makes this the opportune time to direct our focus inwards, to organize our thoughts and to set our daily intentions through a few moments of meditation. Our duties and obligations have not yet begun to crowd our schedule, and the clarity of the dawn creates an open, undistracted mental space.”
quotes.author: Alexander Zenon

quotes.quote: “By meditating on our thoughts, feelings, and desires, we are encouraging a sense of self-awareness and self-mastery. We observe the whimsical and impulsive movements of our mind without getting caught up in them, and in doing so we develop a greater understanding of ourselves.”
quotes.author: Alexander Zenon

quotes.quote: “We are existing in a thin sliver of light between two potentially infinite portions of darkness.”
quotes.author: Alexander Zenon

quotes.quote: “Fly high like an eagle, but stay grounded like a lotus.”
quotes.author: Vinaya

quotes.quote: “First believe in yourself, rest will follow.”
quotes.author: Vinaya

quotes.quote: “We have all envisioned that ideal, greatest version of ourselves. The grand vision of our loftiest aspirations. It’s not as though there is some labyrinthine matrix stopping you, you have the power to materialize him–you simply choose not to.”
quotes.author: Paul Uponi

quotes.quote: “There is no 'right side of history', there is only their side, and yours.”
quotes.author: Holden R. Snow

quotes.quote: “I don't know my stand but when everything is blurred and nothing seems right, just submit.”
quotes.author: Viktor E. Frankl

quotes.quote: “Si ingin sembuh, dari lukanya, dari hidupnya yang selama ini ia nikmati meski yang disuguhkan hari - secangkir getir, adonan kemarahan dan kebencian, dan pedas yang lahir dari mulut-mulut jahat orang di sekitarnya. - Piring Bahagia Si dan Bi”
quotes.author: Dian Pertiwi Josua

quotes.quote: “Ternyata, orang bijak itu mereka yang bisa menerima keadaan dengan enggak mudah menyerah. Mereka yang tetap tumbuh meski terinjak seperti rerumputan. Mereka yang melihat hidup enggak pakai kacamata kuda. - Piring Bahagia Si dan Bi”
quotes.author: Dian Pertiwi Josua

quotes.quote: “Kamu bikin aku mengerti, kadang terlalu kepedean itu, perlu juga sih. Rendah hati harus, rendah diri jangan. - Piring Bahagia Si dan Bi”
quotes.author: Dian Pertiwi Josua

quotes.quote: “Bersaing membuat jalan hidupnya lebih cepat sampai tujuan. Berkolaborasi membuat segala rintangan menjadi ringan. - Piring Bahagia Si dan Bi”
quotes.author: Dian Pertiwi Josua

quotes.quote: “Manusia ‘kan memang juara dalam hidupnya masing-masing. Ada yang lebih penting. Mereka sekarang mengerti, sejak lahir ke dunia, mereka sudah menang bersaing dari sel telur lainnya. - Piring Bahagia Si dan Bi”
quotes.author: Dian Pertiwi Josua

quotes.quote: “Tuhan enggak pernah membiarkan manusia hidup untuk kalah, meski setiap harinya manusia harus digeprek, dipukul, dilapisi tepung, dan dipanaskan dalam penggorengan penuh minyak agar matang sekaligus layak dinikmati. Enggak apaapa kalau pernah lelah asal pantang menyerah. - Piring Bahagia Si dan Bi”
quotes.author: Dian Pertiwi Josua

quotes.quote: “Dari mana kita tahu yang benar, kalau tidak pernah belajar dari kesalahan? Selagi muda, biar saja. Habiskan jatah kegagalan, sebelum terbit masa kesuksesan. - Piring Bahagia Si dan Bi”
quotes.author: Dian Pertiwi Josua

quotes.quote: “Si selalu saja merayakan hal kecil yang ia dapat dengan syukur dan sederhana. Si, selalu punya cara untuk menunjukkan bahwa piring-piring yang ia nikmati, berisi kebahagiaan yang penuh. Tanpa harus sibuk melihat piring orang lain. - Piring Bahagia Si dan Bi”
quotes.author: Dian Pertiwi Josua

quotes.quote: “Kita sudah melakukan usaha terbaik dari yang kita bisa. Tuhan pasti kasih hasil yang jauh lebih baik dari yang kita duga - Piring Bahagia Si dan Bi”
quotes.author: Dian Pertiwi Josua

quotes.quote: “Yesha benar. Membiarkan Si jadi seekor burung elang yang terus berjalan sendirian. Ia sekarang jadi singa hutan, juara dalam tiap kehidupan. Yesha merasa tepat, tidak selalu
quotes.author: Dian Pertiwi Josua

quotes.quote: “Setahuku, kaum kakak biasanya paling segalanya, pemarah, dan menyebalkan. Ketika sedang jalan berdua antara kakak beradik, lihat saja yang tubuhnya lebih pendek. Itu pasti kakaknya. Sudah banyak kutemukan - Piring Bahagia Si dan Bi”
quotes.author: Dian Pertiwi Josua

quotes.quote: “Ada ruang rasa yang tetap bisa dinikmati walau bentuknya berantakan. Pancong lumer setengah matang saja, masih enak dimakan. Manusia mau mencari sempurna? Sempurna itu enggak pernah ada. Yang ada perihal menerima dengan lapang dada. - Piring Bahagia Si dan Bi”
quotes.author: Dian Pertiwi Josua

quotes.quote: “Aku tahu, proses hidup Kak Si, ternyata enggak pernah mudah. Aku juga mengerti, sekarang kalau mau dapat sesuatu, dan mencapai banyak hal yang kita ingin, kita perlu berusaha. Semua enggak tiba-tiba ada - Piring Bahagia Si dan Bi”
quotes.author: Dian Pertiwi Josua

quotes.quote: “Orang itu maunya serba cepat. Mi instan ini saja panjang, keriting, dan ribet. Sama seperti proses hidup kita. Pasti butuh waktu yang enggak sebentar, berkelok, dan enggak semuanya lurus, apalagi berjalan mulus. - Piring Bahagia Si dan Bi”
quotes.author: Dian Pertiwi Josua

quotes.quote: “Yang pasti, semuanya seperti mi instan ini, biar instan, tetap saja perlu proses tanpa banyak protes. - Piring Bahagia Si dan Bi”
quotes.author: Dian Pertiwi Josua

quotes.quote: “Bisa jadi impian kita enggak sejalan dengan kenyataan.
quotes.author: Dian Pertiwi Josua

quotes.quote: “Kegagalan tidak pernah ada. Bukan gagal namanya, manusia memang harus belajar untuk menjadi lebih baik lagi dari kejadian-kejadian yang tidak seirama dengan keinginannya. - Piring Bahagia Si dan Bi”
quotes.author: Dian Pertiwi Josua

quotes.quote: “Create a life that brings inner contentment, not one merely designed for external admiration.”
quotes.author: Aloo Denish Obiero

quotes.quote: “A suitable opportunity will never be denied. If it's not given to you in the moment, assume that it's been postponed to a more suitable date. Never give up.”
quotes.author: Mitta Xinindlu

quotes.quote: “Why?"
quotes.author: MayaJ24

quotes.quote: “Acknowledging that my skin was, in fact, Cocoa as it is, would have destroyed their narrative about who I really was. Therefore they had to convince everyone (but mostly themselves) that my skin colour was black, which is obviously not. They wanted to lessen the value of my skin, my people, and my origins.”
quotes.author: Mitta Xinindlu

quotes.quote: “Friendship is the art of turning shared moments into timeless treasures.”
quotes.author: Aloo Denish Obiero

quotes.quote: “Once you set your standard, you become the standard.”

quotes.quote: “And when you clap for others you will hear applause for yourself too..”
quotes.author: Ritu Negi

quotes.quote: “Mothering ourselves means learning to love what we have given birth to by giving definition to, learning how to be both kind and demanding in the teeth of failure as well as in the face of success, and not misnaming either.”

quotes.quote: “Love is not sports, there's no need to compete.”
quotes.author: Mitta Xinindlu

quotes.quote: “I wish I were … I wish I had … I wish this never happened … I wish I could be … I wish I had chosen to … I wish I could accept myself … I wish I wish I wish! All of us wish things about ourselves and others, and how our life paths could be different. This mindset distracts us from our discomfort, but also prevents us from becoming who we most wish to be.”

quotes.quote: “When we embrace self-compassion, we embrace all the parts of who we are - the strengths and weaknesses, the joys and sorrows, the successes and failures. It's about shedding the armor of self-criticism and allowing ourselves to be vulnerable, just as we are, imperfect yet deserving of love and kindness.”

quotes.quote: “It's enough to put a man on his knees, but I kneel for no man, do you?”

quotes.quote: “Saying nothing must be saying something.”

quotes.quote: “I write these motivational messages every day, but guess what? I'm not some effortlessly enlightened soul. Not yet! I also wake up just like you, with battles to face & insecurities whispering. But here’s the thing: I wake up, face my demons & remind myself (hopefully you too): how strong, capable & freaking awesome I am.

quotes.quote: “Don't you dare settle for fine.”

quotes.quote: “If your business depends on you, you don’t own a business — you have a job. And it’s the worst job in the world because you’re working for a lunatic.”

quotes.quote: “Today, however, this period of egoistic exchange has ended. You cannot receive nor give for the sake of receiving anymore. But then how can we exist? What should we do?

quotes.quote: “Don’t talk bollocks.”

quotes.quote: “Passion is not something you can teach.”

quotes.quote: “Passion is the master of all disciplines.”

quotes.quote: “Passion is always attractive.”

quotes.quote: “Passion is one of the prime motivators and the best in the field of all the various disciplines.”

quotes.quote: “Never ignore heavy and sudden urges to fall asleep. Some important revelations and wins against enemies are found through sleep. The help is already within.”

Those may be for someone like the mighty Bhagirath, who will appear and liberate them all by bringing in Ganga-like virtues.”

quotes.quote: “Live before Learning.”
quotes.author: Sakshi Chopda

quotes.quote: “- I have two whole friends
quotes.author: Hajime Kamoshida

quotes.quote: “I’ve travelled miles to be here; to come and reach out to you. But right now, I’ll put my back towards this place which hems your shame. And I’ll send my feet towards the place where I think of you day in and day out. Where my thoughts dwell in sorrow, like a turnip growing within thorns. And I'll continue to do so until you find a word to say to me.”
quotes.author: Mitta Xinindlu

quotes.quote: “Many ordinary and extraordinary people have made fantastic changes in their lives by keeping

As this awareness takes root within you, you will become finely attuned to the natural FLOW of your life, embarking on a transformative and enlightening journey of self-discovery.”

quotes.quote: “In the ocean of life, swimming against the tide helps you thrive. Work hard, stay honest, and never stop learning to survive.

quotes.quote: “If your life becomes about death, are you still living?”

quotes.quote: “The words of the Qur’an are omnipresent—yet its spirit lies dormant.”

quotes.quote: “The Qur’an was not a book per se or any other kind of physical object, but rather an unfolding experience—its own unique category of living being.”

quotes.quote: “The words of the Qur’an are omnipresent—yet its spirit lies dormant,”
quotes.author: Mohamad Jebara

quotes.quote: “The critics…have it backward: The Qur’an is not the source of the Muslim world’s problems, but its untapped solution.”

quotes.quote: “Whether they're superior or inferior, older brothers are role models for their younger brothers. If the older brother takes the wrong path, the younger brothers can avoid it. And if I take the right path, my little brothers can follow behind.”

quotes.quote: “But you know... This was actually fun while it lasted. Humans, Jujutsu Sorcerers, Cursed Spirits... You're not bad compared to those I fought over the last thousand years. Stand proud. You're strong.”

quotes.quote: “Criticism is a misconception.
quotes.author: Emil Cioran

quotes.quote: “You asked why I'm tough. I'll tell you. It's because I didn't have someone to guide me, so I kept making mistakes. Nonetheless, I must walk ahead of my little brothers. That's why I'm strong.”
quotes.author: Gege Akutami

quotes.quote: “When you start with nothing, you learn to appreciate everything.”

quotes.quote: “I must always write this way. I must always feel – and deeply.”

quotes.quote: “Your days are numbered. Change your ways before it’s too late.”

quotes.quote: “To lead, you need to be equipped, to be equipped entails being passionate about a specific idea.”

quotes.quote: “Sorry, but you didn't love your brothers... And I can't understand that.”

quotes.quote: “If all your weekends are the same, that means you're not collecting experiences.”

quotes.quote: “You betcha! "Impossible" is just a fancy word for a challenge waiting to be conquered! So, let's roll up our sleeves, gather the dream team, and go on an adventure of endless possibilities. With a dash of determination and a sprinkle of "can-do" attitude, we'll show the world that there's nothing we can't achieve!”
quotes.author: lifeispositive.com

quotes.quote: “Oh, honey, "impossible" must be quaking in its boots 'cause we're here to crash its party! We're the dream-chasers, the rule-breakers, and the magic-makers. So, if you dare us to try, just watch us turn the impossible into our playground! Ready or not, here we come, turning dreams into reality, one witty step at a time!”
quotes.author: lifeispositive.com

quotes.quote: “If you lose it all, find yourself first.”

quotes.quote: “Life is a mural that you create. Every action you take is another brush stroke. Make yours beautiful.”

quotes.quote: “At difficult times, you must learn to say inside you: "The more the difficulties are the more I get excited, the more I get aroused and stimulated, the more I like winning and surpassing them! The more the merrier!”

quotes.quote: “You learn throughout your entire life, as long as you don’t get discouraged. Falling down happens to everyone but you need to get up immediately. Therefore put this well into your mind; you did not come to life to become a punching bag, you need to learn how to fight back. The mentality of a victim is not good. Learn how to be the victimizer of your ideals and not the victim of circumstances.”
quotes.author: Caden Manolis Archontakis

quotes.quote: “I might assume a different personality but until there, This is who I am, this is my Identity.”

quotes.quote: “Eu poderia assumir uma personalidade diferente, mas até lá este é quem eu sou, esta é a minha identidade.”

quotes.quote: “Like the ocean, your potential is vast and profound. Don't be afraid to explore the depths of your capabilities.”

quotes.quote: “My son, I've given you a unique name so that people stutter when they're saying it. A king deserves reverence when being addressed.”

quotes.quote: “Become all that you can, so all that you despise, never becomes all that you live by.”

quotes.quote: “If worlds can change, then words must change.”

quotes.quote: “There's power in looking silly and not caring that you do.”

quotes.quote: “Life calls us to where we need to be, and not where we want to be. It's that simple.”

quotes.quote: “First, you have to push people’s boundaries and not feel bad about it. No one is going to give you anything if you don’t ask for it.”
quotes.author: Taylor Jenkins Reid

quotes.quote: “The past is the past, but if you are overanalyzing it or trying to repeat it, you are going to get stuck.”
quotes.author: Chris Evans

quotes.quote: “How soon not now becomes never.”
quotes.author: Martin Luther

quotes.quote: “Someone told me the morning runs are the best healings and I was really curious to to know and yes he was right
quotes.author: Devashish kaushik

quotes.quote: “You can't control how you're loved. Otherwise you will only get the control and not the love.”
quotes.author: Mitta Xinindlu

quotes.quote: “It was in 2020 that I started posting my poetry online. The world was too lonely and scared then, and I wanted to see if my words could be of any help.”

quotes.quote: “A Leo is not after a status. A Leo is the status.”

quotes.quote: “You doubt your value. Do not run from who you are.”

quotes.quote: “If you want to know death -- die! That is the only way to know. If you want to know life -- live!' You are alive but not living, and you will die and you will not die... because everything is lukewarm in you. You live? -- not exactly; you just drag. Somehow, somehow you pull yourself along.
quotes.author: Osho

quotes.quote: “In language, everything lost is also something gained. Everything gained is also something lost. Every way of seeing is also a way of not seeing.”
quotes.author: Gregory Coles

quotes.quote: “I define myself as a love lover. Love lovers are people who wish others nothing but happy and healthy love lives.”

quotes.quote: “The best version of me will be the day I leave this earth. Challenging myself every day is just part of the ascent to the apex of my journey.”
