quotes.quote: “Sometimes you have to lose all you have to find out who you truly are.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “To shine your brightest light is to be who you truly are.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “What do we live for, if it is not to make life less difficult for each other?”
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: “Tears are words that need to be written.”
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: “Be thankful for everything that happens in your life; it’s all an experience.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “The important thing to you is not how many years in your life, but how much life in your years!”
quotes.author: Edward J. Stieglitz

quotes.quote: “I meant what I said and I said what I meant. An elephant's faithful one-hundred percent!”
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.quote: “Remember, darkness does not always equate to evil, just as light does not always bring good.”
quotes.author: P.C. Cast

quotes.quote: “You never change your life until you step out of your comfort zone; change begins at the end of your comfort zone.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “I must be a mermaid, Rango. I have no fear of depths and a great fear of shallow living.”
quotes.author: Anais Nin

quotes.quote: “Do not let the memories of your past limit the potential of your future. There are no limits to what you can achieve on your journey through life, except in your mind.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “When I was about eight, I decided that the most wonderful thing, next to a human being, was a book.”
quotes.author: Margaret Walker

quotes.quote: “The brick walls are there for a reason. The brick walls are not there to keep us out. The brick walls are there to give us a chance to show how badly we want something. Because the brick walls are there to stop the people who don’t want it badly enough. They’re there to stop the other people.”
quotes.author: Randy Pausch

quotes.quote: “Stop comparing yourself to other people, just choose to be happy and live your own life.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “please believe that things are good with me, and even when they're not, they will be soon enough. And i will always believe the same about you.”
quotes.author: Stephen Chbosky

quotes.quote: “Let the improvement of yourself keep you so busy that you have no time to criticize others.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “There must be those among whom we can sit down and weep and still be counted as warriors.”
quotes.author: Adrienne Rich

quotes.quote: “Never be bullied into silence. Never allow yourself to be made a victim. Accept no one's definition of your life, but define yourself.”
quotes.author: Harvey Fierstein

quotes.quote: “When one tugs at a single thing in nature, he finds it attached to the rest of the world.”
quotes.author: John Muir

quotes.quote: “A woman's heart should be so hidden in God that a man has to seek Him just to find her.”
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: “So many people walk around with a meaningless life. They seem half-asleep, even when they're busy doing things they think are important. This is because they're chasing the wrong things. The way you get meaning into your life is to devote yourself to loving others, devote yourself to your community around you, and devote yourself to creating something that gives you purpose and meaning.”
quotes.author: Mitch Albom

quotes.quote: “It is not the size of the dog in the fight that counts, but the fight in the dog that wins.”
quotes.author: Arthur G. Lewis

quotes.quote: “Atticus, he was real nice."
quotes.author: Harper Lee

quotes.quote: “To-morrow, and to-morrow, and to-morrow,
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: “You are not rich until you have a rich heart.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “Life is too short to waste any amount of time on wondering what other people think about you. In the first place, if they had better things going on in their lives, they wouldn't have the time to sit around and talk about you. What's important to me is not others' opinions of me, but what's important to me is my opinion of myself.”
quotes.author: C. JoyBell C.

quotes.quote: “A man who dares to waste one hour of time has not discovered the value of life.”
quotes.author: Charles Darwin

quotes.quote: “Great heroes need great sorrows and burdens, or half their greatness goes unnoticed. It is all part of the fairy tale.”
quotes.author: Peter S. Beagle

quotes.quote: “Only people who are capable of loving strongly can also suffer great sorrow, but this same necessity of loving serves to counteract their grief and heals them.”
quotes.author: Leo Tolstoy

quotes.quote: “Anyone can hide. Facing up to things, working through them, that's what makes you strong.”
quotes.author: Sarah Dessen

quotes.quote: “I kept always two books in my pocket, one to read, one to write in.”
quotes.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quotes.quote: “In the end
quotes.author: Jack Kornfield

quotes.quote: “The question is not what you look at, but what you see.”
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: “I'd rather be hated for who I am, than loved for who I am not.”
quotes.author: Kurt Cobain

quotes.quote: “For me, I am driven by two main philosophies: know more today about the world than I knew yesterday and lessen the suffering of others. You'd be surprised how far that gets you.”
quotes.author: Neil deGrasse Tyson

quotes.quote: “Parents can only give good advice or put them on the right paths, but the final forming of a person's character lies in their own hands.”
quotes.author: Anne Frank

quotes.quote: “Once you have read a book you care about, some part of it is always with you.”
quotes.author: Louis L'Amour

quotes.quote: “I wonder how many people don't get the one they want, but end up with the one they're supposed to be with.”
quotes.author: Fannie Flagg

quotes.quote: “Life before Death.
quotes.author: Brandon Sanderson

quotes.quote: “Wanting to be someone else is a waste of the person you are.”
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.quote: “Incredible change happens in your life when you decide to take control of what you do have power over instead of craving control over what you don't.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “Keep your face always toward the sunshine - and shadows will fall behind you.”
quotes.author: Walt Whitman

quotes.quote: “Shoot for the moon. Even if you miss, you'll land among the stars.”
quotes.author: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.quote: “Courage isn't having the strength to go on - it is going on when you don't have strength.”
quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quotes.quote: “Trees that are slow to grow bear the best fruit.”
quotes.author: Moliere

quotes.quote: “there is a place in the heart that
quotes.author: Charles Bukowski

quotes.quote: “I want to be in a relationship where you telling me you love me is just a ceremonious validation of what you already show me.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “All thinking men are atheists.”
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.quote: “The desire to reach for the stars is ambitious. The desire to reach hearts is wise.”
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: “The past has no power over the present moment.”
quotes.author: Eckhart Tolle

quotes.quote: “Do not fear failure but rather fear not trying.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “You see things; you say, 'Why?' But I dream things that never were; and I say 'Why not?”
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: “We are just an advanced breed of monkeys on a minor planet of a very average star. But we can understand the Universe. That makes us something very special.”
quotes.author: Stephen Hawking

quotes.quote: “Live in the present, remember the past, and fear not the future, for it doesn't exist and never shall. There is only now.”
quotes.author: Christopher Paolini

quotes.quote: “Happiness [is] only real when shared”
quotes.author: Jon Krakauer

quotes.quote: “Is 'fat' really the worst thing a human being can be? Is 'fat' worse than 'vindictive', 'jealous', 'shallow', 'vain', 'boring' or 'cruel'? Not to me.”
quotes.author: J.K. Rowling

quotes.quote: “‎Life is a shipwreck, but we must not forget to sing in the lifeboats.”
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: “A ship is safe in harbor, but that's not what ships are for.”
quotes.author: John A. Shedd

quotes.quote: “Always find opportunities to make someone smile, and to offer random acts of kindness in everyday life.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “When people don't express themselves, they die one piece at a time.”
quotes.author: Laurie Halse Anderson

quotes.quote: “The unreal is more powerful than the real. Because nothing is as perfect as you can imagine it. Because its only intangible ideas, concepts, beliefs, fantasies that last. Stone crumbles. Wood rots. People, well, they die. But things as fragile as a thought, a dream, a legend, they can go on and on. If you can change the way people think. The way they see themselves. The way they see the world. You can change the way people live their lives. That's the only lasting thing you can create.”
quotes.author: Chuck Palahniuk

quotes.quote: “The most common way people give up their power is by thinking they don't have any.”
quotes.author: Alice Walker

quotes.quote: “It was, he thought, the difference between being dragged into the arena to face a battle to the death and walking into the arena with your head held high. Some people, perhaps, would say that there was little to choose between the two ways, but Dumbledore knew - and so do I, thought Harry, with a rush of fierce pride, and so did my parents - that there was all the difference in the world.”
quotes.author: J.K. Rowling

quotes.quote: “Maybe everyone can live beyond what they're capable of.”
quotes.author: Markus Zusak

quotes.quote: “Better to be strong than pretty and useless.”
quotes.author: Lilith Saintcrow

quotes.quote: “The only way that we can live, is if we grow. The only way that we can grow is if we change. The only way that we can change is if we learn. The only way we can learn is if we are exposed. And the only way that we can become exposed is if we throw ourselves out into the open. Do it. Throw yourself.”
quotes.author: C. JoyBell C.

quotes.quote: “Even if you are on the right track, you’ll get run over if you just sit there.”
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.quote: “She seems so cool, so focused, so quiet, yet her eyes remain fixed upon the horizon. You think you know all there is to know about her immediately upon meeting her, but everything you think you know is wrong. Passion flows through her like a river of blood.
quotes.author: Neil Gaiman

quotes.quote: “I have come to accept the feeling of not knowing where I am going. And I have trained myself to love it. Because it is only when we are suspended in mid-air with no landing in sight, that we force our wings to unravel and alas begin our flight. And as we fly, we still may not know where we are going to. But the miracle is in the unfolding of the wings. You may not know where you're going, but you know that so long as you spread your wings, the winds will carry you.”
quotes.author: C. JoyBell C.

quotes.quote: “It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.”
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: “May the forces of evil become confused on the way to your house.”
quotes.author: George Carlin

quotes.quote: “No matter what he does, every person on earth plays a central role in the history of the world. And normally he doesn't know it.”
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: “There was another life that I might have had, but I am having this one.”
quotes.author: Kazuo Ishiguro

quotes.quote: “There are some things you can't share without ending up liking each other, and knocking out a twelve-foot mountain troll is one of them.”
quotes.author: J. K. Rowling

quotes.quote: “Go on with what your heart tells you, or you will lose all.”
quotes.author: Rick Riordan

quotes.quote: “Nothing in the world is ever completely wrong. Even a stopped clock is right twice a day.”
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: “Lack of direction, not lack of time, is the problem. We all have twenty-four hour days.”
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: “You should never be surprised when someone treats you with respect, you should expect it.”
quotes.author: Sarah Dessen

quotes.quote: “Change will not come if we wait for some other person, or if we wait for some other time. We are the ones we've been waiting for. We are the change that we seek.”
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.quote: “It is easy in the world to live after the world's opinion; it is easy in solitude to live after our own; but the great man is he who in the midst of the crowd keeps with perfect sweetness the independence of solitude.”
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: “Believe in your infinite potential. Your only limitations are those you set upon yourself.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “Jane, be still; don't struggle so like a wild, frantic bird, that is rending its own plumage in its desperation."
quotes.author: Charlotte Brontë

quotes.quote: “Do not set aside your happiness. Do not wait to be happy in the future. The best time to be happy is always now.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “However many holy words you read, however many you speak, what good will they do you if you do not act on upon them?”
quotes.author: Buddha Siddhartha Guatama Shakyamuni

quotes.quote: “Listen with curiosity. Speak with honesty. Act with integrity. The greatest problem with communication is we don’t listen to understand. We listen to reply. When we listen with curiosity, we don’t listen with the intent to reply. We listen for what’s behind the words.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “A concept is a brick. It can be used to build a courthouse of reason. Or it can be thrown through the window.”
quotes.author: Gilles Deleuze

quotes.quote: “Happiness is not the absence of problems, it's the ability to deal with them.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “Ask for what you want and be prepared to get it!”
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: “We don’t need a list of rights and wrongs, tables of dos and don’ts: we need books, time, and silence.is soon forgotten, butlasts forever.”
quotes.author: Philip Pullman

quotes.quote: “You may tell a tale that takes up residence in someone's soul, becomes their blood and self and purpose. That tale will move them and drive them and who knows that they might do because of it, because of your words. That is your role, your gift.”
quotes.author: Erin Morgenstern

quotes.quote: “If you want to be happy, be.”
quotes.author: Tolstoy Leo

quotes.quote: “The starting point of all achievement is DESIRE. Keep this constantly in mind. Weak desire brings weak results, just as a small fire makes a small amount of heat.”
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.quote: “Because,' she said, 'when you're scared but you still do it anyway,brave.”
quotes.author: Neil Gaiman

quotes.quote: “Imagination is everything. It is the preview of life's coming attractions.”
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: “What's terrible is to pretend that second-rate is first-rate. To pretend that you don't need love when you do; or you like your work when you know quite well you're capable of better.”
quotes.author: Doris Lessing

quotes.quote: “Life has no remote....get up and change it yourself!”
quotes.author: Mark A. Cooper

quotes.quote: “I just want you to know that you’re very special… and the only reason I’m telling you is that I don’t know if anyone else ever has.”
quotes.author: Stephen Chbosky

quotes.quote: “Help others without any reason and give without the expectation of receiving anything in return.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “The unhappiest people in this world, are those who care the most about what other people think.”
quotes.author: C. JoyBell C.

quotes.quote: “When things break, it's not the actual breaking that prevents them from getting back together again. It's because a little piece gets lost - the two remaining ends couldn't fit together even if they wanted to. The whole shape has changed.”
quotes.author: John Green

quotes.quote: “If we listened to our intellect we'd never have a love affair. We'd never have a friendship. We'd never go in business because we'd be cynical: "It's gonna go wrong." Or "She's going to hurt me." Or,"I've had a couple of bad love affairs, so therefore . . ." Well, that's nonsense. You're going to miss life. You've got to jump off the cliff all the time and build your wings on the way down.”
quotes.author: Ray Bradbury

quotes.quote: “Whatever you do, you need courage. Whatever course you decide upon, there is always someone to tell you that you are wrong. There are always difficulties arising that tempt you to believe your critics are right. To map out a course of action and follow it to an end requires some of the same courage that a soldier needs. Peace has its victories, but it takes brave men and women to win them.”
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: “If I should have a daughter…“Instead of “Mom”, she’s gonna call me “Point B.” Because that way, she knows that no matter what happens, at least she can always find her way to me. And I’m going to paint the solar system on the back of her hands so that she has to learn the entire universe before she can say “Oh, I know that like the back of my hand.”
quotes.author: Sarah Kay

quotes.quote: “If we have no peace, it is because we have forgotten that we belong to each other.”
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: “The higher we soar the smaller we appear to those who cannot fly.”
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: “If you don't go after what you want, you'll never have it. If you don't ask, the answer is always no. If you don't step forward, you're always in the same place.”
quotes.author: Nora Roberts

quotes.quote: “Stepping onto a brand-new path is difficult, but not more difficult than remaining in a situation, which is not nurturing to the whole woman.”
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: “No matter how plain a woman may be, if truth and honesty are written across her face, she will be beautiful.”
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: “Be steady and well-ordered in your life so that you can be fierce and original in your work.”
quotes.author: Gustave Flaubert

quotes.quote: “مش مهم انك تغير الكون... المهم انك تخلي الكون ما يغيركش”
quotes.author: عمر طاهر

quotes.quote: “I sought to hear the voice of God and climbed the topmost steeple, but God declared: "Go down again - I dwell among the people.”
quotes.author: John Henry Newman

quotes.quote: “Whatever you can do or dream you can, begin it.
quotes.author: John Anster

quotes.quote: “The grand essentials to happiness in this life are something to do, something to love, and something to hope for.”
quotes.author: George Washington Burnap

quotes.quote: “I am a part of all that I have met.”
quotes.author: Alfred Tennyson

quotes.quote: “I figured something out. The future is unpredictable.”
quotes.author: John Green

quotes.quote: “Pain is a pesky part of being human, I've learned it feels like a stab wound to the heart, something I wish we could all do without, in our lives here. Pain is a sudden hurt that can't be escaped. But then I have also learned that because of pain, I can feel the beauty, tenderness, and freedom of healing. Pain feels like a fast stab wound to the heart. But then healing feels like the wind against your face when you are spreading your wings and flying through the air! We may not have wings growing out of our backs, but healing is the closest thing that will give us that wind against our faces.”
quotes.author: C. JoyBell C.

quotes.quote: “Earth provides enough to satisfy every man's needs, but not every man's greed.”
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: “There is nothing more dreadful than the habit of doubt. Doubt separates people. It is a poison that disintegrates friendships and breaks up pleasant relations. It is a thorn that irritates and hurts; it is a sword that kills.”
quotes.author: Buddha Siddhartha Guatama Shakyamuni

quotes.quote: “I have never met a man so ignorant that I couldn't learn something from him.”
quotes.author: Galileo Galilei

quotes.quote: “Two roads diverged in a wood, and I -
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: “When you arise in the morning think of what a privilege it is to be alive, to think, to enjoy, to love ...”
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: “Not being heard is no reason for silence.”
quotes.author: Hugo, Victor

quotes.quote: “It’s your life; you don’t need someone’s permission to live the life you want. Be brave to live from your heart.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “Do no harm and leave the world a better place than you found it.”
quotes.author: Patricia Cornwell

quotes.quote: “I am not a teacher, but an awakener.”
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: “Where there is ruin, there is hope for a treasure.”
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: “Write it on your heart that every day is the best day in the year.”
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: “If you can keep your head when all about you
quotes.author: Rudyard Kipling

quotes.quote: “Well, we all make mistakes, dear, so just put it behind you. We should regret our mistakes and learn from them, but never carry them forward into the future with us.”
quotes.author: L.M. Montgomery

quotes.quote: “We don't make mistakes, just happy little accidents.”
quotes.author: Bob Ross

quotes.quote: “. . . when it comes down to it, that’s what life is all about: showing up for the people you love, again and again, until you can’t show up anymore.”
quotes.author: Rebecca Walker

quotes.quote: “Dear God," she prayed, "let me be something every minute of every hour of my life. Let me be gay; let me be sad. Let me be cold; let me be warm. Let me be hungry...have too much to eat. Let me be ragged or well dressed. Let me be sincere - be deceitful. Let me be truthful; let me be a liar. Let me be honorable and let me sin. Only let me be something every blessed minute. And when I sleep, let me dream all the time so that not one little piece of living is ever lost.”
quotes.author: Betty Smith

quotes.quote: “Men are from Earth, women are from Earth. Deal with it.”
quotes.author: George Carlin

quotes.quote: “My only advice is to stay aware, listen carefully, and yell for help if you need it.”
quotes.author: Judy Blume

quotes.quote: “I’ve known people that the world has thrown everything at to discourage them...to break their spirit. And yet something about them retains a dignity. They face life and don’t ask quarters.”
quotes.author: Horton Foote

quotes.quote: “Any book that helps a child to form a habit of reading, to make reading one of his deep and continuing needs, is good for him.”
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: “We never know the quality of someone else's life, though we seldom resist the temptation to assume and pass judgement.”
quotes.author: Tami Hoag

quotes.quote: “Surround Yourself with People Who Believe in Your Dreams:
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “Hearts are breakable," Isabelle said. "And I think even when you heal, you're never what you were before".”
quotes.author: Cassandra Clare

quotes.quote: “All that we are is the result of what we have thought: it is founded on our thoughts and made up of our thoughts. If a man speak or act with an evil thought, suffering follows him as the wheel follows the hoof of the beast that draws the wagon.... If a man speak or act with a good thought, happiness follows him like a shadow that never leaves him.”
quotes.author: Gautama Buddha

quotes.quote: “Never let the future disturb you. You will meet it, if you have to, with the same weapons of reason which today arm you against the present.”
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: “After all," Anne had said to Marilla once, "I believe the nicest and sweetest days are not those on which anything very splendid or wonderful or exciting happens but just those that bring simple little pleasures, following one another softly, like pearls slipping off a string.”
quotes.author: L.M. Montgomery

quotes.quote: “I said to my soul, be still and wait without hope, for hope would be hope for the wrong thing; wait without love, for love would be love of the wrong thing; there is yet faith, but the faith and the love are all in the waiting. Wait without thought, for you are not ready for thought: So the darkness shall be the light, and the stillness the dancing.”
quotes.author: T.S. Eliot

quotes.quote: “Be empty of worrying.
quotes.author: Mawlana Jalal-al-Din Rumi

quotes.quote: “I think that we are like stars. Something happens to burst us open; but when we burst open and think we are dying; we’re actually turning into a supernova. And then when we look at ourselves again, we see that we’re suddenly more beautiful than we ever were before!”
quotes.author: C. JoyBell C.

quotes.quote: “The biggest wall you have to climb is the one you build in your mind: Never let your mind talk you out of your dreams, trick you into giving up. Never let your mind become the greatest obstacle to success. To get your mind on the right track, the rest will follow.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “I live my life in widening circles that reach out across the world.”
quotes.author: Rainer Maria Rilke

quotes.quote: “Do not go gentle into that good night,
quotes.author: Dylan Thomas

quotes.quote: “If a man is called to be a street sweeper, he should sweep streets even as a Michaelangelo painted, or Beethoven composed music or Shakespeare wrote poetry. He should sweep streets so well that all the hosts of heaven and earth will pause to say, 'Here lived a great street sweeper who did his job well.”
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.quote: “Every day, think as you wake up, today I am fortunate to be alive, I have a precious human life, I am not going to waste it. I am going to use all my energies to develop myself, to expand my heart out to others; to achieve enlightenment for the benefit of all beings. I am going to have kind thoughts towards others, I am not going to get angry or think badly about others. I am going to benefit others as much as I can.”
quotes.author: The Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: “Above all else, guard your heart for it affects everything else you do.”
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: “Maturity is when you stop complaining and making excuses, and start making changes.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “For like a shaft, clear and cold, the thought pierced him that in the end the Shadow was only a small and passing thing: there was light and high beauty for ever beyond its reach.”
quotes.author: J.R.R. Tolkien

quotes.quote: “Make the most of yourself....for that is all there is of you.”
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: “A Penny Saved is a Penny Earned”
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: “When in a relationship, a real man doesn't make his woman jealous of others, he makes others jealous of his woman.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “What's done is done. What's gone is gone. One of life's lessons is always moving on. It’s okay to look back to see how far you’ve come but keep moving forward.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “Strong people have a strong sense of self-worth and self-awareness; they don’t need the approval of others.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “Smile more. Smiling can make you and others happy.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “Do not seek the because - in love there is no because, no reason, no explanation, no solutions.”
quotes.author: Anaïs Nin

quotes.quote: “Many of life's failures are people who did not realize how close they were to success when they gave up.”
quotes.author: Thomas A. Edison

quotes.quote: “Death is not the greatest loss in life. The greatest loss is what dies inside while still alive. Never surrender.”
quotes.author: Tupac Shakur

quotes.quote: “Real courage is when you know you're licked before you begin, but you begin anyway and see it through no matter what.”
quotes.author: Harper Lee

quotes.quote: “I never saw a wild thing sorry for itself”
quotes.author: D.H. Lawrence

quotes.quote: “Go into yourself. Find out the reason that commands you to write; see whether it has spread its roots into the very depths of your heart; confess to yourself whether you would have to die if you were forbidden to write.
quotes.author: Rainer Maria Rilke

quotes.quote: “Aim higher in case you fall short.”
quotes.author: Suzanne Collins

quotes.quote: “Our life is what our thoughts make it.”
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: “Sometimes all a person wants is an empathetic ear; all he or she needs is to talk it out. Just offering a listening ear and an understanding heart for his or her suffering can be a big comfort.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “Around here, however, we don't look backwards for very long. We keep moving forward, opening up new doors and doing new things, because we're curious...and curiosity keeps leading us down new paths.”
quotes.author: Walt Disney Company

quotes.quote: “Be Brave and Take Risks: You need to have faith in yourself. Be brave and take risks. You don't have to have it all figured out to move forward.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “Happiness depends on your mindset and attitude.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “Do Not Lie to Yourself
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “If you make a mistake and do not correct it, this is called a mistake.”
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: “Because paper has more patience than people. ”
quotes.author: Anne Frank

quotes.quote: “A star falls from the sky and into your hands. Then it seeps through your veins and swims inside your blood and becomes every part of you. And then you have to put it back into the sky. And it's the most painful thing you'll ever have to do and that you've ever done. But what's yours is yours. Whether it’s up in the sky or here in your hands. And one day, it'll fall from the sky and hit you in the head real hard and that time, you won't have to put it back in the sky again.”
quotes.author: C. JoyBell C.

quotes.quote: “No matter how your heart is grieving, if you keep on believing, the dreams that you wish will come true.”
quotes.author: Walt Disney Company

quotes.quote: “Sometimes life knocks you on your ass... get up, get up, get up!!! Happiness is not the absence of problems, it's the ability to deal with them.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “Do what you love, love what you do, and with all your heart give yourself to it.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “Have courage for the great sorrows of life and patience for the small ones; and when you have laboriously accomplished your daily task, go to sleep in peace. God is awake.”
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: “When you do the right thing, you get the feeling of peace and serenity associated with it. Do it again and again.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “Owning our story can be hard but not nearly as difficult as spending our lives running from it. Embracing our vulnerabilities is risky but not nearly as dangerous as giving up on love and belonging and joy—the experiences that make us the most vulnerable. Only when we are brave enough to explore the darkness will we discover the infinite power of our light.”
quotes.author: Brene Brown

quotes.quote: “The real heroes anyway aren't the people doing things; the real heroes are the people NOTICING things, paying attention.”
quotes.author: John Green

quotes.quote: “Once you realize you deserve a bright future, letting go of your dark past is the best choice you will ever make.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “Only after disaster can we be resurrected. It's only after you've lost everything that you're free to do anything. Nothing is static, everything is evolving, everything is falling apart.”
quotes.author: Chuck Palahniuk

quotes.quote: “Just because you can doesn't mean you should.”
quotes.author: Sherrilyn Kenyon

quotes.quote: “It is not death that a man should fear, but he should fear never beginning to live.”
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: “Excellence is never an accident. It is always the result of high intention, sincere effort, and intelligent execution; it represents the wise choice of many alternatives - choice, not chance, determines your destiny.”
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: “No one really knows why they are alive until they know what they'd die for.”
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.quote: “There is no good and evil, there is only power and those too weak to seek it.”
quotes.author: J.K. Rowling

quotes.quote: “Sometimes God allows what he hates to accomplish what he loves.”
quotes.author: Joni Eareckson Tada

quotes.quote: “Happiness is like a butterfly which, when pursued, is always beyond our grasp, but, if you will sit down quietly, may alight upon you.”
quotes.author: Nathaniel Hawthorne

quotes.quote: “Death is no more than passing from one room into another. But there's a difference for me, you know. Because in that other room I shall be able to see.”
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: “You might as well answer the door, my child,
quotes.author: Lucille Clifton

quotes.quote: “Don't be afraid of enemies who attack you. Be afraid of the friends who flatter you.”
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.quote: “We are going to die, and that makes us the lucky ones. Most people are never going to die because they are never going to be born. The potential people who could have been here in my place but who will in fact never see the light of day outnumber the sand grains of Arabia. Certainly those unborn ghosts include greater poets than Keats, scientists greater than Newton. We know this because the set of possible people allowed by our DNA so massively exceeds the set of actual people. In the teeth of these stupefying odds it is you and I, in our ordinariness, that are here.We privileged few, who won the lottery of birth against all odds, how dare we whine at our inevitable return to that prior state from which the vast majority have never stirred?”
quotes.author: Richard Dawkins

quotes.quote: “How would your life be different if…You stopped making negative judgmental assumptions about people you encounter? Let today be the day…You look for the good in everyone you meet and respect their journey.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “Shoot for the moon, even if you fail, you'll land among the stars”
quotes.author: Cecelia Ahern

quotes.quote: “We are flawed creatures, all of us. Some of us think that means we should fix our flaws. But get rid of my flaws and there would be no one left.”
quotes.author: Sarah Vowell

quotes.quote: “Love: a single word, a wispy thing, a word no bigger or longer than an edge. That's what it is: an edge; a razor. It draws up through the center of your life, cutting everything in two. Before and after. The rest of the world falls away on either side.”
quotes.author: Lauren Oliver

quotes.quote: “Never stop dreaming,
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “Luck is what happens when preparation meets opportunity.”
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: “We are products of our past, but we don't have to be prisoners of it.”
quotes.author: Rick Warren

quotes.quote: “Those who do not weep, do not see.”
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: “When the going gets tough, put one foot in front of the other and just keep going. Don’t give up.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “Everyone you meet is a part of your journey, but not all of them are meant to stay in your life. Some people are just passing through to bring you gifts; either they're blessings or lessons.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “We meet no ordinary people in our lives.”
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis; Inspirational Christian Library

quotes.quote: “When each day is the same as the next, it’s because people fail to recognize the good things that happen in their lives every day that the sun rises.”
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: “In the end you should always do the right thing even if it's hard.”
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.quote: “There is a way to be good again...”
quotes.author: Khaled Hosseini

quotes.quote: “Go placidly amid the noise and the haste, and remember what peace there may be in silence. As far as possible without surrender, be on good terms with all persons. Speak your truth quietly and clearly, and listen to others, even the dull and ignorant; they too have their story. Be yourself. Especially do not feign affection. Neither be cynical about love – for in the face of all aridity and disenchantment it is perennial as the grass. Take kindly the counsel of the years, gracefully surrendering the things of youth. Nurture strength of spirit to shield you from misfortune. But do not distress yourself with imaginings. Many fears are born of fatigue and loneliness. Beyond a wholesome discipline, be gentle with yourself. You are a child of the universe no less than the trees and the stars; you have a right to be here. And whether or not it is clear to you, no doubt the universe is unfolding as it should. Therefore be at peace with God, whatever you conceive Him to be, and whatever your labours and aspirations, in the noisy confusion of life keep peace with your soul. With all its sham, drudgery and broken dreams, it is still a beautiful world.”
quotes.author: Max Ehrmann

quotes.quote: “We have to create culture, don't watch TV, don't read magazines, don't even listen to NPR. Create your own roadshow. The nexus of space and time where you are now is the most immediate sector of your universe, and if you're worrying about Michael Jackson or Bill Clinton or somebody else, then you are disempowered, you're giving it all away to icons, icons which are maintained by an electronic media so that you want to dress like X or have lips like Y. This is shit-brained, this kind of thinking. That is all cultural diversion, and what is real is you and your friends and your associations, your highs, your orgasms, your hopes, your plans, your fears. And we are told 'no', we're unimportant, we're peripheral. 'Get a degree, get a job, get a this, get a that.' And then you're a player, you don't want to even play in that game. You want to reclaim your mind and get it out of the hands of the cultural engineers who want to turn you into a half-baked moron consuming all this trash that's being manufactured out of the bones of a dying world.”
quotes.author: Terence McKenna

quotes.quote: “Too often we underestimate the power of a touch, a smile, a kind word, a listening ear, an honest compliment, or the smallest act of caring, all of which have the potential to turn a life around.”
quotes.author: Leo Buscaglia

quotes.quote: “We either make ourselves miserable, or we make ourselves strong. The amount of work is the same.”
quotes.author: Carlos Castaneda

quotes.quote: “أريد لحظة انفعال...لحظة حب...لحظة دهشة..لحظة اكتشاف...لحظة معرفة...أريد لحظة تجعل لحياتى معنى..إن حياتى من أجل أكل العيش لا معنى لها لأنها مجرد إستمرار ”
quotes.author: مصطفى محمود

quotes.quote: “Count your blessings, not your problems. Count your own blessings, not someone else's. Remember that jealousy is when you count someone else's blessings instead of your own.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “Stop giving other people the power to control your happiness, your mind, and your life. If you don't take control of yourself and your own life, someone else is bound to try.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “There are two ways to reach me: by way of kisses or by way of the imagination. But there is a hierarchy: the kisses alone don't work.”
quotes.author: Anaïs Nin

quotes.quote: “The damage was permanent; there would always be scars. But even the angriest scars faded over time until it was difficult to see them written on the skin at all, and the only thing that remained was the memory of how painful it had been.”
quotes.author: Jodi Picoult

quotes.quote: “Nothing great was ever achieved without enthusiasm.”
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: “I believe there is another world waiting for us. A better world. And I'll be waiting for you there.”
quotes.author: David Mitchell

quotes.quote: “Music melts all the separate parts of our bodies together.”
quotes.author: Anais Nin

quotes.quote: “At the end of the day, let there be no excuses, no explanations, no regrets.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “Swords can win territories but not hearts, forces can bend heads but not minds.”
quotes.author: Mirza Tahir Ahmad

quotes.quote: “People have to forgive. We don't have to like them, we don't have to be friends with them, we don't have to send them hearts in text messages, but we have to forgive them, to overlook, to forget. Because if we don't we are tying rocks to our feet, too much for our wings to carry!”
quotes.author: C. JoyBell C.

quotes.quote: “Dumbledore will only leave from Hogwarts when there are none loyal to him!”
quotes.author: J.K. Rowling

quotes.quote: “Don’t ask what the world needs. Ask what makes you come alive, and go do it. Because what the world needs is people who have come alive.”
quotes.author: Howard Thurman

quotes.quote: “I shall look at you out of the corner of my eye, and you will say nothing. Words are the source of misunderstandings.”
quotes.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

quotes.quote: “It’s dark because you are trying too hard.
quotes.author: Aldous Huxley

quotes.quote: “We all make mistakes, have struggles, and even regret things in our past. But you are not your mistakes, you are not your struggles, and you are here NOW with the power to shape your day and your future.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “Always dream and shoot higher than you know you can do. Do not bother just to be better than your contemporaries or predecessors. Try to be better than yourself.”
quotes.author: William Faulkner

quotes.quote: “Once we accept our limits, we go beyond them.”
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: “Be more concerned with your character than your reputation, because your character is what you really are, while your reputation is merely what others think you are.”
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.quote: “Amateurs sit and wait for inspiration, the rest of us just get up and go to work.”
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.quote: “If you have a strong purpose in life, you don't have to be pushed. Your passion will drive you there.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “What are you going to do with your life?" In one way or another it seemed that people had been asking her this forever; teachers, her parents, friends at three in the morning, but the question had never seemed this pressing and still she was no nearer an answer... "Live each day as if it's your last', that was the conventional advice, but really, who had the energy for that? What if it rained or you felt a bit glandy? It just wasn't practical. Better by far to be good and courageous and bold and to make difference. Not change the world exactly, but the bit around you. Cherish your friends, stay true to your principles, live passionately and fully and well. Experience new things. Love and be loved, if you ever get the chance.”
quotes.author: David Nicholls

quotes.quote: “Man cannot discover new oceans unless he has the courage to lose sight of the shore.”
quotes.author: Andre Gide

quotes.quote: “Resentment is like drinking poison and then hoping it will kill your enemies.”
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: “Dream as if you will live forever; Live as if you will die today.”
quotes.author: James Dean

quotes.quote: “I'd rather learn from one bird how to sing
quotes.author: E.E. Cummings

quotes.quote: “Those who look for the bad in people will surely find it.”
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: “Patience Is Not the Ability to Wait:
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “Guard well your thoughts when alone and your words when accompanied.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “Without fear there cannot be courage.”
quotes.author: Christopher Paolini

quotes.quote: “Whatever the mind can conceive and believe, it can achieve.”
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.quote: “The great thing to remember is that though our feelings come and go God's love for us does not.”
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: “There's so much to be grateful for, words are poor things.”
quotes.author: Marilynne Robinson

quotes.quote: “It is by no means an irrational fancy that, in a future existence, we shall look upon what we think our present existence, as a dream.”
quotes.author: Edgar Allan Poe

quotes.quote: “I dreamed I spoke in another's language,
quotes.author: Clive Barker

quotes.quote: “In the long run, the sharpest weapon of all is a kind and gentle spirit.”
quotes.author: Anne Frank

quotes.quote: “I will not try to convince you to love me, to respect me, to commit to me. I deserve better than that; I AM BETTER THAN THAT...Goodbye.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “Every man is a damn fool for at least five minutes every day; wisdom consists in not exceeding the limit.”
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: “You must learn to let go. Release the stress. You were never in control anyway.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “To love means loving the unlovable. To forgive means pardoning the unpardonable. Faith means believing the unbelievable. Hope means hoping when everything seems hopeless.”
quotes.author: G.K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: “Scar tissue is stronger than regular tissue. Realize the strength, move on.”
quotes.author: Henry Rollins

quotes.quote: “The windows of my soul I throw
quotes.author: John Greenleaf Whittier

quotes.quote: “What would come, would come...and you would have to meet it, when it did.”
quotes.author: J.K. Rowling

quotes.quote: “However mean your life is, meet it and live it; do not shun it and call it hard names. It is not so bad as you are. It looks poorest when you are richest. The fault-finder will find faults even in paradise. Love your life, poor as it is. You may perhaps have some pleasant, thrilling, glorious hours, even in a poorhouse.. I do not see but a quiet mind may live as contentedly there, and have as cheering thoughts, as in a palace.”
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: “Fiction is art and art is the triumph over chaos… to celebrate a world that lies spread out around us like a bewildering and stupendous dream.”
quotes.author: John Cheever

quotes.quote: “I learned this, at least, by my experiment; that if one advances confidently in the direction of his dreams, and endeavors to live the life which he has imagined, he will meet with a success unexpected in common hours..”
quotes.author: Thoreau, Henry David

quotes.quote: “Nothing can disturb your peace of mind unless you allow it to.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “I was suffering the easily foreseeable consequences. Addiction is the hallmark of every infatuation-based love story. It all begins when the object of your adoration bestows upon you a heady, hallucinogenic dose of something you never dared to admit you wanted-an emotional speedball, perhaps, of thunderous love and roiling excitement. Soon you start craving that intense attention, with a hungry obsession of any junkie. When the drug is witheld, you promptly turn sick, crazy, and depleted (not to mention resentful of the dealer who encouraged this addiction in the first place but now refuses to pony up the good stuff anymore-- despite the fact that you know he has it hidden somewhere, goddamn it, because he used to give it to you for free). Next stage finds you skinny and shaking in a corner, certain only that you would sell your soul or rob your neighbors just to have 'that thing' even one more time. Meanwhile, the object of your adoration has now become repulsed by you. He looks at you like you're someone he's never met before, much less someone he once loved with high passion. The irony is,you can hardly blame him. I mean, check yourself out. You're a pathetic mess,unrecognizable even to your own eyes. So that's it. You have now reached infatuation's final destination-- the complete and merciless devaluation of self." - pg 20-21”
quotes.author: Elizabeth Gilbert

quotes.quote: “We come spinning out of nothingness, scattering stars like dust.”
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: “Of all creatures that breathe and move upon the earth, nothing is bred that is weaker than man.”
quotes.author: Homer

quotes.quote: “Kindness is not a business. True kindness expects nothing in return and should never act with conditions.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “الإكتشاف ليس أن تجد أرضاً جديدة .. وإنما أن ترى بعيون جديدة”
quotes.author: أنيس منصور

quotes.quote: “If you hang out with chickens, you're going to cluck and if you hang out with eagles, you're going to fly.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “Whatever comes," she said, "cannot alter one thing. If I am a princess in rags and tatters, I can be a princess inside. It would be easy to be a princess if I were dressed in cloth of gold, but it is a great deal more of a triumph to be one all the time when no one knows it.”
quotes.author: Frances Hodgson Burnett

quotes.quote: “To have what you have never had, you have to do what you have never done.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “Live the Life of Your Dreams
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “Every blessing ignored becomes a curse.”
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: “The power of finding beauty in the humblest things makes home happy and life lovely.”
quotes.author: Louisa May Alcott

quotes.quote: “What you have to decide... is how you want your life to be. If your forever was ending tomorrow, would this be how you'd want to have spent it? Listen, the truth is, nothing is guaranteed. You know that more than anybody. So dont be afraid. Be alive.”
quotes.author: Sarah Dessen

quotes.quote: “Government exists to protect us from each other. Where government has gone beyond its limits is in deciding to protect us from ourselves.”
quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

quotes.quote: “I never said it would be easy, I only said it would be worth it.”
quotes.author: Mae West

quotes.quote: “Perfectionism is the enemy of happiness. Embrace being perfectly imperfect. Learn from your mistakes and forgive yourself, you’ll be happier. We make mistakes because we are imperfect. Learn from your mistakes, forgive yourself, and keep moving forward.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “If a problem is fixable, if a situation is such that you can do something about it, then there is no need to worry. If it's not fixable, then there is no help in worrying. There is no benefit in worrying whatsoever.”
quotes.author: Dalai Lama XIV

quotes.quote: “How far that little candle throws his beams! So shines a good deed in a weary world.”
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: “Never dull your shine for somebody else.”
quotes.author: Tyra Banks

quotes.quote: “Any intelligent fool can make things bigger, more complex, and more violent. It takes a touch of genius — and a lot of courage to move in the opposite direction.”
quotes.author: E.F. Schumacher

quotes.quote: “The rights of every man are diminished when the rights of one man are threatened.”
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: “People say that what we’re all seeking is a meaning for life. I don’t think that’s what we’re really seeking. I think that what we’re seeking is an experience of being alive, so that our life experiences on the purely physical plane will have resonances with our own innermost being and reality, so that we actually feel the rapture of being alive.”
quotes.author: Joseph Campbell

quotes.quote: “You are in charge of your own happiness; you don't need to wait for other people's permission to be happy.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “I have a dream that my four little children will one day live in a nation where they will not be judged by the color of their skin but by the content of their character.”
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.quote: “My father had taught me to be nice first, because you can always be mean later, but once you've been mean to someone, they won't believe the nice anymore. So be nice, be nice, until it's time to stop being nice, then destroy them.”
quotes.author: Laurell K. Hamilton

quotes.quote: “It does not matter how long you are spending on the earth, how much money you have gathered or how much attention you have received. It is the amount of positive vibration you have radiated in life that matters,”
quotes.author: Amit Ray

quotes.quote: “If you're horrible to me, I'm going to write a song about it, and you won't like it. That's how I operate.”
quotes.author: Taylor Swift

quotes.quote: “Shallow men believe in luck or in circumstance. Strong men believe in cause and effect.”
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: “We’re here, and then we’re gone, and it’s not about the time we’re here, but what we do with the time.”
quotes.author: Rick Yancey

quotes.quote: “Oh, what a tangled web we weave...when first we practice to deceive.”
quotes.author: Walter Scott

quotes.quote: “Do not let arrogance go to your head and despair to your heart; do not let compliments go to your head and criticisms to your heart; do not let success go to your head and failure to your heart.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “A smile puts you on the right track. A smile makes the world a beautiful place. When you lose your smile, you lose your way in the chaos of life.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “You are unique. You have different talents and abilities. You don’t have to always follow in the footsteps of others. And most important, you should always remind yourself that you don't have to do what everyone else is doing and have a responsibility to develop the talents you have been given.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “Each day brings new opportunities, allowing you to constantly live with love—be there for others—bring a little light into someone's day. Be grateful and live each day to the fullest.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “There's more to life than dating the boy on the football team.”
quotes.author: Taylor Swift

quotes.quote: “Everything's a risk. Not doing anything is a risk. It's up to you.”
quotes.author: Nicola Yoon

quotes.quote: “I have come home at last! This is my real country! I belong here. This is the land I have been looking for all my life, though I never knew it till now...Come further up, come further in!”
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: “Behind every trial and sorrow that He makes us shoulder, God has a reason.”
quotes.author: Khaled Hosseini

quotes.quote: “You Are the Master of Your Attitude
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “Dare to love yourself
quotes.author: Author-Poet Aberjhani

quotes.quote: “There is no happiness like that of being loved by your fellow creatures, and feeling that your presence is an addition to their comfort.”
quotes.author: Charlotte Brontë

quotes.quote: “With all its sham, drudgery, and broken dreams,
quotes.author: Max Ehrmann

quotes.quote: “As my sufferings mounted I soon realized that there were two ways in which I could respond to my situation -- either to react with bitterness or seek to transform the suffering into a creative force. I decided to follow the latter course.”
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.quote: “you
quotes.author: Nayyirah Waheed

quotes.quote: “Dripping water hollows out stone, not through force but through persistence.”
quotes.author: Ovid

quotes.quote: “Renew, release, let go. Yesterday’s gone. There’s nothing you can do to bring it back. You can’t “should’ve” done something. You can only DO something. Renew yourself. Release that attachment. Today is a new day!”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “People say that eyes are windows to the soul.”
quotes.author: Khaled Hosseini

quotes.quote: “It was always the becoming he dreamed of, never the being.”
quotes.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quotes.quote: “No act of kindness, no matter how small, is ever wasted.”
quotes.author: Aesop

quotes.quote: “I have a dream that one day little black boys and girls will be holding hands with little white boys and girls.”
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.quote: “I do not care so much what I am to others as I care what I am to myself.”
quotes.author: Michel de Montaigne

quotes.quote: “Life was meant to be lived, and curiosity must be kept alive. One must never, for whatever reason, turn his back on life.”
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: “It's the children the world almost breaks who grow up to save it.”
quotes.author: Frank Warren

quotes.quote: “We must live together as brothers or perish together as fools.”
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.quote: “Whenever something bad happens, keep calm, take a few deep breaths and shift the focus to something positive.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “The universe is big, its vast and complicated, and ridiculous. And sometimes, very rarely, impossible things just happen and we call them miracles. And that's the theory. Nine hundred years, never seen one yet, but this would do me.”
quotes.author: Steven Moffat

quotes.quote: “To call woman the weaker sex is a libel; it is man's injustice to woman. If by strength is meant brute strength, then, indeed, is woman less brute than man. If by strength is meant moral power, then woman is immeasurably man's superior. Has she not greater intuition, is she not more self-sacrificing, has she not greater powers of endurance, has she not greater courage? Without her, man could not be. If nonviolence is the law of our being, the future is with woman. Who can make a more effective appeal to the heart than woman?"
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: “You buy furniture. You tell yourself, this is the last sofa I will ever need in my life. Buy the sofa, then for a couple years you're satisfied that no matter what goes wrong, at least you've got your sofa issue handled. Then the right set of dishes. Then the perfect bed. The drapes. The rug. Then you're trapped in your lovely nest, and the things you used to own, now they own you.”
quotes.author: Chuck Palahniuk

quotes.quote: “ما تبحث عنه يبحث عنك”
quotes.author: جلال الدين الرومي

quotes.quote: “Responsibility to yourself means refusing to let others do your thinking, talking, and naming for you...it means that you do not treat your body as a commodity with which to purchase superficial intimacy or economic security; for our bodies to be treated as objects, our minds are in mortal danger. It means insisting that those to whom you give your friendship and love are able to respect your mind. It means being able to say, with Charlotte Bronte's Jane Eyre: "I have an inward treasure born with me, which can keep me alive if all the extraneous delights should be withheld or offered only at a price I cannot afford to give.
quotes.author: Adrienne Rich

quotes.quote: “But remember, boy, that a kind act can sometimes be as powerful as a sword.”
quotes.author: Rick Riordan

quotes.quote: “One must still have chaos in oneself to be able to give birth to a dancing star.”
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: “Do all the good you can,
quotes.author: John Wesley

quotes.quote: “My heart is warm with the friends I make,
quotes.author: Edna St. Vincent Millay

quotes.quote: “Any emotion, if it is sincere, is involuntary.”
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: “You've got this life and while you've got it, you'd better kiss like you only have one moment, try to hold someone's hand like you will never get another chance to, look into people's eyes like they're the last you'll ever see, watch someone sleeping like there's no time left, jump if you feel like jumping, run if you feel like running, play music in your head when there is none, and eat cake like it's the only one left in the world!”
quotes.author: C. JoyBell C.

quotes.quote: “For myself I am an optimist - it does not seem to be much use to be anything else.”
quotes.author: Winston S. Churchill

quotes.quote: “Make a pact with yourself today to not be defined by your past. Sometimes the greatest thing to come out of all your hard work isn't what you get for it, but what you become for it. Shake things up today! Be You...Be Free...Share.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “The strongest people find the courage and caring to help others, even if they are going through their own storm.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “Man is the only creature that consumes without producing. He does not give milk, he does not lay eggs, he is too weak to pull the plough, he cannot run fast enough to catch rabbits. Yet he is lord of all the animals. He sets them to work, he gives back to them the bare minimum that will prevent them from starving, and the rest he keeps for himself.”
quotes.author: George Orwell

quotes.quote: “But if I'm it, the last of my kind, the last page of human history, like hell I'm going to let the story end this way. I may be the last one, but I am the one still standing. I am the one turning to face the faceless hunter in the woods on an abandoned highway. I am the one not running but facing. Because if I am the last one, then I am humanity. And if this is humanity's last war, then I am the battlefield.”
quotes.author: Rick Yancey

quotes.quote: “You will never be able to escape from your heart. So it's better to listen to what it has to say.”
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: “The surest way to make your dreams come true is to live them.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “Don't ever take a fence down until you know why it was put up.”
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: “Since I was young, I have always known this: Life damages us, every one. We can’t escape that damage. But now, I am also learning this: We can be mended. We mend each other”
quotes.author: Veronica Roth

quotes.quote: “Equality is not a concept. It's not something we should be striving for. It's a necessity. Equality is like gravity. We need it to stand on this earth as men and women, and the misogyny that is in every culture is not a true part of the human condition. It is life out of balance, and that imbalance is sucking something out of the soul of every man and woman who's confronted with it. We need equality. Kinda now.”
quotes.author: Joss Whedon

quotes.quote: “Those who bring sunshine to the lives of others cannot keep it from themselves.”
quotes.author: J.M. Barrie

quotes.quote: “Getting something and having the wits to use it...those are two different things.”
quotes.author: Rick Riordan

quotes.quote: “What a large volume of adventures may be grasped within the span of his little life by him who interests his heart in everything.”
quotes.author: Laurence Sterne

quotes.quote: “People don't realize how a man's whole life can be changed by one book.”
quotes.author: Malcolm X

quotes.quote: “I'm not in search of sanctity, sacredness, purity; these things are found after this life, not in this life; but in this life I search to be completely human: to feel, to give, to take, to laugh, to get lost, to be found, to dance, to love and to lust, to be so human.”
quotes.author: C. JoyBell C.

quotes.quote: “Be melting snow.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: “Courage is feeling fear, not getting rid of fear, and taking action in the face of fear.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “I thank you God for this most amazing day, for the leaping greenly spirits of trees, and for the blue dream of sky and for everything which is natural, which is infinite, which is yes.”
quotes.author: e.e. cummings

quotes.quote: “If you are lazy, and accept your lot, you may live in it. If you are willing to work, you can write your name anywhere you choose.”
quotes.author: Gene Stratton-Porter

quotes.quote: “A mathematical formula for happiness:Reality divided by Expectations.There were two ways to be happy:improve your reality or lower your expectations.”
quotes.author: Jodi Picoult

quotes.quote: “Don't think. Thinking is the enemy of creativity. It's self-conscious and anything self-conscious is lousy. You can't "try" to do things. You simply "must" do things.”
quotes.author: Ray Bradbury

quotes.quote: “Being grateful does not mean that everything is necessarily good. It just means that you can accept it as a gift.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “If I am to be fallen into love, I will. And if as a result I will appear to be stupid, disillusioned, and of poor judgment, I will. And I would be damned if I cared what other people think. For I would rather be thought of as all of these things, than not love. If in loving, I become the naked woman on the horse, I will ride that horse with my head held high. This is my spirit. I am unbreakable.”
quotes.author: C. JoyBell C.

quotes.quote: “You cannot change anyone, but you can be the reason someone changes.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “Do not stop thinking of life as an adventure. You have no security unless you can live bravely, excitingly, imaginatively; unless you can choose a challenge instead of competence.”
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: “Get Off The Scale!
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “do not look for healing
quotes.author: Rupi Kaur

quotes.quote: “For beauty is nothing but the beginning of terror
quotes.author: Rainer Maria Rilke

quotes.quote: “Things do not change; we change.”
quotes.author: henry david thoreau

quotes.quote: “Bottom line is, even if you see 'em coming, you're not ready for the big moments. No one asks for their life to change, not really. But it does. So what are we, helpless? Puppets? No. The big moments are gonna come. You can't help that. It's what you do afterwards that counts. That's when you find out who you are.”
quotes.author: Joss Whedon

quotes.quote: “Anything that’s human is mentionable, and anything that is mentionable can be more manageable. When we can talk about our feelings, they become less overwhelming, less upsetting, and less scary. The people we trust with that important talk can help us know that we are not alone.”
quotes.author: Fred Rogers

quotes.quote: “What you are is God's gift to you, what you become is your gift to God.”
quotes.author: Hans Urs von Balthasar

quotes.quote: “If you have good thoughts they will shine out of your face like sunbeams and you will always look lovely.”
quotes.author: Roald Dahl

quotes.quote: “My name is Celaena Sardothien," she whispered, "and I will not be afraid.”
quotes.author: Sarah J. Maas

quotes.quote: “Amor Fati – “Love Your Fate”, which is in fact your life.”
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: “Difficulties strengthen the mind, as labor does the body.”
quotes.author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quotes.quote: “I'm unpredictable, I never know where I'm going until I get there, I'm so random, I'm always growing, learning, changing, I'm never the same person twice. But one thing you can be sure of about me; is I will always do exactly what I want to do.”
quotes.author: C. JoyBell C.

quotes.quote: “The person in life that you will always be with the most, is yourself. Because even when you are with others, you are still with yourself, too! When you wake up in the morning, you are with yourself, laying in bed at night you are with yourself, walking down the street in the sunlight you are with yourself.What kind of person do you want to walk down the street with? What kind of person do you want to wake up in the morning with? What kind of person do you want to see at the end of the day before you fall asleep? Because that person is yourself, and it's your responsibility to be that person you want to be with. I know I want to spend my life with a person who knows how to let things go, who's not full of hate, who's able to smile and be carefree. So that's who I have to be.”
quotes.author: C. JoyBell C.

quotes.quote: “I've had a lot of worries in my life, most of which never happened.”
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: “Let me never fall into the vulgar mistake of dreaming that I am persecuted whenever I am contradicted.”
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: “We are like sculptors, constantly carving out of others the image we long for, need, love or desire, often against reality, against their benefit, and always, in the end, a disappointment, because it does not fit them.”
quotes.author: Anais Nin

quotes.quote: “Art is the proper task of life. ”
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: “A dream is a wish your heart makes, when you're fast asleep.”
quotes.author: Walt Disney Company

quotes.quote: “Certain thoughts are prayers. There are moments when, whatever be the attitude of the body, the soul is on its knees.”
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: “Don’t let others tell you what you can’t do. Don't let the limitations of others limit your vision. If you can remove your self-doubt and believe in yourself, you can achieve what you never thought possible.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “The dog is a gentleman; I hope to go to his heaven not man's.”
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: “You are, after all, what you think. Your emotions are the slaves to your thoughts, and you are the slave to your emotions.”
quotes.author: Elizabeth Gilbert

quotes.quote: “You're alive, Bod. That means you have infinite potential. You can do anything, make anything, dream anything. If you can change the world, the world will change. Potential. Once you're dead, it's gone. Over. You've made what you've made, dreamed your dream, written your name. You may be buried here, you may even walk. But that potential is finished.”
quotes.author: Neil Gaiman

quotes.quote: “Don't think about making life better for other people who don't even deserve you, rather, focus on making your life the best, for yourself and those who love you.”
quotes.author: C. JoyBell C.

quotes.quote: “Adapt what is useful, reject what is useless, and add what is specifically your own.”
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.quote: “The tears of the world are a constant quantity. For each one who begins to weep somewhere else another stops. The same is true of the laugh.”
quotes.author: Samuel Beckett

quotes.quote: “The best discoveries always happened to the people who weren't looking for them.”
quotes.author: Morgan Matson

quotes.quote: “Fake it 'till you make it.”
quotes.author: Gayle Forman

quotes.quote: “No matter who you are, no matter what you did, no matter where you've come from, you can always change, become a better version of yourself.”
quotes.author: Madonna

quotes.quote: “I know that pain is the most important thing in the universes. Greater than survival, greater than love, greater even than the beauty it brings about. For without pain, there can be no pleasure. Without sadness, there can be no happiness. Without misery there can be no beauty. And without these, life is endless, hopeless, doomed and damned.
quotes.author: Harlan Ellison

quotes.quote: “Let us rise up and be thankful, for if we didn't learn a lot at least we learned a little, and if we didn't learn a little, at least we didn't get sick, and if we got sick, at least we didn't die; so, let us all be thankful.”
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.quote: “Women, they have minds, and they have souls, as well as just hearts. And they’ve got ambition, and they’ve got talent, as well as just beauty. I’m so sick of people saying that love is all a woman is fit for.”
quotes.author: Louisa May Alcott

quotes.quote: “How would your life be different if…You walked away from gossip and verbal defamation? Let today be the day…You speak only the good you know of other people and encourage others to do the same.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “No man chooses evil because it is evil; he only mistakes it for happiness, the good he seeks.”
quotes.author: Mary Shelley

quotes.quote: “LAW 4
quotes.author: Robert Greene

quotes.quote: “Forget yesterday - it has already forgotten you. Don't sweat tomorrow - you haven't even met. Instead, open your eyes and your heart to a truly precious gift - today.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “But life is a battle: may we all be enabled to fight it well!”
quotes.author: Charlotte Brontë

quotes.quote: “Nothing is permanent in this wicked world, not even our troubles.”
quotes.author: Charlie Chaplin

quotes.quote: “The most important decision you make is to be in a good mood.”
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: “The easiest thing to be in the world is you. The most difficult thing to be is what other people want you to be. Don't let them put you in that position.”
quotes.author: Leo Buscaglia

quotes.quote: “Somehow, we'll find it. The balance between whom we wish to be and whom we need to be. But for now, we simply have to be satisfied with who we are.”
quotes.author: Brandon Sanderson

quotes.quote: “Attitude is a little thing that makes a big difference.”
quotes.author: Winston S. Churchill

quotes.quote: “I sustain myself with the love of family.”
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: “A hero is no braver than an ordinary man, but he is brave five minutes longer.”
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: “I've come to believe that each of us has a personal calling that's as unique as a fingerprint - and that the best way to succeed is to discover what you love and then find a way to offer it to others in the form of service, working hard, and also allowing the energy of the universe to lead you. ”
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: “I think that the best thing we can do for our children is to allow them to do things for themselves, allow them to be strong, allow them to experience life on their own terms, allow them to take the subway... let them be better people, let them believe more in themselves.”
quotes.author: C. JoyBell C.

quotes.quote: “Remember that everyone you meet is afraid of something, loves something and has lost something.”
quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown

quotes.quote: “You must take life the way it comes at you and make the best of it.”
quotes.author: Yann Martel

quotes.quote: “Always bear in mind that your own resolution to succeed is more important than any one thing.”
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: “All The Woulda-Coulda-Shouldas
quotes.author: Shel Silverstein

quotes.quote: “عجيبة هي الحياة بمنطقها المعاكس. أنت تركض خلف الأشياء لاهثاً، فتهرب الأشياء منك. وما تكاد تجلس وتقنع نفسك بأنها لا تستحق كل هذا الركض، حتى تأتيك هي لاهثة. وعندها لا تدري أيجب أن تدير لها ظهرك أم تفتح لها ذراعيك، وتتلقى هذه الهبة التي رمتها السماء إليك، والتي قد تكون فيها سعادتك، أو هلاكك؟”
quotes.author: أحلام مستغانمي

quotes.quote: “We all need to be mocked from time to time, lest we take ourselves too seriously.”
quotes.author: George R.R. Martin

quotes.quote: “To be rejected by someone doesn't mean you should also reject yourself or that you should think of yourself as a lesser person. It doesn't mean that nobody will ever love you anymore. Remember that only ONE person has rejected you at the moment, and it only hurt so much because to you, that person's opinion symbolized the opinion of the whole world, of God.”
quotes.author: Jocelyn Soriano

quotes.quote: “The universe is made of stories, not of atoms.”
quotes.author: Muriel Rukeyser

quotes.quote: “Life is funny. Things change, people change, but you will always be you, so stay true to yourself and never sacrifice who you are for anyone.”
quotes.author: Zayn Malik

quotes.quote: “The truth is that the world is full of dragons, and none of us are as powerful or cool as we’d like to be. And that sucks. But when you’re confronted with that fact, you can either crawl into a hole and quit, or you can get out there, take off your shoes, and Bilbo it up.”
quotes.author: Patrick Rothfuss

quotes.quote: “Anger is like flowing water; there's nothing wrong with it as long as you let it flow. Hate is like stagnant water; anger that you denied yourself the freedom to feel, the freedom to flow; water that you gathered in one place and left to forget. Stagnant water becomes dirty, stinky, disease-ridden, poisonous, deadly; that is your hate. On flowing water travels little paper boats; paper boats of forgiveness. Allow yourself to feel anger, allow your waters to flow, along with all the paper boats of forgiveness. Be human.”
quotes.author: C. JoyBell C.

quotes.quote: “Great leaders create more leaders, not followers.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “The fishermen know that the sea is dangerous and the storm terrible, but they have never found these dangers sufficient reason for remaining ashore.”
quotes.author: Vincent Van Gogh

quotes.quote: “You are willing to die, you coward, but not to live.”
quotes.author: Herman Hesse

quotes.quote: “Life doesn’t get easier or more forgiving, we get stronger and more resilient.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “Real magic can never be made by offering someone else's liver. You must tear out your own, and not expect to get it back.”
quotes.author: Peter S. Beagle

quotes.quote: “I want to live my life in such a way that when I get out of bed in the morning, the devil says, "aw shit, he's up!”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “To live is so startling it leaves little time for anything else.”
quotes.author: Emily Dickinson

quotes.quote: “If you start by promising what you don't even have yet, you'll lose your desire to work towards getting it.”
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: “Without leaps of imagination or dreaming, we lose the excitement of possibilities. Dreaming, after all is a form of planning.”
quotes.author: Gloria Steinem

quotes.quote: “Life is a process of becoming, a combination of states we have to go through. Where people fail is that they wish to elect a state and remain in it. This is a kind of death.”
quotes.author: ANAIS NIN

quotes.quote: “I trust that everything happens for a reason, even if we are not wise enough to see it.”
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: “We are the music-makers,
quotes.author: Arthur O'Shaughnessy

quotes.quote: “You are not the victim of the world, but rather the master of your own destiny. It is your choices and decisions that determine your destiny.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “This life is yours. Take the power to choose what you want to do and do it well. Take the power to love what you want in life and love it honestly. Take the power to walk in the forest and be a part of nature. Take the power to control your own life. No one else can do it for you. Take the power to make your life happy.”
quotes.author: Susan Polis Schutz

quotes.quote: “All I can be is me- whoever that is. ”
quotes.author: Bob Dylan

quotes.quote: “If you kin see de light at daybreak, you don't keer if you die at dusk. It's so many people never seen de light at all.”
quotes.author: Zora Neale Hurston
