quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

quotes.quote: “Reality is wrong. Dreams are for the real.”
quotes.author: Tupac Shakur

quotes.quote: “When I find myself in times of trouble, mother Mary comes to me,
quotes.author: Paul McCartney

quotes.quote: “Freedom is a heavy load, a great and strange burden for the spirit to undertake. It is not easy. It is not a gift given, but a choice made, and the choice may be a hard one. The road goes upward towards the light; but the laden traveler may never reach the end of it.”
quotes.author: Ursula K. LeGuin

quotes.quote: “Never, ever, let anyone tell you what you can and can't do. Prove the cynics wrong. Pity them for they have no imagination. The sky's the limit. Your sky. Your limit. Now. Let's dance.”
quotes.author: Tom Hiddleston

quotes.quote: “People who lack the clarity, courage, or determination to follow their own dreams will often find ways to discourage yours. When you change for the better, the people around you will be inspired to change also....but only after doing their best to make you stop. Live your truth and don't EVER stop.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “Yesterday is not ours to recover, but tomorrow is ours to win or lose.”
quotes.author: Lyndon B. Johnson

quotes.quote: “Love. Fall in love and stay in love. Write only what you love, and love what you write. The word is love. You have to get up in the morning and write something you love, something to live for.”
quotes.author: Ray Bradbury

quotes.quote: “I hate to say it, but shit really does happen. You just have to get over it. Beat the hell out of it by doing things that make you happy.”
quotes.author: J.A. Redmerski

quotes.quote: “My past has not defined me, destroyed me, deterred me, or defeated me; it has only strengthened me.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “Plant seeds of happiness, hope, success, and love; it will all come back to you in abundance. This is the law of nature.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “All men want, not something to do with, but something to do, or rather something to be.”
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: “The greatest discovery of any generation is that a human can alter his life by altering his attitude.”
quotes.author: William James

quotes.quote: “It is not uncommon for people to spend their whole life waiting to start living.”
quotes.author: Eckhart Tolle

quotes.quote: “I long to accomplish a great and noble task, but it is my chief duty to accomplish small tasks as if they were great and noble.”
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: “If they don't like you for being yourself, be yourself even more.”
quotes.author: Taylor Swift

quotes.quote: “I believe the simplest explanation is, there is no God. No one created the universe and no one directs our fate. This leads me to a profound realization that there probably is no heaven and no afterlife either. We have this one life to appreciate the grand design of the universe and for that, I am extremely grateful.”
quotes.author: Stephen Hawking

quotes.quote: “Always believe in yourself and always stretch yourself beyond your limits. Your life is worth a lot more than you think because you are capable of accomplishing more than you know. You have more potential than you think, but you will never know your full potential unless you keep challenging yourself and pushing beyond your own self imposed limits.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “Children betrayed their parents by becoming their own people.”
quotes.author: Leslye Walton

quotes.quote: “LAW 25
quotes.author: Robert Greene

quotes.quote: “Intellectual growth should commence at birth and cease only at death.”
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: “If you care about what you do and work hard at it, there isn't anything you can't do if you want to.”
quotes.author: Jim Henson

quotes.quote: “I try to avoid looking forward or backward, and try to keep looking upward.”
quotes.author: Charlotte Bronte

quotes.quote: “If you can't run, you crawl. If you can't crawl-- you find someone to carry you.”
quotes.author: Joss Whedon

quotes.quote: “Sometimes, as we're stumbling along in the dark, we hit something good.”
quotes.author: Susan Ee

quotes.quote: “Life's like a movie, write your own ending. Keep believing, keep pretending.”
quotes.author: Jim Henson

quotes.quote: “We all have two lives. The second one starts when we realize that we only have one.”
quotes.author: Tom Hiddleston

quotes.quote: “I am a flawed person. A brook with many stones, a clear blue sky with many blackbirds. I have many shortcomings. A rainbow that’s not long enough, a starry night with clouds. But I can only be thankful to the God who loves me just this way, and I can only be grateful to the people in my life who accept the clear blue sky with many blackbirds and who are patient with the rainbow that isn’t long enough. And because of this, I am taught love, because of this I love my God, and I love these people.”
quotes.author: C. JoyBell C.

quotes.quote: “There is a time in every man's education when he arrives at the conviction that envy is ignorance; that imitation is suicide; that he must take himself for better, for worse, as his portion; that though the wide universe is full of good, no kernel of nourishing corn can come to him but through his toil bestowed on that plot of ground which is given to him to till. The power which resides in him is new in nature, and none but he knows what that is which he can do, nor does he know until he has tried.”
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: “You can't outwit fate by standing on the sidelines placing little sidebets about the outcome of life. either you wade in and risk everything you have to play the game or you don't play at all. and if u don't play u can't win.”
quotes.author: Judith McNaught

quotes.quote: “As we go through life we gradually discover who we are, but the more we discover, the more we lose ourselves.”
quotes.author: Haruki Murakami

quotes.quote: “I’ve had many enemies over the years. If there’s one thing I’ve learned, it’s never engage in a fight you’re sure to lose. On the other hand, never let anyone who has insulted you get away with it. Bide your time and strike back when you’re in a position of strength—even if you no longer need to strike back.”
quotes.author: Steig Larson

quotes.quote: “Remake the world, a little at a time, each in your own corner of the world.”
quotes.author: Rick Riordan

quotes.quote: “Facing it, always facing it, that’s the way to get through. Face it.”
quotes.author: Conrad Joseph

quotes.quote: “It's just that in the Deep South, women learn at a young age that when the world is falling apart around you, it's time to take down the drapes and make a new dress.”
quotes.author: Karen Moning

quotes.quote: “Rock bottom became the solid foundation on which I rebuilt my life.”
quotes.author: J.K. Rowling

quotes.quote: “It is during our darkest moments that we must focus to see the light.”
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: “Indeed, learning to write may be part of learning to read. For all I know, writing comes out of a superior devotion to reading.”
quotes.author: Eudora Welty

quotes.quote: “Always be yourself, there's no one better!”
quotes.author: Selena Gomez

quotes.quote: “Gossip is just a tool to distract people who have nothing better to do from feeling jealous of those few of us still remaining with noble hearts.”
quotes.author: Anna Godbersen

quotes.quote: “It’s strange how dreams get under your skin and give your heart a test for what’s real and what’s imaginary.”
quotes.author: Jason Mraz

quotes.quote: “What we do see depends mainly on what we look for. ... In the same field the farmer will notice the crop, the geologists the fossils, botanists the flowers, artists the colouring, sportmen the cover for the game. Though we may all look at the same things, it does not all follow that we should see them.”
quotes.author: John Lubbock

quotes.quote: “Shine your light and make a positive impact on the world; there is nothing so honorable as helping improve the lives of others.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “The function of freedom is to free someone else.”
quotes.author: Toni Morrison

quotes.quote: “But why think about that when all the golden lands ahead of you and all kinds of unforseen events wait lurking to surprise you and make you glad you're alive to see?”
quotes.author: Jack Kerouac

quotes.quote: “To those human beings who are of any concern to me I wish suffering, desolation, sickness, ill-treatment, indignities—I wish that they should not remain unfamiliar with profound self-contempt, the torture of self-mistrust, the wretchedness of the vanquished: I have no pity for them, because I wish them the only thing that can prove today whether one is worth anything or not—that one endures.”
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: “We do not get to choose when in our lives we feel pain," said Matthew. "It comes when it comes, and we try to remember, even though we cannot imagine a day when it will release its hold on us, that all pain fades. All misery passes. Humanity is drawn to light, not darkness.”
quotes.author: Cassandra Clare

quotes.quote: “I am not what I ought to be, I am not what I want to be, I am not what I hope to be in another world; but still I am not what I once used to be, and by the grace of God I am what I am”
quotes.author: John Newton

quotes.quote: “Nikolai had been told that hope was dangerous, had been warned of it many times. But he’d never believed that. Hope was the wind that came from nowhere to fill your sails and carry you home.”
quotes.author: Leigh Bardugo

quotes.quote: “Anyone who knows me, should learn to know me again;
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: “Chaos is more freedom; in fact, total freedom. But no meaning. I want to be free to act, and I also want my actions to mean something.”
quotes.author: Audrey Niffenegger

quotes.quote: “No one is ever satisfied where he is.”
quotes.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

quotes.quote: “I have learned, that the person I have to ask for forgiveness from the most is: myself. You must love yourself. You have to forgive yourself, everyday, whenever you remember a shortcoming, a flaw, you have to tell yourself "That's just fine". You have to forgive yourself so much, until you don't even see those things anymore. Because that's what love is like.”
quotes.author: C. JoyBell C.

quotes.quote: “That which we persist in doing becomes easier to do, not that the nature of the thing has changed but that our power to do has increased.”
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: “If you can't you must, and if you must you can.”
quotes.author: Anthony Robbins

quotes.quote: “All changes, even the most longed for, have their melancholy; for what we leave behind us is a part of ourselves; we must die to one life before we can enter another.”
quotes.author: Anatole France

quotes.quote: “Closing The Cycle
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: “Only the gentle are ever really strong.”
quotes.author: James Dean

quotes.quote: “Listen to your life. See it for the fathomless mystery it is. In the boredom and pain of it, no less than in the excitement and gladness: touch, taste, smell your way to the holy and hidden heart of it, because in the last analysis all moments are key moments, and life itself is grace.”
quotes.author: Frederick Buechner

quotes.quote: “Sticking feathers up your butt does not make you a chicken!”
quotes.author: Chuck Palahniuk

quotes.quote: “Makakapili ka ng lugar na uupuan mo, pero hindi mo mapipili ang taong uupo sa puwang sa tabi mo... Ganyan ang senaryo sa bus. Ganyan din sa pag-ibig... Lalong 'di mo kontrolado kung kelan siya bababa.”
quotes.author: Bob Ong

quotes.quote: “You must accept the reality of other people. You think that reality is up for negotiation, that we think it's whatever you say it is. You must accept that we are as real as you are; you must accept that you are not God.”
quotes.author: J.K. Rowling

quotes.quote: “Life,” said Marvin dolefully, “loathe it or ignore it, you can’t like it.”
quotes.author: Douglas Adams

quotes.quote: “Written words can also sing.”
quotes.author: Ngũgĩ wa Thiong’o

quotes.quote: “May today there be peace within.
quotes.author: Minnie Louise Haskins

quotes.quote: “Anything is possible. Anything can be.”
quotes.author: Shel Silverstein

quotes.quote: “Jamie: You know what I figured out today?
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.quote: “When your will is God's will, you will have your will.”
quotes.author: Charles Spurgeon

quotes.quote: “إن الأدب يؤدي إلي تغيير إنساني يجعل الإنسان أكثر رقيا وأكثر رحابة ويعمل علي زيادة معرفة النفس البشرية، كما يجعل الإنسان يفهم الآخرين قبل الحكم عليهم”
quotes.author: علاء الأسواني

quotes.quote: “You are not a victim. No matter what you have been through, you're still here. You may have been challenged, hurt, betrayed, beaten, and discouraged, but nothing has defeated you. You are still here! You have been delayed but not denied. You are not a victim, you are a victor. You have a history of victory.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “Seize the moments of happiness, love and be loved! That is the only reality in the world, all else is folly. It is the one thing we are interested in here.”
quotes.author: Leo Tolstoy

quotes.quote: “Just because someone desires you, it does not mean that they value you.
quotes.author: Nayyirah Waheed

quotes.quote: “Every day People straighten up the hair, why not the heart?”
quotes.author: che guevara

quotes.quote: “Whatever you think, be sure it is what you think; whatever you want, be sure that is what you want; whatever you feel, be sure that is what you feel.”
quotes.author: T.S. Eliot

quotes.quote: “Life is essentially an endless series of problems. The solution to one problem is merely the creation of another.”
quotes.author: Mark Manson

quotes.quote: “I cannot compromise my respect for your love. You can keep your love, I will keep my respect.”
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: “I think the act of reading imbues the reader with a sensitivity toward the outside world that people who don't read can sometimes lack. I know it seems like a contradiction in terms; after all reading is such a solitary, internalizing act that it appears to represent a disengagement from day-to-day life. But reading, and particularly the reading of fiction, encourages us to view the world in new and challenging ways...It allows us to inhabit the consciousness of another which is a precursor to empathy, and empathy is, for me, one of the marks of a decent human being.”
quotes.author: John Connolly

quotes.quote: “With great power comes great responsibility.”
quotes.author: Stan Lee

quotes.quote: “Happiness is always there. You just have to choose to see it. There's no point dwelling in the dark and ignoring the light of the stars.”
quotes.author: Carrie Hope Fletcher

quotes.quote: “Consistency is the true foundation of trust. Either keep your promises or do not make them.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “It's funny how, in this journey of life, even though we may begin at different times and places, our paths cross with others so that we may share our love, compassion, observations, and hope. This is a design of God that I appreciate and cherish.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “The caged bird sings with a fearful trill,
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: “There isn't time, so brief is life, for bickerings, apologies, heartburnings, callings to account. There is only time for loving, and but an instant, so to speak, for that.”
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: “Ah, but a man's reach should exceed his grasp,
quotes.author: Robert Browning

quotes.quote: “First you jump off the cliff and build your wings on the way down.”
quotes.author: Ray Bradbury

quotes.quote: “And I thought that all those little kids are going to grow up someday. And all of those little kids are going to do the things that we do. And they will all kiss someone someday. But for now, sledding is enough. I think it would be great if sledding were always enough, but it isn't.”
quotes.author: Stephen Chbosky

quotes.quote: “الحزن عنصر ضروري لنكون بشراً، أما السعادة فشيء استثنائي، وجوده أو عدمه لا يؤثر في إنسانيتنا”
quotes.author: محمد حسن علوان

quotes.quote: “We dance round in a ring and suppose,
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: “Always forgive, but never forget, else you will be a prisoner of your own hatred, and doomed to repeat your mistakes forever.”
quotes.author: Wil Zeus

quotes.quote: “One mistake does not have to rule a person's entire life.”
quotes.author: Joyce Meyer

quotes.quote: “Nothing ever really goes away--it just changes into something else. Something beautiful.”
quotes.author: Sarah Ockler

quotes.quote: “Deciding whether or not to trust a person is like deciding whether or not to climb a tree because you might get a wonderful view from the highest branch or you might simply get covered in sap and for this reason many people choose to spend their time alone and indoors where it is harder to get a splinter.”
quotes.author: Lemony Snicket

quotes.quote: “When you take risks you learn that there will be times when you succeed and there will be times when you fail, and both are equally important.”
quotes.author: Ellen DeGeneres

quotes.quote: “We travel, initially, to lose ourselves; and we travel, next to find ourselves. We travel to open our hearts and eyes and learn more about the world than our newspapers will accommodate. We travel to bring what little we can, in our ignorance and knowledge, to those parts of the globe whose riches are differently dispersed. And we travel, in essence, to become young fools again- to slow time down and get taken in, and fall in love once more.”
quotes.author: Pico Iyer

quotes.quote: “لا يكن تأخر العطاء مع الالحاح في الدعاء موجباً ليأسك ، فهو ضمن لك الاجابة فيما يختاره لك لا فيما تختاره لنفسك”
quotes.author: أحمد بن عطاء الله السكندري

quotes.quote: “Are you on our side...and want to be different, or are you on that side and want to throw a football at my head!?”
quotes.author: Gerard Way

quotes.quote: “Fear robs you of your freedom to make the right choice in life that can bridge the gap between where you are and where you want to be. On the other side of fear, lies freedom. If you want to grow, you need to be brave and take risks. If you're not uncomfortable, you're not growing.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “Life teaches us the right path is rarely the easy one.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “Stay strong, stay positive, and never give up.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “Awake, arise or be for ever fall’n.”
quotes.author: John Milton

quotes.quote: “Whenever you feel afraid, just remember. Courage is the root of change - and change is what we're chemically designed to do. So when you wake up tomorrow, make this pledge. No more holding yourself back. No more subscribing to others' opinions of what you can and cannot achieve. And no more allowing anyone to pigeonhole you into useless categories of sex, race, economic status, and religion. Do not allow your talents to lie dormant, ladies. Design your own future. When you go home today, ask yourself what YOU will change. And then get started.”
quotes.author: Bonnie Garmus

quotes.quote: “I am who I am; no more, no less.”
quotes.author: Terry Goodkind

quotes.quote: “I love you, in my mind where my thoughts reside, in my heart where my emotions live, and in my soul where my dreams are born. I love you.”
quotes.author: Dee Henderson

quotes.quote: “Dream your own dreams, achieve your own goals. Your journey is your own and unique.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “You don't need anybody to tell you who you are or what you are. You are what you are!”
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.quote: “An individual has not started living until he can rise above the narrow confines of his individualistic concerns to the broader concerns of all humanity.”
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.quote: “When I hear music, I fear no danger. I am invulnerable. I see no foe. I am related to the earliest times, and to the latest.”
quotes.author: HENRY DAVID THOREAU

quotes.quote: “No man ever threw away life while it was worth keeping.”
quotes.author: David Hume

quotes.quote: “Great Leaders Create More Leaders
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “You know what I can't understand? You have all these people telling you all the time how great you are, smart and funny and talented and all that, I mean endlessly, I've been telling you for years. So why don't you believe it? why do you think people say that stuff, Em? Do you think it's a conspiracy, people secretly ganging up to be nice about you?”
quotes.author: David Nicholls

quotes.quote: “Maybe we've lived a thousand lives before this one and in each of them we've found each other... I know I've spent each life before this one searching for you. Not someone like you but you, for your soul and mine must always come together.”
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.quote: “Early to bed and early to rise makes a man healthy, wealthy, and wise.”
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: “You were not born on earth to please anyone; you have to live life to express yourself, not to impress someone. Don't pretend to be someone you're not, and never lose yourself in search of other people's acceptance and approval.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “The tree of which we are branches on, makes choices yesterday, by the choices we make today.”
quotes.author: Matthew Edward Hall

quotes.quote: “Be with someone who inspires you and makes you be the best version of yourself.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “The purpose of literature is to turn blood into ink.”
quotes.author: T.S. Eliot

quotes.quote: “But I will not run. I wouldn't be standing here if I'd quit every time something seemed impossible to overcome. I will not die today.”
quotes.author: Rebecca Yarros

quotes.quote: “Tolerance of intolerance is cowardice.”
quotes.author: Ayaan Hirsi Ali

quotes.quote: “The greatest step towards a life of simplicity is to learn to let go.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “...Despite the mayhem that followed, Bruno found that he was still holding Shmuel's hand in his own and nothing in the world would have persuaded him to let go.”
quotes.author: John Boyne

quotes.quote: “no matter how ugly the world gets or how stupid it shows me it is, I always have faith”
quotes.author: Gerard Way

quotes.quote: “In our world," said Eustace, "a star is a huge ball of flaming gas."
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: “The right thing at the wrong tme is the wrong thing.”
quotes.author: Joshua Harris

quotes.quote: “In this sad world of ours, sorrow comes to all; and, to the young, it comes with bitterest agony, because it takes them unawares. The older have learned to ever expect it. I am anxious to afford some alleviation of your present distress. Perfect relief is not possible, except with time. You can not now realize that you will ever feel better. Is not this so? And yet it is a mistake. You are sure to be happy again. To know this, which is certainly true, will make you some less miserable now. I have had experience enough to know what I say; and you need only to believe it, to feel better at once.”
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: “You have every right to a beautiful life.”
quotes.author: Selena Gomez

quotes.quote: “Beyond work and love, I would add two other ingredients that give meaning to life. First, to fulfill whatever talents we are born with. However blessed we are by fate with different abilities and strengths, we should try to develop them to the fullest, rather than allow them to atrophy and decay. We all know individuals who did not fulfill the promise they showed in childhood. Many of them became haunted by the image of what they might have become. Instead of blaming fate, I think we should accept ourselves as we are and try to fulfill whatever dreams are within our capability.
quotes.author: Michio Kaku

quotes.quote: “Every choice comes with a consequence. Once you make a choice, you must accept responsibility. You cannot escape the consequences of your choices, whether you like them or not.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “Difficulties and adversities viciously force all their might on us and cause us to fall apart, but they are necessary elements of individual growth and reveal our true potential. We have got to endure and overcome them, and move forward. Never lose hope. Storms make people stronger and never last forever.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “Push your boundaries beyond the ordinary; be that “extra” in “extraordinary.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “Anything under God's control is never out of control.”
quotes.author: Charles Swindoll

quotes.quote: “There is nothing more beautiful than seeing a person being themselves. Imagine going through your day being unapologetically you.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “it is impossible to build one's own happiness on the unhappiness of others. This perspective is at the heart of Buddhist teachings.”
quotes.author: Daisaku Ikeda

quotes.quote: “Myth is much more important and true than history. History is just journalism and you know how reliable that is.”
quotes.author: Joseph Campbell

quotes.quote: “For all those that have to fight for the respect that everyone else is given without question.”
quotes.author: N.K. Jemisin

quotes.quote: “Do not wait: the time will never be 'just right'. Start where you stand, and work whatever tools you may have at your command and better tools will be found as you go along.”
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.quote: “You can’t go back and make a new start, but you can start right now and make a brand new ending.”
quotes.author: James R. Sherman

quotes.quote: “I am what I am, an’ I’m not ashamed. 'Never be ashamed,’ my ol’ dad used ter say, ‘there’s some who’ll hold it against you, but they’re not worth botherin’ with.”
quotes.author: J.K. Rowling

quotes.quote: “A path is only a path, and there is no affront, to oneself or to others, in dropping it if that is what your heart tells you . . . Look at every path closely and deliberately. Try it as many times as you think necessary. Then ask yourself alone, one question . . . Does this path have a heart? If it does, the path is good; if it doesn't it is of no use.”
quotes.author: Carlos Castaneda

quotes.quote: “Wanderer, your footsteps are the road, and nothing more; wanderer, there is no road, the road is made by walking. By walking one makes the road, and upon glancing behind one sees the path that never will be trod again. Wanderer, there is no road-- Only wakes upon the sea.
quotes.author: Antonio Machado

quotes.quote: “Death is the easy part, the hard part is living and knowing you could be so much more then you’re willing to be.”
quotes.author: robert m drake

quotes.quote: “I give myself a good cry if I need it. But then I concentrate on the good things still in my life. I don't allow myself any more self-pity than that. A little each every morning, a few tears, and that's all.”
quotes.author: Mitch Albom

quotes.quote: “If a bullet should enter my brain, let that bullet destroy every closet door.”
quotes.author: Harvey Milk

quotes.quote: “Those three things - autonomy, complexity, and a connection between effort and reward - are, most people will agree, the three qualities that work has to have if it is to be satisfying.”
quotes.author: Malcolm Gladwell

quotes.quote: “There comes a time when we realize that our parents cannot save themselves or save us, that everyone who wades through time eventually gets dragged out to sea by the undertow- that, in short, we are all going.”
quotes.author: John Green

quotes.quote: “Living well is an art that can be developed: a love of life and ability to take great pleasure from small offerings and assurance that the world owes you nothing and that every gift is exactly that, a gift. ”
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: “...even a tiny bit of deceit is dishonorable when it's used for selfish or cowardly reasons.
quotes.author: Jeanne Birdsall

quotes.quote: “Every person, all the events of your life are there because you have drawn them there. What you choose to do with them is up to you.”
quotes.author: Richard Bach

quotes.quote: “The past can't hurt you anymore. Not unless you let it. They made you into a victim, Evey. They made you into a statistic. But, that's not the real you. That's not who you are inside.”
quotes.author: Alan Moore

quotes.quote: “Anxiety is the handmaiden of creativity”
quotes.author: T.S. Eliot

quotes.quote: “This place is a dream. Only a sleeper considers it real. Then death comes like dawn, and you wake up laughing at what you thought was your grief.”
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: “Perfect is the enemy of good.”
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: “Let us live so that when we come to die even the undertaker will be sorry.”
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: “Call him Voldemort, Harry. Always use the proper name for things. Fear of a name increases fear of the thing itself.”
quotes.author: J.K. Rowling

quotes.quote: “I don't know why people are afraid of lust. Then I can imagine that they are very afraid of me, for I have a great lust for everything. A lust for life, a lust for how the summer-heated street feels beneath my feet, a lust for the touch of another's skin on my skin...a lust for everything. I even lust after cake. Yes, I am very lusty and very scary.”
quotes.author: C. JoyBell C.

quotes.quote: “Go out in the woods, go out. If you don't go out in the woods nothing will ever happen and your life will never begin.”
quotes.author: Clarissa Pinkola Estés

quotes.quote: “All the problem of women, starts with men. All the problem of men, ends with women.”
quotes.author: Santosh Kalwar

quotes.quote: “How much you can learn when you fail determines how far you will go into achieving your goals.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “Change course, but don’t give up.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “He couldn’t save the world outright, but he could aid it by living a life of integrity and contentment. If enough people did the same, the hundredth monkey effect would reshape the world, and in this way, he would be saving the world within a collective effort. Till then, he’d dive deeper and deeper into the calming depths of the sea, safe from the storms on the surface. And when he found himself coming up for air to interact with an unbalanced person who was stuck in the methodical illusion of the game, it would be his wealth of knowledge instead of his wealth of coin that would allow him to act like a cruise liner upon the surface of the sea, too immense for waves to agitate.”
quotes.author: Jasun Ether

quotes.quote: “Opinion is really the lowest form of human knowledge. It requires no accountability, no understanding. The highest form of knowledge… is empathy, for it requires us to suspend our egos and live in another’s world. It requires profound purpose larger than the self kind of understanding.”
quotes.author: Bill Bullard

quotes.quote: “Success is determined not by whether or not you face obstacles, but by your reaction to them. And if you look at these obstacles as a containing fence, they become your excuse for failure. If you look at them as a hurdle, each one strengthens you for the next.”
quotes.author: Ben Carson

quotes.quote: “There are not more than five musical notes, yet the combinations of these five give rise to more melodies than can ever be heard.
quotes.author: Sun Tzu

quotes.quote: “Consider it: every person you have ever met, every person will suffer the loss of his friends and family. All are going to lose everything they love in this world. Why would one want to be anything but kind to them in the meantime?”
quotes.author: Sam Harris

quotes.quote: “I wish I could've lived my life without making any wrong turns. But that's impossible. A path like that doesn't exist. We fail. We trip. We get lost. We make mistakes. And little by little, one step at a time, we push forward. It's all we can do. On our own two feet.”
quotes.author: Natsuki Takaya

quotes.quote: “By declaring that man is responsible and must actualize the potential meaning of his life, I wish to stress that the true meaning of life is to be discovered in the world rather than within man or his own psyche, as though it were a closed system. I have termed this constitutive characteristic "the self-transcendence of human existence." It denotes the fact that being human always points, and is directed, to something or someone, other than oneself--be it a meaning to fulfill or another human being to encounter. The more one forgets himself--by giving himself to a cause to serve or another person to love--the more human he is and the more he actualizes himself. What is called self-actualization is not an attainable aim at all, for the simple reason that the more one would strive for it, the more he would miss it. In other words, self-actualization is possible only as a side-effect of self-transcendence.”
quotes.author: Viktor E. Frankl

quotes.quote: “Give up to grace. The ocean takes care of each wave 'til it gets to shore. You need more help than you know.”
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: “a wind has blown the rain away & the sky away & all the leaves away, & the trees stand. i think i, too, have known autumn too long.”
quotes.author: e.e. cummings

quotes.quote: “Don't marry a rich man. Marry a good man. He will spend his life trying to keep you happy. No rich man can buy that!”
quotes.author: Staness Jonekos

quotes.quote: “Mutual caring relationships require kindness and patience, tolerance, optimism, joy in the other's achievements, confidence in oneself, and the ability to give without undue thought of gain.”
quotes.author: Fred Rogers

quotes.quote: “Courage does not always roar. Sometimes courage is the quiet voice at the end of the day saying, 'I will try again tomorrow.”
quotes.author: Mary Anne Radmacher

quotes.quote: “The beauty of the world...has two edges, one of laughter, one of anguish, cutting the heart asunder.”
quotes.author: Virginia Woolf

quotes.quote: “No, our science is no illusion. But an illusion it would be to suppose that what science cannot give us we can get elsewhere.”
quotes.author: Sigmund Freud

quotes.quote: “Love those you hate you.”
quotes.author: Leo Tolstoy

quotes.quote: “A thing of beauty is a joy for ever:
quotes.author: John Keats

quotes.quote: “If the only prayer you say throughout your life is "Thank You," then that will be enough.”
quotes.author: Elie Wiesel

quotes.quote: “It serves me right for putting all my eggs in one bastard.”
quotes.author: Dorothy Parker

quotes.quote: “But in the end it's only a passing thing, this shadow; even darkness must pass.”
quotes.author: J.R.R. Tolkien

quotes.quote: “The most exquisite paradox… as soon as you give it all up, you can have it all. As long as you want power, you can't have it. The minute you don't want power, you'll have more than you ever dreamed possible.”
quotes.author: ram dass

quotes.quote: “You can't find someone who doesn't want to be found.”
quotes.author: Isabel Allende

quotes.quote: “Arrange whatever pieces come your way.”
quotes.author: Virginia Woolf

quotes.quote: “The further you go, the more you have to be proud of. At the same time, in order to come a long way, you have to be behind to begin with. IN the end, though maybe it's not how you reach a place that matters. Just that you get there at all.”
quotes.author: Sarah Dessen

quotes.quote: “When you're screwing up and nobody says anything to you anymore, that means they've given up on you.”
quotes.author: Randy Pausch

quotes.quote: “I wonder,” he said, “whether the stars are set alight in heaven so that one day each one of us may find his own again...”
quotes.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

quotes.quote: “I want you to know
quotes.author: Pablo Neruda

quotes.quote: “I want to continue being crazy; living my life the way I dream it, and not the way the other people want it to be.”
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: “We are all of us born with a letter inside us, and that only if we are true to ourselves, may we be allowed to read it before we die.”
quotes.author: Douglas Coupland

quotes.quote: “أعتقد يعني ان الدليل على ان روحك بتكبر فعلا هو ان مفاهيمك تتغير. مش مبادئك, مفاهيمك.”
quotes.author: أحمد العسيلي

quotes.quote: “With your head full of brains and your shoes full of feet, you're too smart to go down any not-so-good street.”
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.quote: “Pac said Thug Life stood for 'The Hate U Give Little Infants Fucks Everybody'.”
quotes.author: Angie Thomas

quotes.quote: “Laughter is carbonated holiness.”
quotes.author: Anne Lamott

quotes.quote: “Do your best and let God do the rest.”
quotes.author: Ben Carson

quotes.quote: “So many people live within unhappy circumstances and yet will not take the initiative to change their situation because they are conditioned to a life of security, conformity, and conservatism, all of which may appear to give one peace of mind, but in reality nothing is more damaging to the adventurous spirit within a man than a secure future. The very basic core of a man's living spirit is his passion for adventure. The joy of life comes from our encounters with new experiences and hence there is no greater joy than to have an endlessly changing horizon, for each day to have a new and different sun.”
quotes.author: Christopher McCandless

quotes.quote: “How would your life be different if…You stopped worrying about things you can’t control and started focusing on the things you can? Let today be the day…You free yourself from fruitless worry, seize the day and take effective action on things you can change.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “Have you ever seen the stars in the night? See them closely, they will tell you, how to be open, how to love and how to shine and twinkle without any differences and jealousy of other stars.”
quotes.author: Santosh Kalwar

quotes.quote: “Because," explained Mary Rommely simply, "the child must have a valuable thing which is called imagination. The child must have a secret world in which live things that never were. It is necessary that she believe. She must start out by believing in things not of this world. Then when the world becomes too ugly for living in, the child can reach back and live in her imagination. I, myself, even in this day and at my age, have great need of recalling the miraculous lives of the Saints and the great miracles that have come to pass on earth. Only by having these things in my mind can I live beyond what I have to live for.”
quotes.author: Betty Smith

quotes.quote: “Love demands everything, they say, but my love demands only this: that no matter what happens or how long it takes, you`ll keep faith in me, you`ll remember who we are, and you`ll never feel despair.”
quotes.author: Ann Brashares

quotes.quote: “You should never assume. You know what happens when you assume. You make an ass out of you and me because that's how it's spelled.”
quotes.author: Ellen DeGeneres

quotes.quote: “Find a purpose to serve, not a lifestyle to live.”
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: “A winner is a dreamer who never gives up”
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: “My heart, which is so full to overflowing, has often been solaced and refreshed by music when sick and weary.”
quotes.author: Martin Luther

quotes.quote: “Failures are the stairs we climb to reach success.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “People would rather believe than know.”
quotes.author: Edward O. Wilson

quotes.quote: “Take wrong turns. Talk to strangers. Open unmarked doors. And if you see a group of people in a field, go find out what they are doing. Do things without always knowing how they'll turn out. You're curious and smart and bored, and all you see is the choice between working hard and slacking off. There are so many adventures that you miss because you're waiting to think of a plan. To find them, look for tiny interesting choices. And remember that you are always making up the future as you go.”
quotes.author: Randall Munroe

quotes.quote: “Today is a new day. Don't let your history interfere with your destiny! Let today be the day you stop being a victim of your circumstances and start taking action towards the life you want. You have the power and the time to shape your life. Break free from the poisonous victim mentality and embrace the truth of your greatness. You were not meant for a mundane or mediocre life!”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “The amazing thing is that every atom in your body came from a star that exploded. And, the atoms in your left hand probably came from a different star than your right hand. It really is the most poetic thing I know about physics: You are all stardust. You couldn’t be here if stars hadn’t exploded, because the elements - the carbon, nitrogen, oxygen, iron, all the things that matter for evolution - weren’t created at the beginning of time. They were created in the nuclear furnaces of stars, and the only way they could get into your body is if those stars were kind enough to explode. So, forget Jesus. The stars died so that you could be here today.”
quotes.author: Lawrence M. Krauss

quotes.quote: “I'm beginning to think that maybe it's not just how much you love someone. Maybe what matters is who you are when you're with them.”
quotes.author: Anne Tyler

quotes.quote: “Create a vision for the life you really want and then work relentlessly towards making it a reality.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “Do not pray for easy lives. Pray to be stronger men.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: “If someone does not want me it is not the end of the world. But if I do not want me, the world is nothing but endings.”
quotes.author: Nayyirah Waheed

quotes.quote: “Your daughter is ugly.
quotes.author: Warsan Shire

quotes.quote: “Sometimes I arrive just when God's ready to have somone click the shutter.”
quotes.author: Ansel Adams

quotes.quote: “You know, the mind is a remarkable thing. Just because you can't see the wound doesn't mean it isn't hurting. It scars all the time, but it heals.”
quotes.author: Jodi Picoult

quotes.quote: “When we blindly adopt a religion, a political system, a literary dogma, we become automatons.”
quotes.author: Anaïs Nin

quotes.quote: “That's everyone's dream, isn't it, really? Instead of many who give you little pieces of themselves-one who gives you everything.”
quotes.author: Cassandra Clare

quotes.quote: “Do not give way to useless alarm; though it is right to be prepared for the worst, there is no occasion to look on it as certain.”
quotes.author: Jane Austen

quotes.quote: “You are never too old to set another goal, or to dream a new dream.”
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.quote: “Let us pick up our books and our pens, they are the most powerful weapons.”
quotes.author: Malala Yousafzai

quotes.quote: “I am no king, and I am no lord,
quotes.author: Peter S. Beagle

quotes.quote: “Be where you are, stop over-thinking, and focus on what you are doing.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “In case you never get a second chance: don't be afraid!" "And what if you do get a second chance?" "You take it!”
quotes.author: C. JoyBell C.

quotes.quote: “Don't find fault, find a remedy; anybody can complain”
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: “Be comforted, dear soul! There is always light behind the clouds.”
quotes.author: Louisa May Alcott

quotes.quote: “Life will hit you hard in the face, wait for you to get back up just so it can kick you in the stomach. But getting the wind knocked out of you is the only way to remind your lungs how much they like the taste of air.”
quotes.author: Sarah Kay

quotes.quote: “Look at children. Of course they may quarrel, but generally speaking they do not harbor ill feelings as much or as long as adults do. Most adults have the advantage of education over children, but what is the use of an education if they show a big smile while hiding negative feelings deep inside? Children dont usually act in such a manner. If they feel angry with someone, they express it, and then it is finished. They can still play with that person the following day.”
quotes.author: Dalai Lama XIV

quotes.quote: “Love art in yourself, and not yourself in art.”
quotes.author: Constantin Stanislavski

quotes.quote: “People who have a religion should be glad, for not everyone has the gift of believing in heavenly things. You don't necessarily even have to be afraid of punishment after death; purgatory, hell, and heaven are things that a lot of people can't accept, but still a religion, it doesn't matter which, keeps a person on the right path. It isn't the fear of God but the upholding of one's own honor and conscience. How noble and good everyone could be if, every evening before falling asleep, they were to recall to their minds the events of the while day and consider exactly what has been good and bad. Then, without realizing it you try to improve yourself at the start of each new day; of course, you achieve quite a lot in the course of time. Anyone can do this, it costs nothing and is certainly very helpful. Whoever doesn't know it must learn and find by experience that: "A quiet conscience mades one strong!”
quotes.author: Anne Frank

quotes.quote: “Wahai, wanita-wanita yang hingga usia tiga puluh, empat puluh, atau lebih dari itu, tapi belum juga menikah (mungkin kerana kekurangan fizikal, tidak ada kesempatan, atau tidak pernah 'terpilih' di dunia yang amat keterlaluan mencintai harta dan penampilan wajah.) Yakinlah, wanita-wanita solehah yang sendiri, namun tetap mengisi hidupnya dengan indah, bersedekah dan berkongsi, berbuat baik dan bersyukur. Kelak di hari akhir sungguh akan menjadi bidadari-bidadari syurga. Dan khabar baik itu pastilah benar, bidadari syurga parasnya cantik luar biasa.”
quotes.author: Tere Liye

quotes.quote: “Great men are like eagles, and build their nest on some lofty solitude”
quotes.author: Arthur Schopenhauer

quotes.quote: “I believe in the immeasurable power of love; that true love can endure any circumstance and reach across any distance.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “By hook or by crook, I hope that you will possess yourselves of money enough to travel and to idle, to contemplate the future or the past of the world, to dream over books and loiter at street corners and let the line of thought dip deep into the stream”
quotes.author: Virginia Woolf

quotes.quote: “Dream, Dream Dream
quotes.author: APJ ABDUL KALAM

quotes.quote: “The harder you fall, the heavier your heart; the heavier your heart, the stronger you climb; the stronger you climb, the higher your pedestal.”
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: “Make voyages. Attempt them. There's nothing else.”
quotes.author: Tennesse Williams

quotes.quote: “Two things fill the mind with ever-increasing wonder and awe, the more often and the more intensely the mind of thought is drawn to them: the starry heavens above me and the moral law within me.”
quotes.author: Immanuel Kant

quotes.quote: “If I had to choose between betraying my country and betraying my friend, I hope I should have the guts to betray my country.”
quotes.author: E.M. Forster

quotes.quote: “If it can be destroyed by the truth, it deserves to be destroyed by the truth.”
quotes.author: Carl Sagan

quotes.quote: “I do not believe that sheer suffering teaches. If suffering alone taught, all the world would be wise, since everyone suffers. To suffering must be added mourning, understanding, patience, love, openness, and the willingness to remain vulnerable.”
quotes.author: Anne Morrow Lindbergh

quotes.quote: “We humans do not understand compassion. In each moment of our lives, we betray it. Aye, we know of its worth, yet in knowing we then attach to it a value, we guard the giving of it, believing it must be earned, T’lan Imass. Compassion is priceless in the truest sense of the word. It must be given freely. In abundance.”
quotes.author: Steven Erikson

quotes.quote: “You can have everything you want if you can put your heart and soul into everything you do.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “We judge ourselves by what we feel capable of doing, while others judge us by what we have already done.”
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.quote: “She was beautiful, but not like those girls in magazines. She was beautiful, for the way she thought. She was beautiful, for the sparkle in her eyes when she talked about something she loved. She was beautiful, for her ability to make other people smile, even if she was sad. No, she wasn't beautiful for something as temporary as her looks. She was beautiful, deep down to her soul. She is beautiful.”
quotes.author: F Scott Fitzgerald

quotes.quote: “One of the penalties of an ecological education is that one lives alone in a world of wounds. Much of the damage inflicted on land is quite invisible to laymen. An ecologist must either harden his shell and make believe that the consequences of science are none of his business, or he must be the doctor who sees the marks of death in a community that believes itself well and does not want to be told otherwise.”
quotes.author: Aldo Leopold

quotes.quote: “What if I mess up?"
quotes.author: Victoria Schwab

quotes.quote: “A man, though wise, should never be ashamed of learning more, and must unbend his mind.”
quotes.author: Sophocles

quotes.quote: “Write while the heat is in you. The writer who postpones the recording of his thoughts uses an iron which has cooled to burn a hole with. He cannot inflame the minds of his audience.”
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: “It is quite a revelation to discover that the place you wanted to escape to is the exact same place you escaped from. That the prison wasn't the place, but the perspective.”
quotes.author: Matt Haig

quotes.quote: “The second thing you have to do to be a writer is to keep on writing. Don't listen to people who tell you that very few people get published and you won't be one of them. Don't listen to your friend who says you are better that Tolkien and don't have to try any more. Keep writing, keep faith in the idea that you have unique stories to tell, and tell them. I meet far too many people who are going to be writers 'someday.' When they are out of high school, when they've finished college, after the wedding, when the kids are older, after I retire . . . That is such a trap You will never have any more free time than you do right now. So, whether you are 12 or 70, you should sit down today and start being a writer if that is what you want to do. You might have to write on a notebook while your kids are playing on the swings or write in your car on your coffee break. That's okay. I think we've all 'been there, done that.' It all starts with the writing. ”
quotes.author: Robin Hobb

quotes.quote: “The adventure of life is to learn.
quotes.author: William Arthur Ward

quotes.quote: “I advise you to stop sharing your dreams with people who try to hold you back, even if they're your parents. Because, if you're the kind of person who senses there's something out there for you beyond whatever it is you're expected to do - if you want to be EXTRA-ordinary- you will not get there by hanging around a bunch of people who tell you you're not extraordinary. Instead, you will probably
quotes.author: Kelly Cutrone

quotes.quote: “Do your own thing on your own terms and get what you came here for”
quotes.author: Oliver James

quotes.quote: “The language of Friendship is not words, but meanings.”
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: “The decisions I made after that moment were not the ones she would have made. They were the choices of a changed person, a new self.
quotes.author: Tara Westover

quotes.quote: “Ten spears go to battle," he whispered, "and nine shatter. Did the warthe one that remained? No, Amaran. All the war did was.”
quotes.author: Brandon Sanderson

quotes.quote: “Jesus Christ lived in the midst of his enemies. At the end all his disciples deserted him. On the Cross he was utterly alone, surrounded by evildoers and mockers. For this cause he had come, to bring peace to the enemies of God. So the Christian, too, belongs not in the seclusion of a cloistered life but in the thick of foes. There is his commission, his work. 'The kingdom is to be in the midst of your enemies. And he who will not suffer this does not want to be of the Kingdom of Christ; he wants to be among friends, to sit among roses and lilies, not with the bad people but the devout people. O you blasphemers and betrayers of Christ! If Christ had done what you are doing who would ever have been spared' (Luther).”
quotes.author: Dietrich Bonhoeffer

quotes.quote: “If I've learned one lesson from all that's happened to me, it's that there is no such thing as the biggest mistake of your existence. There's no such thing as ruining your life. Life's a pretty resilient thing, it turns out.”
quotes.author: Sophie Kinsella

quotes.quote: “If you surrendered to the air, you could ride it.”
quotes.author: Toni Morrison

quotes.quote: “Collective madness is called sanity ..”
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: “It is not worth the while to let our imperfections disturb us always.”
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: “We hunt the flame, the light in the darkness, the good this world deserves.”
quotes.author: Hafsah Faizal

quotes.quote: “All the time you're saying to yourself, 'I could do that, but I won't,' — which is just another way of saying that you can't.”
quotes.author: Richard P. Feynman

quotes.quote: “God is subtle but he is not malicious.”
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: “One of the pitfalls of childhood is that one doesn't have to understand something to feel it. By the time the mind is able to comprehend what has happened, the wounds of the heart are already too deep.”
quotes.author: Carlos Ruiz Zafón

quotes.quote: “الرجل درع المرأة الواقي من كل ما هو خارجي و مؤذ، والمرأة درعه الداخلي من اقلابات روحه على جسده ،كلاهما يحميان بعضهما، واذا كانت المرأه قادرة على الاستغناء عن الرجل، و حماية نفسها استنادا الى المجتمع والقانون، فقد لا يجد الرجل ما يغنيه عنها، فليس في قوانين الدنيا ما يحمي أرواحنا من الانهيار و التفتت لشح الحنان”
quotes.author: محمد حسن علوان

quotes.quote: “Grace is the face that love wears when it meets imperfection.”
quotes.author: Joseph R. Cooke

quotes.quote: “A Nation should not be judged by how it treats its highest citizens, but it's lowest ones”
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: “that as long as we are being remembered, we remain alive.”
quotes.author: Carlos Ruiz Zafon

quotes.quote: “No one has ever achieved greatness without dreams.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “It is much easier to be brave if you do not know everything.”
quotes.author: Lois Lowry

quotes.quote: “Security is mostly a superstition. It does not exist in nature, nor do the children of men as a whole experience it. Avoiding danger is no safer in the long run than outright exposure. Life is either a daring adventure, or nothing.”
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: “If you're not comfortable enough with yourself or with your own truth when entering a relationship, then you're not ready for that relationship.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “Live boldly. Push yourself. Don't settle.”
quotes.author: Jojo Moyes

quotes.quote: “Free yourself from the complexities and drama of your life. Simplify. Look within. Within ourselves we all have the gifts and talents we need to fulfill the purpose we've been blessed with.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “After sleeping through a hundred million centuries we have finally opened our eyes on a sumptuous planet, sparkling with color, bountiful with life. Within decades we must close our eyes again. Isn’t it a noble, an enlightened way of spending our brief time in the sun, to work at understanding the universe and how we have come to wake up in it? This is how I answer when I am asked—as I am surprisingly often—why I bother to get up in the mornings.”
quotes.author: Richard Dawkins

quotes.quote: “Your own Self-Realization is the greatest service you can render the world.”
quotes.author: Ramana Maharshi

quotes.quote: “Too much sanity may be madness — and maddest of all: to see life as it is, and not as it should be!”
quotes.author: Dale Wasserman

quotes.quote: “When I left Queen's my future seemed to stretch out before me like a straight road. I thought I could see along it for many a milestone. Now there is a bend in it. I don't know what lies around the bend, but I'm going to believe that the best does.”
quotes.author: Lucy Maud Montgomery

quotes.quote: “There's some good in this world, Mr. Frodo, and it's worth fighting for.”
quotes.author: J. R. R. Tolkien

quotes.quote: “These mountains that you are carrying, you were only supposed to climb.”
quotes.author: Najwa Zebian

quotes.quote: “If it sounds like writing, I rewrite it.”
quotes.author: Elmore Leonard

quotes.quote: “Just because you fall once, doesn't mean you're fall at everything. Keep trying, hold on, and always trust yourself, because if you don't then who will??”
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.quote: “Quiet people have the loudest minds.”
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.quote: “To be in your children's memories tomorrow,
quotes.author: Barbara Johnson

quotes.quote: “I think joy and sweetness and affection are a spiritual path. We're here to know God, to love and serve God, and to be blown away by the beauty and miracle of nature. You just have to get rid of so much baggage to be light enough to dance, to sing, to play. You don't have time to carry grudges; you don't have time to cling to the need to be right.”
quotes.author: Anne Lamott

quotes.quote: “Although I am a typical loner in my daily life, my awareness of belonging to the invisible community of those who strive for truth, beauty, and justice has prevented me from feelings of isolation.”
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: “Life is painful. It has thorns, like the stem of a rose. Culture and art are the roses that bloom on the stem. The flower is yourself, your humanity. Art is the liberation of the humanity inside yourself.”
quotes.author: Daisaku Ikeda

quotes.quote: “To write is human, to edit is divine.”
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.quote: “Why are you trying so hard to fit in when you were born to stand out?”
quotes.author: Ian Wallace

quotes.quote: “Believe in yourself and there will come a day when others will have no choice but to believe with you.”
quotes.author: Cynthia Kersey

quotes.quote: “Be an Encourager: When you encourage others, you boost their self-esteem, enhance their self-confidence, make them work harder, lift their spirits and make them successful in their endeavors. Encouragement goes straight to the heart and is always available. Be an encourager. Always.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “Berhenti bercita-cita adalah tragedi terbesar dalam hidup manusia”
quotes.author: Andrea Hirata

quotes.quote: “Once upon a time, there was a wise man who used to go to the ocean to do his writing. He had a habit of walking on the beach before he began his work.
quotes.author: Loren Eiseley

quotes.quote: “You can have many great ideas in your head, but what makes the difference is the action. Without action upon an idea, there will be no manifestation, no results, and no reward”
quotes.author: Don Miguel Ruiz

quotes.quote: “No matter how much experience you have, there’s always something new you can learn and room for improvement.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “I am not a smart man, particularly, but one day, at long last, I stumbled from the dark woods of my own, and my family's, and my country's past, holding in my hands these truths: that love grows from the rich loam of forgiveness; that mongrels make good dogs; that the evidence of God exists in the roundness of things. This much, at least, I've figured out. I know this much is true.”
quotes.author: Wally Lamb

quotes.quote: “Sit down before fact as a little child, be prepared to give up every preconceived notion, follow humbly wherever and to whatever abysses nature leads, or you shall learn nothing. I have only begun to learn content and peace of mind since I have resolved at all risks to do this.”
quotes.author: Thomas Huxley

quotes.quote: “Realize deeply that the present moment is all you will ever have.”
quotes.author: Eckhart Tolle

quotes.quote: “God save us from religion.”
quotes.author: David Eddings

quotes.quote: “It was the moment I realized what music can do to people, how it can make you hurt and feel so good all at once.”
quotes.author: Nina LaCour

quotes.quote: “In the end, just three things matter:
quotes.author: Jack Kornfield

quotes.quote: “The truth was a mirror in the hands of God. It fell, and broke into pieces. Everybody took a piece of it, and they looked at it and thought they had the truth.”
quotes.author: Mawlana Jalal-al-Din Rumi

quotes.quote: “It is only with true love and compassion that we can begin to mend what is broken in the world. It is these two blessed things that can begin to heal all broken hearts.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “I think the reason we sometimes have the false sense that God is so far away is because that is where we have put him. We have kept him at a distance, and then when we are in need and call on him in prayer, we wonder where he is. He is exactly where we left him.”
quotes.author: Ravi Zacharias

quotes.quote: “We often think of peace as the absence of war, that if powerful countries would reduce their weapon arsenals, we could have peace. But if we look deeply into the weapons, we see our own minds- our own prejudices, fears and ignorance. Even if we transport all the bombs to the moon, the roots of war and the roots of bombs are still there, in our hearts and minds, and sooner or later we will make new bombs. To work for peace is to uproot war from ourselves and from the hearts of men and women. To prepare for war, to give millions of men and women the opportunity to practice killing day and night in their hearts, is to plant millions of seeds of violence, anger, frustration, and fear that will be passed on for generations to come. ”
quotes.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quotes.quote: “A bird is safe in its nest - but that is not what its wings are made for.”
quotes.author: Amit Ray

quotes.quote: “We ask ourselves, who am I to be brilliant, gorgeous, handsome, talented and fabulous? Actually, who are you not to be?”
quotes.author: Marianne Williamson

quotes.quote: “Do not let your negative thoughts have power over you because those thoughts will end up controlling your life. No one can live a positive life with a negative mind.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “What did you put in the fire?" Kaladin said. "To make that special smoke?"
quotes.author: Brandon Sanderson

quotes.quote: “Everything happens for a reason and, something better will come along for me!”
quotes.author: Selena Gomez

quotes.quote: “Nothing's a better cure for writer's block than to eat ice cream right out of the carton.”
quotes.author: Don Roff

quotes.quote: “If you let lesser people determine your self-worth, you'll never reach higher than their limited imagination.”
quotes.author: Ana Huang

quotes.quote: “This is the key to life: To expect everything to be given to you from above, yet to be genuinely surprised and forever grateful, when they are. Expecting all good things to be yours, while not knowing how to take anything for granted. If there may be a key in life, this is the key.”
quotes.author: C. JoyBell C.

quotes.quote: “If you are under the impression you have already perfected yourself, you will never rise to the heights you are no doubt capable of.”
quotes.author: Kazuo Ishiguro

quotes.quote: “She had been given a wonderful gift: life. Sometimes it was cruelly taken away too soon, but it's what you did with it that counted, not how long it lasted.”
quotes.author: Cecelia Ahern

quotes.quote: “The deeds you do may be the only sermon some persons will hear today”
quotes.author: St. Francis Of Assisi

quotes.quote: “Yoga is not a religion. It is a science, science of well-being, science of youthfulness, science of integrating body, mind and soul.”
quotes.author: Amit Ray

quotes.quote: “As soon as you honor the present moment, all unhappiness and struggle dissolve, and life begins to flow with joy and ease. When you act out the present-moment awareness, whatever you do becomes imbued with a sense of quality, care, and love - even the most simple action.”
quotes.author: Eckhart Tolle

quotes.quote: “There is great change to be experienced once you learn the power of letting go. Stop allowing anyone or anything to control, limit, repress, or discourage you from being your true self! Today is YOURS to shape - own it - break free from people and things that poison or dilute your spirit.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “Talent is a gift, but character is a choice.”
quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

quotes.quote: “Destiny is real. And she's not mild-mannered. She will come around and hit you in the face and knock you over and before you know what hit you, you're naked- stripped of everything you thought you knew and everything you thought you didn't know- and there you are! A bloody nose, bruises all over you, and naked. And it's the most beautiful thing.”
quotes.author: C. JoyBell C.

quotes.quote: “Lord, grant me the strength to accept the things I cannot change,
quotes.author: Reinhold Niebuhr

quotes.quote: “Finding one important thing in your life doesn’t mean you have to
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: “To those who abuse: the sin is yours, the crime is yours, and the shame is yours. To those who protect the perpetrators: blaming the victims only masks the evil within, making you as guilty as those who abuse. Stand up for the innocent or go down with the rest.”
quotes.author: Flora Jessop

quotes.quote: “Your complaints, your drama, your victim mentality, your whining, your blaming, and all of your excuses have NEVER gotten you even a single step closer to your goals or dreams. Let go of your nonsense. Let go of the delusion that you DESERVE better and go EARN it! Today is a new day!”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “HOW
quotes.author: Ellen Hopkins

quotes.quote: “But there were some things I believed in. Some things I had faith in. And faith isn't about perfect attendance to services, or how much money you put on the little plate. It isn't about going skyclad to the Holy Rites, or meditating each day upon the divine.
quotes.author: Jim Butcher

quotes.quote: “Although my memory's fading, I remember two things very clearly: I am a great sinner and Christ is a great Savior.”
quotes.author: John Newton

quotes.quote: “Two wrongs don't make a right, but don't three lefts make a right? Two wrongs don't make a right, but don't two negatives make a positive?”
quotes.author: Andrew Clements

quotes.quote: “We need to help people to discover the true meaning of love. Love is generally confused with dependence. Those of us who have grown in true love know that we can love only in proportion to our capacity for independence.”
quotes.author: Fred Rogers

quotes.quote: “Life is ours to be spent, not to
quotes.author: D.H. Lawrence

quotes.quote: “Great spirits have always encountered violent opposition from mediocre minds. The mediocre mind is incapable of understanding the man who refuses to bow blindly to conventional prejudices and chooses instead to express his opinions courageously and honestly.”
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: “Plants are more courageous than almost all human beings: an orange tree would rather die than produce lemons, whereas instead of dying the average person would rather be someone they are not.”
quotes.author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quotes.quote: “Success is a lousy teacher. It seduces smart people into thinking they can't lose.”
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.quote: “You have to be the bravest person in the world to go out every day, being yourself when no one likes who you are.”
quotes.author: Matthew Dicks

quotes.quote: “Til shade is gone,
quotes.author: Robert Jordan

quotes.quote: “A dog has no use for fancy cars or big homes or designer clothes. Status symbol means nothing to him. A waterlogged stick will do just fine. A dog judges others not by their color or creed or class but by who they are inside. A dog doesn't care if you are rich or poor, educated or illiterate, clever or dull. Give him your heart and he will give you his. It was really quite simple, and yet we humans, so much wiser and more sophisticated, have always had trouble figuring out what really counts and what does not. As I wrote that farewell column to Marley, I realized it was all right there in front of us, if only we opened our eyes. Sometimes it took a dog with bad breath, worse manners, and pure intentions to help us see.”
quotes.author: John Grogan

quotes.quote: “In the beginner’s mind there are many possibilities, but in the expert’s there are few”
quotes.author: Shunryu Suzuki

quotes.quote: “I was never more hated than when I tried to be honest. Or when, even as just now I've tried to articulate exactly what I felt to be the truth. No one was satisfied”
quotes.author: Ralph Ellison

quotes.quote: “Normalness leads to sadness.”
quotes.author: Phil Lester

quotes.quote: “Tearing down the rest of the world won't make you happy. Look inside yourself. Because finding who you were meant to be? What you were put into this world to do? That's what fills the emptiness. It's the only things that can.”
quotes.author: A.G. Howard

quotes.quote: “I'd like to add some beauty to life," said Anne dreamily. "I don't exactly want to make people KNOW more... though I know that IS the noblest ambition... but I'd love to make them have a pleasanter time because of me... to have some little joy or happy thought that would never have existed if I hadn't been born.”
quotes.author: L.M. Montgomery

quotes.quote: “Be not angry that you cannot make others as you wish them to be, since you cannot make yourself as you wish to be.”
quotes.author: Thomas à Kempis

quotes.quote: “But we never get back our youth… The pulse of joy that beats in us at twenty becomes sluggish. Our limbs fail, our senses rot. We degenerate into hideous puppets, haunted by the memory of the passions of which we were too much afraid, and the exquisite temptations that we had not the courage to yield to.”
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: “The greatest day in your life and mine is when we take total responsibility for our attitudes. That's the day we truly grow up.”
quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

quotes.quote: “هذه رسالة لكاتب مكسيسي اسمه "جوني ولش" كتبها على لسان دمية لماركيز سنة 1999 وقت أن كان ماركيز يصارع السرطان
quotes.author: John Welch

quotes.quote: “When forever becomes a place...when forever ceases to be just a word… when it ceases to be just a measurement of time…but instead becomes a place where soul mates can dance to the song in their hearts... that is a reflection of true love.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “Not everything is supposed to become something beautiful and long-lasting. Sometimes people come into your life to show you what is right and what is wrong, to show you who you can be, to teach you to love yourself, to make you feel better for a little while, or to just be someone to walk with at night and spill your life to. Not everyone is going to stay forever, and we still have to keep on going and thank them for what they’ve given us.”
quotes.author: Emery Allen

quotes.quote: “Before a dream is realized, the Soul of the World tests everything that was learned along the way. It does this not because it is evil, but so that we can, in addition to realizing our dreams, master the lessons we’ve learned as we’ve moved toward that dream. That’s the point at which most people give up. It’s the point at which, as we say in the language of the desert, one 'dies of thirst just when the palm trees have appeared on the horizon.”
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: “We're so engaged in doing things to achieve purposes of outer value that we forget the inner value, the rapture that is associated with being alive, is what it is all about.”
quotes.author: Joseph Campbell

quotes.quote: “Never let a problem to be solved, become more important than a person to be loved.”
quotes.author: Thomas S. Monson

quotes.quote: “There is no failure except in no longer trying.”
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: “I'm not going to limit myself just because people won't accept the fact that I can do something else.”
quotes.author: Dolly Parton

quotes.quote: “life is truly known only to those who suffer, lose, endure adversity, & stumble from defeat to defeat.”
quotes.author: anaïs nin

quotes.quote: “She's a woman, you're a dude. You're notto understand her. That'swhat she's after.... She doesn't want you to understand. She knowsimpossible. She just wants you to understand. Everything else is negotiable.”
quotes.author: Neal Stephenson

quotes.quote: “I don’t chase after anyone, If you wanna walk out of my life, then I’ll hold the fucking door open for you.”
quotes.author: Wiz Khalifa

quotes.quote: “A thousand words leave not the same deep impression as does a single deed.”
quotes.author: Henrik Ibsen

quotes.quote: “When pain and talent mix together, that’s when you’re able to persevere in your goals in life; the pain gives your talent something to feed into.”
quotes.author: Vernon Davis

quotes.quote: “A man may die, nations may rise and fall, but an idea lives on. Ideas have endurance without death.”
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: “My only regrets are the moments when i doubted myself and took the safe route. Life is too short to waste time being unhappy.”
quotes.author: Dan Howell

quotes.quote: “For the world is in a bad state, but everything will become still worse unless each of us does his best.”
quotes.author: Viktor E. Frankl

quotes.quote: “I'm starting with the man in the mirror,
quotes.author: Michael Jackson

quotes.quote: “لا تحزن الا عن شيئين: فوات هدفك, أو اثناؤك عنه ”
quotes.author: محمد حسن علوان

quotes.quote: “Let us try to teach generosity and altruism, because we are born selfish. Let us understand what our own selfish genes are up to, because we may then at least have the chance to upset their designs, something that no other species has ever aspired to do.”
quotes.author: Richard Dawkins

quotes.quote: “Find the things that matter, and hold on to them, and fight for them, and refuse to let them go.”
quotes.author: Lauren Oliver

quotes.quote: “Wherever the art of Medicine is loved, there is also a love of Humanity. ”
quotes.author: Hippocrates

quotes.quote: “I’ve gotta get out of the basement. I’ve gotta see the world. I’ve gotta make a difference”
quotes.author: Gerard Way

quotes.quote: “When people see some things as beautiful,
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: “One more dance along the razor's edge finished. Almost dead yesterday, maybe dead tomorrow, but alive, gloriously alive, today.”
quotes.author: Robert Jordan

quotes.quote: “Whether a thought is spoken or not it is a real thing and it has power," Tuek said. "You might find the line between life and death among the Fremen to be too sharp and quick.”
quotes.author: Frank Herbert

quotes.quote: “You've got to show the world who you are before it tells you. Otherwise you become victim to someone you're not.”
quotes.author: Chris Colfer

quotes.quote: “The deepest secret is that life is not a process of discovery, but a process of creation. You are not discovering yourself, but creating yourself anew. Seek therefore, not to find out Who You Are, but seek to determine Who You Want to Be.”
quotes.author: Neale Donald Walsch

quotes.quote: “Am I weird?"
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.quote: “I hate you."
quotes.author: Stephen Chbosky

quotes.quote: “To invent your own life's meaning is not easy, but it's still allowed, and I think you'll be happier for the trouble.”
quotes.author: Bill Watterson

quotes.quote: “Remind thyself, in the darkest moments, that every failure is only a step toward success, every detection of what is false directs you toward what is true, every trial exhausts some tempting form of error, and every adversity will only hide, for a time, your path to peace and fulfillment. ”
quotes.author: Og Mandino

quotes.quote: “Every time you do a good deed you shine the light a little farther into the dark. And the thing is, when you're gone that light is going to keep shining on, pushing the shadows back.”
quotes.author: charles de lint

quotes.quote: “Know from whence you came. If you know whence you came, there are absolutely no limitations to where you can go.”
quotes.author: James Baldwin

quotes.quote: “Passion is a feeling that tells you: this is the right thing to do. Nothing can stand in my way. It doesn't matter what anyone else says. This feeling is so good that it cannot be ignored. I'm going to follow my bliss and act upon this glorious sensation of joy.”
quotes.author: Wayne W. Dyer

quotes.quote: “Life is short. If you doubt me, ask a butterfly. Their average life span is a mere five to fourteen days.”
quotes.author: Ellen DeGeneres

quotes.quote: “When you lose your smile, you lose your way in the chaos of life.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “When obstacles arise, you change your direction to reach your goal; you do not change your decision to get there.”
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: “Don't waste your energy trying to change opinions... Do your thing and don't care if they like it.”
quotes.author: Tina Fey

quotes.quote: “I've had it with being nice, understanding, fair and hopeful. I feel like being negative all day. The chip on my shoulder could sink the QE2. I've got an attitude problem and nobody better get in my way...I'm in a bad mood and the whole stupid little world is gonna pay!”
quotes.author: John Waters

quotes.quote: “Maybe you think you’ll be entitled to more happiness later by forgoing all of it now, but it doesn’t work that way. Happiness takes as much practice as unhappiness does. It’s by living that you live more. By waiting you wait more. Every waiting day makes your life a little less. Every lonely day makes you a little smaller. Every day you put off your life makes you less capable of living it.”
quotes.author: Ann Brashares

quotes.quote: “When they say the sky's the limit to me that's really true”
quotes.author: Michael Jackson

quotes.quote: “Bring something incomprehensible into the world!”
quotes.author: Gilles Deleuze

quotes.quote: “I consider myself a stained-glass window. And this is how I live my life. Closing no doors and covering no windows; I am the multi-colored glass with light filtering through me, in many different shades. Allowing light to shed and fall into many many hues. My job is not to direct anything, but only to filter into many colors. My answer is destiny and my guide is joy. And there you have me.”
quotes.author: C. JoyBell C.
