quotes.author: Jonathan Safran Foer

quotes.quote: “When I look in the mirror, I know I’m looking at someone who isn’t sure she deserves to be loved at all.”
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.quote: “Unexpected intrusions of beauty. This is what life is.”
quotes.author: Saul Bellow

quotes.quote: “Surround Yourself with People Who Believe in Your Dreams:
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “لا أخاف الموت ..أخاف أن أموت قبل أن أحيا”
quotes.author: أحمد خالد توفيق

quotes.quote: “We are taught you must blame your father, your sisters, your brothers, the school, the teachers - but never blame yourself. It's never your fault. But it's always your fault, because if you wanted to change you're the one who has got to change.”
quotes.author: Katharine Hepburn

quotes.quote: “Death is not the opposite of life, but a part of it.”
quotes.author: Haruki Murakami

quotes.quote: “Sometimes the right thing feels all wrong until it is over and done with.”
quotes.author: Alice Hoffman

quotes.quote: “I live in my own little world. But its ok, they know me here.”
quotes.author: Lauren Myracle

quotes.quote: “Living is Easy with Eyes Closed.”
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.quote: “Do I dare
quotes.author: T.S. Eliot

quotes.quote: “Listen to the people who love you. Believe that they are worth living for even when you don't believe it. Seek out the memories depression takes away and project them into the future. Be brave; be strong; take your pills. Exercise because it's good for you even if every step weighs a thousand pounds. Eat when food itself disgusts you. Reason with yourself when you have lost your reason.”
quotes.author: Andrew Solomon

quotes.quote: “I am incapable of conceiving infinity, and yet I do not accept finity. I want this adventure that is the context of my life to go on without end.”
quotes.author: Simone de Beauvoir

quotes.quote: “Growing up is losing some illusions, in order to acquire others.”
quotes.author: Virginia Woolf

quotes.quote: “Sometimes life knocks you on your ass... get up, get up, get up!!! Happiness is not the absence of problems, it's the ability to deal with them.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “Life seems sometimes like nothing more than a series of losses, from beginning to end. That's the given. How you respond to those losses, what you make of what's left, that's the part you have to make up as you go.”
quotes.author: Katharine Weber

quotes.quote: “What makes big boobs and perkiness so attractive to boys? I mean, really. Two round, mounds of fat and a fake smile. Yeah, winning attributes.”
quotes.author: Gena Showalter

quotes.quote: “We are all the pieces of what we remember. We hold in ourselves the hopes and fears of those who love us. As long as there is love and memory, there is no true loss.”
quotes.author: Cassandra Clare

quotes.quote: “Focus on your strengths, not your weaknesses.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “This must be Thursday,' said Arthur to himself, sinking low over his beer. 'I never could get the hang of Thursdays.”
quotes.author: Douglas Adams

quotes.quote: “As soon as you trust yourself, you will know how to live.”
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: “There are two tragedies in life. One is to lose your heart's desire. The other is to gain it.”
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: “The trouble with being in the rat race is that even if you win, you're still a rat.”
quotes.author: Lily Tomlin

quotes.quote: “I think that we are like stars. Something happens to burst us open; but when we burst open and think we are dying; we’re actually turning into a supernova. And then when we look at ourselves again, we see that we’re suddenly more beautiful than we ever were before!”
quotes.author: C. JoyBell C.

quotes.quote: “Not one of your pertinent ancestors was squashed, devoured, drowned, starved, stranded, stuck fast, untimely wounded, or otherwise deflected from its life's quest of delivering a tiny charge of genetic material to the right partner at the right moment in order to perpetuate the only possible sequence of hereditary combinations that could result -- eventually, astoundingly, and all too briefly -- in you.”
quotes.author: Bill Bryson

quotes.quote: “That what I need to survive is not Gale's fire, kindled with rage and hatred. I have plenty of fire myself. What I need is the dandelion in the spring. The bright yellow that means rebirth instead of destruction. The promise that life can go on, no matter how bad our losses. That it can be good again. And only Peeta can give me that.”
quotes.author: Suzanne Collins

quotes.quote: “The biggest wall you have to climb is the one you build in your mind: Never let your mind talk you out of your dreams, trick you into giving up. Never let your mind become the greatest obstacle to success. To get your mind on the right track, the rest will follow.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “I live my life in widening circles that reach out across the world.”
quotes.author: Rainer Maria Rilke

quotes.quote: “The problem with people is they forget that most of the time it's the small things that count.”
quotes.author: Jennifer Niven

quotes.quote: “Many people die at twenty five and aren't buried until they are seventy five.”
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: “Accept what life offers you and try to drink from every cup. All wines should be tasted; some should only be sipped, but with others, drink the whole bottle.”
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: “Why do they always teach us that it's easy and evil to do what we want and that we need discipline to restrain ourselves? It's the hardest thing in the world--to do what we want. And it takes the greatest kind of courage. I mean, what we really want.”
quotes.author: Ayn Rand

quotes.quote: “Maturity is when you stop complaining and making excuses, and start making changes.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “I'd like to repeat the advice that I gave you before, in that I think you really should make a radical change in your lifestyle and begin to boldly do things which you may previously never have thought of doing, or been too hesitant to attempt. So many people live within unhappy circumstances and yet will not take the initiative to change their situation because they are conditioned to a life of security, conformity, and conservatism, all of which may appear to give one peace of mind, but in reality nothing is more damaging to the adventurous spirit within a man than a secure future. The very basic core of a man's living spirit is his passion for adventure. The joy of life comes from our encounters with new experiences, and hence there is no greater joy than to have an endlessly changing horizon, for each day to have a new and different sun.
quotes.author: Jon Krakauer

quotes.quote: “Never complain, never explain. Resist the temptation to defend yourself or make excuses.”
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: “When in a relationship, a real man doesn't make his woman jealous of others, he makes others jealous of his woman.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “What's done is done. What's gone is gone. One of life's lessons is always moving on. It’s okay to look back to see how far you’ve come but keep moving forward.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “Strong people have a strong sense of self-worth and self-awareness; they don’t need the approval of others.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “The world is a tragedy to those who feel, but a comedy to those who think.”
quotes.author: Horace Walpole

quotes.quote: “Ester asked why people are sad.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: “Smile more. Smiling can make you and others happy.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “That's what literature is. It's the people who went before us, tapping out messages from the past, from beyond the grave, trying to tell us about life and death! Listen to them!”
quotes.author: Connie Willis

quotes.quote: “I believe that words are strong, that they can overwhelm what we fear when fear seems more awful than life is good.”
quotes.author: Andrew Solomon

quotes.quote: “Develop an interest in life as you see it; the people, things, literature, music - the world is so rich, simply throbbing with rich treasures, beautiful souls and interesting people. Forget yourself.”
quotes.author: Henry Miller

quotes.quote: “I wonder why I don't go to bed and go to sleep. But then it would be tomorrow, so I decide that no matter how tired, no matter how incoherent I am, I can skip on hour more of sleep and live.”
quotes.author: Sylvia Plath

quotes.quote: “To be creative means to be in love with life. You can be creative only if you love life enough that you want to enhance its beauty, you want to bring a little more music to it, a little more poetry to it, a little more dance to it.”
quotes.author: Osho

quotes.quote: “I think prime numbers are like life. They are very logical but you could never work out the rules, even if you spent all your time thinking about them”
quotes.author: Mark Haddon

quotes.quote: “Sometimes all a person wants is an empathetic ear; all he or she needs is to talk it out. Just offering a listening ear and an understanding heart for his or her suffering can be a big comfort.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “The outer world is a reflection of the inner world. Other people’s perception of you is a reflection of them; your response to them is an awareness of you.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “If you believe very strongly in something, stand up and fight for it.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “A man with outward courage dares to die; a man with inner courage dares to live.”
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: “It is easy to mourn the lives we aren't living. Easy to wish we'd developed other other talents, said yes to different offers. Easy to wish we'd worked harder, loved better, handled our finances more astutely, been more popular, stayed in the band, gone to Australia, said yes to the coffee or done more bloody yoga.
quotes.author: Matt Haig

quotes.quote: “Let me be, was all I wanted. Be what I am, no matter how I am.”
quotes.author: Henry Miller

quotes.quote: “Whoever saves one life, saves the world entire.”
quotes.author: Thomas Keneally

quotes.quote: “Even though you may want to move forward in your life, you may have one foot on the brakes. In order to be free, we must learn how to let go. Release the hurt. Release the fear. Refuse to entertain your old pain. The energy it takes to hang onto the past is holding you back from a new life. What is it you would let go of today?”
quotes.author: Mary Manin Morrissey

quotes.quote: “A pain stabbed my heart, as it did every time I saw a girl I loved who was going the opposite direction in this too-big world.”
quotes.author: Jack Kerouac

quotes.quote: “The two most important days in your life are the day you are born and the day you find out why.”
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: “There’s no such thing as ruining your life. Life’s a pretty resilient thing, it turns out.”
quotes.author: Sophie Kinsella

quotes.quote: “It's never too late to change your life for the better. You don't have to take huge steps to change your life. Making even the smallest changes to your daily routine can make a big difference to your life.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “I think I've discovered the secret of life -- you just hang around until you get used to it.”
quotes.author: Charles Schultz

quotes.quote: “why are trying so hard to fit in, when you're born to stand out”
quotes.author: Oliver James

quotes.quote: “Almost nobody dances sober, unless they happen to be insane.”
quotes.author: Howard Phillips Lovecraft

quotes.quote: “You can search throughout the entire universe for someone who is more deserving of your love and affection than you are yourself, and that person is not to be found anywhere. You, yourself, as much as anybody in the entire universe, deserve your love and affection.”
quotes.author: Sharon Salzberg

quotes.quote: “Always remember people who have helped you along the way, and don’t forget to lift someone up.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “There is not a particle of life which does not bear poetry within it”
quotes.author: Gustave Flaubert

quotes.quote: “And I learned what is obvious to a child. That life is simply a collection of little lives, each lived one day at a time. That each day should be spent finding beauty in flowers and poetry and talking to animals. That a day spent with dreaming and sunsets and refreshing breezes cannot be bettered. But most of all, I learned that life is about sitting on benches next to ancient creeks with my hand on her knee and sometimes, on good days, for falling in love.”
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.quote: “There is some kind of a sweet innocence in being human- in not having to be just happy or just sad- in the nature of being able to be both broken and whole, at the same time.”
quotes.author: C. JoyBell C.

quotes.quote: “There is nothing more rare, nor more beautiful, than a woman being unapologetically herself; comfortable in her perfect imperfection. To me, that is the true essence of beauty.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “In the name of God, stop a moment, cease your work, look around you.”
quotes.author: Leo Tolstoy

quotes.quote: “How people treat you is their karma; how you react is yours.”
quotes.author: Wayne W. Dyer

quotes.quote: “Every man's life ends the same way. It is only the details of how he lived and how he died that distinguish one man from another.”
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.quote: “Some people, they can't just move on, you know, mourn and cry and be done with it. Or at least seem to be. But for me... I don't know. I didn't want to fix it, to forget. It wasn't something that was broken. It's just...something that happened. And like that hole, I'm just finding ways, every day, of working around it. Respecting and remembering and getting on at the same time. ”
quotes.author: Sarah Dessen

quotes.quote: “The only person who can pull me down is myself, and I'm not going to let myself pull me down anymore.”
quotes.author: C. JoyBell C.

quotes.quote: “One lives in the hope of becoming a memory.”
quotes.author: Antonio Porchia

quotes.quote: “I was blind and heart broken and didn't want to do anything and Gus burst into my room and shouted, "I have wonderful news!" And I was like, "I don't really want to hear wonderful news right now," and Gus said, "This is wonderful news you want to hear," and I asked him, "Fine, what is it?" and he said, "You are going to live a good and long life filled with great and terrible moments that you cannot even imagine yet!”
quotes.author: John Green

quotes.quote: “I don’t live in either my past or my future. I’m interested only in the present. If you can concentrate always on the present, you’ll be a happy man. Life will be a party for you, a grand festival, because life is the moment we’re living now.”
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: “The biggest adventure you can ever take is to live the life of your dreams.”
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: “The thing about getting older is that you don't need everything to be possible any more, you just need things to be certain.”
quotes.author: Monica Ali

quotes.quote: “Never stop dreaming,
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “Sometimes the hardest part isn't letting go but rather learning to start over.”
quotes.author: Nicole Sobon

quotes.quote: “[H]iding how you really feel and trying to make everyone happy doesn't make you nice, it just makes you a liar.”
quotes.author: Jenny O'Connell

quotes.quote: “Our life is what our thoughts make it.”
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: “Lots of things can be fixed. Things can be fixed. But many times, relationships between people cannot be fixed, because they should not be fixed. You're aboard a ship setting sail, and the other person has joined the inland circus, or is boarding a different ship, and you just can't be with each other anymore. Because you shouldn't be.”
quotes.author: C. JoyBell C.

quotes.quote: “Don't ask for guarantees. And don't look to be saved in any one thing, person, machine, or library. Do your own bit of saving, and if you drown, at least die knowing you were heading for shore.”
quotes.author: Ray Bradbury

quotes.quote: “You must not ever stop being whimsical. And you must not, ever, give anyone else the responsibility for your life.”
quotes.author: Mary Oliver

quotes.quote: “When the going gets tough, put one foot in front of the other and just keep going. Don’t give up.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “Everyone you meet is a part of your journey, but not all of them are meant to stay in your life. Some people are just passing through to bring you gifts; either they're blessings or lessons.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “You're on Earth. There's no cure for that.”
quotes.author: Samuel Beckett

quotes.quote: “Is this thing safe?"
quotes.author: Maggie Stiefvater

quotes.quote: “Do not despise your own place and hour. Every place is under the stars, every place is the center of the world.”
quotes.author: John Burroughs

quotes.quote: “You spend your whole life stuck in the labyrinth, thinking about how you'll escape one day, and how awesome it will be, and imagining that future keeps you going, but you never do it. You just use the future to escape the present.”
quotes.author: John Green

quotes.quote: “We have to create culture, don't watch TV, don't read magazines, don't even listen to NPR. Create your own roadshow. The nexus of space and time where you are now is the most immediate sector of your universe, and if you're worrying about Michael Jackson or Bill Clinton or somebody else, then you are disempowered, you're giving it all away to icons, icons which are maintained by an electronic media so that you want to dress like X or have lips like Y. This is shit-brained, this kind of thinking. That is all cultural diversion, and what is real is you and your friends and your associations, your highs, your orgasms, your hopes, your plans, your fears. And we are told 'no', we're unimportant, we're peripheral. 'Get a degree, get a job, get a this, get a that.' And then you're a player, you don't want to even play in that game. You want to reclaim your mind and get it out of the hands of the cultural engineers who want to turn you into a half-baked moron consuming all this trash that's being manufactured out of the bones of a dying world.”
quotes.author: Terence McKenna

quotes.quote: “But when it came right down to it, the skin of my wrist looked so white and defensless that I couldn't do it. It was as if what I wanted to kill wasn't in that skin or the thin blue pulse that jumped under my thumb, but somewhere else, deeper, more secret, and a whole lot harder to get.”
quotes.author: Sylvia Plath

quotes.quote: “If there's a thing I've learned in my life it's to not be afraid of the responsibility that comes with caring for other people. What we do for love: those things endure. Even if the people you do them for don't”
quotes.author: Cassandra Clare

quotes.quote: “Nothing ever happens like you imagine it will”
quotes.author: John Green

quotes.quote: “Count your blessings, not your problems. Count your own blessings, not someone else's. Remember that jealousy is when you count someone else's blessings instead of your own.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “Stop giving other people the power to control your happiness, your mind, and your life. If you don't take control of yourself and your own life, someone else is bound to try.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “Some of us get dipped in flat, some in satin, some in gloss...." He turned to me. "But every once in a while, you find someone who's iridescent, and when you do, nothing will ever compare.”
quotes.author: Wendelin Van Draanen

quotes.quote: “People are like stained-glass windows. They sparkle and shine when the sun is out, but when the darkness sets in, their true beauty is revealed only if there is a light from within.”
quotes.author: Elisabeth Kübler-Ross

quotes.quote: “Believe something and the Universe is on its way to being changed. Because you've changed, by believing. Once you've changed, other things start to follow. Isn't that the way it works?”
quotes.author: Diane Duane

quotes.quote: “Roads Go Ever On
quotes.author: J.R.R. Tolkien

quotes.quote: “I believe there is another world waiting for us. A better world. And I'll be waiting for you there.”
quotes.author: David Mitchell

quotes.quote: “Sleep my little baby-oh
quotes.author: Neil Gaiman

quotes.quote: “To fear love is to fear life, and those who fear life are already 3-parts dead.”
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: “I envy people that know love. That have someone who takes them as they are.”
quotes.author: Jess C Scott

quotes.quote: “For small creatures such as we the vastness is bearable only through love.”
quotes.author: Carl Sagan

quotes.quote: “People have to forgive. We don't have to like them, we don't have to be friends with them, we don't have to send them hearts in text messages, but we have to forgive them, to overlook, to forget. Because if we don't we are tying rocks to our feet, too much for our wings to carry!”
quotes.author: C. JoyBell C.

quotes.quote: “Pull up a chair. Take a taste. Come join us. Life is so endlessly delicious.”
quotes.author: Ruth Reichl

quotes.quote: “This is the real secret of life -- to be completely engaged with what you are doing in the here and now. And instead of calling it work, realize it is play.”
quotes.author: Alan Watts

quotes.quote: “Sadness gives depth. Happiness gives height. Sadness gives roots. Happiness gives branches. Happiness is like a tree going into the sky, and sadness is like the roots going down into the womb of the earth. Both are needed, and the higher a tree goes, the deeper it goes, simultaneously. The bigger the tree, the bigger will be its roots. In fact, it is always in proportion. That's its balance.”
quotes.author: Osho Rajneesh

quotes.quote: “Marry, and you will regret it; don’t marry, you will also regret it; marry or don’t marry, you will regret it either way. Laugh at the world’s foolishness, you will regret it; weep over it, you will regret that too; laugh at the world’s foolishness or weep over it, you will regret both. Believe a woman, you will regret it; believe her not, you will also regret it… Hang yourself, you will regret it; do not hang yourself, and you will regret that too; hang yourself or don’t hang yourself, you’ll regret it either way; whether you hang yourself or do not hang yourself, you will regret both. This, gentlemen, is the essence of all philosophy.”
quotes.author: Søren Kierkegaard

quotes.quote: “Man is a mystery. It needs to be unravelled, and if you spend your whole life unravelling it, don't say that you've wasted time. I am studying that mystery because I want to be a human being.”
quotes.author: Fyodor Dostoevsky

quotes.quote: “At the end of the day, let there be no excuses, no explanations, no regrets.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “Life's as kind as you let it be.”
quotes.author: Charles Bukowski

quotes.quote: “Life isn't about waiting for the storm to pass...It's about learning to dance in the rain.”
quotes.author: Vivian Greene

quotes.quote: “I can see how it might be possible for a man to look down upon the earth and be an atheist, but I cannot conceive how a man could look up into the heavens and say there is no God.”
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: “We could do it, you know."
quotes.author: Suzanne Collins

quotes.quote: “We all make mistakes, have struggles, and even regret things in our past. But you are not your mistakes, you are not your struggles, and you are here NOW with the power to shape your day and your future.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “Learning to let go should be learned before learning to get. Life should be touched, not strangled. You’ve got to relax, let it happen at times, and at others move forward with it.”
quotes.author: Ray Bradbury

quotes.quote: “If you have a strong purpose in life, you don't have to be pushed. Your passion will drive you there.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “You've a good heart. Sometimes that's enough to see you safe wherever you go. But mostly, it's not.”
quotes.author: Neil Gaiman

quotes.quote: “Who says life is fair, where is that written?”
quotes.author: William Goldman

quotes.quote: “It all goes away. Eventually, everything goes away.”
quotes.author: Elizabeth Gilbert

quotes.quote: “Keep your best wishes, close to your heart and watch what happens”
quotes.author: Tony DeLiso

quotes.quote: “We leave something of ourselves behind when we leave a place, we stay there, even though we go away. And there are things in us that we can find again only by going back there.”
quotes.author: Pascal Mercier

quotes.quote: “I was always an unusual girl.
quotes.author: Lana Del Rey

quotes.quote: “Patience Is Not the Ability to Wait:
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “Guard well your thoughts when alone and your words when accompanied.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “و شعرت بأن فى روحى ثقباً .. ثقباً يتسع .. و يمتص كل ذكرياتى و حياتى و أحلامى ..
quotes.author: أحمد خالد توفيق

quotes.quote: “It has always seemed strange to me...The things we admire in men, kindness and generosity, openness, honesty, understanding and feeling, are the concomitants of failure in our system. And those traits we detest, sharpness, greed, acquisitiveness, meanness, egotism and self-interest, are the traits of success. And while men admire the quality of the first they love the produce of the second.”
quotes.author: John Steinbeck

quotes.quote: “When a woman becomes her own best friend life is easier.”
quotes.author: Diane Von Furstenberg

quotes.quote: “When Great Trees Fall
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: “I am fated to journey hand in hand with my strange heroes and to survey the surging immensity of life, to survey it through the laughter that all can see and through the tears unseen and unknown by anyone.”
quotes.author: Nikolai Gogol

quotes.quote: “Throughout life people will make you mad, disrespect you and treat you bad. Let God deal with the things they do, cause hate in your heart will consume you too.”
quotes.author: Will Smith

quotes.quote: “I see it all perfectly; there are two possible situations — one can either do this or that. My honest opinion and my friendly advice is this: do it or do not do it — you will regret both.”
quotes.author: Soren Kierkegaard

quotes.quote: “To perceive is to suffer.”
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: “Scar tissue is stronger than regular tissue. Realize the strength, move on.”
quotes.author: Henry Rollins

quotes.quote: “Parents were the only ones obligated to love you; from the rest of the world you had to earn it.”
quotes.author: Ann Brashares

quotes.quote: “When it's over, I want to say: all my life
quotes.author: Mary Oliver

quotes.quote: “How can I be reasonable? To me our love was everything and you were my whole life. It is not very pleasant to realize that to you it was only an episode.”
quotes.author: W. Somerset Maugham

quotes.quote: “It's better to burn out than to fade away.”
quotes.author: Neil Young

quotes.quote: “Perfectionism is the voice of the oppressor, the enemy of the people. It will keep you cramped and insane your whole life, and it is the main obstacle between you and a shitty first draft. I think perfectionism is based on the obsessive belief that if you run carefully enough, hitting each stepping-stone just right, you won't have to die. The truth is that you will die anyway and that a lot of people who aren't even looking at their feet are going to do a whole lot better than you, and have a lot more fun while they're doing it.”
quotes.author: Anne Lamott

quotes.quote: “It's not the men in your life that matters, it's the life in your men.”
quotes.author: Mae West

quotes.quote: “I will not try to convince you to love me, to respect me, to commit to me. I deserve better than that; I AM BETTER THAN THAT...Goodbye.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “Magic exists. Who can doubt it, when there are rainbows and wildflowers, the music of the wind and the silence of the stars? Anyone who has loved has been touched by magic. It is such a simple and such an extraordinary part of the lives we live.”
quotes.author: Nora Roberts

quotes.quote: “You must learn to let go. Release the stress. You were never in control anyway.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “Those who are willing to be vulnerable move among mysteries.”
quotes.author: Theodore Roethke

quotes.quote: “Friends are the family you choose (~ Nin/Ithilnin, Elven rogue).”
quotes.author: Jess C Scott

quotes.quote: “Paradoxically though it may seem, it is none the less true that life imitates art far more than art imitates life.”
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: “Every luxury must be paid for, and everything is a luxury, starting with being in this world.”
quotes.author: Cesare Pavese

quotes.quote: “What would come, would come...and you would have to meet it, when it did.”
quotes.author: J.K. Rowling

quotes.quote: “The whole of life is just like watching a film. Only it's as though you always get in ten minutes after the big picture has started, and no-one will tell you the plot, so you have to work it out all yourself from the clues.”
quotes.author: Terry Pratchett

quotes.quote: “One of the few good things about modern times: If you die horribly on television, you will not have died in vain. You will have entertained us.”
quotes.author: Kurt Vonnegut

quotes.quote: “If you aim to be something you are not, you will always fail. Aim to be you. Aim to look and act and think like you. Aim to be the truest version of you. Embrace that you-ness. Endorse it. Love it. Work hard at it. And don't give a second thought when people mock it or ridicule it. Most gossip is envy in disguise.”
quotes.author: Matt Haig

quotes.quote: “Life is a comedy to those who think, a tragedy to those who feel.”
quotes.author: Jean Racine

quotes.quote: “I learned this, at least, by my experiment; that if one advances confidently in the direction of his dreams, and endeavors to live the life which he has imagined, he will meet with a success unexpected in common hours..”
quotes.author: Thoreau, Henry David

quotes.quote: “He was mastered by the sheer surging of life, the tidal wave of being, the perfect joy of each separate muscle, joint, and sinew in that it was everything that was not death, that it was aglow and rampant, expressing itself in movement, flying exultantly under the stars.”
quotes.author: Jack London

quotes.quote: “The object of life is not to be on the side of the majority, but to escape finding oneself in the ranks of the insane.”
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: “Alone we can do so little; together we can do so much”
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: “Our true friends are those who are with us when the good things happen. They cheer us on and are pleased by our triumphs. False friends only appear at difficult times, with their sad, supportive faces, when, in fact, our suffering is serving to console them for their miserable lives.”
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: “Make a pact with yourself today to not be defined by your past. Sometimes the greatest thing to come out of all your hard work isn't what you get for it, but what you become for it. Shake things up today! Be You...Be Free...Share.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “Closed in a room, my imagination becomes the universe, and the rest of the world is missing out.”
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: “Spring passes and one remembers one's innocence.
quotes.author: Yoko Ono

quotes.quote: “Do not wait for the last judgment. It comes every day.”
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: “I walked over to the hill where we used to go and sled. There were a lot of little kids there. I watched them flying. Doing jumps and having races. And I thought that all those little kids are going to grow up someday. And all of those little kids are going to do the things that we do. And they will all kiss someone someday. But for now, sledding is enough. I think it would be great if sledding were always enough, but it isn't.”
quotes.author: Stephen Chbosky

quotes.quote: “Then, one stupid person, no different from any other stupid person, wanders into your stupid life...you give them a piece of you. They don't ask for it. They do something dumb one day like kiss you or smile at you, and then your life isn't your own anymore.”
quotes.author: Neil Gaiman

quotes.quote: “nothing in this world was more difficult than love.”
quotes.author: Gabriel García Márquez

quotes.quote: “One always has a better book in one's mind than one can manage to get onto paper.”
quotes.author: Michael Cunningham

quotes.quote: “How much I missed, simply because I was afraid of missing it.”
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: “Time takes it all, whether you want it to or not.”
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.quote: “Nothing can disturb your peace of mind unless you allow it to.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “The strongest people find the courage and caring to help others, even if they are going through their own storm.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “There are ships sailing to many ports, but not a single one goes where life is not painful.”
quotes.author: Fernando Pessoa

quotes.quote: “Of all creatures that breathe and move upon the earth, nothing is bred that is weaker than man.”
quotes.author: Homer

quotes.quote: “It’s never an insult to be called what somebody thinks is a bad name. It just shows you how poor that person is, it doesn’t hurt you.”
quotes.author: Harper Lee

quotes.quote: “The surest way to make your dreams come true is to live them.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “He is terribly afraid of dying because he hasn’t yet lived.”
quotes.author: Franz Kafka

quotes.quote: “I'm the most terrific liar you ever saw in your life. It's awful. If I'm on my way to the store to buy a magazine, even, and somebody asks me where I'm going, I'm liable to say I'm going to the opera. It's terrible.”
quotes.author: J.D. Salinger

quotes.quote: “Life is tragic simply because the earth turns and the sun inexorably rises and sets, and one day, for each of us, the sun will go down for the last, last time. Perhaps the whole root of our trouble, the human trouble, is that we will sacrifice all the beauty of our lives, will imprison ourselves in totems, taboos, crosses, blood sacrifices, steeples, mosques, races, armies, flags, nations, in order to deny the fact of death, the only fact we have. It seems to me that one ought to rejoice in the fact of death--ought to decide, indeed, to earn one's death by confronting with passion the conundrum of life. One is responsible for life: It is the small beacon in that terrifying darkness from which we come and to which we shall return.”
quotes.author: James Baldwin

quotes.quote: “I have no idea what's awaiting me, or what will happen when this all ends. For the moment I know this: there are sick people and they need curing.”
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: “I know that the whole point—the only point—is to
quotes.author: Lauren Oliver

quotes.quote: “I'm not in search of sanctity, sacredness, purity; these things are found after this life, not in this life; but in this life I search to be completely human: to feel, to give, to take, to laugh, to get lost, to be found, to dance, to love and to lust, to be so human.”
quotes.author: C. JoyBell C.

quotes.quote: “Do not take life too seriously. You will never get out of it alive.”
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: “Courage is feeling fear, not getting rid of fear, and taking action in the face of fear.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “My body is my journal, and my tattoos are my story.”
quotes.author: Johnny Depp

quotes.quote: “Every woman that finally figured out her worth, has picked up her suitcases of pride and boarded a flight to freedom, which landed in the valley of change.”
quotes.author: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.quote: “Don't be too timid and squeamish about your actions. All life is an experiment. The more experiments you make the better.”
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: “I would rather be ashes than dust!
quotes.author: Jack London

quotes.quote: “There comes a time in your life when you have to choose to turn the page, write another book or simply close it.”
quotes.author: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.quote: “You never know what's around the corner. It could be everything. Or it could be nothing. You keep putting one foot in front of the other, and then one day you look back and you've climbed a mountain.”
quotes.author: Tom Hiddleston

quotes.quote: “Being grateful does not mean that everything is necessarily good. It just means that you can accept it as a gift.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “I can't decide whether I'm a good girl wrapped up in a bad girl, or if I'm a bad girl wrapped up in a good girl. And that's how I know I'm a woman!”
quotes.author: C. JoyBell C.

quotes.quote: “To have what you have never had, you have to do what you have never done.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “Live the Life of Your Dreams
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “Oh, Life, I am yours. Whatever it is you want of me, I am ready to give.”
quotes.author: William Steig

quotes.quote: “He's not your prince charming if he doesn't make sure you know that you're his princess.”
quotes.author: Demi Lovato

quotes.quote: “When you can live forever what do you live for?”
quotes.author: Stephenie Meyer

quotes.quote: “Who are you?
quotes.author: Lana Del Rey

quotes.quote: “Style is the answer to everything.
quotes.author: Charles Bukowski

quotes.quote: “Kindness is not a business. True kindness expects nothing in return and should never act with conditions.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “الإكتشاف ليس أن تجد أرضاً جديدة .. وإنما أن ترى بعيون جديدة”
quotes.author: أنيس منصور

quotes.quote: “If you hang out with chickens, you're going to cluck and if you hang out with eagles, you're going to fly.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “My one regret in life is that I am not someone else.”
quotes.author: Woody Allen

quotes.quote: “Do not ask your children
quotes.author: William Martin

quotes.quote: “Sacrifice is a part of life. It's supposed to be. It's not something to regret. It's something to aspire to.”
quotes.author: Mitch Albom

quotes.quote: “Perfectionism is the enemy of happiness. Embrace being perfectly imperfect. Learn from your mistakes and forgive yourself, you’ll be happier. We make mistakes because we are imperfect. Learn from your mistakes, forgive yourself, and keep moving forward.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “Tears, idle tears, I know not what they mean,
quotes.author: Alfred Lord Tennyson

quotes.quote: “How far that little candle throws his beams! So shines a good deed in a weary world.”
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: “Your time is limited, so don't waste it living someone else's life.”
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: “There is nothing more frightful than ignorance in action.”
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: “When the going gets weird, the weird turn professional.”
quotes.author: Hunter S. Thompson

quotes.quote: “Knowledge, like air, is vital to life. Like air, no one should be denied it.”
quotes.author: Alan Moore

quotes.quote: “Life is a series of pulls back and forth... A tension of opposites, like a pull on a rubber band. Most of us live somewhere in the middle. A wrestling match...Which side win? Love wins. Love always wins”
quotes.author: Mitch Albom

quotes.quote: “Romance novels are birthday cake and life is often peanut butter and jelly. I think everyone should have lots of delicious romance novels lying around for those times when the peanut butter of life gets stuck to the roof of your mouth.”
quotes.author: Janet Evanovich

quotes.quote: “You are in charge of your own happiness; you don't need to wait for other people's permission to be happy.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “Don't leave a piece of jewelry at his house so you can go back and get it later; he may be with his real girlfriend.”
quotes.author: Amy Sedaris

quotes.quote: “My father had taught me to be nice first, because you can always be mean later, but once you've been mean to someone, they won't believe the nice anymore. So be nice, be nice, until it's time to stop being nice, then destroy them.”
quotes.author: Laurell K. Hamilton

quotes.quote: “It wasn’t my day. My week. My month. My year. My life. God damn it.”
quotes.author: Charles Bukowski

quotes.quote: “It does not matter how long you are spending on the earth, how much money you have gathered or how much attention you have received. It is the amount of positive vibration you have radiated in life that matters,”
quotes.author: Amit Ray

quotes.quote: “I love that you get cold when it's 71 degrees out. I love that it takes you an hour and a half to order a sandwich. I love that you get a little crinkle above your nose when you're looking at me like I'm nuts. I love that after I spend the day with you, I can still smell your perfume on my clothes. And I love that you are the last person I want to talk to before I go to sleep at night. And it's not because I'm lonely, and it's not because it's New Year's Eve. I came here tonight because when you realize you want to spend the rest of your life with somebody, you want the rest of your life to start as soon as possible.”
quotes.author: Nora Ephron

quotes.quote: “A fit, healthy body—that is the best fashion statement”
quotes.author: Jess C Scott

quotes.quote: “There are people who are generic. They make generic responses and they expect generic answers. They live inside a box and they think people who don't fit into their box are weird. But I'll tell you what, generic people are the weird people. They are like genetically-manipulated plants growing inside a laboratory, like indistinguishable faces, like droids. Like ignorance.”
quotes.author: C. JoyBell C.

quotes.quote: “When you run with the Doctor, it feels like it'll never end. But however hard you try you can't run forever. Everybody knows that everybody dies and nobody knows it like the Doctor. But I do think that all the skies of all the worlds might just turn dark if he ever for one moment, accepts it. Everybody knows that everybody dies. But not every day. Not today. Some days are special. Some days are so, so blessed. Some days, nobody dies at all. (In the library, the Doctor walks back to the TARDIS. He stops, looking at the doors. Then he raises his hand, and stands there poised like that for a long moment. Finally he snaps his fingers. The doors open. He smiles slowly and walks in, joining Donna. Then he snaps his fingers again, and the doors close. River's voice continues over this.) Now and then, every once in a very long while, every day in a million days, when the wind stands fair, and the Doctor comes to call... everybody lives.”
quotes.author: Steven Moffat

quotes.quote: “We’re here, and then we’re gone, and it’s not about the time we’re here, but what we do with the time.”
quotes.author: Rick Yancey

quotes.quote: “Just living is not enough," said the butterfly, "one must have sunshine, freedom, and a little flower.”
quotes.author: Hans Christian Anderson

quotes.quote: “People say that eyes are windows to the soul.”
quotes.author: Khaled Hosseini

quotes.quote: “People are unhappy when they get something too easily. You have to sweat--that's the only moral they know.”
quotes.author: Dany Laferrière

quotes.quote: “Do not let arrogance go to your head and despair to your heart; do not let compliments go to your head and criticisms to your heart; do not let success go to your head and failure to your heart.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “A smile puts you on the right track. A smile makes the world a beautiful place. When you lose your smile, you lose your way in the chaos of life.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “You are unique. You have different talents and abilities. You don’t have to always follow in the footsteps of others. And most important, you should always remind yourself that you don't have to do what everyone else is doing and have a responsibility to develop the talents you have been given.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “Each day brings new opportunities, allowing you to constantly live with love—be there for others—bring a little light into someone's day. Be grateful and live each day to the fullest.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “Happiness is not a goal...it's a by-product of a life well lived.”
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: “Love is our true destiny. We do not find the meaning of life by ourselves alone - we find it with another.”
quotes.author: Thomas Merton

quotes.quote: “Have patience with everything that remains unsolved in your heart. Try to love the questions themselves, like locked rooms and like books written in a foreign language. Do not now look for the answers. They cannot now be given to you because you could not live them. It is a question of experiencing everything. At present you need to live the question. Perhaps you will gradually, without even noticing it, find yourself experiencing the answer, some distant day.”
quotes.author: Rainer Maria Rilke

quotes.quote: “You Are the Master of Your Attitude
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “It is important that we forgive ourselves for making mistakes. We need to learn from our errors and move on.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “The best thing, though, in that museum was that everything always stayed right where it was. Nobody'd move. You could go there a hundred thousand times, and that Eskimo would still be just finished catching those two fish, the birds would still be on their way south, the deers would still be drinking out of that water hole, with their pretty antlers and they're pretty, skinny legs, and that squaw with the naked bosom would still be weaving that same blanket. Nobody's be different. The only thing that would be different would be you. Not that you'd be so much older or anything. It wouldn't be that, exactly. You'd just be different, that's all. You'd have an overcoat this time. Or the kid that was your partner in line the last time had got scarlet fever and you'd have a new partner. Or you'd have a substitute taking the class, instead of Miss Aigletinger. Or you'd heard your mother and father having a terrific fight in the bathroom. Or you'd just passed by one of those puddles in the street with gasoline rainbows in them. I mean you'd be different in some way—I can't explain what I mean. And even if I could, I'm not sure I'd feel like it.”
quotes.author: J.D. Salinger

quotes.quote: “Renew, release, let go. Yesterday’s gone. There’s nothing you can do to bring it back. You can’t “should’ve” done something. You can only DO something. Renew yourself. Release that attachment. Today is a new day!”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “Our lives are not as limited as we think they are; the world is a wonderfully weird place; consensual reality is significantly flawed; no institution can be trusted, but love does work; all things are possible; and we all could be happy and fulfilled if we only had the guts to be truly free and the wisdom to shrink our egos and quit taking ourselves so damn seriously.”
quotes.author: Tom Robbins

quotes.quote: “You were given life; it is your duty (and also your entitlement as a human being) to find something beautiful within life, no matter how slight.”
quotes.author: Elizabeth Gilbert

quotes.quote: “It was always the becoming he dreamed of, never the being.”
quotes.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quotes.quote: “Even for me life had its gleams of sunshine.”
quotes.author: Charlotte Brontë

quotes.quote: “Action expresses priorities.”
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: “I just wanted to tell you that I understand if you go. It’s okay if you have to leave us. It’s okay if you want to stop fighting.”
quotes.author: Gayle Forman

quotes.quote: “Life was meant to be lived, and curiosity must be kept alive. One must never, for whatever reason, turn his back on life.”
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: “Successful people are always looking for opportunities to help others.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: “Some things you hear with your ears. Others, you hear with your heart.”
quotes.author: Sarah J. Maas

quotes.quote: “We are all connected; To each other, biologically. To the earth, chemically. To the rest of the universe atomically.”
quotes.author: Neil DeGrasse Tyson

quotes.quote: “Whenever something bad happens, keep calm, take a few deep breaths and shift the focus to something positive.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “My life didn't please me, so I created my life.”
quotes.author: Coco Chanel

quotes.quote: “You don't have to disrespect and insult others simply to hold your own ground. If you do, that shows how shaky your own position is.”
quotes.author: Red Haircrow

quotes.quote: “The only way to survive eternity is to be able to appreciate each moment.”
quotes.author: Lauren Kate

quotes.quote: “ما تبحث عنه يبحث عنك”
quotes.author: جلال الدين الرومي

quotes.quote: “Your life is an occasion. Rise to it.”
quotes.author: Suzanne Weyn

quotes.quote: “Sure, we'd faced some things as children that a lot of kids don't. Sure, Justin had qualified for his Junior de Sade Badge in his teaching methods for dealing with pain. We still hadn't learned, though, that growing up is all about getting hurt. And then getting over it. You hurt. You recover. You move on. Odds are pretty good you're just going to get hurt again. But each time, you learn something.
quotes.author: Jim Butcher

quotes.quote: “I don't want to achieve immortality through my work; I want to achieve immortality through not dying. I don't want to live on in the hearts of my countrymen; I want to live on in my apartment.”
quotes.author: Woody Allen

quotes.quote: “Don’t let the noise of others’ opinions drown out your own inner voice."
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: “You cannot change anyone, but you can be the reason someone changes.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “I know it seems hard sometimes but remember one thing. Through every dark night, there's a bright day after that. So no matter how hard it get, stick your chest out, keep ya head up.... and handle it.”
quotes.author: Tupac Shakur

quotes.quote: “Get Off The Scale!
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “Your conscience is the measure of the honesty of your selfishness.
quotes.author: Richard Bach

quotes.quote: “I have always, essentially, been waiting. Waiting to become something else, waiting to be that person I always thought I was on the verge of becoming, waiting for that life I thought I would have. In my head, I was always one step away. In high school, I was biding my time until I could become the college version of myself, the one my mind could see so clearly. In college, the post-college “adult” person was always looming in front of me, smarter, stronger, more organized. Then the married person, then the person I’d become when we have kids. For twenty years, literally, I have waited to become the thin version of myself, because that’s when life will really begin.
quotes.author: Shauna Niequist

quotes.quote: “Bottom line is, even if you see 'em coming, you're not ready for the big moments. No one asks for their life to change, not really. But it does. So what are we, helpless? Puppets? No. The big moments are gonna come. You can't help that. It's what you do afterwards that counts. That's when you find out who you are.”
quotes.author: Joss Whedon

quotes.quote: “If you've never eaten while crying you don t know what life tastes like.”
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: “Nobody wants to be here and nobody wants to leave.”
quotes.author: Cormac McCarthy

quotes.quote: “Art is to console those who are broken by life.”
quotes.author: Vincent van Gogh

quotes.quote: “For I have known them all already, known them all—
quotes.author: T.S. Eliot

quotes.quote: “Amor Fati – “Love Your Fate”, which is in fact your life.”
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: “There's nothing more embarrassing than to have earned the disfavor of a perceptive animal.”
quotes.author: Michael Chabon

quotes.quote: “She just smiled, said that she loved books more than anything, and started telling him excitedly what each of the ones in her lap was about. And Ove realised that he wanted to hear her talking about the things she loved for the rest of his life.”
quotes.author: Fredrik Backman

quotes.quote: “Growing up happens when you start having things you look back on and wish you could change -Clary Fray”
quotes.author: Cassandra Clare

quotes.quote: “They had an ordinary life, full of ordinary things—if love can ever be called that.”
quotes.author: Leigh Bardugo

quotes.quote: “The person in life that you will always be with the most, is yourself. Because even when you are with others, you are still with yourself, too! When you wake up in the morning, you are with yourself, laying in bed at night you are with yourself, walking down the street in the sunlight you are with yourself.What kind of person do you want to walk down the street with? What kind of person do you want to wake up in the morning with? What kind of person do you want to see at the end of the day before you fall asleep? Because that person is yourself, and it's your responsibility to be that person you want to be with. I know I want to spend my life with a person who knows how to let things go, who's not full of hate, who's able to smile and be carefree. So that's who I have to be.”
quotes.author: C. JoyBell C.

quotes.quote: “I am afraid. Not of life, or death, or nothingness, but of wasting it as if I had never been.”
quotes.author: Daniel Keyes

quotes.quote: “Poetry is just the evidence of life. If your life is burning well, poetry is just the ash.”
quotes.author: Leonard Cohen

quotes.quote: “Cynics are simply thwarted romantics.”
quotes.author: William Goldman

quotes.quote: “Our lives are defined by opportunities, even the ones we miss.”
quotes.author: Eric Roth

quotes.quote: “You do not immortalize the lost by writing about them. Language buries, but does not resurrect.”
quotes.author: John Green

quotes.quote: “Yea, all things live forever, though at times they sleep and are forgotten.”
quotes.author: H. Rider Haggard

quotes.quote: “Very occasionally, if you pay really close attention, life doesn't suck.”
quotes.author: Joss Whedon

quotes.quote: “I feel that life is divided into the horrible and the miserable. That's the two categories. The horrible are like, I don't know, terminal cases, you know, and blind people, crippled. I don't know how they get through life. It's amazing to me. And the miserable is everyone else. So you should be thankful that you're miserable, because that's very lucky, to be miserable.”
quotes.author: Woody Allen

quotes.quote: “Prime numbers are what is left when you have taken all the patterns away. I think prime numbers are like life. They are very logical but you could never work out the rules, even if you spent all your time thinking about them.”
quotes.author: Mark Haddon

quotes.quote: “Art is the proper task of life. ”
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: “If there was anything that depressed him more than his own cynicism, it was that quite often it still wasn't as cynical as real life.”
quotes.author: Terry Pratchett

quotes.quote: “I have often wished I had time to cultivate modesty...But I am too busy thinking about myself.”
quotes.author: Edith Sitwell

quotes.quote: “Don’t let others tell you what you can’t do. Don't let the limitations of others limit your vision. If you can remove your self-doubt and believe in yourself, you can achieve what you never thought possible.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “The best of us must sometimes eat our words.”
quotes.author: J.K. Rowling

quotes.quote: “You're both the fire and the water that extinguishes it. You're the narrator, the protagonist, and the sidekick. You're the storyteller and the story told. You are somebody's something, but you are also your you.”
quotes.author: John Green

quotes.quote: “Moral wounds have this peculiarity - they may be hidden, but they never close; always painful, always ready to bleed when touched, they remain fresh and open in the heart.”
quotes.author: Alexandre Dumas

quotes.quote: “Women, they have minds, and they have souls, as well as just hearts. And they’ve got ambition, and they’ve got talent, as well as just beauty. I’m so sick of people saying that love is all a woman is fit for.”
quotes.author: Louisa May Alcott

quotes.quote: “When you compare the sorrows of real life to the pleasures of the imaginary one, you will never want to live again, only to dream forever.”
quotes.author: Alexandre Dumas

quotes.quote: “How would your life be different if…You walked away from gossip and verbal defamation? Let today be the day…You speak only the good you know of other people and encourage others to do the same.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “I'll never know, and neither will you, of the life you don't choose. We'll only know that whatever that sister life was, it was important and beautiful and not ours. It was the ghost ship that didn't carry us. There's nothing to do but salute it from the shore.”
quotes.author: Cheryl Strayed

quotes.quote: “There are no random acts...We are all connected...You can no more separate one life from another than you can separate a breeze from the wind...”
quotes.author: Mitch Albom

quotes.quote: “Forget yesterday - it has already forgotten you. Don't sweat tomorrow - you haven't even met. Instead, open your eyes and your heart to a truly precious gift - today.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “The story of life is quicker than the wink of an eye, the story of love is hello and goodbye...until we meet again”
quotes.author: Jimi Hendrix

quotes.quote: “It's not what you say out of your mouth that determines your life, it's what you whisper to yourself that has the most power!”
quotes.author: Robert T. Kiyosaki

quotes.quote: “You never knew the last time you were seeing someone. You didn't know when the last argument happened, or the last time you had sex, or the last time you looked into their eyes and thanked God they were in your life.
quotes.author: J.R. Ward

quotes.quote: “Don't think about making life better for other people who don't even deserve you, rather, focus on making your life the best, for yourself and those who love you.”
quotes.author: C. JoyBell C.

quotes.quote: “It is wise to direct your anger towards problems -- not people; to focus your energies on answers -- not excuses.”
quotes.author: William Arthur Ward

quotes.quote: “Remember that everyone you meet is afraid of something, loves something and has lost something.”
quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown

quotes.quote: “In all of living, have much fun and laughter. Life is to be enjoyed, not just endured.”
quotes.author: Gordon B. Hinckley

quotes.quote: “Life will not break your heart. It'll crush it.”
quotes.author: Henry Rollins

quotes.quote: “Life is like a novel. It's filled with suspense. You have no idea what is going to happen until you turn the page.”
quotes.author: sidney sheldon

quotes.quote: “How often do we tell our own life story? How often do we adjust, embellish, make sly cuts? And the longer life goes on, the fewer are those around to challenge our account, to remind us that our life is not our life, merely the story we have told about our life. Told to others, but—mainly—to ourselves.”
quotes.author: Julian Barnes

quotes.quote: “If you need something from somebody always give that person a way to hand it to you.”
quotes.author: Sue Monk Kidd

quotes.quote: “الندم هو صوت الفطرة لحظة الخطأ”
quotes.author: مصطفى محمود

quotes.quote: “There was beauty in the idea of freedom, but it was an illusion. Every human heart was chained by love.”
quotes.author: Cassandra Clare

quotes.quote: “When a man cannot choose, he ceases to be a man.”
quotes.author: Anthony Burgess

quotes.quote: “عجيبة هي الحياة بمنطقها المعاكس. أنت تركض خلف الأشياء لاهثاً، فتهرب الأشياء منك. وما تكاد تجلس وتقنع نفسك بأنها لا تستحق كل هذا الركض، حتى تأتيك هي لاهثة. وعندها لا تدري أيجب أن تدير لها ظهرك أم تفتح لها ذراعيك، وتتلقى هذه الهبة التي رمتها السماء إليك، والتي قد تكون فيها سعادتك، أو هلاكك؟”
quotes.author: أحلام مستغانمي

quotes.quote: “The best way to predict your future is to create it.”
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: “The person you became with her is worth being.”
quotes.author: Veronica Roth

quotes.quote: “At some point we all look up and realize we are lost in a maze.”
quotes.author: John Green

quotes.quote: “All human beings have three lives: public, private, and secret.”
quotes.author: Gabriel García Márquez

quotes.quote: “If there were such a thing as terminal literalism, you'd have died in childhood.”
quotes.author: Cassandra Clare

quotes.quote: “To be rejected by someone doesn't mean you should also reject yourself or that you should think of yourself as a lesser person. It doesn't mean that nobody will ever love you anymore. Remember that only ONE person has rejected you at the moment, and it only hurt so much because to you, that person's opinion symbolized the opinion of the whole world, of God.”
quotes.author: Jocelyn Soriano

quotes.quote: “Great leaders create more leaders, not followers.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “Don’t sacrifice yourself too much, because if you sacrifice too much there’s nothing else you can give and nobody will care for you.”
quotes.author: Karl Lagerfeld

quotes.quote: “If your daily life seems poor, do not blame it; blame yourself, tell yourself that you are not poet enough to call forth its riches; for to the creator there is no poverty and no poor indifferent place.”
quotes.author: Rainer Maria Rilke

quotes.quote: “Follow your bliss and the universe will open doors for you where there were only walls.”
quotes.author: Joseph Campbell

quotes.quote: “I think that the best thing we can do for our children is to allow them to do things for themselves, allow them to be strong, allow them to experience life on their own terms, allow them to take the subway... let them be better people, let them believe more in themselves.”
quotes.author: C. JoyBell C.

quotes.quote: “If you want to be a grocer, or a general, or a politician, or a judge, you will invariably become it; that is your punishment. If you never know what you want to be, if you live what some might call the dynamic life but what I will call the artistic life, if each day you are unsure of who you are and what you know you will never become anything, and that is your reward.”
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: “Too many people spend money they haven't earned, to buy things they don't want, to impress people that they don't like.”
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.quote: “The Laughing Heart
quotes.author: Charles Bukowski

quotes.quote: “Choosing a path meant having to miss out on others. She had a whole life to live, and she was always thinking that, in the future, she might regret the choices she made now. “I’m afraid of committing myself,” she thought to herself. She wanted to follow all possible paths and so ended up following none. Even in that most important area of her life, love, she had failed to commit herself. After her first romantic disappointment, she had never again given herself entirely. She feared pan, loss, and separation. These things were inevitable on the path to love, and the only way of avoiding them was by deciding not to take that path at all. In order not to suffer, you had to renounce love. It was like putting out your own eyes not to see the bad things in life.”
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: “You will be required to do wrong no matter where you go. It is the basic condition of life, to be required to violate your own identity. At some time, every creature which lives must do so. It is the ultimate shadow, the defeat of creation; this is the curse at work, the curse that feeds on all life. Everywhere in the universe.”
quotes.author: Philip K. Dick

quotes.quote: “We demand rigidly defined areas of doubt and uncertainty!”
quotes.author: Douglas Adams

quotes.quote: “I like the scientific spirit—the holding off, the being sure but not too sure, the willingness to surrender ideas when the evidence is against them: this is ultimately fine—it always keeps the way beyond open—always gives life, thought, affection, the whole man, a chance to try over again after a mistake—after a wrong guess.”
quotes.author: Walt Whitman

quotes.quote: “We are stuck with technology when what we really want is just stuff that works.”
quotes.author: Douglas Adams

quotes.quote: “I'm the girl nobody knows until she commits suicide. Then suddenly everyone had a class with her.”
quotes.author: Tom Leveen

quotes.quote: “When things go wrong, don't go with them.”
quotes.author: Elvis Presley

quotes.quote: “Oh, don't cry, I'm so sorry I cheated so much, but that's the way things are.”
quotes.author: Vladimir Nabokov

quotes.quote: “Life is funny. Things change, people change, but you will always be you, so stay true to yourself and never sacrifice who you are for anyone.”
quotes.author: Zayn Malik

quotes.quote: “I want words at my funeral. But I guess that means you need life in your life.”
quotes.author: Markus Zusak

quotes.quote: “The truth is that the world is full of dragons, and none of us are as powerful or cool as we’d like to be. And that sucks. But when you’re confronted with that fact, you can either crawl into a hole and quit, or you can get out there, take off your shoes, and Bilbo it up.”
quotes.author: Patrick Rothfuss

quotes.quote: “Mistakes are, after all, the foundations of truth, and if a man does not know what a thing is, it is at least an increase in knowledge if he knows what it is not. ”
quotes.author: Carl G. Jung

quotes.quote: “I want to live my life in such a way that when I get out of bed in the morning, the devil says, "aw shit, he's up!”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “You know what I think?" she says. "That people's memories are maybe the fuel they burn to stay alive. Whether those memories have any actual importance or not, it doesn't matter as far as the maintenance of life is concerned. They're all just fuel. Advertising fillers in the newspaper, philosophy books, dirty pictures in a magazine, a bundle of ten-thousand-yen bills: when you feed 'em to the fire, they're all just paper. The fire isn't thinking 'Oh, this is Kant,' or 'Oh, this is the Yomiuri evening edition,' or 'Nice tits,' while it burns. To the fire, they're nothing but scraps of paper. It's the exact same thing. Important memories, not-so-important memories, totally useless memories: there's no distinction--they're all just fuel.”
quotes.author: Haruki Murakami

quotes.quote: “I don't know why we are here, but I'm pretty sure that it is not in order to enjoy ourselves.”
quotes.author: Ludwig Wittgenstein

quotes.quote: “Life, with its rules, its obligations, and its freedoms, is like a sonnet: You're given the form, but you have to write the sonnet yourself. - Mrs. Whatsit”
quotes.author: Madeleine L'Engle

quotes.quote: “Nobody sees anybody truly but all through the flaws of their own egos. That is the way we all see ...each other in life. Vanity, fear, desire, competition-- all such distortions within our own egos-- condition our vision of those in relation to us. Add to those distortions to our own egos the corresponding distortions in the egos of others, and you see how cloudy the glass must become through which we look at each other. That's how it is in all living relationships except when there is that rare case of two people who love intensely enough to burn through all those layers of opacity and see each other's naked hearts.”
quotes.author: Tennessee Williams

quotes.quote: “Then I discovered that being related is no guarantee of love!”
quotes.author: Stieg Larsson

quotes.quote: “Hollowness: that I understand. I'm starting to believe that there isn't anything you can do to fix it. That's what I've taken from the therapy sessions: the holes in your life are permanent. You have to grow around them, like tree roots around concrete; you mold yourself through the gaps”
quotes.author: Paula Hawkins

quotes.quote: “Home wasn't a set house, or a single town on a map. It was wherever the people who loved you were, whenever you were together. Not a place, but a moment, and then another, building on each other like bricks to create a solid shelter that you take with you for your entire life, wherever you may go.”
quotes.author: Sarah Dessen

quotes.quote: “Every atom in your body came from a star that exploded. And, the atoms in your left hand probably came from a different star than your right hand. It really is the most poetic thing I know about physics: You are all stardust. You couldn’t be here if stars hadn’t exploded, because the elements - the carbon, nitrogen, oxygen, iron, all the things that matter for evolution and for life - weren’t created at the beginning of time. They were created in the nuclear furnaces of stars, and the only way for them to get into your body is if those stars were kind enough to explode. So, forget Jesus. The stars died so that you could be here today.”
quotes.author: Lawrence M. Krauss

quotes.quote: “To travel is to live.”
quotes.author: Hans Christian Andersen

quotes.quote: “Just keep moving forward and don't give a shit about what anybody thinks. Do what you have to do, for you.”
quotes.author: Johnny Depp

quotes.quote: “The future is something which everyone reaches at the rate of sixty minutes an hour, whatever he does, whoever he is.”
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: “And therein lies the whole of man's plight. Human time does not turn in a circle; it runs ahead in a straight line. That is why man cannot be happy: happiness is the longing for repetition.”
quotes.author: Milan Kundera

quotes.quote: “There are, it has been said, two types of people in the world. There are those who, when presented with a glass that is exactly half full, say: this glass is half full. And then there are those who say: this glass is half empty.
quotes.author: Terry Pratchett

quotes.quote: “Life isn't as serious as the mind makes it out to be.”
quotes.author: Eckhart Tolle

quotes.quote: “The cost of a thing is the amount of what I will call life which is required to be exchanged for it, immediately or in the long run.”
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: “A kind gesture can reach a wound that only compassion can heal.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “All opinions are not equal. Some are a very great deal more robust, sophisticated and well supported in logic and argument than others.”
quotes.author: Douglas Adams

quotes.quote: “Life is a funny thing. We only get so many years to live it, so we have to do everything we can to make sure those years are as full as they can be. We shouldn't waste time on things that might happen someday, or maybe even never.”
quotes.author: Colleen Hoover

quotes.quote: “No one here gets out alive.”
quotes.author: Jim Morrison

quotes.quote: “No one should ever ask themselves that: why am I unhappy? The question carries within it the virus that will destroy everything. If we ask that question, it means we want to find out what makes us happy. If what makes us happy is different from what we have now, then we must either change once and for all or stay as we are, feeling even more unhappy.”
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: “Pulvis et umbra sumus. ()”
quotes.author: Horace

quotes.quote: “Turn your obstacles into opportunities and your problems into possibilities.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “One of the most spiritual things you can do is embrace your humanity. Connect with those around you today. Say, "I love you", "I'm sorry", "I appreciate you", "I'm proud of you"...whatever you're feeling. Send random texts, write a cute note, embrace your truth and share it...cause a smile today for someone else...and give plenty of hugs.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “It scares me how hard it is to remember life before you. I can't even make the comparisons anymore, because my memories of that time have all the depth of a photograph. It seems foolish to play games of better and worse. It's simply a matter of is and is no longer.”
quotes.author: David Levithan

quotes.quote: “Here's what I think, Mr. Wind-Up Bird," said May Kasahara. "Everybody's born with some different thing at the core of their existence. And that thing, whatever it is, becomes like a heat source that runs each person from the inside. I have one too, of course. Like everybody else. But sometimes it gets out of hand. It swells or shrinks inside me, and it shakes me up. What I'd really like to do is find a way to communicate that feeling to another person. But I can't seem to do it. They just don't get it. Of course, the problem could be that I'm not explaining it very well, but I think it's because they're not listening very well. They pretend to be listening, but they're not, really. So I get worked up sometimes, and I do some crazy things.”
quotes.author: Haruki Murakami

quotes.quote: “If you want to identify me, ask me not where I live, or what I like to eat, or how I comb my hair, but ask me what I am living for, in detail, ask me what I think is keeping me from living fully for the thing I want to live for.”
quotes.author: Thomas Merton

quotes.quote: “Most things are forgotten over time. Even the war itself, the life-and-death struggle people went through is now like something from the distant past. We’re so caught up in our everyday lives that events of the past are no longer in orbit around our minds. There are just too many things we have to think about everyday, too many new things we have to learn. But still, no matter how much time passes, no matter what takes place in the interim, there are some things we can never assign to oblivion, memories we can never rub away. They remain with us forever, like a touchstone.”
quotes.author: haruki murakami

quotes.quote: “People rarely bring flowers to a suicide.”
quotes.author: Jennifer Niven

quotes.quote: “He walked out in the gray light and stood and he saw for a brief moment the absolute truth of the world. The cold relentless circling of the intestate earth. Darkness implacable. The blind dogs of the sun in their running. The crushing black vacuum of the universe. And somewhere two hunted animals trembling like ground-foxes in their cover. Borrowed time and borrowed world and borrowed eyes with which to sorrow it.”
quotes.author: Cormac McCarthy

quotes.quote: “I seem to have run in a great circle, and met myself again on the starting line.”
quotes.author: Jeanette Winterson

quotes.quote: “How terribly sad it was that people are made in such a way that they get used to something as extraordinary as living.”
quotes.author: Jostein Gaarder

quotes.quote: “To move, to breathe, to fly, to float,
quotes.author: Hans Christian Andersen

quotes.quote: “If you only shine light on your flaws, all your perfects will dim.”
quotes.author: Colleen Hoover

quotes.quote: “Life is not a PG feel-good movie. Real life often ends badly. Literature tries to document this reality, while showing us it is still possible for us to endure nobly.”
quotes.author: Matthew Quick

quotes.quote: “Taking pictures is savoring life intensely, every hundredth of a second.”
quotes.author: Marc Riboud

quotes.quote: “We never know which lives we influence, or when, or why.”
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.quote: “We should forgive our enemies, but not before they are hanged”
quotes.author: Heinrich Heine

quotes.quote: “Keep love in your heart. A life without it is like a sunless garden when the flowers are dead. The consciousness of loving and being loved brings a warmth and a richness to life that nothing else can bring.”
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: “But I have learned that you make your own happiness, that part of going for what you want means losing something else. And when the stakes are high, the losses can be that much greater.”
quotes.author: Emily Giffin

quotes.quote: “There is more to life than simply increasing its speed.”
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: “There is no escape—we pay for the violence of our ancestors.”
quotes.author: Frank Herbert

quotes.quote: “The human race tends to remember the abuses to which it has been subjected rather than the endearments. What's left of kisses? Wounds, however, leave scars.”
quotes.author: Bertolt Brecht

quotes.quote: “Each affects the other, and the other affects the next, and the world is full of stories, but the stories are all one.”
quotes.author: Mitch Albom

quotes.quote: “If you don’t give up on something you truly believe in, you will find a way.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “But the effect of her being on those around her was incalculably diffusive: for the growing good of the world is partly dependent on unhistoric acts; and that things are not so ill with you and me as they might have been, is half owing to the number who lived faithfully a hidden life, and rest in unvisited tombs.”
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: “O Me! O life!... of the questions of these recurring;
quotes.author: Walt Whitman

quotes.quote: “Science is organized knowledge. Wisdom is organized life.”
quotes.author: Will Durant

quotes.quote: “You can live your whole life not realizing that what you're looking for is right in front of you.”
quotes.author: David Nicholls

quotes.quote: “The more you praise and celebrate your life, the more there is in life to celebrate.”
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: “Never let hard lessons harden your heart; the hard lessons of life are meant to make you better, not bitter.”
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: “Quiet is peace. Tranquility. Quiet is turning down the volume knob on life. Silence is pushing the off button. Shutting it down. All of it. - Amir”
quotes.author: Khaled Hosseini

quotes.quote: “When you hold a grudge, you want someone else’s sorrow to reflect your level of hurt but the two rarely meet.”
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: “The only position that leaves me with no cognitive dissonance is atheism. It is not a creed. Death is certain, replacing both the siren-song of Paradise and the dread of Hell. Life on this earth, with all its mystery and beauty and pain, is then to be lived far more intensely: we stumble and get up, we are sad, confident, insecure, feel loneliness and joy and love. There is nothing more; but I want nothing more.”
quotes.author: Ayaan Hirsi Ali

quotes.quote: “My destination is no longer a place, rather a new way of seeing.”
